Question #1 (ID: 476466)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin \frac{x}{2}[/math] হলে [math]f^{\prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{4 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-1}{4 \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(\mathrm{x})=\sin \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}, f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{1}{2} \cos \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}, f^{\prime \prime}(\mathrm{x})=-\frac{1}{4} \sin \frac{\mathrm{x}}{2} \\\therefore f^{\prime }\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=-\frac{1}{4} \sin \frac{\pi}{4}=-\frac{1}{4} \times \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{-1}{4 \sqrt{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #2 (ID: 476467)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=\mathbf{a}(\theta-\sin \theta);[/math] এবং [math]y=a(1+\cos \theta)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{\mathbf{d y}}{\mathbf{d x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\cot \left(\frac{\theta}{2}\right)[/math]
B. [math]-\sin \theta[/math]
C. [math]1-\cos \theta[/math]
D. [math]-\tan \left(\frac{\theta}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\cot \left(\frac{\theta}{2}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=\mathrm{a}(\theta-\sin \theta)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{a}(1-\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{a}(1+\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{a} \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{-\mathrm{a} \sin \theta}{\mathrm{a}(1-\cos \theta)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #3 (ID: 476468)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-15 x^{2}+36 x+10[/math] ফাংশনটি কোন ব্যবধিতে হ্রাস পায় ?

Options:
ক. [math]x>1[/math]
খ. [math]x<2[/math]
গ. [math]x>3[/math]
ঘ. [math]2


Correct Answer: D.[math]2

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=2 x^{3}-15 x^{2}+36 x+10 \\f^{\prime}(x)=6 x^{2}-30 x+36=6\left(x^{2}-5 x+6\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow6(x-2)(x-3) ; 2 [math]x-2>0[/math]
এবং [math]x-3<0[/math]
 সুতরাং [math]f^{\prime}(x)<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]2

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #4 (ID: 476469)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-y^{2}=5[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](−3, 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}x^{2}-y^{2}=5 \Rightarrow 2 x-2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{x}{y} \\\therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(-3,2)}=\frac{-3}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #5 (ID: 476470)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=\ell[/math] এবং [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} g(x)=m[/math] হয় -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i.}\quad \lim _{x \rightarrow a}[f(x)-g(x)]=\ell-m\\\text{ii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} g(x) f(x)=m \ell\\\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{g(x)}{f(x)}=\frac{\ell}{m}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=l[/math]
 এবং [math]g(x)=m[/math]
 হলে,[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{g(x)}{f(x)}=\frac{m}{l}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { iii }[/math]
 নং তথ্যটি সঠিক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #6 (ID: 476471)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin 2 x[/math] হলে -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad y_{1}=2 \cos 2 x\\\text{ii. } y_{2}+4 y=0\\\text{iii. } y_{3}-4 y_{1}=0\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sin 2 x \\\Rightarrow y_{1}=2 \cos 2 x[(i)\end{array}[/math]
 নং সঠিক ][math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y_{2}=2(-2 \sin 2 x) \\\Rightarrow y_{2}=-4 \sin 2 x \\\Rightarrow y_{2}=-4 y \\\Rightarrow y_{2}+4 y=0[(i i)\end{array}[/math]
নং সঠিক ][math]\Rightarrow y_{3}+4 y_{1}=0 \text { (iii) }[/math]
 নং সঠিক ]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #7 (ID: 476472)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+5[/math] হলে -

[math]\text { i. } x<-1[/math] এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math] একটি ক্রমহ্রাসমান ফাংশন

[math]\text { ii. } f(x)[/math] -এর ক্ষুদ্রতম মান 6

[math]\text { iii. } f^{\prime \prime}(0)=-2[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-x^{2}-2 x+5=-(x+1)^{2}+6[/math]সুতরাং ফাংশনটি ক্রমহ্রাসমান এবং এর ক্ষুদ্রতম মান নেই। (ii) সঠিক নয় ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #8 (ID: 476473)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(\mathbf{x})[/math] ফাংশন [math]x = b[/math] বিন্দুতে অবিচ্ছিন্ন হলে—

[math]\text { i. } f(\mathrm{~b})[/math] সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়

[math]\text { ii. } \lim _{\mathrm{x} \rightarrow \mathrm{b}} f(\mathrm{x})[/math] বিদ্যমান থাকে না

[math]\text { iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow b} f(x)=f(b)[/math] হয়

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ii. সঠিক নয় [math]f (x)[/math]
 ফাংশন [math]x = b[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অবিচ্ছিন্ন হলে- [math]\lim _{\mathrm{x} \rightarrow \mathrm{b}} f(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 বিদ্যমান

Explanation:

Question #9 (ID: 476474)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]y=3 x(x-2)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

বক্ররেখাটির [math](2, 0)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-12[/math]
খ. [math]-6[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=3 x(x-2)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-6 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=6 x-6[/math]
 [math](2,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(2,0)}[/math]
 [math]=6.2-6=12-6=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #10 (ID: 476475)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = 3x (x – 2)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y+6 x=0[/math]
খ. [math]y-6 x=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+6 y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-6 y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]y+6 x=0[/math]

Solution:
[math](0,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(0,0)}=6.0-6=-6[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে স্পশর্কের সমীকরণ, [math]y-0=-6(x-0)[/math]
 [math]\therefore y+6 x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #11 (ID: 476476)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math]

ফাংশনটির কোন বিন্দুতে অংকিত স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{-1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{-1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{x} \therefore f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-1[/math]
স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হলে,[math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow 2 x-1=0 \quad \therefore x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1-2}{4}=\frac{-1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #12 (ID: 476477)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\ f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math] ফাংশনটির চরম মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]99 .[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=a x^{2}+b x+c[/math]
 : (কোনো দ্বিঘাত ফাংশনের চরম মান)(সর্বোচ্চ/সর্বনিম্ন) [math]=c-\frac{b^{2}}{4 a}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math]
 ফাংশনটির চরম মান [math]=0-\frac{(-1)^{2}}{4.1}=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #13 (ID: 476478)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin 2 x}{\cos x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{-\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin 2 x}{\cos x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{-\pi}{2}} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{\cos x} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{-\pi}{2}} 2 \sin x=2 \sin \left(\frac{-\pi}{2}\right)=2(-1)=-2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #14 (ID: 476479)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x^{\circ}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x^{\circ}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}}[/math]
 [math]\lim _{\dfrac{\pi x}{180}\rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{\pi x}{180}}{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}} \times \frac{180}{\pi}=\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #15 (ID: 476480)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-\cos 2 x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-\cos 2 x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{2 \sin ^{2} x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{2} \sin x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2} \cdot 1[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #16 (ID: 476481)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 4 x}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan ^{-1} 4 x=\theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{\tan \theta}{4}[/math]
এবং [math]x \rightarrow 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]\theta \rightarrow 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 4 x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\theta}{\frac{\tan \theta}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \cdot \frac{1}{\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan \theta}{\theta}}=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #17 (ID: 476482)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{3 x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2} \text {}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan ^{-1} 2 x=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x=\tan y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x=\frac{3}{2} \tan y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{3 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{y}{\frac{3}{2} \tan y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} \times \frac{1}{\lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan y}{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #18 (ID: 476483)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{\theta}{2}}{\theta}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{\theta}{2}}{\theta}=\frac{1}{2} \lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{\theta}{2}}{\frac{\theta}{2}} \\\quad=\frac{1}{2} \times 1=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #20 (ID: 476485)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}+3 x+4}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\infty[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}+3 x+4}} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}\left(1+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{4}{x^{2}}\right)}} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{x \sqrt{1+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{4}{x^{2}}}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1+\frac{3}{\infty}+\frac{4}{\infty^{2}}}}=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1+0+0}}=-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #21 (ID: 476486)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x \sin \left(\frac{2}{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\frac{2}{x}=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x \sin \left(\frac{2}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{2}{y} \sin y[/math]
 [math]=2 . \lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin y}{y}[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #22 (ID: 476487)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x+1}{5 x^{2}-6}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x+1}{5 x^{2}-6}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\frac{2}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}}{5-\frac{6}{x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{2}{\alpha}+\frac{1}{\alpha ^{2}}}{5-\frac{6}{\alpha ^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0}{5}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #23 (ID: 476488)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{5} x\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{e} 5[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{5 \ln x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln 5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \ln 5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{5} x\right)=\frac{1}{x} \log _{5} e=\frac{1}{x} \cdot \frac{1}{\log _{e} 5}=\frac{1}{x \ln 5}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #25 (ID: 476490)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos 7 x^{\circ}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]-7 \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \left(\cos 7 x^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{7 x \pi}{180}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\sin \frac{7 x \pi}{180} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{7 x \pi}{180}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #28 (ID: 476493)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)^{}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\ln (x)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln (x)}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln (x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \ln (x)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \ln (\ln x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\ln x} \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #29 (ID: 476494)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos \sqrt{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\cos \sqrt{\mathrm{x}})=(-\sin \sqrt{\mathrm{x}}) \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}})=\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #30 (ID: 476495)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{-\frac{3}{2} x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{2}{3} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\frac{-3}{2} x}\right)=e^{\frac{-3}{2} x}\left(\frac{-3}{2}\right)=-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3}{2} x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #31 (ID: 476496)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cot (2 \sqrt{x}))=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \{\cot (2 \sqrt{x})\}[/math]
 [math]=-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x}) \frac{d}{d x}(2 \sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]=-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})\left\{\left\{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}\right\}=\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{\sqrt{x}}\right.[/math]


Explanation:

Question #32 (ID: 476497)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x}{1-\dot{x}^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Question #33 (ID: 476498)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{x^{2}}\right)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{x^{2}} 2(1+\ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{x^{2}} 2 x(1+\ln x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \ln x)[/math]
D. [math]x^{x^{2}-1} \cdot 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \ln x)[/math]

Solution:
ধরি , [math]y=x^{x^{2}} \Rightarrow \ln y=x^{2} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y^{}} \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot 2 x \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \cdot \ln x) \\\therefore \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{x^{2}}\right)=x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \cdot \ln x)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #34 (ID: 476499)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=a(\theta-\sin \theta)[/math] এবং [math]y=a^{}(1+\cos \theta)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\sin \theta[/math]
C. [math]1-\cos \theta[/math]
D. [math]-\tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}x=a(\theta-\sin \theta) \therefore \frac{d x}{d \theta}=a(1-\cos \theta) \\y=a(1+\cos \theta) \therefore \frac{d y}{d \theta}=-a \sin \theta \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-a \sin \theta}{a(1-\cos \theta)}=\frac{-2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}=-\cot \frac{\theta}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #35 (ID: 476500)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{7}}{d x^{7}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]6 ![/math]
B. [math]7 ![/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]30[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(x^{n}\right) n ![/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)=5 \cdot \frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(x^{6}\right)=5 \times 6 ![/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)=5 \cdot \frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(x^{6}\right)=5 \times 6 ![/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\frac{d^{10}}{d x^{10}}\left(x^{10}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]10![/math]
B. [math]12![/math]
C. [math]15![/math]
D. [math]8![/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]10![/math]

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]x^{n}[/math]
 এর n-তম অন্তরজ[math]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(x^{n}\right)^{} =n ! \frac{d^{10}}{d x^{10}}\left(x^{10}\right)=10 ![/math]

Question #37 (ID: 476502)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো একটি বস্তুর অতিক্রান্ত দূরত্ব [math]s=5 t^{3}-9 t^{2}+3 t-2[/math] হলে, [math]4[/math] সেকেন্ড পর বেগ কত হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]71[/math]
খ. [math]171[/math]
গ. [math]243[/math]
ঘ. [math]343[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]171[/math]

Solution:
বেগ [math]v=\frac{d s}{d t}=15 t^{2}-18 t+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore 4[/math]
 সেকেন্ড [math](t=4)[/math]
 এর বেগ [math]=15.4^{2}-18.4+3=171 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #38 (ID: 476503)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-2 y=10[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-4, 3)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]14[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-2 y=10 \Rightarrow 2 x-\frac{2 d y}{d x}=0 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore(-4,3)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=-4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #39 (ID: 476504)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-x y[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{6}\right)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{5}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{5}{9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=x^{2}-x y \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}-x y\right)=2 x-x \frac{d y}{d x}-y \cdot 1 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}+x \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-y \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2 x-y}{1+x}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{6}\right)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]=\frac{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{6}}{1+\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{6-1}{6} \times \frac{2}{3}=\frac{5}{9}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #40 (ID: 476505)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-y^{2}=5[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-3, 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-y^{2}[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x-2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)(-3,2)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #41 (ID: 476506)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x \ln x[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]X[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তার ভুজ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]e[/math]
খ. [math]-e[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x \ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের ঢাল, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot 1=1+\ln x[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]1+\ln x=0\Rightarrow \ln x=-1 \Rightarrow x=e^{-1}=\frac{1}{e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #42 (ID: 476507)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1-x)[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime }(\mathrm{2})[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1-x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{-1}{1-{x}}[/math]
 এবং [math]f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{-1}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(2)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{(1-2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{(-1)^{2}}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #43 (ID: 476508)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin \frac{x}{2}[/math] হলে [math]f^{\prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{4 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-1}{4 \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin \frac{x}{2}, f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}, f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{4} \sin \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime \prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{4} \sin \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{4} \times \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{4 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #44 (ID: 476509)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x(1-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]-6[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x(1-x)=x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=c-\frac{b^{2}}{4 a}=0-\frac{1}{4(-1)}=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #45 (ID: 476510)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর মান কত হলে [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math] এর মান ক্ষুদ্রতম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
খ. [math]e[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-e[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{\ln x \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(x)-x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)}{(\ln x)^{2}}=\frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
শর্তমতে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow \frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow \ln x-1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=1 \Rightarrow \ln x=\ln e \therefore x=\mathrm{e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #46 (ID: 476511)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=\ell[/math] এবং [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} g(x)=m[/math] হয়-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \lim _{x \rightarrow a}[f(x)-g(x)]=\ell-m\\\text{ii. } \lim _{\mathrm{x} \rightarrow a} \mathrm{~g}(\mathrm{x}) f(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{m} \text{.}\\\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{g(x)}{f^{\prime}(x)}=\frac{\ell}{\mathrm{m}}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=l[/math]
 এবং [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} g(x)=m[/math]
 হলে,[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{g(x)}{f(x)}=\frac{m}{l}[/math]
lim [math]g(x)_m f(x) = 7[/math]
 x→a Лx)[math]\therefore \mathrm{iii}[/math]
 নং তথ্যটি সঠিক নয় ।

Explanation:

Question #47 (ID: 476512)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=\ell[/math] এবং [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} g(x)=m[/math] হয়-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \lim _{x \rightarrow a}[f(x)-g(x)]=\ell-\mathrm{m}\\\text{ii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} \mathrm{~g}(\mathrm{x}) f(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{m} \text{.}\\\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{g(x)}{f^{\prime}(x)}=\frac{l}{\mathrm{~m}}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও ii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=l[/math]
 এবং [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} g(x)=m[/math]
 হলে[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{g(x)}{f(x)}=\frac{\mathrm{m}}{l}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { iii }[/math]
 নং তথ্যটি সঠিক নয়।

Explanation:

Question #48 (ID: 476513)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশন [math]x = b[/math] বিন্দুতে অবিচ্ছিন্ন হলে-

i. [math]f(b)[/math] সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়

ii. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow b} f(x)[/math] বিদ্যমান থাকে না

iii. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow b} f(x)=f(b)[/math] হয়

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ii. সঠিক নয়। [math]f (x)[/math]
 ফাংশন [math]x = b[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অবিচ্ছিন্ন হলে [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow b} f(x)[/math]
 বিদ্যমান

Explanation:

Question #49 (ID: 476514)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=3 x(x-2)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

বক্ররেখাটির [math](2, 0)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-12[/math]
খ. [math]-6[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]{c}y=3 x(x-2)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-6 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=6 x-6[/math]
 [math](2,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]\left.\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right|_{(2,0)}[/math]
 [math]=6.2-6[/math]
 [math]=12-6=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #50 (ID: 476515)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=3 x(x-2)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y+6 x = 0[/math]
খ. [math]y-6 x=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+6 y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-6 y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]y+6 x = 0[/math]

Solution:
[math](0 , 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল, [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(0,0)}=6.0-6=-6[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে স্পশর্কের সমীকরণ, [math]y-0=-6(x-0)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}+6 \mathrm{x}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #51 (ID: 476516)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math]

ফাংশনটির কোন বিন্দুতে অংকিত স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{-1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{-1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-x \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 x-1[/math]
স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হলে,[math]f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=0 \Rightarrow 2 x-1=0 \quad \therefore x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 হলে [math]f(x)=\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1-2}{4}=\frac{-1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #52 (ID: 476358)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\sin ^{-1} 2 x}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{-2}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{2\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} 2 x\right)=\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1-(2 x)^{2}}} \dfrac{d}{d x}(2 x)=\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{1-4 x^{2}}}}[/math]

Question #53 (ID: 476359)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right\}=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x^{2}}}}[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{1}{1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{1}{1+e^{x^{2}}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm { \dfrac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right\}=\dfrac{1}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} \cdot e^{x}=\dfrac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}}[/math]

Question #54 (ID: 476360)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm {f(x)=e^{-2 x}}[/math] [math]\large {\mathrm {\overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~\frac{f(x)-1}{x}=}}[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. -2
খ. 0
গ. 2
ঘ. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
-2

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l} \large { \mathrm { \overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{f(x)-1}{x}}} \\ \large { \mathrm {= \overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{e^{-2 x}-1}{x}= ~ \overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{-2 e^{-2 x}}{1}}} \normalsize {[\text { L Hospital rule] }} \\ =-2\end{array}[/math]

Question #55 (ID: 476361)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm {f(x)=e^{-2 x}}[/math] [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\{f(x) \cdot \cos x\}=}[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}}(\sin \mathrm{x}-2 \cos \mathrm{x})[/math]
খ. [math]-\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}}(\sin \mathrm{x}+2 \cos \mathrm{x})[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm { e^{-2 x}(\sin x+2 \cos x)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm { e^{-2 x}(\sin x-2 \cos x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\mathrm{e}^{-2 \mathrm{x}}(\sin \mathrm{x}+2 \cos \mathrm{x})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\{f(x) \cdot \cos x\}=\dfrac{d}{d x}\left\{e^{-2 x} \cos x\right\} }\\\mathrm {=e^{-2 x}(-\sin x)+\cos x e^{-2 x}(-2) }\\\mathrm {=-2 x \cdot e^{-2 x} \sin x-2 e^{-2 x} \cos x=-e^{-2 x}(\sin x+2 \cos x)}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #56 (ID: 476362)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {e^{xy+3} = 2}[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm {\frac{dy}{dx}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{y}{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{x}{y}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{ln2}{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{ln2}{xy}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{y}{x}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{xy}+3}=2 \Rightarrow \ln \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{xy}+3}=\ln 2 \Rightarrow \mathrm {x y+3 =\ln 2} \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{x} \dfrac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}+\mathrm{y} \cdot 1+0=0 \quad \therefore \dfrac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=-\dfrac{\mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{x}}\end{array}[/math]

Sub-Questions:

Question #57 (ID: 476363)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {x^y=e^{x+y}}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm {\frac{dy}{dx}} = ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm { \frac{x-y}{x(1-\ln x)}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm { \frac{x-y}{x(\ln x-1)}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm { \frac{y-x}{x(\ln x-1)}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm { \frac{x-y}{\ln x-1}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm { \frac{x-y}{x(\ln x-1)}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l} \mathrm {x^{y}=e^{x+y} \Rightarrow \ln x=\ln e^{x+y}} \\ \therefore \mathrm { y \ln x=x+y} \dots \quad \dots \quad \dots \text{(i)} \end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math]\text {(i)}[/math]
 এর উভয়পক্ষে [math]\mathrm {x}[/math]
 এর সাকেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে পাই,[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{y}{x}+\ln x \cdot \dfrac{d y}{d x}=1+\dfrac{d y}{d x} \Rightarrow \dfrac{d y}{d x}(\ln x-1)=1-\dfrac{y}{x} \therefore \dfrac{d y}{d x}=\dfrac{x-y}{x(\ln x-1)}}[/math]

Question:
[math]\mathrm {y=\ln e^{x^{2}}}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm {y_2} = ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {2x}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {e^{x^{2}} \ln e^{x^{2}}}[/math]
C. 2
D. [math]\mathrm {e^{x^2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
2

Explanation:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\ln \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \text {. ln } \mathrm{e}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \quad \therefore \mathrm{y}_{1}=2 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 ও [math]\mathrm{y}_{2}=2[/math]

Question #60 (ID: 476366)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {f(1)=6, f^{\prime}(1)=3}[/math] হলে, [math]\text x = 0[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left\{\log f\left(e^{x}\right)\right\}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. 2
B. 1
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. 0


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\dfrac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left\{\log \mathrm{f}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)\right\}=\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{f}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)} \cdot \mathrm{f}^{\prime}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে নির্ণেয় মান [math]=\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{f}(1)}, \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(1)=\dfrac{3}{6}=\dfrac{1}{2}[/math]

Question #61 (ID: 476367)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\mathrm {y = \sec x}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\mathrm {y_2 + y}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. 2
B. [math]\mathrm {2y}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {2y^2}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {2y^3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {2y^3}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l} \mathrm { y=\sec x \Rightarrow y_{1}=\sec x \tan x }\\\Rightarrow \mathrm { y_{2}=\sec ^{3} \cdot \sec ^{2} x+\tan x \cdot \sec x \tan x } \\\qquad \mathrm {=\sec ^{3} x+\sec x \cdot \tan ^{2} x=\sec ^{3} x+\sec x\left(\sec ^{2} x-1\right) } \\\mathrm { \qquad=\sec ^{3} x+\sec ^{3} x-\sec x=y^{3}+y^{3}-y=2 y^{3}-y} \\\mathrm { \therefore y_{2}+y=2 y^{3}}\end{array}[/math]

Sub-Questions:

Question #62 (ID: 476368)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023, 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board, Dhaka Board | Tags: Chattogram Board, Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {y = \frac{1}{x^3}}[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-1, −1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. -3
খ. -1
গ. 1
ঘ. 3


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
-3

Explanation:
নির্ণেয় ঢাল [math]=\left.\dfrac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right|_{(-1,-1)}=\left.\dfrac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{3}}\right)\right|_{(-1 ;-1)}=\left.\dfrac{-3}{\mathrm{x}^{4}}\right|_{(-1,-1)}[/math]
 [math]=-\dfrac{3}{(-1)^{4}}=-3[/math]

Question #63 (ID: 476369)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {f(x) = x^2 - x − 2}[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](2, – 1)[/math]বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. 5
খ. 3
গ. -5
ঘ. -3


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
3

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{x}-2 ; \\\therefore \mathrm{f^{\prime}}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-1 \end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বক্ররেখার [math](2,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=2 \times 2-1=3[/math]

Question #64 (ID: 476370)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {x^2 + y ^2 - 2x = 0}[/math] বৃত্তের [math](1, −1)[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm {y-1=0}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm {y+1=0}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm {2x-y-1=0}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm {2x-y+1=0}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {y+1=0}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\mathrm {x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x=0}[/math]
 বৃত্তের [math]\mathrm {\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right)}[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকেরসমীকরণ: [math]\mathrm{xx}_{1}+\mathrm{yy}_{1}-\left(\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{x}_{1}\right)=0[/math]
সুতরাং; প্রদত্ত বৃত্তের [math](1,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ:[math]\mathrm {x(1)+y(-1)-(x+1)=0}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm { x-y-x-1=0 \therefore y+1=0}[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #65 (ID: 476371)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]\mathrm {3x^2 +y-7 =0}[/math] একটি বক্ররেখা।

বক্ররেখাটির [math](2, -5)[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. 12
খ. 0
গ. -10
ঘ. -12


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
-12

Explanation:
প্রদত্ত বক্ররেখাটির সমীকরণ: [math]\mathrm {3x^2 + y - 7 = 0 \therefore y = 7 - 3x^2 }[/math]
এখন, বক্ররেখাটির [math](2, −5)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল:[math]\left. =\dfrac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right|_{(2,-5)}=-\left.6 \mathrm{x}\right|_{(2,-5)}=-6 \times 2=-12[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #66 (ID: 476372)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]\mathrm {3x^2 +y-7 =0}[/math] একটি বক্ররেখা।

বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি [math]\mathrm x[/math]-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হবে?

Options:
ক. [math](0,7)[/math]
খ. [math](0,-7)[/math]
গ. [math](6,0)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-6,0)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](0,7)[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\mathrm x[/math]
-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল স্পর্শকের ঢালের জন্য,[math]\dfrac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=0 \Rightarrow \dfrac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(7-3 \mathrm{x}^{2}\right)=0 \Rightarrow-6 \mathrm{x}=0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{x}=0[/math]
আবার, [math]\mathrm x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm y = 7 – 3(0)^2 = 7[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু [math](0, 7 )[/math]


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #67 (ID: 476373)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-7 x}{5 x^{2}-3 x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{7}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}& \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-7 x}{5 x^{2}-3 x} \\= & \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(1-\frac{7}{x}\right)}{x^{2}\left(5-\frac{3}{x}\right)} \\= & \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1-\frac{7}{x}}{5-\frac{3}{x}} \\= & \frac{1-\frac{7}{\infty}}{5-\frac{3}{\infty}} \\= & \frac{1-0}{5-0}=\frac{1}{5}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #68 (ID: 476374)

Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(3^{x}\right)= ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x 3^{x-1}[/math]
B. [math]3^{x}[/math]
C. [math]3 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]3^{x} \ln 3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3^{x} \ln 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(3^{x}\right)=3^{x} \ln 3 \quad\left[\because \frac{d}{d x}\left(a^{x}\right)=a^{x} \ln a\right][/math]

Explanation:

Question #69 (ID: 476375)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{-\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{-2-\frac{1}{x}}(1-\ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{\frac{1}{x}+2}(\ln x-1)[/math]
C. [math]x^{-2+\frac{1}{x}}(1-\ln x)[/math]
D. [math]x^{-2-\frac{1}{x}(\ln x-1)}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x^{-2-\frac{1}{x}(\ln x-1)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=x^{-\frac{1}{x}} \\\Rightarrow \ln y=\ln x^{-\frac{1}{x}} \\\Rightarrow \ln y=-\frac{1}{x} \ln x \\\therefore \frac{d}{d x}(\ln y)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(-\frac{1}{x} \ln x\right) \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}-\ln x\cdot\left(-\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=y\left\{-\frac{1}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x^{2}} \ln x\right\} \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{-\frac{1}{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}}(\ln x-1) \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{-\frac{1}{x}} \cdot x^{-2}(\ln x-1) \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{-2-\frac{1}{x}}(\ln x-1)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #70 (ID: 476376)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x^{3}}[/math] বক্ররেখার (-1,-1) বিন্দুতে। এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. -3
খ. -1
গ. 1
ঘ. 3


Correct Answer: A.-3

Solution:
এখানে, [math]y=\frac{1}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=x^{-3}[/math]
x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে পাই,[math]\begin{aligned}\frac{d y}{d x} & =-3 x^{-3-1} \\\Rightarrow y_{1} & =-3 x^{-4} \\\Rightarrow y_{1} & =\frac{-3}{x^{4}}\end{aligned}[/math]
(-1,-1) বিন্দুতে [math]y_{1}=\frac{-3}{(-1)^{4}}=-3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #71 (ID: 476377)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি [math]x-[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]0, 7[/math]
খ. [math]0, -7[/math]
গ. [math]6,0[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6, 0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0, 7[/math]

Solution:
উপরের প্রশ্নের ব্যাখ্যা অনুযায়ী, স্পর্শক [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-6 x[/math]
স্পর্শক x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
বা, [math]-6 x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0[/math]
(i) নং হতে, [math]3.0^{2}+y-7=0[/math]
বা, [math]y=7[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুটি [math](x, y)=(0,7)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #72 (ID: 476378)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x)-1}{x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, [math]f(x)=e^{-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x)-1}{x}=[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{-2 x}-1}{x}[/math]
 [math]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-2 e^{-2 x}-0}{1}~~~~~~[/math]
 [La Hospital rule][math]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(-2 e^{-2 x}\right) \\=-2 \cdot e^{0} \\=-2 \cdot 1=-2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #73 (ID: 476379)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\{f(x) \cdot \cos x\}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-e^{-2 x}(\sin x+2 \cos x)[/math]
B. [math]-e^{-2 x}(\sin x-2 \cos x)[/math]
C. [math]e^{-2 x}(\sin x+2 \cos x)[/math]
D. [math]e^{-2 x}(\sin x-2 \cos x)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-e^{-2 x}(\sin x+2 \cos x)[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, [math]f(x)=e^{-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d}{d x}\{f(x) \cdot \cos x\}=\frac{d}{d x}\left\{e^{-2 x} \cdot \cos x\right\}[/math]
 [math]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\begin{array}{l}=e^{-2 x} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(\cos x)+\cos x \frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{-2 x}\right) \\=e^{-2 x}(-\sin x)+\cos x\left(-2 e^{-2 x}\right) \\=-e^{-2 x} \sin x-2 e^{-2 x} \cos x \\=-e^{-2 x}(\sin x+2 \cos x)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #74 (ID: 476380)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\sin 2 x+\sin 3 x)}{\sin x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\sin 3 x+\sin 2 x)}{\sin x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{5 x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{\sin x}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \frac{\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \sin ^{5 x} \frac{5 x}{2} \cdot \cos \frac{x}{2}}{\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}}=\frac{2 \times 0 \times 1}{1}=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #75 (ID: 476381)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{3 x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{3 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{2 x} \times \frac{2}{3}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #76 (ID: 476382)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan b x}{\sin a x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{b}[/math]
B. [math]\text { ab }[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}}{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
D. [math]a b^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\mathrm{b}}{\mathrm{a}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan b x}{\sin a x}=\frac{\lim _{a x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan b x}{b x} \cdot b x}{\lim _{a x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{a x} \cdot a x}=\frac{1 \times b x}{1 \times a x}=\frac{b}{a}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #77 (ID: 476383)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+\sin x}-\sqrt{1-\sin x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+\sin x}-\sqrt{1-\sin x}}{x} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{\left(\cos \frac{x}{2}+\sin \frac{x}{2}\right)^{2}}-\sqrt{\left(\cos \frac{x}{2}-\sin \frac{x}{2}\right)^{2}}}{x} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos \frac{x}{2}+\sin \frac{x}{2}-\cos \frac{x}{2}+\sin \frac{x}{2}}{x} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{x}{2}}{x} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}=1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\{2 \ln (1+x)-\ln (1-x)\}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0[/math]

Solution:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{2 x}-1}{2 x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{a x}-1}{b x}=\frac{a}{b}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{2 x}-1}{2 x}=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #82 (ID: 476388)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-7[/math]
B. [math]-5[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\frac{5^{n+1}}{7^{n}}+7}{\frac{5^{n}}{7^{n}}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{5^{n+1}}{7^{n}}+7\right)}{\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{5^{n}}{7^{n}}-1\right)}=\frac{(0+7)}{(0-1)}=-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #83 (ID: 476389)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)[/math] এর যোগজ-

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
B. [math]-\ln x+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}+c[/math]
D. [math]\ln x+c[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\ln x+c[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) d x=\int d(\ln x)=\ln x+c[/math]

Question #84 (ID: 476390)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x(2 a-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\text { a }[/math]
খ. [math]2 a[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=x(2 a-x)=2 a x-x^{2} \\\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 a-2 x\end{array}[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=2 a-2 x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]x=a[/math]
আবার, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=f(a)=2a\cdot a-a^{2}=a^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #86 (ID: 476392)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{a} 2 x\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{e} a[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{a} e[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2 x} \log _{a}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{a} e[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{a} 2 x\right)=\frac{1}{2 x} \cdot \log _{a} e \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(2 x)=\frac{1}{x} \log _{a} e[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #87 (ID: 476393)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{x}{5}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{x}{5}\right)=-\sin \frac{x}{5} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x}{5}\right)=\frac{-1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sqrt{\sec 2 x} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec 2 x}} \cdot(\sec 2 x \cdot \tan 2 x) \cdot 2 \\\Rightarrow \sqrt{\sec 2 x} \tan 2 x=y \tan 2 x . \\\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #88 (ID: 476394)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]2 \mathrm{e}^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin x[/math]
গ. [math]-e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin 2 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sin ^{2} x}\right)=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right) \\\Rightarrow e^{\sin ^{2} x} 2 \sin x \frac{d}{d x}(\sin x) \\\Rightarrow e^{\sin ^{2} x}: 2 \sin x \cos x=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \cdot \sin 2 x\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #89 (ID: 476395)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{2} x^{2}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 x \sin x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 x \sin 2 x^{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{2} \sin 2 x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 x \sin 2 x^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x^{2}\right) \\\Rightarrow 2\left(\sin x^{2}\right) \cdot\left(\cos x^{2}\right) \cdot 2 x \\\Rightarrow 2 x \times \sin \left(2 \times x^{2}\right) \\\Rightarrow 2 x \sin 2 x^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #91 (ID: 476397)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+x^{2}}{1-x^{2}}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\left(x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{2}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+x^{2}}{1-x^{2}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}\right)=2 \tan ^{-1} x \\\therefore \frac{d}{d x} \sec ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+x^{2}}{1-x^{2}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \cdot \tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #92 (ID: 476398)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\left(x^{2}+1\right) \tan ^{-1} x-x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]2 x \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]x \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2 x \tan ^{-1} x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\left(x^{2}+1\right) \tan ^{-1} x-x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x} =\left(x^{2}+1\right)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1} x+\tan ^{-1} x \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}+1\right)-1[/math]
 [math]=\left(1+x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}+\tan ^{-1} x \cdot(2 x)-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x \tan ^{-1} x+1-1[/math]
 [math]=2 x \tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #93 (ID: 476399)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}, \sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
আবার, [math]\sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} t=y[/math]
এখানে, [math]y=x \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #94 (ID: 476400)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x+x)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{y(y \ln x-x)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y(y \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{y}=y^{n} \Rightarrow y \ln x=x \text {. Iny }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \operatorname{ln} x \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}+y \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}+\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\ln x-\frac{x}{y}\right) \frac{d y}{d x} \ln y-\frac{y}{x} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x} \frac{y(x \ln y - y)}{x(y \ln x - x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #95 (ID: 476401)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{2}{3 x}[/math] হলে [math]y_{3}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{4}{x^{4}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{x^{4}}[/math]
C. [math]4 x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]- 4 x^{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{2}{3 x} \frac{2}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore y_{1}^{}=\frac{2}{3}\left(\frac{-1}{x^{2}}\right)=\frac{-2}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}} \\\therefore y_{2}=\frac{-2}{3}\left(\frac{-2}{x^{3}}\right)=\frac{4}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{x^{3}} \\\therefore y_{3}=\frac{4}{3}\left(\frac{-3}{x^{4}}\right)=\frac{-4}{x^{4}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #96 (ID: 476402)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board

Question:
দূরত্ব [math]S=5 t^{3}-9 t^{2}+3t+2[/math] হলে, [math]t=4[/math] সময় পর বেগ কত একক হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]71[/math]
খ. [math]171[/math]
গ. [math]243[/math]
ঘ. [math]343[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]171[/math]

Solution:
[math]s=5 t^{3}-9 t^{2}+3 t+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বেগ [math]\frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}} m: 15 t^{2}-18 t+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore t = 4[/math]
 সময় পর বেগ [math]=15.4^{2}-18.4+3=171[/math]


Explanation:

Question #97 (ID: 476403)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\operatorname{ax}(1-x)[/math] বক্ররেখাটির মূলবিন্দুতে ঢাল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-a[/math]
খ. [math]a[/math]
গ. [math]a-2 a x243[/math]
ঘ. [math]a+2 a x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]a[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=a x\left(1-x^{}\right)=a x-a x^{2} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=a-2 a x\end{array}[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে ঢাল, [math]\left.\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right|_{(0,0)}=\mathrm{a}-0=\mathrm{a}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #98 (ID: 476404)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln x[/math] বক্ররেখাটির [math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল-

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\ln x \quad \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1[/math]
বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{x-1}=\frac{1}{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #99 (ID: 476405)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দুতে [math]y=\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3}[/math] এর স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x-3 y=0[/math]
খ. [math]x+3 y=0[/math]
গ. [math]3 x+y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x-y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x-3 y=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{3} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\frac{x^{2}}{9}}} \times \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মূলবিন্দুতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ: [math]y-0=\frac{1}{3}(x-0) \therefore x-3 y=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #100 (ID: 476406)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-8 x^{2}+7[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1, 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]13 x-y+12=0[/math]
খ. [math]13 x+y+12=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+13 y+12=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-13 y+12=0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x-13 y+12=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-8 x^{2}+7 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-16 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]=3.1^{2}-16.1=-13[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ, [math]y-1=-\frac{1}{-13}(x-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 13 y-13=x-1 \therefore x-13 y+12=0[/math]


Explanation:

খ. [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})<0[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{a}) \neq 0[/math]
