Question #102 (ID: 476408)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sin ^{-1}(\sin \sqrt{x})[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \quad f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } g^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } f(1)=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{(i) } f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1-{x}^{2}}\right)=2 \tan ^{-1} x\\\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=2 \cdot \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}\\\text{(ii) } g(x)=\sin ^{-1}(\operatorname{sin} \sqrt{\mathrm{x}})=\sqrt{\mathrm{x}} \therefore \mathrm{g}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{x}}}\\\text{(iii) } f(1)=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2.1}{1-1^{2}}=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2}{0}=\frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { (ii) }[/math]
 নং তথ্যটি সঠিক নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #103 (ID: 476409)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin x[/math] হলে—

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } y_{1}=\cos x\\\text{ii. } y_{2}=-\sin x\\\text{iii. } y_{3}+y_{1}=0\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sin x \therefore y_{1}=\cos x, y_{2}=-\sin x, y_{3}=-\cos x \\\therefore y_{1}+y_{3}=\cos x-\cos x=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #104 (ID: 476410)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}+2 x^{2}+4[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1, 7)[/math] বিন্দুতে—

i. স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]7[/math]

ii. স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]7 x-y+5=0[/math]

iii. অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ [math]x+7 y=50[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}+4 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=3.1^{2}+4.1=7[/math]
(ii) স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math]y-7=7(x-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y-7=7 x-7 \Rightarrow 7 x-y=0[/math]
(iii) অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ, [math](x-1)+7(y-7)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-1+7 y-49=0 \Rightarrow x+7 y=50[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { (ii) }[/math]
 তথ্যটি সঠিক নয় ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #105 (ID: 476411)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2{x}^{2}-x+3[/math] হলে-

i. [math](1, 4 )[/math] বিন্দুতে ফাংশনটির স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]3[/math]

ii. [math]x=\frac{1}{4}[/math] এর জন্য ফাংশনটি ক্রমহ্রাসমান

iii. [math]x=\frac{1}{4}[/math] এর জন্য ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান বিদ্যমান

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: A.i ও ii

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } f(x)=2 x^{2}-x+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=4 x-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,4)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=4.1-1=3[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } f^{\prime}(x)=4 x-1 ; f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটি ক্রমহ্রাসমান হলে,[math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্ন মান বিদ্যমান।সুতরাং (iii) নং তথ্যটি সঠিক নয়।

Explanation:

Question #106 (ID: 476412)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\ln (1-x)[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\tan x^{2}[/math] [math]\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{x})[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sec ^{2} x^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]2 \sec ^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]2 x \sec ^{2} x^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \tan x \sec ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 x \sec ^{2} x^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}g(x)=\tan x^{2} \\\therefore g^{\prime}(x)=\sec ^{2} x^{2} \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right)=2 x \sec ^{2} x^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #107 (ID: 476413)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=\ln (1-x)[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\tan x^{2}[/math] [math]f^{\prime \prime}(2)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1-x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]=-(1-x)^{-1}[/math]
এবং [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=-(1-x)^{-2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime \prime}(2)[/math]
 [math]=-(1-2)^{-2}[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #108 (ID: 476414)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{10} x\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} e[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{\mathrm{c}} 10[/math]
D. [math]\log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} e[/math]

Solution:
আমরা জানি,[math]\begin{aligned}\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{a} x\right) & =\frac{1}{x} \log _{a} e \\\therefore & \frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{10} x\right)=\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} e\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Question #110 (ID: 476416)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{x}{5}\right)= ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{5} \sin \frac{x}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{x}{5}\right) & =-\sin \left(\frac{x}{5}\right) \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x}{5}\right) \\& =-\sin \left(\frac{x}{5}\right) \cdot \frac{1}{5} \\& =-\frac{1}{5} \sin \left(\frac{x}{5}\right)\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #111 (ID: 476417)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
cos (ax + b) এর n-তম অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math](-1)^{n} a^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+a x+b\right)[/math]
খ. [math]a^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+a x+b\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+a x+b\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]a^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+a x+b\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]a^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+a x+b\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\cos (a x+b)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}y_{1}=-\sin (a x+b) \cdot a=a^{1} \cos \left(1 \times \frac{\pi}{2}+a x+b\right) \\y_{2}=-a \cos (a x+b) \cdot a=a^{2} \cos \left(2 \times \frac{\pi}{2}+a x+b\right) \\y_{3}=a^{2} \sin (a x+b) \cdot a=a^{3} \cos \left(3 \times \frac{\pi}{2}+a x+b\right)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #112 (ID: 476418)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sec 2 x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]y \tan 2 x[/math]
B. [math]2 \tan 2 x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]y \cot 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]y \tan 2 x[/math]

Solution:
দেওয়া আছে, [math]y=\sqrt{\sec 2 x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\therefore \frac{d y}{d x} & =\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec 2 x}} \frac{d}{d x}(\sec 2 x) \\& =\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec 2 x}} \cdot \sec 2 x \tan 2 x \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(2 x) \\& =\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec 2 x}} \cdot \sec 2 x \tan 2 x \cdot 2 \\& =\sqrt{\sec 2 x} \tan 2 x=y \tan 2 x\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #113 (ID: 476419)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}(\sin 2 x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]
B. [math]\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-2 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin 2 x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{d}{d x}(\sin 2 x)=\cos 2 x \cdot 2=2 \sin \left(1 \times \frac{\pi}{2}+2 x\right) \\\therefore\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{dx}^{2}}(\sin 2 \mathrm{x})=-2 \sin 2 \mathrm{x} \cdot 2=2^{2} \sin \left(2 \times\frac{\pi}{2}+2 \mathrm{x}\right) \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{3}}{d x^{3}}(\sin 2 x)=-4 \cos 2 x \cdot 2=2^{3} \sin \left(3\times \frac{\pi}{2}+2 x\right) \\\text {... .... ..... ... ... .... ..... ...... .... } \\\therefore \frac{d^{n}}{\mathrm{dx}^{\mathrm{n}}}(\sin 2 \mathrm{x})=2^{\mathrm{n}} \sin \left(\frac{\mathrm{n} \pi}{2}+2 \mathrm{x}\right)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #114 (ID: 476420)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=5[/math] হলে [math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}=?[/math]

Options:
A. -1
B. 0
C. 1
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: B.0

Solution:
[math]f(x)=5[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore f(x+h)=5 \\\therefore \lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{5-5}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} 0=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #115 (ID: 476421)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y = sin x হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } y_{1}=\cos x\\\text{ii. } y_{2}=-\sin x\\\text{iii. } y_{3}+y_{1}=0\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
এখানে, y = sin x[math]y_{1}[/math]
 = cos x(i) নং সঠিক।[math]y_{2}[/math]
 = - sin x(ii) নং সঠিক।[math]y_{3}[/math]
 = - cos xবা, [math]y_{3} = - y_{1}[/math]
বা, [math]y_{3} + y_{1} = 0[/math]
(iii) নং সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #116 (ID: 476422)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x[/math] ফাংশনটি ক্রমহ্রাসমান হওয়ার শর্ত-

Options:
ক. [math]x>1[/math]
খ. [math]x>2[/math]
গ. [math]x<1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x<2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x<1[/math]

Solution:
দেওয়া আছে, [math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x}) & =2 \mathrm{x}-2 \\& =2(\mathrm{x}-1)\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]x < 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]x - 1 < 0[/math]
 কাজেই [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}<1[/math]
 ব্যবধিতে ফাংশনটি ক্রমহ্রাসমান।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #117 (ID: 476423)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1} \cdot\left(\frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\sin ^{-1}(\sin \sqrt{x})[/math] হলে

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}\\\text{ii. } g^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}\\\text{iii. } f(1)=\frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { i ও ii }[/math]
B. [math]\text { ii ও iii }[/math]
C. [math]\text { i ও iii }[/math]
D. [math]\text { i, ii ও, iii }[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\text { i ও iii }[/math]

Solution:
[math].f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)[/math]
বা, [math]f(x)=2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{2}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { (i) }[/math]
 নং সঠিক।

Explanation:

Question #118 (ID: 476424)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
A(-1,0) বিন্দুটি y = y³-3x²- x + 3 বক্ররেখার উপর হলে-

i. A বিন্দুতে ঢাল = ৪

ii. A বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ 8x-y+8=0

iii. A বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ x - 8y-1=0

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. iও ii
খ. iও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: A.iও ii

Solution:
দেওয়া আছে, [math]y = x ^ 3 - 3x ^ 2 - x + 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-6 x-1[/math]
A(- 1, 0) বিন্দুতে [math]5 \frac{d y}{d x}(-1,0)=3 \times(-1)^{2}-6 \times(-1)-1=8[/math]
(i) নং সঠিক।(-1,0) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ y - 0 = 8(x+1)[math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 y = 8x+8[math]\therefore[/math]
 8x-y+8 = 0(ii) নং সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #119 (ID: 476425)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}+3 x+4}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\infty[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}+3 x+4}} \\\Rightarrow\lim _{x\rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}\left(1+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{4}{x^{2}}\right)}} \\\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{-x}{x \sqrt{1+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{4}{x^{2}}}} \\\Rightarrow\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1+\frac{3}{\infty}+\frac{4}{\infty^{2}}}}=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1+0+0}}=-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #120 (ID: 476426)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin 2 x}{\cos x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{-\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin 2 x}{\cos x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{-\pi}{2}} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{\cos x} \\\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{-\pi}{2}} 2 \sin x=2 \sin \left(\frac{-\pi}{2}\right)=2(-1)=-2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #122 (ID: 476428)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cot (2 \sqrt{x}))=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}} \{\cot (2 \sqrt{\mathrm{x}})\}[/math]
 [math]=-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x}) \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(2 \sqrt{\mathrm{x}})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})\left\{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2}(2 \sqrt{x})}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{5} x\right)=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{e} 5[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{5 \ln x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln 5}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \ln 5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{5} x\right)=\frac{1}{x} \log _{5} e=\frac{1}{x} \cdot \frac{1}{\log _{e} 5}=\frac{1}{x \ln 5}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #125 (ID: 476431)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x \sin \left(\frac{2}{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\frac{2}{x}=y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x \sin \left(\frac{2}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{2}{y} \sin y[/math]
 [math]=2 . \lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin y}{y}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #126 (ID: 476432)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-x^{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{\dot{2}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #127 (ID: 476433)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{x^{2}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{x^{2}} 2(1+\ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{x^{2}} 2 x(1+\ln x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \ln x)[/math]
D. [math]x^{x^{2}-1} \cdot 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \ln x)[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=x^{x^{2}} \Rightarrow \ln y=x^{2} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot 2 x \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \cdot \ln x) \\\therefore \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{x^{2}}\right)=x^{x^{2}}(x+2 x \cdot \ln x)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #128 (ID: 476434)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-2 y=10[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](– 4, 3)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]14[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}-2 y=10\Rightarrow2 x-\frac{2 d y}{d x}=0 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore(-4,3)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল = [math]- 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #129 (ID: 476435)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x(1-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]-6[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x(1-x)=x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=c-\frac{b^{2}}{4 a}=0-\frac{1}{4(-1)}=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #131 (ID: 476437)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{10}}{d x^{10}}\left(x^{10}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]10 ![/math]
B. [math]10 ! . x[/math]
C. [math]10 ! . x^{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]10 ![/math]

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]x^{n}[/math]
 এর [math]n[/math]
 তম অন্তরজ:[math]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(x^{n}\right)=n ![/math]
 [math]\therefore\frac{d^{10}}{d x^{10}}\left(x^{10}\right)=10 ![/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #132 (ID: 476438)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1-x)[/math] হলে [math]f_{}^{\prime \prime}(\mathbf{2})[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=\ln (1-x) \\\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{-1}{1-x}\end{array}[/math]
 এবং [math]f^{\prime \prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{-1}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(2)=\frac{-1}{(1-2)^{2}}=\frac{-1}{(-1)^{2}}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #133 (ID: 476439)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x+1}{5 x^{2}-6}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x+1}{5 x^{2}-6}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\frac{2}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}}{5-\frac{6}{x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{2}{\alpha}+\frac{1}{\alpha^{2}}}{5-\frac{6}{\alpha^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0}{5}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #134 (ID: 476440)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{7}}{d x^{7}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]6 ![/math]
B. [math]7![/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]30[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(x^{n}\right)=n ![/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)[/math]
 [math]=5 \cdot \frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(x^{6}\right)[/math]
 [math]=5 \times 6 ![/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{7}}{d x^{7}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\frac{d^{6}}{d x^{6}}\left(5 x^{6}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(5 \times 6 !)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(5^{x}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5^{x} \ln 5[/math]
B. [math]5^{x}[/math]
C. [math]5^{x-1} x[/math]
D. [math]5^{x} \ln x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]5^{x} \ln 5[/math]

Solution:

Question #137 (ID: 476443)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x =lnx[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]X[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তার ভুজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]e[/math]
খ. [math]-e[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x \ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের ঢাল: [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x .1=1+\ln x[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]1+\ln x=0 \Rightarrow \ln x=-1 \Rightarrow x=\mathrm{e}^{-1}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #138 (ID: 476444)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x^{\circ}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x^{\circ}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}} \\\Rightarrow\frac{\pi x}{180} \rightarrow 0 \frac{\frac{\pi x}{180}}{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}} \times \frac{180}{\pi}=\frac{180}{\pi}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #139 (ID: 476445)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-\cos 2 x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-\cos 2 x}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{2 \sin ^{2} x}}{x} \\\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{2} \sin x}{x}=\sqrt{2} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}=\sqrt{2} \cdot 1=\sqrt{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #140 (ID: 476446)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{-3 x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-e^{-3 x}[/math]
B. [math]-3 e^{-3 x}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{-3 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
D. [math]3 e^{-3 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-3 e^{-3 x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=e^{-3 x} \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{-3 x}\right)=e^{-3 x} \frac{d}{d x}(-3 x)=-3 e^{-3 x}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #141 (ID: 476447)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos \sqrt{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\operatorname{sim} \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})=(-\sin \sqrt{x}) \frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{x})=\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math]-এর সাপেক্ষে [math]ln ax[/math] এর অন্তরজ-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{a}{x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{x}{a}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{ax}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln a x)=\frac{1}{a x} \times a=\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Question #143 (ID: 476449)

Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1} 3 x[/math] এর অন্তরজ—

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{1+3 x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{1+3 x^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} 3 x\right)=\frac{1}{1+9 x^{2}} \times 3=\frac{3}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]

Question #144 (ID: 476450)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{-\frac{3}{2}} x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathbf{d y}}{\mathbf{d x}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3}{2} \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{3 \mathrm{x}}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{2}{3} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{3}{2} \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{3 \mathrm{x}}{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\frac{-3}{2} x}\right)=e^{\frac{-3}{2} x}\left(\frac{-3}{2}\right)=-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3}{2} x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #145 (ID: 476451)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 4 x}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
ধরি , [math]\tan ^{-1} 4 x=\theta \therefore x=\frac{\tan \theta}{4}[/math]
এবং [math]x \rightarrow 0[/math]
 হলে [math]\theta \rightarrow 0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 4 x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\theta}{\frac{\tan \theta}{4}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \cdot \frac{1}{\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan \theta}{\theta}}=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #146 (ID: 476452)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y-2 x+10=0[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1, – 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল—

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
এখানে প্রশ্নটি সঠিক নয়। কারণ (I, −1) বিন্দুটি[math]x^{2}+y-2 x+10=0[/math]
 বক্ররেখার উপর অবস্থিত নয়।[math]x = 1[/math]
 হলে, [math](I, − 9)[/math]
 বিন্দুটি উক্ত বক্ররেখার উপর অবিস্থত হবে। -তাহলে [math]2 x+\frac{d y}{d x}-2=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2-2 x[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=2-2.1=0[/math]
[বি.দ্র.: [math](1, − 1 )[/math]
 বিন্দুটি প্রদত্ত বক্ররেখার উপর অবস্থিত নয়।তাই এখানে [math](1, − 1)[/math]
 এর স্থলে [math]( 1, − 9 )[/math]
 বিবেচনা করে উত্তর দেওয়া হয়েছে।]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #147 (ID: 476453)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin x ?[/math] হলে [math]y_{n}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]
C. [math]\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sin x \\y_{1}=\cos x=\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \\y_{2}=-\sin x=\sin \left(2 \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \\y_{3}=-\cos x=\sin \left(3 \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \\y_{4}=\sin x=\sin \left(4 \times \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \\y_{n}=\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #148 (ID: 476454)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{3 x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\tan ^{-1} 2 x=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x=\tan y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x=\frac{3}{2} \tan y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{3 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{y}{\frac{3}{2} \tan y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} \times \frac{1}{\lim _{y \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan y}{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #149 (ID: 476455)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\ln \frac{1}{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\ln \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{x}} x-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \doteq-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #150 (ID: 476456)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-3 x+1[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](3, 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-3 x+1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore(3,1)[/math]
 | বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]= ( 2 .3 − 3 ) = 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]=-\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #152 (ID: 476458)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো একটি বস্তুর অতিক্রান্ত দূরত্ব, [math]s=5 t^{3}-9 t^{2}+3 t-2[/math] হলে ,4 সেকেন্ড পর বেগ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]71[/math]
খ. [math]171[/math]
গ. [math]243[/math]
ঘ. [math]343[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]171[/math]

Solution:
বেগ, [math]v=\frac{d s}{d t}=15 t^{2}-18 t+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সেকেন্ড [math](t=4)[/math]
পরে বেগ [math]=15.4^{2}-18.4+3=171 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #153 (ID: 476459)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos 7 x^{\circ}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]-7 \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 \mathrm{x}^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 x^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 \mathrm{x}^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\cos 7 \mathrm{x}^{\circ}\right)=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\cos \frac{7 \mathrm{x} \pi}{180}\right) \\\quad\Rightarrow-\sin \frac{7 \mathrm{x} \pi}{180} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\frac{7 \mathrm{x} \pi}{180}\right)=\frac{-7 \pi}{180} \sin 7 \mathrm{x}^{\circ}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #154 (ID: 476460)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর মান কত হলে [math]\frac{\mathbf{x}}{\ln x}[/math] এর মান ক্ষুদ্রতম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
খ. [math]e[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-e[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{\ln x \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(x)-x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)}{(\ln x)^{2}}=\frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
শর্তমতে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow \frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow \ln x-1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=1 \Rightarrow \ln x=\ln e \therefore x=e[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #155 (ID: 476461)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-x y[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{6}\right)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{5}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{5}{9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-x y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}-x y\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 x-x \frac{d y}{d x}-y_{i} 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}+x \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-y \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2 x-y}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{6}\right)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]=\frac{2 \cdot \frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{6}}{1+\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6-1}{6} \times \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{9}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #156 (ID: 476462)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{\theta}{2}}{\theta}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{\dot{\theta}}{2}}{\theta}=\frac{1}{2} \lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{\theta}{2}}{\frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \times 1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #157 (ID: 476463)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ক্রমবর্ধমান ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{d y}{d x} \geq 0[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}>0[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}<0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}>0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{d y}{d x}>0[/math]

Solution:
ক্রমবর্ধমান ফাংশনের ক্ষেত্রে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}>0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #158 (ID: 476464)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\ln (x)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln (x)}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln (x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \ln (x)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\frac{d y}{d x} & =\frac{d}{d x} \ln (\ln x)=\frac{1}{\ln x} \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \\& \Rightarrow\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #160 (ID: 476228)

Question:
[math]y=e^{x+3}[/math] হলে [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{x=2} \text { }[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]e^{5}[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]e^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e^{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore x=4 \rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{4(1+4)}}=\frac{1}{10}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 \rightarrow e^{2+3}=e^{5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #161 (ID: 476229)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{a}[/math] হলে [math]3\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{x=2}[/math] এর মান কত হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} \\\left.\therefore 3 \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{x=2}=\frac{3}{2 \sqrt{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #162 (ID: 476230)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-x}[/math] হলে, [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{x=4}[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{10}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-(\sqrt{x})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2}{1+(\sqrt{x})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{x})=\frac{2}{1+x} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=4 \rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{1(1+4)}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #163 (ID: 476231)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin x+\cos x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sin x+\cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\sin x-\cos x[/math]
C. [math]-\cos x+\sin x[/math]
D. [math]\cos x-\sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\cos x+\sin x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin x+\cos x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos x-\sin{x}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x-\cos x[/math]
 [math]\because \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=-\cos x+\sin x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #164 (ID: 476232)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=t^{3}+t^{2}+3[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=0[/math] হলে, [math]t[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=t^{3}+t^{2}+3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=3 t^{2}+2 t[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d t^{2}}=6 t+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore 6 t+2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow t=-\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #165 (ID: 476233)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]x = 2[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]4(\ln 2+1)[/math]
খ. [math]\ln 2+1[/math]
গ. [math]\ln 2+4[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4(\ln 2+1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=\ln x^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=x \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x \frac{1}{x}+\ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=y(1+\ln x)=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2 \rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2^{2}(1+\ln 2)[/math]
 [math]=4(\ln 2+1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #166 (ID: 476234)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5[/math] হলে, [math]f(x)[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-6 x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=0,2[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=6 x-6[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-6<0[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে মান গরিষ্ট[math]\therefore[/math]
 গরিষ্ঠ মান [math]=0-3 \times 0+5[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #167 (ID: 476235)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](2,2 \sqrt{2})[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y=2 \sqrt{x} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{x}{E \sqrt{x}}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(2, \sqrt{2})[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d 1}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #168 (ID: 476236)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{a}{x}+b[/math] হলে,

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{-a}{x^{2}}\\\text{ii. } f^{\prime \prime}(x)=\frac{-2 a}{x^{3}}\\\text{iii. } f^{\prime \prime \prime}(x)=\frac{-6 a}{x^{4}}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.i ও iii

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{a}{x}+b \quad f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{-a}{x^{2}} \text {. }[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=\frac{2 a}{x^{3}} \quad f^{\prime \prime \prime}(x)=\frac{-6 a}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { ii }[/math]
 নং সঠিক নয়

Explanation:

Question #170 (ID: 476238)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)\\\text{ii.} -\frac{1}{x^{2}} \cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)\end{array}[/math] [math]\mathrm {iii}[/math] অনির্ণেয়, যখন [math]x = 0[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. ii ও iii
B. i ও ii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: A.ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]y=\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) \quad \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right) \frac{1}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{-1}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\cos 2 x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{21}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2^{20} \sin 2 x[/math]
B. [math]-2^{20} \sin 2 x[/math]
C. [math]2^{21} \sin 2 x[/math]
D. [math]-2^{21} \sin 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2^{21} \sin 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]25=5 \times 4+1[/math]
 এবং [math]y_{1}=-2 \sin x[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=-2^{2} \cos x .[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{21}=-2^{21} \sin 2 x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #172 (ID: 476240)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions

Question:
[math]y=\cos x[/math] হলে [math]\mathbf{y}_{102}[/math] এর মান কত, যখন [math]x=60^{\circ} \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]102=25 \times 4+2[/math]
 এবং[math]y_{1}=-\sin x, y_{2}=-\cos x[/math]
 [math]y_{102}=y_{2}=-\cos 60^{\circ}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 যখন[math]x=60^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #173 (ID: 476241)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin x[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{y}_{15}[/math] এর মান কত যখন [math]x=30^{\circ} \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]15=3 \times 4+3[/math]
 এবং [math]y_{1}=\cos x[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=-\cos x, y_{3}=-\sin x[/math]
 [math]y_{15}=y_{3}=-\sin 30^{\circ}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 যখন [math]x=30^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #174 (ID: 476242)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} e\right)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\log _{x} e}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\log _{x} e\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{\ln x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{(\ln x)^{-1}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=-1(\ln x)^{-2} \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #175 (ID: 476243)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ।

[math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুর সন্নিকটে y এর যোগাশ্রয়ী আসন্ন মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x+1[/math]
খ. [math]x-1[/math]
গ. [math]x+0.5[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-0.5[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x-0.5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(1)=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(1)=1[/math]
 [math]L(x)=f(1)+f^{\prime}(1)(x-1)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}+1(x-1)=x-0.5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #176 (ID: 476244)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ।

[math]x=2[/math] ও [math]\delta x=1[/math] হলে [math]\delta y=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]2.5[/math]
গ. [math]4.5[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2.5[/math]

Solution:
[math]\delta y=f(x+\delta x)-f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(x+\delta x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{1}{2} x^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math](2+1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{1}{2} 2^{2}[/math]
 [math]=2.5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #177 (ID: 476245)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
স্বাধীন চলক [math]x[/math] এর অন্তরক [math]dx[/math] ও অধীন চলক [math]y[/math] এর অন্তরক [math]dy[/math] যথাক্রমে—

Options:
ক. 1 ও 1
খ. 1 ও 2
গ. 2 ও 1
ঘ. ২ ও ২


Correct Answer: A.1 ও 1

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{dx}=\delta x=1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}f^{\prime}(x)=x \quad \therefore f^{\prime}(1)=1 \\d y=f^{\prime}(1) d x=1 \times 1=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #178 (ID: 476246)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+4[/math] এর সন্ধি বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,1)[/math]
খ. [math](1,-1) \text { }[/math]
গ. [math](-1,-1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,1)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](1,1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+4 \\\quad f^{\prime}(x)=6 x-6=0 \quad \therefore x=1 \\\therefore f(x)=3.1-6.1+4=1\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 চরমবিন্দু [math](1,1)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #179 (ID: 476247)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{x-1}[/math]
B. [math]x \times x^{x-1}[/math]
C. [math]x \ln x[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\mathrm{x}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)=x^{x}\left[\mathrm{x} \frac{d}{d x}(\ln \mathrm{x})+\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(\mathrm{x})\right][/math]
 [math]=x^{x}\left[x \times \frac{1}{x}+\ln \mathbf{x} .1\right][/math]
 [math]=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #180 (ID: 476248)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর গুরুমান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=x+x^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad f^{\prime}(x)=1-x^{-2},[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=2 x^{-3} \text {. }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x= \pm 1[/math]
 [math]x=-1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)<0[/math]
 এবং [math]f(x) = -2[/math]


Explanation:

Options:
A. [math]3 x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]6 x[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]-5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-5 x[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=3!=6[/math]

Question #182 (ID: 476250)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln x[/math] হলে, [math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{~h}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}=\frac{d}{d x}\{f(x)\}=\frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #183 (ID: 476251)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos 2 x[/math] হলে [math]y_{2}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-4 \cos 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]-\cos 2 x[/math]
গ. [math]4 \cos 2 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-4 \cos 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y_{1}=\frac{d}{d x}(y)=(\cos 2 x)=-2 \sin 2 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{2}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(y_{1}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(-2 \sin 2 x)=-4 \cos 2 x \text {. }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #184 (ID: 476252)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{2} \sin x[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} f(x)=0[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \ln y=2 \ln x+\ln (\sin x)[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x \cos x[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: A.i ও ii

Solution:
[math]\text{i. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} x^{2} \sin x[/math]
 [math]=0^{2} \cdot \sin 0=0[/math]
 [math]\text{ii. } \ln y=\ln \left(x^{2} \sin x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln x^{2}+\ln \sin x[/math]
 [math]=2 \ln x+\ln (\sin x)[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. }[/math]
 সঠিক নয় ।কারণ [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2} \frac{d}{d x}(\sin x)[/math]
 [math]+(\sin x) \frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cos x+2 x \sin x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #185 (ID: 476253)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln 3 x, x>0[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } x=\frac{1}{3} e^{y}\\\text{ii. } \mathrm{y}_{1}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \text{.}\\\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 1 / 3} y=0\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]\text{i. } \quad y=\ln 3 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x=e^{y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3} e^{y}[/math]
 [math]\text{ii. } \quad y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(\ln 3 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3 x} \cdot 3[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]y=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{1}{3}} \ln 3 x[/math]
 [math]=\ln 3 \frac{1}{3}=\ln 1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #186 (ID: 476254)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]u=e^{5 x}[/math] এবং [math]v=e^{-5 x}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \frac{d}{d x}(u+v)=5(u-v)\\\text{ii } \frac{d}{d x}(u v)=0\\\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{u}{v}\right)=1\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]\text{i. } \frac{d}{d x}(u+v)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{5 x}+e^{-5 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=5\left(e^{5 x}-e^{-5 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=5(u-v)[/math]
 [math]\text{ii. } \frac{d}{d x}(u v)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{5 x} \cdot e^{-5 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(1)=0[/math]
 [math]\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{u}{v}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{e^{5 x}}{e^{-5 x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{0}}{e^{-0}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #187 (ID: 476255)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{5 x}, g(x)=\ln x[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } f^{\prime}(x)=5 e^{5 x}\\\text{ii. } g^{\prime \prime}(x)=\frac{1}{x^{2}}\\\text{iii. } \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\{\operatorname{gof}(\mathrm{x})\}=5\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.i ও iii

Solution:
[math]\text{i. } f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{d}{d x} f(x)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{5 x}\right)=5 e^{5 x}[/math]
 [math]\text{ii. } g^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore g^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\text{iii. } go f(x)=g\{f(x)\}=\ln \mathrm{e}^{5 x}[/math]
 [math]=5 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\{\operatorname{gof}(\mathrm{x})\}=5[/math]


Explanation:

C. [math]64[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]80[/math]

Question #191 (ID: 476259)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Joypurhat Girls’ Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{3 x+2}{x}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{10}[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{e}^{10}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]P=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{3 x+2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \ln P[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{3 x+2}{x}[/math]
 [math]\ln (1+5 x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{3 x+2}{x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{5 x-\frac{(5 x)^{2}}{2}+\frac{(5 x)^{3}}{3}-\ldots \ldots\right\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(3 x+2)[/math]
 [math]\left\{5-\frac{25 x}{2}+\frac{125 x^{2}}{3}-\ldots \ldots\right\}[/math]
 [math]=2.5=10[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad p=e^{10}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #197 (ID: 476265)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Notre Dame College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos x ; \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-3 x\right)}{3 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-3 x\right)}{3 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-3 x\right)}{3 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{3 x}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #198 (ID: 476266)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan \frac{x}{3}}{\frac{x}{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan \frac{x}{3}}{\frac{x}{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan \frac{x}{3}}{\frac{x}{3}} \times \frac{2}{3}=1 \times \frac{2}{3}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #199 (ID: 476267)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: সফিউদ্দিন সরকার একাডেমি এন্ড কলেজ

Question #200 (ID: 476268)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahid Syed Nazrul Islam College, Mymensingh
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{2 x}+e^{-2 x}-2}{\sin ^{2} x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{2 x}+e^{-2 x}-2}{\sin ^{2} x} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}-2 \cdot e^{x} \cdot e^{-x}+\left(e^{-x}\right)^{2}}{\sin ^{2} x}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left(\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{\sin x}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \left(\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{\cos x}\right)^{2}\left[L^{\prime}\right. \text { Hospitale rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে ][math]\Rightarrow \left(\frac{1+1}{1}\right)^{2}=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #201 (ID: 476269)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ideal School & College, Motijheel, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 5 \theta}{2 \theta^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{25}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{50}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{25}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{25}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{5 \theta}{2}}{2 \theta^{2}} \\\Rightarrow \lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin \frac{5 \theta}{2}}{\frac{5}{2} \theta}\right)^{2} \times\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2} \\\Rightarrow \frac{25}{4}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #202 (ID: 476270)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}[/math]
 যা [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকারের[math]\therefore[/math]
 লা হসপিটাল ব্যবহার করে [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)}{\frac{d}{d x}(x)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} e^{\dot{x}}+e^{-x}=e^{0}+e^{0}=1+1=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #205 (ID: 476273)

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x-2}[/math] [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} f(x)[/math] এর মান কত ?

ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{a x+c}{b x+d}=\frac{a}{b} \\\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} f(x)=\frac{2}{1}=2\end{array}[/math]

Question #208 (ID: 476276)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Feni Girls' Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x-\cos x[/math] হলে [math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math] হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}-\cos \mathrm{x} \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=1+\sin \mathrm{x} \\\therefore 1+\sin \mathrm{x}=0 \\\Rightarrow \sin \mathrm{x}=-1 \\\Rightarrow \sin x=-\sin \frac{\pi}{2} \\\Rightarrow \sin x=\sin \left(\pi+\frac{\pi}{2}\right) \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{3 \pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #210 (ID: 476278)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal College, Khilgaon, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\sin x^{\circ}[/math]এর অন্তরক কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos{x}^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]-\cos x^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{180} \cos \frac{x}{180}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{180} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\pi}{180} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin x^{\circ}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}\right) \\\Rightarrow \cos \frac{\pi x}{180} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi x}{180}\right)=\frac{\pi}{180} \cos \frac{\pi x}{180}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #214 (ID: 476282)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022, 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: BAF Shaheen College, Dhaka, BAF Shaheen College Shamshernagar, Moulvibazar
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sec x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y \tan x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\tan x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\cot x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\cot x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{y \tan x}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sqrt{\sec x} \\\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec x}} \cdot \sec x \tan x=\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sec x} \cdot \tan x=\frac{y \tan x}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #217 (ID: 476285)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka Residential Model College, Dhaka

Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে—

Question #218 (ID: 476286)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: BAF Shaheen College Shamshernagar, Moulvibazar
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { i. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}=2[/math] [math]\text { ii. } f(x)=\frac{1-x}{x+1}[/math] হলে, [math]f(\cos 2 \theta)=\tan ^{2} \theta[/math] [math]\text { iii. } y=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{; 2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{(i) } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}\\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1} \text { [Using L'Hospital Rule] } \\=e^{0}+e^{0}=2\\\text{(ii) } f(\cos 2 \theta)=\frac{1-\cos 2 \theta}{1+\cos 2 \theta}=\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \theta}{2 \cos ^{2} \theta}=\tan ^{2} \theta\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #220 (ID: 476288)

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]y=\tan x, u=v-\frac{1}{v}[/math] এবং [math]v=\ln x[/math] [math]x=e[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]

Question #221 (ID: 476289)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Govt. Women’s College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(e^{m x}+e^{-m x}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]f^{\prime}(0)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(e^{m x}+e^{-m x}\right)[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{e^{m x}+e^{-m x}}[/math]
 [math]\left(m e^{m x}-m e^{-m x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m\left(e^{m x}-e^{-m x}\right)}{e^{m x}+e^{-m x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad f^{\prime}(0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m\left(e^{0}-e^{0}\right)}{\left(e^{0}+e^{0}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m(1-1)}{1+1}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #222 (ID: 476290)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: IDEAL COLLEGE, DHANMONDI
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]x = 2[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4(\ln 2+1)[/math]
খ. [math]\ln 2+1[/math]
গ. [math]\ln 2+4[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4(\ln 2+1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=x^{x} \\\Rightarrow \ln y=x \ln x \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}=x \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot 1 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x}(1+\ln x) \\\left.\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{x=2}=4(1+\ln 2)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #224 (ID: 476292)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna Govt. Women’s College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\sin e^{x}\right)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x} \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\cos \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}{1+\sin ^{2} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{x} \sin e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{e^{x} \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]

Solution:


Explanation:
