Question #225 (ID: 476293)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: RCPSCG
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{2} 2 x+e^{2 \ln (\cos 2 x)}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y =\sin ^{2} 2 x+e^{2 \ln (\cos 2 x)}[/math]
 [math]=\sin ^{2} 2 x+e^{\ln (\cos 2 x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin ^{2} 2 x+\cos ^{2} 2 x=1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #227 (ID: 476295)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cantonment Public School & College, Rangpur
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}} \frac{1}{4 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}}{2 \sqrt{x} \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}}{2 \sqrt{x} \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -\sin \sqrt{\frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #229 (ID: 476297)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet MC College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln \sqrt{x}[/math] হলে [math]f^{\prime}(2)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=\ln \sqrt{x} \\\therefore \quad f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{1}{2 x} \\\therefore \quad f^{\prime}(2)=\frac{1}{2.2}=\frac{1}{4}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #233 (ID: 476301)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ideal School & College, Motijheel, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1-\sqrt{x}}{1+\sqrt{x}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{x}}{1+2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{x}=\tan \theta[/math]
 হলে ,[math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1-\sqrt{x}}{1+\sqrt{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1-\tan \theta}{1+\tan \theta}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\theta\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\pi}{4}-\theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #234 (ID: 476302)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: NGDCR
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\ldots \ldots}}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1-2 y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 y-1}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1-4 y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4 y-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2 y-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\ldots}}} \Rightarrow y=\sqrt{x+y} \\\Rightarrow y^{2}=x+y \\\therefore 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=1+\frac{d y}{d x} \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}(2 y-1)=1 \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 y-1}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #235 (ID: 476303)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: IDEAL COLLEGE, DHANMONDI
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]x=2[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]4(\ln 2+1)[/math]
খ. [math]\ln 2+1[/math]
গ. [math]\ln 2+4[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4(\ln 2+1)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\ ln y=x \ ln x \therefore \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}=x \frac{1}{x}+\ell n x .1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x}[1+\ \ell n x][/math]
 [math]x=2[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]
 [math]2^{2}(1+\ln 2)=4(\ln 2+1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]f(x)=e^{x}[/math] এবং [math]g(x)=\tan ^{-1} x[/math] [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\mathrm{g}(\theta)}{\theta}=1\\\text{ii. } \lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{\theta}{\mathrm{g}(\theta)}=1 \text{.}\\\text{iii. } \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\{\mathrm{g}(\mathrm{x})\}=\frac{1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Question #243 (ID: 476311)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathbf{y}_{11}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{11 !}{x^{12}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{11 !}{x^{11}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{11 !}{x^{11}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11 !}{x^{12}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{11 !}{x^{12}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}=x^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \quad y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=-1 x^{-2}[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=(-1)(-2) x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=(-1)[/math]
 [math](-2)(-3)[/math]
 [math]\cdot x^{-4}[/math]
 [math]y_{11}=(-1)(-2)(-3)[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots .(-11) x^{-12}[/math]
 [math]=-(11 !) x^{-12}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #245 (ID: 476313)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Birsrestha Noor Mohammad Public College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x^{2}+2[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4 x}{y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\mathrm{y}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{4 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{4 x}{y}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y^{2}=4 x^{2}+2 \\\Rightarrow \quad \frac{d}{d x}\left(y^{2}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(4 x^{2}+2\right) \\\Rightarrow 2 y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=8 x+0 \\\therefore \quad \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{4 x}{y}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #248 (ID: 476316)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: """Mirzapur Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sin x[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]{y}_{5}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\cos x[/math]
খ. [math]\sin x[/math]
গ. [math]-\sin x[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\cos x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left(n \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]y_{5}=\sin \left(5 \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{5}=\cos x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #249 (ID: 476317)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]y=\ln (1+x)[/math] হলে, [math]{y}_{3}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\dfrac{2}{\left( 1+x\right) ^{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\dfrac{2}{\left( 1+x\right) ^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]-\dfrac{1}{\left( 1+x\right) ^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\dfrac{3}{\left( 1+x\right) ^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\dfrac{2}{\left( 1+x\right) ^{2}}[/math]

Solution:

Question #254 (ID: 476322)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Holy Cross College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1}(a+b x)[/math] এবং [math]f^{\prime}(0)=1[/math] হলে, নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}}{2+\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}}{1-\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}}{1+\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{\mathrm{b}}{3+\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\mathrm{b}}{1+\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{bx})[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+(\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{bx})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times \mathrm{b}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{b}}{1+(\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b} \times 0)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{b}}{1+\mathrm{a}^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #255 (ID: 476323)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ideal School & College, Motijheel, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ট্রেন [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ডে [math]\left(3 t+\frac{1}{16} t^{2}\right)[/math] মিটার অতিক্রম করে। [math]4[/math] মিনিট পর তার বেগ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]3.25 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]
খ. [math]3.5 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]
গ. [math]18 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]
ঘ. [math]33 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]33 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}s=3 t+\frac{t^{2}}{16} \\v=\frac{d s}{d t}=3+\frac{2 t}{16}=3+\frac{t}{8}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 4[/math]
 মিনিট [math]=240[/math]
 সেকেন্ড পরে বেগ [math]=3+\frac{240}{8}=33 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=1-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\\\text{ii. } f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-\frac{2}{x^{3}}\end{array}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } x=0[/math] এ [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math] অসংজ্ঞায়িত

A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii

Question:
[math]f(x)=\cos x, g(x)=\sin x[/math] হলে -

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } g^{\prime}(x)=f(x)\\\text{ii. } g(x)+g^{\prime \prime}(x)=0\\\text{iii. } \frac{d}{d x}\left\{g^{\prime}(x) f(x)\right\}=\cos x(-\sin x)\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
i ও ii

Question #268 (ID: 476336)

Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-x+3[/math] বক্ররেখার উপরস্থ একটি বিন্দু [math](– 1, 0 )[/math] হলে-

i. [math]A[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]= 8[/math]

ii. A বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math]8 x+y+8=0[/math]

iii. [math]y_{3}-6=0[/math]

খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii

Question #269 (ID: 476337)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dinajpur Govt. Women's College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f(x)=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}-\frac{f(x)}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}-\frac{f(x)}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x) =\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]f(x) =\frac{x \frac{d}{d x} \ln x-\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \cdot \frac{1}{x}-\ln x .1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}}-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}}-\frac{f(x)}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #270 (ID: 476338)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dinajpur Govt. Women's College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]f(x)=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]

কোন বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)[/math] এর স্পর্শক [math]x[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math](\mathrm{e}, \mathrm{e})[/math]
খ. [math]\left(e, \frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{e}, e\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{e}, \frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left(e, \frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]

Solution:
যেহেতু, স্পর্শক [math]x-[/math]
অক্ষের সমান্তরাল ।সুতরাং, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}=0\\\Rightarrow 1-\ln x=0\\\Rightarrow \ln x=\ln e\\\therefore \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e}\end{array}[/math]
স্পর্শবিন্দু : [math]\left(\mathrm{e}, \frac{\ln \mathrm{e}}{\mathrm{e}}\right) \equiv\left(\mathrm{e}, \frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #271 (ID: 476339)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka Residential Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]y=\operatorname{ax}(x-1)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

বক্ররেখাটির [math](1, 0)[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\mathbf{a}[/math]
খ. [math]\text { a }[/math]
গ. [math]a-2 a x[/math]
ঘ. [math]a+2 a x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\text { a }[/math]

Solution:


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #272 (ID: 476340)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka Residential Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]y=\operatorname{ax}(x-1)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]a x-y=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-a y=0[/math]
গ. [math]a x+y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+a y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]a x+y=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=a x^{2}-a x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 a x-a[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-a[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math]y=-a x \quad \therefore a x+y=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #273 (ID: 476341)

Question #274 (ID: 476342)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Kushtia Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ [math]x^{3}+x y^{2}-3 x^{2}+4 x+5 y+2=0[/math] [math](1 – 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2 x+3 y-1=0[/math]
খ. [math]2 x+2 y+1=0[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3 y+7=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 x+3 y+1=0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 x+3 y+1=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+ x y^{2} -[/math]
 [math]3 x^{2}+4 x+5y+ 2=0[/math]
 [math]x[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে পাই,[math]\Rightarrow (2 x y+5) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-3 x^{2}-y^{2}+6 x-4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3 x^{2}-y^{2}+6 x-4}{2 x y+5}[/math]
 [math](1, - 1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3-1+6-4}{-2+5}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ,[math]y+1=-\frac{2}{3}(x-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 y+3=-2 x+2 \text{.}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+3 y+1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #275 (ID: 476343)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\Large {\mathrm { \overset{\lim } {_{x \rightarrow 3}} ~\frac{x^{3}-27}{x^{2}-9}}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. 0
C. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
D. 6


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{3}-27}{x^{2}-9}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{(x-3)\left(x^{2}+3 x+9\right)}{(x+3)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{2}+3 x+9}{x+3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3^{2}+3.3+9}{3+3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{27}{6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #276 (ID: 476344)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\Large{\mathrm { \overset {\lim }{_{x \rightarrow \infty}}~ \frac{x^{2}-7 x}{5 x^{2}-3 x}}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{7}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\Large{\mathrm {\overset{\lim} {_{x \rightarrow \infty} } ~\frac{x^{2}-7 x}{5 x^{2}-3 x}= \overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow \infty}} ~\frac{x^{2}\left(1-\frac{7}{x}\right)}{x^{2}\left(5-\frac{3}{x}\right)}=\frac{1-0}{5-0}=\frac{1}{5}}}[/math]

Question #277 (ID: 476345)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\Large{\mathrm { \overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow \infty}}~ \frac{2 x^{2}+3 x+1}{2 x^{2}-4 x+2}}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 0
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. 1


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
1

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{r}\Large { \mathrm {\overset{\lim} {_{x \rightarrow \infty}}~ \frac{2 x^{2}+3 x+1}{2 x^{2}-4 x+2}= \overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow \infty}}~ \frac{x^{2}\left(2+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right)}{x^{2}\left(2-\frac{4}{x}+\frac{2}{x^{2}}\right)}}} \quad ~~~~~~~\\ \Large { \mathrm {= \overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow \infty}} ~\frac{2+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}}{2-\frac{4}{x}+\frac{2}{x^{2}}}=\frac{2}{2}=1}}\end{array}[/math]

Question #278 (ID: 476346)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\Large{\mathrm{\overset{\lim }{_{x\rightarrow\infty}}~\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{x+5}=}}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm e}[/math]
B. [math]{\mathrm e}[/math]
C. [math]{\mathrm e^5}[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]{\mathrm e}[/math]

Solution:


Explanation:
[math]\begin{aligned}\Large{\mathrm{\lim_{x\rightarrow\infty}\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{x+5}}}&\Large{\mathrm{=\lim _{x\rightarrow\infty}\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{x}\lim_{x\rightarrow\infty}\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{5}}}\\ & = \Large { \mathrm {e(1+0)^{5}=e}}\end{aligned}[/math]

Question #279 (ID: 476347)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\Large{\mathrm{\overset{\lim}{_{x\rightarrow\infty}}~\frac{\ln(1-3x)}{3x}=}}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. 1
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. -1
D. -3


Correct Answer: C.-1

Solution:
[math]\large{\mathrm {\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow \infty}}~ \frac{\ln (1-3 x)}{3 x}=\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow \infty}}~ \dfrac{\frac{-3}{1-3 x}}{3} } 
ormalsize {\text{ [L' Hospital rule]}}} \\ \large{=\frac{-3}{(1-0)} \times \frac{1}{3}=-1}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #280 (ID: 476348)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]{\mathrm { \overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow \ 0}}\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)^{4 x}=?}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm e^{\frac{4}{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm e^{12}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm 3e^{12}[/math]
D. 1


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\Large{\mathrm {\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)^{4 x}\\= \overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ e^{\ln \left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)^{4 x}}}}[/math]
 [math]\Large{\mathrm {= \overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ e^{4 x \ln \left(\frac{x+3}{x}\right)}\\=e^{\left(\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ 4 x\right) \times\left\{ \overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~\ln \left(\frac{x+3}{x}\right)\right\}}}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l} \Large { \mathrm {=e^{\left(\overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ 4 x\right) ~\times~ \overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~\{\ln (x+3)-\ln x\}} }}\\ \Large { \mathrm {=e^{\left(\overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ 4 x\right) ~\times~{ }\overset {\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~\left(\frac{1}{x+3}-\frac{1}{x}\right)}}} 
ormalsize {\text { [L'Hospital rule] }} \\ \Large { \mathrm {=e^{\left(\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ 4 x\right) ~\times~ \overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow 0}}~\left(\frac{-3}{x^{2}+3 x}\right)} }}\\\Large{\mathrm {=e^{\left(\overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ 4 x\right) ~\times~ \overset{ \lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ \left(\frac{0}{2 x+3}\right)} }} 
ormalsize{\text { [L'Hospital rule] }} \\\Large{\mathrm{=e^{(4 \times 0) \times\left(\frac{0}{3}\right)}}} 
ormalsize{ \text { [L'Hospital rule]} }\\\Large { \mathrm {=e^{0 \times 0=e^{0}=1}}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #281 (ID: 476349)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\large{\mathrm {\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{\sin x}{\sin 2 x}}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. 0
B. 1
C. -1
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\Large{\mathrm{\overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ \frac{\sin x}{\sin 2 x}=\overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ \frac{\sin x}{2 \sin x \cos x}=\overset{\lim }{_{x \rightarrow 0}} ~\frac{1}{2 \cos x}=\frac{1}{2}}}[/math]

Question #282 (ID: 476350)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\large{\mathrm{\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}} ~ \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. 2
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\large{\mathrm {\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}=\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{x^{2}}=\left(\overset{\lim}{ _{\frac{x}{2} \rightarrow 0}} ~\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}\right)^{2}. \frac{1}{2}=1. \frac{1}{2}=\frac{1}{2}}}[/math]

[math]\large{\mathrm {\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}}{3 x}=}}[/math] কত ?

B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\large{\mathrm{\overset{\lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}}{3 x}=\frac{1}{6}~\overset{ \lim}{ _{x \rightarrow 0}}~ \frac{\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}=\frac{1}{6}}}[/math]

Question #285 (ID: 476353)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \dfrac{1}{x}\right)}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{1}{x^{2}}~ \cos \dfrac{1}{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm {-\dfrac{1}{x^{2}} ~\sin\dfrac{1}{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{x^{2}}~ \sin\dfrac{1}{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{x^{2}}~ \cos \dfrac{1}{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{1}{x^{2}}~ \sin\dfrac{1}{x}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\dfrac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\cos \dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)=-\sin \dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \cdot \dfrac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)=\left(-\sin \dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)\left(-\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)=\dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}} \sin \dfrac{1}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]

Question #286 (ID: 476354)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3}\right)=}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{2}\left(\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{2 \mathrm{x}}-3}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{\left(\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{2 \mathrm x}-3}\right)}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3}}{\sqrt{2 x}}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{\sqrt{2}\left(e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3}\right)}{\sqrt{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3}}{\sqrt{2 x}}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3}\right)=e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3} \cdot \sqrt{2} \dfrac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\dfrac{e^{\sqrt{2 x}-3}}{\sqrt{2 x}}}[/math]

Question #287 (ID: 476355)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2 x}\right)=}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm { 2 x \cdot x^{2 x-1}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{x^{2 x+1}}{2 x+1}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm { x^{x}(1+\ln 2 x)}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm { x^{2 x}(2+2 \ln x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm { x^{2 x}(2+2 \ln x)}[/math]

Explanation:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm {y=x^{2 x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \mathrm { \ln y=2 x \ln x \Rightarrow \dfrac{d}{d x}(\ln y)=\dfrac{d}{d x}(2 x \cdot \ln x) }\\\Rightarrow \mathrm { \dfrac{1}{y} \dfrac{d y}{d x}=2\left(x \cdot \dfrac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot 1\right)=2+2 \ln x }\\\therefore \mathrm {\dfrac{d y}{d x}=y(2+2 \ln x)=x^{2 x}(2+2 \ln x)}\end{array}[/math]

Question #288 (ID: 476356)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Mymensingh Board | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {f(x)=\dfrac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm {2 \tan \dfrac{x}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm { \sec ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm { \tan \dfrac{x}{2} \sec ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm { 2 \tan \dfrac{x}{2} \cdot \sec ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm { \tan \dfrac{x}{2} \sec ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm { f(x)=\dfrac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}=\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}=\tan ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}} \\\mathrm { f^{\prime}(x)=2 \tan \dfrac{x}{2} \sec ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2} \times \dfrac{1}{2}=\tan \dfrac{x}{2} \sec ^{2} \dfrac{x}{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Question #289 (ID: 476357)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {y=\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\ldots \ldots}}}}[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm {\dfrac{d y}{d x}=}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{1}{2 y}}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{1}{-2 y}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{1}{2 y-1}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm { \dfrac{1}{1-2 y}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm { \dfrac{1}{2 y-1}}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\begin{aligned} \mathrm {y}= & \mathrm {\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\ldots \ldots \ldots}}}} \\& \Rightarrow \mathrm { y^{2}=x+\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x+\ldots \ldots \ldots}}}} \\& \Rightarrow \mathrm {y^{2}=x+y \Rightarrow y^{2}-y=x}\end{aligned} \end{array}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}[/math]
 এর সাঁপক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে পাই,[math]\qquad \mathrm {2 y \cdot \dfrac{d y}{d x}-\dfrac{d y}{d x}=1 \Rightarrow \dfrac{d y}{d x}(2 y-1)=1 \quad \therefore \dfrac{d y}{d x}=\dfrac{1}{2 y-1}}[/math]

Question #290 (ID: 476152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


চিত্রে, সরলরেখাটির অক্ষদ্বয় হতে ছেদকৃত অংশের যোগফলের সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
সরলরেখার সমীকরণ, [math]\frac{x}{a}+\frac{y}{b}=1[/math]
এবং [math](4,16)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী হওয়ায়, [math]\frac{4}{a}+\frac{16}{b}=1[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\Rightarrow \frac{4}{a} & =1-\frac{16}{b} \\& \Rightarrow \frac{b-16}{b}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}f(a, b)=a+b \\f(b)=\frac{4 b}{b-16}+b \\f^{\prime}(b)=\frac{4(b-16)-4 b}{(b-16)^{2}}+1 \\\Rightarrow 0=\frac{-64+(b-16)^{2}}{(b-16)^{2}} \\\Rightarrow(b-16)^{2}=64 \\\Rightarrow b= \pm 8+16 \\\therefore b=24,8\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=\frac{4 b}{b-16}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]b = 24[/math]
 হলে, [math]a = 12[/math]
 এবং b = 8 হলে, [math]a = -4[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}f_{\max }=24+12=36 \\f_{\min }=8-4=4\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #291 (ID: 476153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] ও [math]g(x)=x[/math] হলে-

[math]\text{i. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math] [math](f o g)(x)=0[/math] [math]\text{ii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math] [math]\frac{f(x)}{g(x)}=1[/math] [math]\text{iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math] [math]\frac{g(x)}{(\operatorname{gof})(x)}=1[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math][(fog)(x)][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math][f(g(x))][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[f(x)][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \sin x=0[/math]
 [math]\text { (ii) } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{f(x)}{g(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}=1[/math]
 [math]\text { (iii) } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{g(x)}{(g \circ f)(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{g(\sin x)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #292 (ID: 476154)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin e^{x}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \frac{d y}{d x}=\operatorname{cos e}^{x}\\\text{ii. } \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} y\right)=e^{\mathrm{x}}\\\text{iii. } \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} y\right)=\frac{e^{x} \cos ^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.ii ও iii

Solution:
(i) সঠিক নয়। কারণ, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x} \cos e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\text { (iii) } \frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left[\tan ^{-1}\left(\sin e^{x}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sin ^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos e^{x} \cdot e^{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x} \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #293 (ID: 476155)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}, g(x)=e^{x}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \frac{d}{d x}\{gof(x)\}=2 x^{x^{2}}\\\text{ii. } \frac{d}{d x}\{f o g(x)\}=2 \mathrm{e}^{2 \mathrm{x}}\\\text{iii. } \frac{d f(x)}{d g(x)}=\frac{2 x}{\ln x}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয় ।[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d f(x)}{d x}=2 x, \frac{d g(x)}{d x}=e^{x} \\\therefore \frac{d f(x)}{d x} \cdot \frac{1}{\frac{d g(x)}{d x}}=2 x \cdot \frac{1}{e^{x}} \\\therefore \frac{d f(x)}{d g(x)}=\frac{2 x}{e^{x}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #294 (ID: 476156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a(\theta-\sin \theta), y=a(1-\cos \theta)[/math] হলে-

i. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]

ii. [math]\frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dy}}=\frac{1-\cos \theta}{\sin \theta}[/math]

iii. [math]\theta=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]i. \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a-a \cos \theta}{a \theta-a \sin \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a \sin \theta}{a-a \cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a \sin \theta}{a(1-\cos \theta)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]ii \cdot \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a \theta-a \sin \theta}{a-a \cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a-a \cos \theta}{a \sin \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a(1-\cos \theta)}{a \sin \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\cos \theta}{\sin \theta}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cot \frac{\theta}{2} \quad \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2} \because \cot \frac{\pi}{4}=1[/math]
সুতরাং সবগুলোই সঠিক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #295 (ID: 476157)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\operatorname{sin} \sqrt{y}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2 \cdot \sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \text{}\\\text{ii. } \frac{d x}{d y}=\frac{\operatorname{sim} \sqrt{y}}{2 \sqrt{y}}\\\text{iii. } \left(1-x^{2}\right) \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-x \frac{d y}{d x}=2\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: C.i ও iii

Solution:
[math]x=\sin \sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=\cos \sqrt{y}\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos \sqrt{y}}{2 \sqrt{y}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ii নং ভুল

Explanation:

Question #296 (ID: 476158)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\ldots \ldots . .}}}}}[/math] হলে-

i. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{e^{x}}{2 y-1}[/math]

ii. [math]2 y_{2}+2 y_{1}^{2}-y_{2}=e^{x}[/math]

iii. [math](0, 3)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{1}{5}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { (i) } y=\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\ldots . .} \infty}} \\\Rightarrow y=\sqrt{e^{x}+y} \\\Rightarrow y^{2}=e^{x}+y \\\Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}+\frac{d y}{d x} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{e^{x}}{2 y-1} \\\text { (ii) } y_{1}=\frac{e^{x}}{2 y-1} \\\Rightarrow 2 y_{y_{1}}-y_{1}=e^{x} \\\Rightarrow 2 y_{2}+2 y_{1}{ }^{2}-y_{2}=e^{x} \\\therefore 2 y_{2}+2 y^{2}{ }^{x}-y_{2}=e^{x} \\\text { (iii) }\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(0,3)}=\frac{e^{0}}{2 \times 3-1}=\frac{1}{5}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #297 (ID: 476159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-x+3[/math] বক্ররেখার উপর [math]A(-1, 0)[/math] একটি বিন্দু হলে—

i. [math]A[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]= 8[/math]

ii. [math]A[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math]8 x+y+8=0[/math]

iii. [math]A[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ, [math]x+8 y+1=0[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
(ii) সঠিক নয় ।কারণ, স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y-0=8(x+1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore 8 x-y+8=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #298 (ID: 476160)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে—

i. [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]

ii. [math]f(x)[/math] এর লঘুমান [math]= 2[/math]

iii. [math]f(x)[/math] এর লঘুমান গুরুমান অপেক্ষা বড়

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: B.ii ও iii

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=1-x^{-2}[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x) =0-(-2) x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 (i) নং সঠিক নয়।

Explanation:

ঘ. [math]9 x^{2}+5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]60 x^{2}-18 x[/math]

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=5 x^{4}-3 x^{3}+5 x+2[/math] [math]x = 2[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y_{3}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]204[/math]
খ. [math]222[/math]
গ. [math]258[/math]
ঘ. [math]276[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]222[/math]

Solution:
[math]y_{3}=120 x-18[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=2[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]y_{3}=120 \times 2-18=222[/math]

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=\lambda x(1-x)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখা।

বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \lambda x[/math]
খ. [math]4 \lambda x[/math]
গ. [math]\lambda-2 \lambda \mathrm{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\lambda-4 \lambda x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\lambda-2 \lambda \mathrm{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\lambda x-\lambda x^{2} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\lambda-2 \lambda x[/math]

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=\lambda x(1-x)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখা।

মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সাথে [math]60^{\circ}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে [math]\lambda=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math](0, 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\lambda=\tan 60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3}[/math]

Question #303 (ID: 476165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=b x(x-1)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

[math]b[/math] এর মান কত হলে বক্ররেখাটির মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2 b x-b[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে এক [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(0,0)}=-b[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]\tan 30^{\circ}=-b[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{b}=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #304 (ID: 476166)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y=b x(x-1)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

বক্ররেখাটির মূল বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]b x-y=0[/math]
খ. [math]y-b x=0[/math]
গ. [math]y+b {x}=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { by }-x=0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]y+b {x}=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y-0=-b(x-0) \\\therefore y+b x=0\end{array}[/math]

Question #305 (ID: 476167)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important

Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x ; 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2}[/math] [math]f^{\prime}(x)=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2 i n 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]-\sin 2 x[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2^{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 \sin 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\sin 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}f^{\prime}(x) & =6 \sin x \cdot \cos x+8 \cos x(-\sin x) \\& \Rightarrow -2 \sin x \cos x=-\sin 2 x\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #306 (ID: 476168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=3 \sin ^{2} x+4 \cos ^{2} x ; 0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2}[/math] [math]f(x)[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 বা, [math]\sin 2 x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2x = 0[/math]
 অথবা, [math]\pi \therefore x=0[/math]
 অথবা, [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}f^{\prime}(x)=-2 \cos 2 x \\\therefore f^{\prime}(0)=-20\end{array}[/math]
সর্বনিম্নমান [math]=f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=3 \sin ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}+4 \cdot \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{2}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #307 (ID: 476169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=a x^{2}+b x+c[/math] এবং [math]f_{\max }=9[/math] যখন [math]x = 1[/math] [math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশনটির জন্য নিচের কোনটি সঠিক নয়?

Options:
ক. মূল দুইটি
খ. শুধুমাত্র সর্বোচ্চ মান আছে
গ. সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন উভয়ই বিদ্যমান
ঘ. a এর মান ঋণাত্মক


Correct Answer: C.সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন উভয়ই বিদ্যমান

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=a x^{2}+b x+c \\f^{\prime}(x)=2 a x+b\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=0[/math]
 এর মূল একটি হওয়ায় শুধুমাত্র সর্বোচ্চ মান সম্ভব।[math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=2 a[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{a}<0[/math]
 হলেই [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)<0[/math]
 হবে ফলে গুরুমান পাওয়া যাবে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #308 (ID: 476170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=a x^{2}+b x+c[/math] এবং [math]f_{\max }=9[/math]; যখন, [math]x = 1[/math] [math]f(0)=6[/math] হলে ফাংশনটি নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-x^{2}+6 x+6[/math]
খ. [math]-3 x^{2}+6 x+6[/math]
গ. [math]-6 x^{2}+3 x+6[/math]
ঘ. [math]-x^{2}+9 x+6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-3 x^{2}+6 x+6[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(1)=a+b+c[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 9=a+b+c[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text { (i) }[/math]
এবং [math]f(0)=c=6[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text { (ii) }[/math]
(i) ও (ii) হতে পাই, [math]\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}+6=9[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}=3[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text { (iii) }[/math]
আবার, চরম বিন্দুতে, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 .[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}=0[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text { (iv) }[/math]
(iii) ও (iv) সমাধান করে পাই,[math]a=-3, b=6[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=-3 \mathrm{x}^{2}+6 x+6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #309 (ID: 476171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}[/math]
লব ও হরকে অন্তরীকরণ করে পাই,[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3+x}}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #310 (ID: 476172)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2} \ln x+x^{4} e^{x}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 x+4 x^{3} e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]x+2 x \ln x+x^{3} e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]x+2 x \ln x+x^{3} e^{x}(x+4)[/math]
D. [math]x(1+2 \ln x)+e^{x}(x+4)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x+2 x \ln x+x^{3} e^{x}(x+4)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2} \ln x\right)[/math]
 [math]+\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{4} e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=x^{2} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 x[/math]
 [math]\cdot \ln x+x^{4}[/math]
 [math]\cdot e^{x}+4 x^{3} \cdot e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+2 x[/math]
 [math]\ln x+x^{3} e^{x}(x+4)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #311 (ID: 476173)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\theta[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\frac{1-\tan \theta}{1+\tan \theta}[/math] এর অন্তরক কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1-\tan \theta)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2 \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1+\tan \theta)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-2 \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1-\tan \theta)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-(1+\tan \theta)^{2}}{2 \sec ^{2} \theta}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-2 \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1+\tan \theta)^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d \theta}\left(\frac{1-\tan \theta}{1+\tan \theta}\right) \\\Rightarrow \frac{(1+\tan \theta) \frac{d}{d \theta}(1-\tan \theta)-(1-\tan \theta) \frac{d}{d \theta}(1+\tan \theta)}{(1+\tan \theta)^{2}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{(1+\tan \theta)\left(-\sec ^{2} \theta\right)-(1-\tan \theta) \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1+\tan \theta)^{2}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{(-1-\tan \theta-1+\tan \theta) \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1+\tan \theta)^{2}}=\frac{-2 \sec ^{2} \theta}{(1+\tan \theta)^{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #312 (ID: 476174)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{3}-3 x y+y^{3}=3[/math] অধিবৃত্তের [math](1,− 1 )[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y-1=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-1=0[/math]
গ. [math]x=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x-1=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{3}-3 x y+y^{3}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{3 x^{2}-3 y}{-3 x+3 y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-x^{2}}{y^{2}-x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=\left.\frac{y^{2}-x}{y-x^{2}} \therefore \frac{d x}{d y}\right|_{(1,-1)}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math](1, −1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ,[math]y+1=\frac{1}{\frac{d x}{d y}}(x-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (y+1) \frac{d x}{d y}=x-1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x-1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #313 (ID: 476175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{7}{2}}-a^{\frac{7}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]7 a^{2}[/math]
B. [math]7 a^{4}[/math]
C. [math]7 a^{3}[/math]
D. [math]7 a^{6} \text {. }[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7 a^{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{7}{2}}-a^{\frac{7}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}=\lim _{x} \frac{(\sqrt{x})^{7}-(\sqrt{a})^{7}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\\quad\Rightarrow 7(\sqrt{a})^{7-1}=7 a^{3}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #314 (ID: 476176)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো সমবাহু ত্রিভুজের বাহুগুলো [math]\sqrt{3} \mathrm{~cm} / \mathrm{s}[/math] হারে ও ক্ষেত্রফল [math]12 \mathrm{cm}^{2} / \mathrm{s}[/math] হারে বাড়লে, বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য কত [math]cm[/math] ?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{8}[/math]
খ. [math]16[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]18[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]8[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{da}}{\mathrm{dt}}=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}}=12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} \mathrm{a}^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \mathrm{a} \frac{\mathrm{da}}{\mathrm{dt}}=12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{3}=12[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{a}=8 \mathrm{~cm} \text { (Ans.) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #315 (ID: 476177)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=a x+\frac{b}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathbf{y}_{2}[/math] কত হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 b}{x^{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 c}{x^{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 b}{x^{3}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2 b}{x^{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2 b}{x^{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=a x+\frac{b}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=a x+b x^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{1}=a[/math]
 [math]\cdot 1+b(-1) x^{-2}[/math]
 [math]=a-b x^{-2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{2}=-b(-2) x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]=b 2 x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 b}{x^{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #316 (ID: 476178)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সরলরেখায় চলমান কোন কণা [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ডে [math]s=64 t-5 t^{2}-2 t^{3}[/math] অতিক্রম করে। [math]2[/math] সেকেন্ড পরে কণার বেগ কত [math]\mathrm{ms}^{-1}[/math] হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]20[/math]
গ. [math]30[/math]
ঘ. [math]40[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]20[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}s=64 t-5 t^{2}-2 t^{3} \\\therefore \frac{d s}{d t}=64-10 t-6 t^{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2[/math]
 সেকেন্ড পরে কণারবেগ [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d s}{d t}=64-10.2-6.2^{2}[\because \mathrm{t}=2 \mathrm{~s}][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 64-20-24=20 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #317 (ID: 476179)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{\cos x}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+\sin x}{\cos x}\right) \\\Rightarrow \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\cos x}+\frac{\sin x}{\cos x}\right) \\\Rightarrow \tan ^{-1}(\sec x+\tan x) \\\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+(\sec x+\tan x)^{2}} \frac{d}{d x}(\sec x+\tan x) \\\Rightarrow \frac{\sec x \tan x+\sec ^{2} x}{1+\sec ^{2} x+\tan ^{2} x+2 \sec x \tan x} \\\Rightarrow \frac{\sec x(\tan x+\sec x)}{2 \sec ^{2} x+2 \sec x \tan x} \\\Rightarrow \frac{\sec x(\tan x+\sec x)}{2 \sec x(\sec x+\tan x)}=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 যে কোন বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #318 (ID: 476180)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}(2 a-x)[/math] বক্ররেখায় যে সকল বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তাদের একটির স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math](0,0)[/math]
খ. [math](0,1)[/math]
গ. [math](1,0)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,1)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](0,0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=x^{2}(2 a-x)=2 a x^{2}-x^{3} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=2 a \cdot 2 x-3 x^{2}=4 a x-3 x^{2}\end{array}[/math]
যেহেতু স্পর্শক x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\Rightarrow 4 a x-3 x^{2}=0 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}(4 a-3 x)=0 \\\therefore \mathrm{x}=0, \frac{4 a}{3}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=0[/math]
একটির স্থানাঙ্ক [math](x, y)=(0,0)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #319 (ID: 476181)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](0, 9)[/math] ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=x^{3}-18 x^{2}+96 x[/math] ফাংশনের সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]260[/math]
খ. [math]160[/math]
গ. [math]-260[/math]
ঘ. [math]-160[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]160[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-18[/math]
 [math]x^{2}+96 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-36 x+96[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=6 x-36[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]f^{}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 3 \mathrm{x}^{2}[/math]
 [math]-36 \mathrm{x}+96=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}[/math]
 [math]-12 \mathrm{x}+32=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}[/math]
 [math]-4 \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]-8 \mathrm{x}+32=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}(\mathrm{x}-4)[/math]
 [math]-8(\mathrm{x}-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (\mathrm{x}-4)[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{x}-8)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=4,8[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=4[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6.4-36=24-36=-120[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]x = 4[/math]
 এ [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর মান সর্বোচ্চ[math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=4^{3}-18[/math]
 [math].{4}^{2}+96.4[/math]
 [math]=160[/math]


Explanation:

Question #320 (ID: 476182)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 x^{3}-3 x^{2}+2[/math] হলে, [math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\mathbf{y}_{2}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]24[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]18[/math]
ঘ. [math]81[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]18[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=4 x^{3}-3 x^{2}+2 \\\therefore y_{1}=4.3 x^{2}-3.2 x+0=12 x^{2}-6 x \\\therefore y_{2}=12.2 x-6=24 x-6\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]y_{2}=24.1-6=24-6=18[/math]


Explanation:

Question #321 (ID: 476183)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-5 x+2[/math] এর চরমবিন্দুর ভুজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{6}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{5}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{5}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-5 x+2 \quad \therefore f(x)=6 x-5[/math]
চরমবিন্দুতে, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 x-5=0 \Rightarrow 6 x=5 \therefore x=\frac{5}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #322 (ID: 476184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](0,1)[/math] ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=3+2 x-x^{2}[/math] ফাংশন হলে, [math]f(2) =[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}-3 \mathrm{x}+1 \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}-3 \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(0)=2 \mathrm{e}^{0}-3=2.1-3=-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #323 (ID: 476185)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=5 x^{-3} e^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathbf{y}_{1}[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]5 x^{-4} \mathrm{e}^{x}[/math]
B. [math]5 x^{-2} e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]-15 x^{-4} e^{x}+5 x^{-3} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]15 x^{-4} e^{x}-5 x^{-3} e^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-15 x^{-4} e^{x}+5 x^{-3} e^{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=5\left(x^{-3} e^{x}\right) \\\therefore y_{1}=5\left(x^{-3} \cdot e^{x}+e^{x} \cdot-3 x^{-4}\right) \\\Rightarrow 5 e^{x} x^{-3}-15 e^{x} x^{-4} \\\Rightarrow -15 x^{-4} e^{x}+5 x^{-3} e^{x} \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #324 (ID: 476186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin 2 x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{2 \cdot \sin 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\lim _{2 x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{\sin 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} .1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #326 (ID: 476188)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\ln \left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math] হয় তবে, [math](1, 0)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}+y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left(2 x+-2 y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}}{x^{2}+y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]-2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(x^{2}+y^{2}-2 y\right)=2 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{x^{2}+y^{2}-2 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2.1}{1^{2}+0^{2}-2.0}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #327 (ID: 476189)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+3 x}{1+2 x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+3 x}{1+2 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(1+\frac{3}{x}\right)}{x^{2}\left(\frac{1}{x^{2}}+2\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}[/math]
 [math]\frac{1+\frac{3}{x}}{\frac{1}{x^{2}}+2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+\frac{3}{\infty}}{\frac{1}{\infty^{2}}+2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+0}{0+2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #329 (ID: 476191)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সাবানের একটি গোলাকার বুদবুদের আয়তন পরিবর্তনের হার ও ব্যাসার্ধের পরিবর্তনের হারের অনুপাত কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \pi^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4 \pi r^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi r^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\pi r^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4 \pi^{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, ব্যাসার্ধ [math]=r[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হার [math]=\frac{d r}{d t}[/math]
আয়তন, [math]v=4 / 3 \pi r^{3}[/math]
আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার [math]\frac{d v}{d t}=4 \pi r^{2} \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]
 [math]=4 \pi r^{2} \times[/math]
 ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হার

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #330 (ID: 476192)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]h(x)=\ln \left(e^{m x}+e^{-m x}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]h^{\prime}(0)=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]h(x)=\ln \left(e^{m x}+e^{-m x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore h^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{e^{m x}+e^{-m x}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(m e^{m x}-m e^{-m x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore h^{\prime}(0)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m e^{m .0}-m e^{-m .0}}{e^{m .0}+e^{-m .0}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m-m}{1+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0}{2}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #331 (ID: 476193)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{m x}-1}{2 x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]m[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\mathrm{m}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\mathrm{m}}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{m x}-1}{2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{m e^{m x}}{2}[L-\text { Hospital's rule }[/math]
 ব্যবহার করে][math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{m} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{m} .0}}{2}=\frac{\mathrm{m} .1}{2}=\frac{\mathrm{m}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #332 (ID: 476194)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x \sqrt{1+x^{2}}[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x = 0[/math] তে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y =x \sqrt{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=x \cdot \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(1+x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \cdot 2 x+\sqrt{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}+\sqrt{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}+\left(\sqrt{1+x^{2}}\right)\left(\sqrt{1+x^{2}}\right)}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}+1+x^{2}}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+2 x^{2}}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+0}{\sqrt{1+0}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #335 (ID: 476197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan (x y)=x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cos ^{2}(x y)+y}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\cos ^{2}(x y)-y}{y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\cos ^{2}(x y)-y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\cos ^{2}(x y)+x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\cos ^{2}(x y)-y}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan (x y)=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sec ^{2}(x y)[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(x \frac{d y}{d x}+y\right)=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \frac{d y}{d x}+y[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sec ^{2}(x y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \frac{d y}{d x}+y=\cos ^{2}(x y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{2}(x y)-y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos ^{2}(x y)-y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #336 (ID: 476198)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে, [math]f(x) =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln (\ln x) \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Question #341 (ID: 476203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-3 x^{2}-12 x+15[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ।

বক্ররেখাটির [math](1, 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-12[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-12[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=2 x^{3}-3 x^{2}-12 x+15 \\\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=6 x^{2}-6 x-12\end{array}[/math]
 [math](1, 2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=6.1^{2}-6.1-12=6-6-12=-12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #342 (ID: 476204)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-3 x^{2}-12 x+15[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ।

x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)[/math] সর্বোচ্চ হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}^{3}-3 \mathrm{x}^{2}-12 \mathrm{x}+15 \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=6 \mathrm{x}^{2}-6 \mathrm{x}-12 . \\\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=12 \mathrm{x}-6\end{array}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্নমানের জন্যে, [math]f^{}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 6 x^{2}-6 x-12=0 \\\Rightarrow x^{2}-x-2=0 \\\Rightarrow x^{2}-2 x+x-2=0 \\\Rightarrow x(x-2)+1(x-2)=0 \\\Rightarrow (x+1)(x-2)=0 \\\therefore x=-1 ; 2\end{array}[/math]
 [math]x = − 1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=12(-1)-6=-180[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=-1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর মান সর্বোচ্চ হবে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #343 (ID: 476205)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাওঃ

[math]x=a t^{2}[/math] এবং [math]y=2 a t[/math] [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{t}=1[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{x}=\mathrm{a} t^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \mathrm{at}[/math]
 এবং [math]y=2 a t[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d t}=2 a[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{d y}{d t}}{\frac{d x}{d t}}=\frac{2 a}{2 a t}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{t}[/math]
 [math]\therefore t=1[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #344 (ID: 476206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \mathrm{at}^{3}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2 a t^{3}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{t^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{t^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{2 a t^{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \cdot\left(\frac{1}{t}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d t}{d x} \cdot \frac{d}{d t}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{t}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 a t} \cdot \frac{-1}{t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2 \mathrm{at}^{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #345 (ID: 476207)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যটি পড়ে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

সরলরেখায় চলমান কোনো কণার [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ডে অতিক্রান্ত দূরত্ব, [math]=\frac{1}{3} t^{3}+t^{2}+4 t[/math]

গতি শুরুর [math]5[/math] সেকেন্ডে কণার বেগ কত [math]\mathrm{ms}^{-1} \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]30[/math]
খ. [math]35[/math]
গ. [math]39[/math]
ঘ. [math]40[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]39[/math]

Solution:
[math]s=\frac{1}{3} t^{3}[/math]
 [math]+t^{2}+4 t \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d s}{d t}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 3 t^{2}+2 t+4[/math]
 [math]=t^{2}+2 t+4[/math]
গতি শুরুর [math]5[/math]
 সেকেন্ডে কণার বেগ [math]=\frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=5^{2}+2.5+4[/math]
 [math]=25+10+4[/math]
 [math]=39 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #346 (ID: 476208)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যটি পড়ে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

সরলরেখায় চলমান কোনো কণার [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ডে অতিক্রান্ত দূরত্ব, [math]=\frac{1}{3} t^{3}+t^{2}+4 t[/math] [math]5[/math] সেকেন্ড পরে কণাটির ত্বরণ কত [math]\mathrm{ms}^{-2} \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]14[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{s}=\frac{1}{3} \mathrm{t}^{3}+\mathrm{t}^{2}+4 \mathrm{t} \quad \therefore \frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}}=\mathrm{t}^{2}+2 \mathrm{t}+4 \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{~s}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}=2 \mathrm{t}+2\end{array}[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]5[/math]
 সেকেন্ড পরে কণাটির ত্বরণ[math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{~s}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}=2.5+2=10+2=12 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #347 (ID: 476209)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}}{1}\left[L^{\prime} \text { Hospital Law }\right]=e^{0}=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #348 (ID: 476210)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1}\left[L^{\prime} \text { Hospital Law }\right]=1[/math]

Explanation:
