Question #349 (ID: 476211)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x} ;(a>1)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\text { ln a }[/math]
D. [math]-\text { ln a }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} a^{x} \ln a\left[L^{\prime} \text { Hospital Law }=\ln a\right.[/math]

Question #350 (ID: 476212)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1}\left[L^{\prime} \text { Hospital Law }\right]=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #351 (ID: 476213)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+3 x+5}{2 x^{2}+9 x-4}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-5}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+3 x+5}{2 x^{2}+9 x-4}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{5}{x^{2}}}{2+\frac{9}{x}-\frac{4}{x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #352 (ID: 476214)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]{y}=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}}=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sin x+\cos x}=1 \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(1)=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #353 (ID: 476215)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2} \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
C. [math]e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(-\frac{3 x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=e^{\frac{-3 x}{2}} \cdot\left(-\frac{3}{2}\right) \\=-\frac{3}{2} e^{-\frac{3 x}{2}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #354 (ID: 476216)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cot ^{-1} \frac{1-x}{1+x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\cot ^{-1} \frac{1-x}{1+x}=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}=\tan ^{-1} 1+\tan ^{-1} x \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #355 (ID: 476217)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1}\left(\sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\cos \frac{x}{2}}\right) \\\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{x}{2}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #356 (ID: 476218)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sin 2 x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cos 2 x}{2 \sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sqrt{\sin 2 x} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sin 2 x}} \cdot \cos 2 x \cdot 2=\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #357 (ID: 476219)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos ^{-1}\left(2 x \sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\cos ^{-1}\left(2 x\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\cos^{-1}\left(2\sin \theta\sqrt{1-\sin^{2} \theta}\right)\right\}[/math]
 ধরি, [math]\left.x=\sin \theta \Rightarrow \theta=\sin ^{-1} x\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}\left\{\cos ^{-1}(2 \sin\theta \cos \theta)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\cos ^{-1}(\sin 2\theta)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}\left\{\cos ^{-1} \cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 \theta\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 \theta\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}\left\{\frac{\pi}{2}-2 \sin ^{-1} x\right\}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #358 (ID: 476220)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{a+x}{a-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{a^{2}+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{a\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+a^{2} x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{a}{a^{2}+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{a+x}{a-x} \\y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+\frac{x}{a}}{1-1 \times \frac{x}{a}}=\tan ^{-1}(1)+\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{a}\right) \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0+\frac{1}{1+\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}} \times \frac{1}{a}=\frac{a}{a^{2}+x^{2}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #359 (ID: 476221)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+4 x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 এ [math]x=\tan \theta[/math]
 বসিয়ে পাই,[math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \tan \theta}{1-\tan ^{2} \theta}=\tan ^{-1} \tan 2 \theta=2 \theta \\\Rightarrow 2 \cdot \tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\left[\because \theta=\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right] \\\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{2}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #360 (ID: 476222)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sin ^{2} x}{1+\cos x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\sin x[/math]
C. [math]\sin x[/math]
D. [math]-\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sin x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\sin ^{2} x}{1+\cos x}=\frac{1-\cos ^{2} x}{1+\cos x}=1-\cos x \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\sin x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #361 (ID: 476223)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গাড়ি সোজা রাস্তায় [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ডে [math]\left(3 t+\frac{1}{8} t^{2}\right)[/math] মিটার অতিক্রম করলে, [math]5[/math] মিনিটে তার বেগ কত হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]60 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
খ. [math]72 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
গ. [math]78 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
ঘ. [math]80 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]78 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]

Solution:
[math]S=3 t+\frac{1}{8} t^{2} \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dS}}{\mathrm{dt}}=3+\frac{t}{4}[/math]
 [math]5[/math]
 মিনিট [math]=5 \times 60[/math]
 সেকেন্ড [math]= 300[/math]
 সেকেন্ড[math]\therefore 5[/math]
 মিনিটে বেগ [math]=3+\frac{300}{4}=78 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #364 (ID: 476226)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর প্রেক্ষিতে [math]\ln \left(1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{x}}{1+\mathrm{e}^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{\left(1+e^{x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+\mathrm{e}^{2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{x}}{1+\mathrm{e}^{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right) \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left[\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+e^{x}} \frac{d}{d x}\left(1+e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #365 (ID: 476227)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } \quad y=\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \sin ^{2}(x / 2)}{2 \cos ^{2}(x / 2)}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { Differentiate with respect to ' } x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\frac{\mathrm{x}}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #366 (ID: 476149)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos x[/math] ফাংশনটি নিচের কোন ব্যবধিতে ক্রমহ্রাসমান?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2} \leq x \leq \frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2} \leq x \leq 2 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]\pi \leq x \leq 2 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]0 \leq x \leq \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0 \leq x \leq \pi[/math]

Solution:
উদাহরণ: যে সকল ব্যবধিতে [math]f(x)=\cos x, 0সমাধান: প্রদত্ত ফাংশন:[math]f(x)=\cos x, 0[math]\therefore \quad f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x[/math]
এখন [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow-\sin x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\pi[/math]

[Image]
[math]x=\pi[/math]
 বিন্দুটি [math]0 [math]0 [math]\pi[math]0 [math]\sin x>0,[/math]
 কাজেই [math]f^{\prime}(x)0[/math]
সুতরাং [math]\pi

Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+18 x+15[/math] ফাংশনটি কোন ধরনের?

Options:
ক. ক্রমবর্ধমান
খ. ক্রমহ্রাসমান
গ. ধ্রুব
ঘ. অভেদ


Correct Answer: A.ক্রমবর্ধমান

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x +18[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3(x-1)^{2}+15>0[/math]

Question #368 (ID: 476151)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি সংখ্যার যোগফল [math]36[/math] এবং এদের গুণফল সর্বোচ্চ হলে সংখ্যাদুটির বর্গের যোগফল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]324[/math]
খ. [math]648[/math]
গ. [math]1296[/math]
ঘ. [math]1944[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]648[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}a+b=36 \\f=a b=a(36-a) \\f^{\prime}=36-2 a \quad \Rightarrow 0=36-2 a \\\therefore a=18 \\\therefore b=18 \\f^{\prime \prime}=-2<0\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 গুণফলের সর্বোচ্চ মান, [math]a b=18^{2}=324[/math]
 [math]\therefore a^{2}+b^{2}=18^{2}+18^{2}=648[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #369 (ID: 476124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


লেখচিত্রটির অন্তরঙ্গ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]|x-2|[/math]
B. [math]\frac{|x-2|}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{|x-2|}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x-2}{|x-2|}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{x-2}{|x-2|}[/math]

Solution:
লেখচিত্রে প্রদত্ত ফাংশন,[math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=|x-2| \\\Rightarrow y=|x-2| \\\Rightarrow y=\sqrt{(x-2)^{2}} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{(x-2)^{2}}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(x-2)^{2} \\\Rightarrow \frac{2(x-2)}{2 \sqrt{(x-2)^{2}}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{x-2}{\sqrt{(x-2)^{2}}}=\frac{x-2}{|x-2|} \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #370 (ID: 476125)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1-\tan ^{2} \theta}{1+\tan ^{2} \theta}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d \theta}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y= \cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{1-\tan ^{2} \theta}{1+\tan ^{2} \theta}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\cos 2 \theta=2 \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #371 (ID: 476126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \frac{6 x}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1-9 x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{6}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{1-9 x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{6}{1+9 x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} \frac{6 x}{1+9 x^{2}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \tan ^{-1} 3 x\right) \\\Rightarrow 2 \frac{1}{1+(3 x)^{2}} \times \frac{d}{d x}(3 x) \\\Rightarrow \frac{6}{1+9 x^{2}} \\\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #372 (ID: 476127)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cot \tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]x[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{x}=\cot ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=\cot \cot ^{-1} x=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #373 (ID: 476129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\sin e^{x}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{x} \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{e^{x} \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{e^{x} \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1}\left(\sin ^{x}\right) \\\Rightarrow \frac{I}{1+\left(\sin ^{x}\right)^{2}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin e^{x}\right)=\frac{e^{x} \cdot \cos e^{x}}{1+\sin ^{2} e^{x}} \end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #374 (ID: 476130)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{4}-y=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\sin x[/math]
D. [math]\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sin x \\\Rightarrow y_{1}=\cos x \\\Rightarrow y_{2}=-\sin x \\\Rightarrow y_{3}=-\cos x \\\Rightarrow y_{4}=-(-\sin x)=\sin x=y \\\therefore y_{4}-y=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #375 (ID: 476131)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি অব্যক্ত ফাংশন?

Options:
ক. [math]x+y=0[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=0[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+x y+y^{2}=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x=2 \sin t, y=2 \cos t[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{2}+x y+y^{2}=0[/math]

Solution:
কোনো ফাংশনে সএবং [math]x[/math]
 এর [math]y[/math]
 চলক একই থাকলে এবং [math]xy[/math]
 যুক্ত পদ থাকলে তাকে অব্যক্ত ফাংশন বলে।

Explanation:

Question #376 (ID: 476132)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](x+y)^{2}-x y=1[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x+2 y}{y+2 x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 x+y}{x+2 y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-2 x-y}{x+2 y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-x-2 y}{y+2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-2 x-y}{x+2 y}[/math]

Solution:
[math](x+y)^{2}-x y=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{(x+y)^{2}-x y\right\}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2(x+y)[/math]
 [math]\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)-x[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}-y[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2(x+y)[/math]
 [math]+2(x+y) \frac{d y}{d x}=x \frac{d y}{d x}+y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x+2 y) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-(2 x+y)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 x+y}{x+2 y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #377 (ID: 476133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin 2 x[/math] এর n তম অন্তরজ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-1)^{n} 2^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]
খ. [math]2^{n} \cdot \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]
গ. [math]2^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1)^{n} \cdot 2^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2^{n} \cdot \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\sin 2 x \\y_{1}=2 \cos 2 x=2 \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+2 x\right) \\y_{2}=-2.2 \sin 2 x=2^{2} \sin \left(\frac{2 \pi}{2}+2 x\right) \\y_{3}=-2.2 .2 \cos 2 x=2^{3} \sin \left(\frac{3 \pi}{2}+2 x\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]................................[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}=2^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #378 (ID: 476134)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ell n x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n}=[/math]কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n+1}}{x^{n}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n}}{x^{n}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n}}{x^{n}} n ![/math]
D. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n+1}}{x^{n}}(n-1) ![/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{(-1)^{n+1}}{x^{n}}(n-1) ![/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y_{1}=\frac{1}{x} \\y_{2}=\frac{-1}{x^{2}} \\y_{3}=2 \cdot \frac{1}{x^{3}} \\y_{4}=-6 \cdot \frac{1}{x^{4}} \\\cdots \cdots \cdots \cdots \cdots \cdots \cdots \\\therefore y_{n}=\frac{(-1)^{n+1}}{x^{n}}(n-1) !\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math](n-1) ![/math]
ঘ. [math]n ![/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0[/math]

Solution:

Question #380 (ID: 476136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{100}[/math] এর [math]31[/math] তম অন্তরজ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](100) ! x^{31}[/math]
খ. [math](100) ! x^{69}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{100 !}{31 !} x^{31}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{100 !}{69 !} x^{69}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{100 !}{69 !} x^{69}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y_{n}={ }^{100} P_{n} x^{100-n} \\\therefore y_{31}={ }^{100} P_{31} x^{100-31}={ }^{100} P_{31} x^{69}=\frac{100 !}{69 !} x^{69}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #381 (ID: 476137)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{-m x}[/math] হলে [math]y_{2 n+1}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]m e^{-m x}[/math]
খ. [math]m^{n} e^{-m x}[/math]
গ. [math]-m^{2 n+1} e^{-m n x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-m^{2 n+1} e^{-m x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-m^{2 n+1} e^{-m x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}y= & e^{-m x} \\y_{1} & =-m e^{-m x} \\y_{2} & =m^{2} e^{-m x} \\y_{3} & =-m^{3} e^{-m x}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]............[/math]
 [math]y_{2 n+1}=-m^{2 n+1} e^{-m x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #382 (ID: 476138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{2}{x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math](-2,2)[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{(-2) 2}{x^{3}}=\frac{-4}{x^{3}} \\\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(-2,2)}=\frac{-4}{(-2)^{3}}=\frac{-4}{-8}=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]x^{2}-y^{2}=7[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-4, 3 )[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{4}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 x-2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{x}{y}=\frac{-4}{3}[/math]

Question #384 (ID: 476140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]{f}(x): x^{3}-3 x+2[/math] বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল ?

Options:
ক. [math](1,-1)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,1)[/math]
গ. [math](1,4)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,0)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](1,0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x} f(x)=3 x^{2}-3 \\\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-3=0 \\\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}=3 \\\Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \quad \therefore x= \pm 1\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](1, 0) (–1, 4)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #385 (ID: 476141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=x^{2}(9-x)[/math] বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের উপর লম্ব?

Options:
ক. [math](3,0)[/math]
খ. [math](0,3)[/math]
গ. [math](9,0)[/math]
ঘ. [math](0,9)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](9,0)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y^{2}=x^{2}(9-x) \\\Rightarrow y^{2}=9 x^{2}-x^{3} \\\Rightarrow 2 y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=18 x-3 x^{2} \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{18 x-3 x^{2}}{2 y} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{d y}=\frac{2 y}{18 x-3 x^{2}} \\\Rightarrow 0=\frac{2 y}{18 x-3 x^{2}} \\\therefore y=0 \\\therefore x=0,9\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(0,0)[/math]
 এবং [math](9, 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল x-অক্ষের উপর লম্ব।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #386 (ID: 476142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন বিন্দুতে [math]y=x^{3}-x^{2}-7 x+6[/math] বক্ররেখার স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]1[/math]?

Options:
ক. [math](-1,1)[/math]
খ. [math](2,-3)[/math]
গ. [math](2,-4)[/math]
ঘ. [math](3,-5)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](2,-4)[/math]

Solution:
ঢাল [math]=\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 1=3 x^{2}-2 x-7\\\therefore x=2,-\frac{4}{3}\end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math]x = 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=2^{3}-2^{2}-7.2+6=-4[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুটি [math](2,-4)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #387 (ID: 476143)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-9 x^{2}+27 x-27[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](0, 4)[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত অভিলম্বের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-27[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{27}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{27}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y= x^{3}-9 x^{2}+27 x-27[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-18 x+27[/math]
 [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(0,4)}[/math]
 [math]=3.0-18.0+27=27[/math]
 [math]\therefore -\frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{27}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #388 (ID: 476144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]t[/math] সময়ে কোনো কণার অতিক্রান্ত দূরত্ব, [math]s=t^{3}-12 t^{2}+6 t+8[/math] যখন কণাটির ত্বরণ শূন্য তখন এর বেগ কত একক ?

Options:
ক. [math]-48[/math]
খ. [math]-42[/math]
গ. [math]42[/math]
ঘ. [math]48[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-42[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}v=\frac{d s}{d t}=3 t^{2}-24 t+6 \\\therefore a=\frac{d v}{d t}=6 t-24\end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math]6 t-24=0 \Rightarrow t=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore v=3 \times 4^{2}-24 \times 4+6=-42[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #389 (ID: 476145)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বর্গক্ষেত্রের বাহু [math]2m[/math] হারে এবং ক্ষেত্রফল [math]16 \mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math] হারে বৃদ্ধি পেলে বর্গক্ষেত্রটির বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]16m[/math]
খ. [math]8m[/math]
গ. [math]4m[/math]
ঘ. [math]2m[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]4m[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}A=a^{2} \\\Rightarrow \frac{d A}{d t}=2 a \cdot \frac{d a}{d t} \\\Rightarrow 16=2 a \times 2 \\\Rightarrow 16=4 a \quad \therefore a=4 \mathrm{~m}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #390 (ID: 476146)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি আয়তক্ষেত্রের দৈর্ঘ্য প্রস্থের দ্বিগুণ, এর পরিসীমা সেকেন্ডে [math]9cm[/math] হারে এবং ক্ষেত্রফল সেকেন্ডে [math]16 \mathrm{~cm}^{2}[/math] হারে বৃদ্ধি পেলে আয়তক্ষেত্রের দৈর্ঘ্য ও প্রস্থ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{16}{9}, \frac{8}{9}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{16}{3}, \frac{8}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{9}, \frac{16}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{8}{3}, \frac{16}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{16}{3}, \frac{8}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=a b=2 b^{2}[/math]
আবার, [math]S=2(a+b)=6 b[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{~b} \cdot \frac{\mathrm{db}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dS}}{\mathrm{dt}}=6[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{db}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{~b} \cdot \frac{1}{6}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{\mathrm{dS}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 16=\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \mathrm{b} \cdot 9[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{b}=\frac{8}{3}[/math]
 এবং [math]a=\frac{16}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #391 (ID: 476147)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x}{\ell \ln x}[/math] ফাংশনের সর্বনিম্ন মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-e[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x}{\ell \operatorname{nx}}\right)=\frac{\ell \mathrm{nx}-1}{(\ell \mathrm{n} x)^{2}} \\\therefore \frac{\ell \operatorname{nx}-1}{(\ell \operatorname{n})^{2}}=0 \\\Rightarrow \ln x=1 \\\Rightarrow \ln x=\ell \text { ne } \\\therefore \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e} \\\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=\frac{\mathrm{e}}{\ell \mathrm{ne}}=\mathrm{e}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #392 (ID: 476148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-2 x+4[/math] এর চরম বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{3},-3\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{3}, 5\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{3}, \frac{11}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{3}, \frac{19}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\left(\frac{1}{3}, \frac{11}{3}\right)[/math]

Solution:
চরম বিন্দুর ক্ষেত্রে, [math]f^{}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 x-2={0} \therefore x=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)=\frac{11}{3}[/math]
চরম বিন্দু: [math]\left(\frac{1}{3}, \frac{11}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #393 (ID: 476095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3 x^{-4}[/math]
B. [math]3 x^{4}[/math]
C. [math]-6 x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]6 x^{-4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]6 x^{-4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x} \Rightarrow y=x-\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\frac{2}{x^{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=\frac{6}{x^{4}}=6 x^{-4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #394 (ID: 476096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2001-2002 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}(\sec x+\tan x)\right\}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\cos x}+\frac{\sin x}{\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+\sin x}{\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\cos \frac{x}{2}+\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\cos \frac{x}{2}-\sin \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+\tan \frac{x}{2}}{1-\tan \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #395 (ID: 476097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}\right)[/math] এর [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}\right)=2 \tan ^{-1} x \quad \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #396 (ID: 476098)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-x y[/math] বক্ররেখার (1, 1/2) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-x y \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2 x-y}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,1 / 2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]5 \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #397 (ID: 476099)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)[/math] এর গুরুমান থাকলে-

Options:
ক. [math]f'(1) = 0[/math]
খ. [math]f'(1)>0[/math]
গ. [math]f"(1)>0[/math]
ঘ. [math]f"(1) <0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]f"(1) <0[/math]

Solution:
[math]n[/math]
 যদি জোড় সংখ্যা হয় তবে [math]f"(c)  0[/math]
 হলে,[math]x = c[/math]
 বিন্দুতে f(x) লঘিষ্ঠ হবে। [math]⇒ f'(1) <0[/math]
 হবে।

Explanation:

Question #398 (ID: 476100)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = 5[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-45 x+13[/math] এর লঘুমান আছে, কারণ-

Options:
ক. [math]f^{\prime \prime}(5)=0[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime \prime}(5)<0[/math]
খ. [math]f' (5) = 0[/math] এবং [math]f"(5) > 0[/math]
গ. [math]f'(5) = 0[/math] এবং [math]f'(5) > 0[/math]
ঘ. [math]f'(5) = 0[/math] এবং [math]f"(5) = 0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]f' (5) = 0[/math] এবং [math]f"(5) > 0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-45 x+13[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-6 x-45[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=6 x-6[/math]
লঘুমান ও গুরুমানের জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-6 x-45=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-2 x-15=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-5)(x+3)=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=5,-3[/math]
যখন, [math]x=5, \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6 \times 5-6[/math]
 [math]=24>0[/math]
 লঘুমান।লঘুমান = [math]5^{3}-3.5^{2}-45.5+13=-162[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #399 (ID: 476101)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{4+3 x-x^{2}}{4 x-x^{2}+5}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{5}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{4}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{4+3 x-x^{2}}{4 x-x^{2}+5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{4+3.0-0}{4.0-0+5}=\frac{4}{5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #400 (ID: 476102)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{4 x^{2}+3}{3 x^{2}-2}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-4}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-3}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{4 x^{2}+3}{3 x^{2}-2}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{4+\frac{3}{x^{2}}}{3-\frac{2}{x^{2}}}=\frac{4}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #401 (ID: 476103)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{a^{x}+a^{-x}}{a^{x}-a^{-x}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-a[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]a[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1+\frac{1}{a^{2 x}}}{1-\frac{1}{a^{2 x}}}=\frac{1+0}{1-0}=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #402 (ID: 476104)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{3}-a^{3}}{x^{2}-a^{2}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 \mathrm{a}}{2} \text {}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3 \mathrm{a}}{2} \text {}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{(x-a)\left(x^{2}+a x+a^{2}\right)}{(x+a)(x-a)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{2}+a x+a^{2}}{(x+a)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{a^{2}+a^{2}+a^{2}}{a+a}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{3 a^{2}}{2 a}=\frac{3 a}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #403 (ID: 476105)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin 2 x}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin 2 x}=\lim _{2 x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{\sin 2 x} \times \frac{1}{2} \\\Rightarrow 1 \times \frac{1}{2}=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #404 (ID: 476106)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x}{x \cos x}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x \cdot \cos x}{x \cos x}=2 \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #405 (ID: 476107)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{1}{3 x}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{3}{5}}[/math]
B. [math]e^{-\frac{3}{5}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{5}{3}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{-\frac{5}{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{5}{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{1}{5 x} \cdot \frac{5}{3}}=e^{\frac{5}{3}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #406 (ID: 476108)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{\frac{3 x+4}{5 x}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{28}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{12}{28}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{28}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{28}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{28}{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{\frac{3 x+4}{5 x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{}}(1+7 x)^{\frac{3}{5}+\frac{4}{5 x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{}}(1+7 x)^{\frac{3}{5}} \cdot \lim _{7 x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{\frac{1}{7 x} \cdot \frac{4.7}{5}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1 . e^{\frac{28}{5}}=e^{\frac{28}{5}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #407 (ID: 476109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{5^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]\ln 5[/math]
D. [math]e^{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\ln 5[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{5^{x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{5^{x} \ln 5}{1}, \text { [L 'Hospital's Rule] }[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 5^{\circ} \ln 5 \\\Rightarrow \ln 5\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #408 (ID: 476110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x-\tan 7 x}{e^{x}-1}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x-\tan 7 x}{e^{x}-1}, \frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার[math]\text{to L'Hospital's rule,}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x-\tan 7 x}{e^{x}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{d}{d x}(\sin 5 x-\tan 7 x)}{\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}-1\right)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{5 \cos 5 x-7 \sec ^{2} 7 x}{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{5.1-7.1}{e^{0}}=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #409 (ID: 476111)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left(1+\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2^{2}}+\ldots \ldots+\frac{1}{2^{n}}\right)[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]2^{n}[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]n \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 অর্থাৎ প্রদত্ত গুণোত্তর ধারার অসীমতক সমষ্টি[math]\Rightarrow \frac{a}{1-r}=\frac{1}{1-\frac{1}{2}}=2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #410 (ID: 476112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{(2 n+1) !+(2 n-1) !}{(2 n) !+(2 n-1) !}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\infty[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(2 n+1) !+(2 n-1) !}{(2 n) !+(2 n-1) !}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(2 n+1) 2 n(2 n-1) !+(2 n-1) !}{2 n(2 n-1) !+(2 n-1) !}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}[/math]
 [math]\frac{4 n^{2}+2 n+1}{2 n+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \infty[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #411 (ID: 476113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ell n a)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\text { a } \ell \text { na }[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{a}[/math]
C. [math]a[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}& \frac{d}{d x}(\ln a) \\= & \frac{1}{a} \cdot \times 0 \\= & 0 \end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #413 (ID: 476115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(9^{x}\right)[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2.3^{2 x} \ell n 3[/math]
B. [math]9^{x} \cdot \ell n 9^{x}[/math]
C. [math]3^{x} \ell n 3[/math]
D. [math]6^{2 x} \cdot \ell n 3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2.3^{2 x} \ell n 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(9^{x}\right)=9^{x} \ell n 9[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 9^{x} \ell n 3^{2} \\\Rightarrow 2.9^{x} \cdot \ell \mathrm{n} 3 \\\Rightarrow 2.3^{2 x} \cdot \ell \mathrm{n} 3\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #414 (ID: 476116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{a} x\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\log _{e} a}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
C. [math]a^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \operatorname{\ell na}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \operatorname{\ell na}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \ell og _{a} x=\frac{1}{x} \cdot \ell og _{a} \mathrm{e}=\frac{1}{x \ell og _{e} a}=\frac{1}{x \ell n a}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #415 (ID: 476117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sqrt{x}+1}{\sqrt{x}-1}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}+1)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}+1)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}-1)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}-1)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}-1)^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(\sqrt{x}-1) \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}-(\sqrt{x}+1) \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}}{(\sqrt{x}-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}(\sqrt{x}-1-\sqrt{x}-1)}{(\sqrt{x}-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{x}(\sqrt{x}-1)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #416 (ID: 476118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\sqrt{1-\sin 2 x}}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \cos 2 x[/math]
B. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\sqrt{\cos ^{2} x+\sin ^{2} x-2 \sin x \cdot \cos x}} \\\quad\Rightarrow \frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\sqrt{(\cos x-\sin x)^{2}}} \\\quad\Rightarrow \frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\cos x-\sin x}=1 \\\therefore \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\sqrt{1-\sin 2 x}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(1)=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #417 (ID: 476119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন ফাংশনটির অন্তরজ শূন্য ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sin x-\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\cos 2 x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sin x-\cos x}{\sqrt{1-\cos 2 x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sin x-\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}} \\=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{(\sin x+\cos x)^{2}}} \\=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sin x+\cos x}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(1)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #418 (ID: 476120)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ell \operatorname{n} \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} (\ell \ln \sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{2 x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #419 (ID: 476121)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan x^{-1}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{-1} \sec ^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]x^{-2} \sec ^{2} x^{-1}[/math]
C. [math]-x^{-2} \sec ^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]-x^{-2} \sec ^{2} x^{-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-x^{-2} \sec ^{2} x^{-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \left(\tan x^{-1}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sec ^{2} x^{-1} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{-1}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow -x^{-2} \sec ^{2} x^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #420 (ID: 476122)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{\cos \sqrt{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-e^{\cos \sqrt{x}} \cdot \sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-y \sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y \sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{-y \sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=e^{\cos \sqrt{x}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\cos \sqrt{x}}\right) \\\Rightarrow e^{\cos \sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x}) \\\Rightarrow e^{\cos \sqrt{x}} \cdot(-\sin \sqrt{x}) \frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{x}) \\\Rightarrow e^{\cos \sqrt{x}} \cdot(-\sin \sqrt{x}) \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}} \\\Rightarrow \frac{-e^{\cos \sqrt{x}} \cdot \sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #421 (ID: 476123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)[/math] ফাংশনটির অন্তরজ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\{f(x)\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x+\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]\times\left(1+\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #422 (ID: 476081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ নির্ণয় করঃ

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sec x+\tan x}{\sec x-\tan x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{\text {kinx }}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sin 3 x}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-(\sqrt{x})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #423 (ID: 476082)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University of Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]a[/math]
B. [math]-a[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]loga[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x},[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]\text { L' Hospital's Rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই,[math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \log a-1}{1}=a^{0} \cdot \log a=\log a[/math]


Explanation:

Question #424 (ID: 476083)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]x^{x}(1+\log x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{x}+x \log x[/math]
C. [math]x \log x^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}(x+\log x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x} \frac{d}{d x}(x \ln x)=x^{x}\left(\frac{x}{x}+\ln x\right)=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #425 (ID: 476084)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\log x}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1-\log x[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\log x}{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{1}{x}-x-\log x}{x^{2}}=\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #426 (ID: 476085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3 x^{-4}[/math]
B. [math]3 x^{4}[/math]
C. [math]-6 x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]6 x^{-4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]6 x^{-4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x} \Rightarrow y=x-\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\frac{2}{x^{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=\frac{6}{x^{4}}=6 x^{-4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #427 (ID: 476086)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2006-2007, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]y_{3}[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x[/math]
খ. [math]9 x[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x+5[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x ; y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \log x+\frac{x^{2}}{x}=2 x \log x+x[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=2 x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=2+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{x^{3}+8}{x+2}[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]12[/math]
B. [math]21[/math]
C. [math]14[/math]
D. [math]15[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]12[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{x^{3}+8}{x+2},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{3 x^{2}}{1}=12[/math]

Question #429 (ID: 476088)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-n^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #430 (ID: 476089)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}=\cos ^{-1} x \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{1+x^{2}} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]\left(1+x^{2}\right) \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right) \tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left(1+x^{2}\right) \tan ^{-1} x[/math]

Solution:
[math]e^{y}=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\ln[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=\left(1+x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #431 (ID: 476090)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2005-2006 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log \{\sec (2 x+3)\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan (2 x+3)[/math]
B. [math]\sec (2 x+3)[/math]
C. [math]-2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log \{\sec (2 x+3)\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sec (2 x+3)}[/math]
 [math]\times \sec (2 x+3)[/math]
 [math]\times \tan (2 x+3)[/math]
 [math]\times 2=2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\sqrt{\log x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2 \log x \sqrt{x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2 x \sqrt{\log x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 x \sqrt{x \log x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2 x \log x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{2 x \sqrt{\log x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\log x})=\frac{1}{2 x \sqrt{\log x}}[/math]

Question #433 (ID: 476092)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=x^{2}[/math] হলে, উক্ত বক্ররেখার [math]x = 2[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল = ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{2} \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=2 \mathrm{x} \therefore \mathrm{x}=2[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল = [math]2.2 = 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #434 (ID: 476093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2^{-2 x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]2^{-2 x+1} \log 2[/math]
B. [math]2^{-2 x} \log 2[/math]
C. [math]-2^{-2 x+1} \log 2[/math]
D. [math]2^{2 x+1} \log 2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-2^{-2 x+1} \log 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=2^{-2 x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-2 \cdot 2^{-2 x} \cdot \ln 2=-2^{-2 x+1} \ln 2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #435 (ID: 476094)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2003-2004, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #436 (ID: 476077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2016-2017, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির জন্য যে সমস্ত বিন্দুর স্পর্শক X অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তা হল-

Options:
ক. [math](1, 2), (-1,-2)[/math]
খ. [math](-1, 2), (1, 0)[/math]
গ. [math](2,-1), (0, 1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1, 2), (1, -2)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শক x- অক্ষের সমান্তরাল [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=1 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}= \pm 1 \therefore \mathrm{x}=1,-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=1+\frac{1}{1}=2[/math]
 যখন [math]x = 1[/math]
 [math]y=f(x)=-1-\frac{1}{1}=-2[/math]
 যখন x = -1[math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু [math](1,2), (-1,-2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #437 (ID: 476078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2006-2007, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}=2 \text { [By L' H Rule] }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #438 (ID: 476079)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #439 (ID: 476080)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2003-2004, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #440 (ID: 476064)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]x°cosx[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]x \sin x+\cos x[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}\left(\cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}-\frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180} \sin \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}\left(\frac{\pi x}{180} \sin \frac{\pi x}{180}+\frac{\cos \pi x}{180}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি [math]y=x^{\circ} \cos x^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180} \cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}\right)[/math]
 [math]+\cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}\left(-\sin \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}\right) \frac{\pi}{180}+\cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180} \frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cos \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}-\frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180} \sin \frac{\pi \mathrm{x}}{180}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #441 (ID: 476065)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{y}_{\mathrm{n}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{n!}{X n \frac{1}{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{(n-1)!}{X n \frac{-1}{y}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n!}{x^{n+1}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n!}{x^{n}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ব্যাখ্যা: নিম্নোক্ত n তম অন্তরীকরণসমূহ মুখস্থ রাখাই উত্তম।(i) [math]y=x^{n}[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{n}=\mathrm{n}![/math]
(ii) [math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{y}_{\mathrm{n}}=\mathrm{m}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{mx}}[/math]
(iii) [math]y=e^{m x}[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{y}_{\mathrm{n}}=\mathrm{m}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{mx}}[/math]
(iv) [math]y=a^{x}[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{n}=a^{x}(\ln a)^{n}[/math]
(v) [math]y=\sin x[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{n}=\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
(vi) [math]y=\cos x[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{n}=\cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
