Question #442 (ID: 476066)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{|x|}{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. লিমিটের অস্থিত্ব নেই
B. 1
C. -1
D. কোনটিই না


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{|x|}{x}\right)[/math]
এখানে, Left Hand Limit এর ক্ষেত্রে, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{-}}\left(\frac{|x|}{x}\right)=-1[/math]
Right Hand Limit এর ক্ষেত্রে, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{+}} \frac{|x|}{x}=1[/math]
.:. ফাংশনটি অবিচ্ছিন্ন নয়। ফলে লিমিটের অস্তিত্ব নেই।

Explanation:
Left Hand Limit এবং Right Hand Limit এবং Functionel Value সমান হলে অর্থাৎ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{-}} f(x)=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{+}} f(x)=f(0)[/math] হলে লিমিটের অস্তিত্ব বিদ্যমান থাকে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #443 (ID: 476067)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y³ + mx²+2x - 9 = 0[/math] বক্ররেখাটি [math](1, 2)[/math] বিন্দু দিয়ে অতিক্রম করে। উক্ত বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. m
খ. 1
গ. 0
ঘ. 2


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y² + mx²+2x-9=0 .......[/math]
(i)(i) নং রেখা (1, 2) বিন্দুগামী হলে [math](2)^{3}+m \cdot 1^{2}+2 \cdot 1-9=0 \Rightarrow m=-1[/math]
(i) হতে, [math]y³-x²+2x-9 = 0[/math]
অন্তরীকরণ করে [math]3 y^{2} \frac{d y}{d x}-2 x+2=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2 x-2}{3 y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(1,2)}=\frac{0}{12}=0[/math]


Explanation:
প্রথমে Unknown Constant m এর মান বের করা হয়েছে। আমরা জানি, কোন বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢালকে ঐ রেখার ঐ বিন্দুতে অন্তরজ সহগ বলে। ফলে উক্ত রেখাকে অন্তরীকরণ করে (x, y) বিন্দু বসিয়ে উক্ত ঢাল বের করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #444 (ID: 476068)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin 2 \theta-\cos 2 \theta[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত হতে পারে?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-√2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি[math]y=\sin 2 \theta-\cos 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]................(i)[/math]
 [math]y_{1}=2 \cos 2 \theta+2 \sin 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots . . . . . \text { (ii) }[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=-4 \sin 2 \theta+4 \cos 2[/math]
 [math]\theta \ldots \ldots . \text { (iii) } \\y_{1}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \cos 2 \theta+2 \sin 2 \theta=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]=-1=-\tan 45^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]=\tan \left(-45^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]=-45^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]20 = -45°[/math]
 হলে, [math]y₂ = 4√2 > 0[/math]
এখন, (i) নং হতে,[math]y=\sin 2 \theta-\cos 2 \theta=\sin \left(-45^{\circ}\right)-\cos \left(-45^{\circ}\right)=-\sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:
রাশিটির সর্বনিম্ন মান বের করতে বলা হয়েছে। তাই রাশিটিকে θ এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে গুরুমান/লঘুমানের কনসেপ্ট অনুযায়ী রাশিটির সর্বনিম্ন মান বের করা হয়েছে। ৪ এর মান ধরে নিয়ে অপশনের সাথে মিলিয়ে। সর্বনিম্ন মান বের করার চেয়ে অন্তরীকরণের কনসেপ্ট থেকে বের করাটা বুদ্ধিমানের কাজ।আরেকটা ব্যাপার খেয়াল করো। [math]\tan 2 \theta=-1[/math]
; এখান থেকে 20 এর আরেকটি মান বের করা সম্ভব, সেটা হচ্ছে 135°। কিন্তু 2 θ = 135° এর জন্য [math]y_2 > 0[/math]
 হয় না। ফলে এর এই মানের জন্য সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া সম্ভব না।

Sub-Questions:

Question #445 (ID: 476069)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}+1[/math] হলে কোন বিন্দুতে y ও [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান সমান?

Options:
ক. (1, 2)
খ. (2, 1)
গ. (0, 1)
ঘ. (-1, 0)


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text{ } y=x^{2}+2 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x \\\text{ Option (A) } \Rightarrow \mathrm{y}=2 \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=2.1=2[/math].: Option (A) সঠিক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #446 (ID: 476070)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = (1-2x)/(x²+5)[/math] হলে, [math]x = 1[/math] এর জন্য [math]dy/dx[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. 0
খ. -1/6
গ. -1/4
ঘ. 1/4


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y = (1-2x)/(x²+5) \Rightarrow (x²+5) y = 1 -2x............ (i)[/math]
 [math]x = 1[/math]
 হলে [math]y = -2/6[/math]
 [(i) এর মান বসিয়ে](i) কে অন্তরীকরণ করে, [math]\left(x^{3}+5\right) \frac{d y}{d x}+y\left(3 x^{2}+0\right)=-2[/math]
 [math]x = 1[/math]
 এবং [math]y = -1/6[/math]
 হলে [math]\left(1^{3}+5\right) \frac{d y}{d x}+\left(-\frac{1}{6}\right) \times 3.1^{2}=-2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 \frac{d y}{d x}=-2+\frac{1}{2} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{6}\left(-\frac{3}{2}\right)=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:
x এর মানের জন্য y এর মান প্রথমে বের করা হয়েছে। এরপর অন্তরীকরণ করে x ও y এর মান বসিয়ে [math]dy/dx[/math] এর মান বের করা হয়েছে।By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরের d/dx বাটনটি চেপে হুবহু ফাংশনটা Input দিয়ে x =1 বসিয়ে Equal বাটন চাপলে মান আসে -1/4 বা-0.25

Sub-Questions:

Question #447 (ID: 476071)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2003-2004, 2005-2006, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\cos x+\cos 2 x) \\=1 \times(\cos 0+\cos 0)=1+1=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \quad \text { [By Technique: 03] }[/math]

Question #449 (ID: 476073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2018-2019, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{3 x} \times 3=3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #450 (ID: 476074)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin (\cos x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sin \cos (\cos x)[/math]
B. [math]\cos x \sin (\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]
D. [math]-\sin x \sin (\cos x)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin (\cos x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\cos (\cos x)(-\sin x)=-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #451 (ID: 476075)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1997-1998, 1996-1997, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}\{\sin (x+1)\}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\{\sin (x+1)\}[/math]
B. [math]\cos (x+1)[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\{\cos (x+1)\}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}\{\sin (x+1)\} \Rightarrow y=x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=1 \quad \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dy}}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #452 (ID: 476076)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1995-1996, 2017-2018, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\left(\log _{e} x\right)^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
C. [math]2 \log _{e} x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \log _{e} x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2 \log _{e} x \frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{e} x\right)=2 \log _{e} x \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{2 \log _{e} x}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #453 (ID: 476054)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় করঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{49}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{49}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকৃতি ] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \sin 7 x}{6 x}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকৃতি ] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{49 \cos 7 x}{6}=\frac{49}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #454 (ID: 476055)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2006-2007, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]y_{3}[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x[/math]
খ. [math]9 x[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x+5[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x ; y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \log x+\frac{x^{2}}{x}=2 x \log x+x[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=2 x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=2+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #455 (ID: 476056)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=1+\sqrt{\sin ^{2}(x)+1}[/math] ফাংশনের সর্বোচ্চ মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2.41[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=1+\sqrt{\operatorname{Sin}^{2}(x)+1} ; \operatorname{Sin}(x)[/math]
 এর সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]= 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=1+\sqrt{(1)^{2}+1}=1+\sqrt{2}=2.41[/math]


Explanation:

Question #456 (ID: 476057)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\log _{e}(1+x)}{x}\right\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]-e[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\log _{e}(1+x)}{x}\right\}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\frac{1}{1+ x}}{1}\right\}=\frac{1}{1}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #457 (ID: 476058)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{0}+e^{-0}}{1}=\frac{1+1}{1}[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #458 (ID: 476059)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2009-2010, 2006-2007 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College, Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বৃত্তের পরিধি বৃদ্ধির হার উহার ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হারের কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\mathbf{x}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]2\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d s}{d t}=\frac{d}{d t}(2 \pi r)=2 \pi \frac{d r}{d t}=2 \pi \times[/math] ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধি

Explanation:

Question #459 (ID: 476060)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি আয়তক্ষেত্রের পরিসীমা [math]160m[/math], দৈর্ঘ্য ও প্রস্থ কত হলে ইহার ক্ষেত্রফল বৃহত্তম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]40, 40[/math]
খ. [math]50, 30[/math]
গ. [math]60, 20[/math]
ঘ. [math]45, 35[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Hints: গুরুমান/লঘুমান বের করার কনসেপ্ট থেকে বৃহত্তম ক্ষেত্রফল বের করতে পারো।Solve: ধরি, আয়তক্ষেত্রটির দৈর্ঘ্য X এবং প্রস্থ y[math]\therefore[/math]
 পরিসীমা [math]2(x+y)=160 \Rightarrow x+y=80 \Rightarrow y=(80-x)[/math]
এখন, ক্ষেত্রফল [math]f(x)=x y=x(80-x)=80 x-x^{2}[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল f(x) বৃহত্তন হতে হলে f(x) = (0) থেকে প্রাপ্ত x এর মানের জন্য[math]f" (x) =[/math]
 ঋণাত্মক হতে হবে[math]f^{\prime}(x)=80-2 x=0 \Rightarrow x=40[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2[/math]
 , যা ধণাত্নকক্ষেত্রফল বৃহত্তম হতে হলে দৈর্ঘ্য হবে, x = 40mএছ, [math]y = 80 - 40 = 40m[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: গুরুমান কিংবা লঘুমানের অংকগুলো আমরা যেভাবে করি এ প্রশ্নটির ক্ষেত্রেও একই Method Follow করা হয়েছে। দৈর্ঘ্য ও প্রন্থকে প্রথমে যথাক্রমে x ey ধরে পরিসীমার সূত্র থেকে x ও y কে এক চলকে অর্থাৎ y কে X এর ফাংশন আকারে প্রকাশ করা হয়েছে। যে কারণে y এর Value পাওয়া [math](80-x)[/math]
এরপর ক্ষেত্রফলকে x এর ফাংশনে রূপ দেওয়া হয়েছে। সবকিছুকে একই চপকে আনার পর ক্ষেত্রফলের ফাংশনটিকে (f(x)) একবার অন্তরীকরণ করে f(x) = (0) লিখে x এর মান বের করে রাখা হয়েছে। এরপর ২য় বার অন্তরীকরণ করার পর দেখা যাচ্ছে f" ( x ) সরাসরিই ঋণাত্মক এসেছে। অর্থাৎ f' (x) থেকে প্রাপ্ত মান না বসিয়েই জানা গেলো, ঐ মানের জন্যই f(x) ফাংশনটির শুরুমান বিদ্যমান। অর্থাৎ x এর ঐ মানের জন্য আয়তক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল বৃহত্তম হবে।সুতরাং, x এর ঐ মান অর্থাৎ 40m হচ্ছে আয়তক্ষেত্রটির দৈর্ঘ্য। আর [math]y = 80 - x = 80 - 40 = 40m[/math]
 হচ্ছে আয়তটির গ্রন্থ।মূলত আয়তক্ষেত্রটির ক্ষেত্রফল তখনই সর্বোচ্চ হবে যখন আয়তটি একটি বর্গক্ষেত্রে পরিণত হবে। এক্ষেত্রে তাই দৈর্ঘ্য ও প্রস্থ উভয়ই 40m করে হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #460 (ID: 476061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\pi /2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: L' Hospital's Rule প্রয়োগ করতে পারো।[math]\text { Solve: } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \frac{1}{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-0^{2}}}=1[/math]

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: L Hospital's Rule হলো কোন ফাংশনকে ততক্ষণ পর্যন্ত অন্তরীকরণ করতে হবে যথক্ষণ পর্যন্ত x এর লিমিট বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান না পাওয়া যায়। সঙ্গায়িত মান পেলে limit বসিয়ে মান বের করতে হবে। আমাদের আলোচ্য অঙ্কে একবার অন্তরীকরণ করার পর limit বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান পাওয়া গেছে। এই সঙ্গায়িত মানই আমাদের কাঙ্ক্ষিত উত্তর বা Limiting Value.By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরকে রেডিয়ান Mode-এ রেখে x এর পছন্দমতো একটা মান ধরে নিয়ে সম্পূর্ণ ফাংশনটা ক্যালকুলেটরে Input দিয়ে Equal বাটন চেপে ফাংশনটির Limiting value বের করা সম্ভব। সেক্ষেত্রে x → 0 এর জন্য x এর মান 0.001 কিংবা ) এর খুব কাছাকাছি কোনো মান ধরতে হবে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #461 (ID: 476062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কিরূপ হলে [math]a x^{2}+2 b x+b^{2} / a[/math] এর একটি সর্বোচ্চ মান থাকবে?

Options:
ক. [math]a > 0[/math]
খ. [math]a <0[/math]
গ. [math]a=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]a > 1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: f(x) এর সর্বোচ্চ মান পাওয়া যাবে যখন [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})}{\mathrm{dx^{2 }}}<0[/math]
 হবেSolve: [math]f(x)=a x^{2}+2 b x+\frac{b^{2}}{a}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d f(x)}{d x}=2 a x+2 b \Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} f(x)}{d x^{2}}=2 a[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ মানের ক্ষেত্রে [math]2 a<0 \Rightarrow a<0 \quad[2<0[/math]
 সম্ভব নয় ]

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ সর্বোচ্চ মান কিংবা গুরু মানের জন্য Function এর দ্বিতীয় অন্তরীকরণের মান ঋণাত্মক হয়। এক্ষেত্রে উল্লেখিত রাশিকে f(x) ধরে দুইবার অন্তরীকরণ করা হয়েছে এবং উক্ত শর্ত আরোপ করে a এর মানের প্রকৃতি নির্ণয় করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #462 (ID: 476063)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]xy = 4[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=0[/math] [math]x[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x y=4[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \mathrm{x} \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}+\mathrm{y}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=-\frac{\mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{x}} \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dy}}=-\frac{\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{y}}=0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{x}=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #463 (ID: 476032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \text { then find the valuc of } \frac{d y}{d x} \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]
E. [math]\text {No correct answer}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text {No correct answer}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #464 (ID: 476033)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0+\sin x}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos x}{2} ;[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos 0}{2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #465 (ID: 476034)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underset{x \rightarrow 0}{ } \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: L' Hospital's Rule প্রয়োগ করতে পারো।Solve : [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \frac{1}{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-0^{2}}}=1[/math]
Ans. (B)ব্যাখ্যা: L' Hospital's Rule হলো কোন ফাংশনকে ততক্ষণ পর্যন্ত অন্তরীকরণ করতে হবে যথক্ষণ পর্যন্ত x এর লিমিট বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান না পাওয়া যায়। সঙ্গায়িত মান পেলে limit বসিয়ে মান বের করতে হবে। আমাদের আলোচ্য অঙ্কে একবার অন্তরীকরণ করার পর limit বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান পাওয়া গেছে। এই সঙ্গায়িত মানই আমাদের কাঙ্ক্ষিত উত্তর বা Limiting Value.By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরকে রেডিয়ান Mode-এ রেখে x এর পছন্দমতো একটা মান ধরে নিয়ে সম্পূর্ণ ফাংশনটা ক্যালকুলেটরে Input দিয়ে Equal বাটন চেপে ফাংশনটির Limiting value বের করা সম্ভব। সেক্ষেত্রে [math]x → 0[/math]
 এর জন্য x এর মান [math]0.001[/math]
 কিংবা 0 এর খুব কাছাকাছি কোনো মান ধরতে হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #466 (ID: 476035)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]I+Inx[/math]
B. [math]xInx[/math]
C. [math]I+Inx[/math]
D. [math](1+\ln x) x^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: ফাংশনের উভয় পাশে In নিতে হবে।Solve : [math]y=x^{x} \Rightarrow \ln y=\ln x^{x}=x \ln x[/math]
অন্তরীকরণ করে, [math]\frac{1}{y}=\frac{d y}{d x}=\left(x \frac{1}{x}+\ln x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=y(1+\ln x) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে উভয়পাশে In নিয়ে [math]\ln x^{x}[/math] কে xinx আকারে প্রকাশ করে এরপর x- এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করা হয়েছে। মনে রাখবে, চলক যখন ঘাত আকারে থাকবে তখন সমীকরণের উভয়পাশে In নিয়ে করলে সহজেই অন্তরীকরণ করা সম্ভব হয়।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #467 (ID: 476036)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+x y+y^{2}=8[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-(y+2 x)}{(2 y+x)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{(y+2 x)}{(2 y+x)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-(2 y+x)}{(y+2 x)}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Hints: অন্তরীকরণ করে একপাশে রেখে বাকী রাশিগুলো আরেকপাশে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 রাখতে হবে।[math]\text { Solve: } x^{2}[/math]
 [math]+x y+y^{2}=8[/math]
 [math]\quad \Rightarrow 2 x+x \frac{d y}{d x}+y[/math]
 [math]\cdot 1+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x+2 y) \frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]
 [math]-(y+2 x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{(y+2 x)}{(+2 y)}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ এই ধরণের ফাংশন গুলো হচ্ছে অব্যক্ত ফাংশন। প্রথমে x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে এরপর [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] একপাশে এবং বাকি রাশিগুলো অন্যপাশে dx নিয়ে যাওয়া হয়েছে। এখানে xy কে uv আকারে অন্তরীকরণ করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #468 (ID: 476037)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sin x \cos x[/math]
B. [math]\sin x \cos x[/math]
C. [math]\sin 2 x[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)=2 \sin x \cos x=\sin 2 x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #469 (ID: 476038)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x=\sin \theta, y=\cos \theta[/math] হয় তবে নিচের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\tan \theta[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\cot \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{y}=\cos \theta \therefore \mathrm{dy}=-\sin \theta \mathrm{d} \theta \\\mathrm{x}=\sin \theta \mathrm{dx}=\cos \theta \mathrm{d} \theta=\mathrm{yd} \theta \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=-\frac{\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{y}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #470 (ID: 476039)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x\left(x^{2}-2\right)[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math] হলে, x এর ধনাত্মক মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-2=1 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \quad \therefore x=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #471 (ID: 476040)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x-3=0[/math] বক্ররেখার (-1, 1) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x-3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+2 y[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{d y}{d x}-2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2-2 x}{2 y}[/math]
 [math](-1, 1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটির ঢাল [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-2 x}{2 y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-2(-1)}{2.1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #472 (ID: 476041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 y=\sqrt{3} x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\left(1, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\right) f[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তা-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3} .2 \mathrm{x}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3} \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(1, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\right)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\sqrt{3} \cdot 1=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]=\tan 60^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #473 (ID: 476042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ফাংশনের অন্তরক [math]f(x)=4x-7[/math] হলে, ফাংশনটির ম্যাক্সিমাম মান [math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]7[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{7}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-4 x-7 \text { for maxima }-4 x-7=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 x+7=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=-\frac{7}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #475 (ID: 476044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } y=1+\frac{x}{1 !}+\frac{x^{2}}{2 !}+\frac{x^{3}}{3 !}+\cdots, \text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]x[/math]
D. [math]y[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{x} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}=y[/math]

Question #476 (ID: 476045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x} \sin x\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x} \cos x[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}(\sin x+\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}(\sin x-\cos x)[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x} \sin x\right)=e^{x} \cos x+e^{x} \sin x=e^{x}(\cos x+\sin x)[/math]

Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{2 x} \times 2=2[/math]

Question #478 (ID: 476047)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1997-1998, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin x+e^{2 x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+y=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{2 x}[/math]
B. [math]2 \cos x+e^{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]5 e^{2 x}[/math]
D. [math]-2 \sin x+e^{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin x+e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+2 e^{2 x} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x+4 e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+y[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x+4 e^{2 x}+\sin x+e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]=5 e^{2 x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #479 (ID: 476048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}=2 \text { [By L' H Rule] }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #480 (ID: 476049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=x^{n}[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n+1}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\text { n! }[/math]
B. [math](n+1) ![/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math](n-1) ![/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{n} \Rightarrow y_{n}=n ! \Rightarrow y_{n+1}=0[/math]

Question #483 (ID: 476052)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2016-2017, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}=\left(\frac{d}{d x} \ln x\right)_{x=2}=\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)_{x=2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #484 (ID: 476053)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2009-2010, 2006-2007 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো গোলকের ব্যাসার্ধ [math]r[/math] হলে উহার আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হারের কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi r^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \pi r[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d v}{d t}=\frac{d}{d t}\left(\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}\right)=4 \pi r^{2} \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #485 (ID: 475998)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{1}[/math]
 [হসপিটাল [math]\text { rule }]=0[/math]
বিকল্পঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x^{2}}{x}\left[\because \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \sin x\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #486 (ID: 475999)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right] \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{1+x}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #487 (ID: 476000)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\log x}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1-\log x[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\log x}{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{1}{x}-x-\log x}{x^{2}}=\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #488 (ID: 476001)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1+y^{2}[/math]
B. [math]1-y^{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 y\left(1-y^{2}\right)[/math]
D. [math]2 y\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sec x \cdot \sec x \tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sec ^{2} x \tan x[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan x\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 y\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #489 (ID: 476002)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2009-2010, 2006-2007 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো গোলকের ব্যাসার্ধ [math]r[/math] হলে উহার আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হারের কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi r^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \pi r[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d v}{d t}=\frac{d}{d t}\left(\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}\right)=4 \pi r^{2} \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #490 (ID: 476003)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}, \sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
B. [math]2 \sin ^{-1} t[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 \mathrm{t}}{1+\mathrm{t}^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \left(2 \tan ^{-1} t\right) \Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left(2 \tan ^{-1} t\right) \Rightarrow x=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]x(12-2 x)^{2}[/math] *এর বৃহত্তম মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]120[/math]
খ. [math]128[/math]
গ. [math]228[/math]
ঘ. [math]-128[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\Rightarrow f(x)=x(12-2 x)^{2}, f^{\prime}(x)=144-96 x+12 x^{2} \text { So, } 12 x^{2}-96 x+144=0[/math]
 [math]x^{2}-8 x+12=0 \Rightarrow x=6,2, f^{\prime}(x)=-96+24 x \text { for } x=2 ; f^{\prime \prime}(x)<0 \quad f(x)=128[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)

Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]
D. \frac{6}{x^{2}}$


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x \therefore y_{1}=3 x^{2} \ln x+x^{2} ; y_{2}=6 x \ln x+3 x+2 x=6 x \ln x+5 x[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=6 \ln x+6+5=6 \ln x+11 ; y_{4}=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math] হলে [math]f^{\prime}(x)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-e^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-e^{2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right) \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]

Question #495 (ID: 476008)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x, f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math] হলে x এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]-\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=1+\cos x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=\cos 180^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=180^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\pi[/math]


Explanation:

Question #496 (ID: 476009)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x=\tan (\ln y)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{y_{2}}{y_{1}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}}{2 x-1}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 x-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}}{2 x+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-2 x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x=\tan (\ln y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan ^{-1} x=\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=e^{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{y}}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{y}_{1}=\mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{y}_{2}+2 \mathrm{xy}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{y}_{2}[/math]
 [math]=-(2 \mathrm{x}-1) \mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{y}_{2}}{\mathrm{y}_{1}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \mathrm{x}-1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 \mathrm{x}+1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-2 \mathrm{x}}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #497 (ID: 476010)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2009-2010, 2006-2007 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College, Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University

Question:
বৃত্তের পরিধি বৃদ্ধির হার উহার ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হারের কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \pi[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\mathbf{x}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]2\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d s}{d t}=\frac{d}{d t}(2 \pi r)=2 \pi \frac{d r}{d t}=2 \pi \times[/math] ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধি

Explanation:

Question #498 (ID: 476011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = log(sinx)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
B. [math]cotx[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]tanx[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\log (\sin x) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sin x} \cos x=\cot x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x=-\frac{1}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #499 (ID: 476012)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)

Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-1[/math] বক্ররেখায় (1, -3) বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]-6[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-1 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-6 x[/math]
 [math](1,-3)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3(1)^{2}-6.1=3-6=-3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #500 (ID: 476013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-9 x+5[/math] বক্ররেখার যে সব বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]X[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তাদের ভূজের মান হলো।

Options:
ক. [math]x = 0[/math] ও [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]x =1[/math] ও [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]x =1[/math] ও [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x =-1[/math] ও [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-9 x+5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-6 x-9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}[/math]
 [math]-6 x-9=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x+1)[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=3,-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #501 (ID: 476014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (1+x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] [math]=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-(1+x)^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (1+x) \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{(1+x)}=(1+x)^{-1} ; \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-1(1+x)^{-1-1}=-\frac{1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #502 (ID: 476015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে [math]y_{4}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{24}{x^{5}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{x^{4}}{9}[/math]
গ. [math]25 x^{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{-1}\right)=-x^{-2}, y_{2}=2 x^{-3}, y_{3}=-6 x^{-4}, y_{4}=\frac{24}{x^{5}}[/math]

Question #503 (ID: 476016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+x+1[/math] এর ক্ষুদ্রতম মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+2 \cdot x[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{4}+\frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\left(x+\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 হলে ,ক্ষুদ্রতম মান হবে: [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #504 (ID: 476017)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log (\log x)[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\log x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\log x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 \log x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{x \log x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\{\log (\log x)\}=\frac{1}{\log x} \times \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \log x}[/math]

Question #506 (ID: 476019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x-3=0[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-1,1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢালে কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: কোন বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে ঢাল হচ্ছে ঐ রেখার ঐ বিন্দুতে অন্তরক সহ।Solve : [math]x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x-3=0[/math]
x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে, [math]2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}-2=0 \\\Rightarrow y \frac{d y}{d x}=1-x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right)=\frac{1-\mathrm{x}}{\mathrm{y}} \quad \\\therefore\left(\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right)_{(-1,1)}=\frac{1-(-1)}{1}=1+1=2[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে বক্ররেখাটিকে অন্তরীকরণ করে পরে উক্ত বিন্দুর মান বসানো হয়েছে। কারণ, (–1, 1 ) বিন্দুতে বক্ররেখাটির [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] ই হচ্ছে ঐ বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #507 (ID: 476020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y একটি বক্ররেখা যা [math](0,3)[/math] বিন্দু দিয়ে যায়। যদি এ [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\left(x^{2}+x+1\right)[/math] হয়, তাহলে y কে x এর নিচের কোন ফাংশন হিসাবে প্রকাশ করা হয়?

Options:
ক. [math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}+\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x[/math]
খ. [math]y=2 x+1[/math]
গ. [math]y=\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}+\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 এর ফাংশনটিকে যোগজ করলেই মূল ফাংশনটি পাওয়া যাবে ।[math]\text{Solve: } \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \int d y[/math]
 [math]=\int\left(x^{2}+x+1\right) d x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+C[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text{ (i)}[/math]
(i) নং সমীকরণ (0, 3 ) বিন্দুগামী হলে, [math]3=0+0+0+C[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow C=3[/math]
(i) নং এ C = 3 বসিয়ে [math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{x^{2}}{2}+x+3[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] এর ফাংশনটিকে সমাকলিত করা হয়েছে। (যেহেতু y এর dx মান চাওয়া হয়েছে) এরপর সমাকলন ধ্রুবক C এর মান বের করার জন্য বক্ররেখাটি যে বিন্দু দিয়ে গমন করে তা দিয়ে সিদ্ধ করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #508 (ID: 476021)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=3 x^{5}-1[/math] বক্ররেখার (11) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ

Options:
ক. [math]y = 13x-14[/math]
খ. [math]y = 14x-15[/math]
গ. [math]y = 15x-16[/math]
ঘ. [math]y = 16x-17[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Hints: [math]y = f(x)[/math]
 যদি বক্ররেখা হয় তবে এর স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
m ঢালবিশিষ্ট এবং [math]\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী রেখার সমীকরণ[math]\left(y-y_{1}\right)=m\left(x-x_{1}\right)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Solve: } y=3 x^{5}-1\\\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=15 \mathrm{x}^{4} \therefore\left(\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right)_{(1,-1)}=15 \times 1^{4}=15\end{array}[/math]
.:. (1,−1) বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math](y+1)=15(x-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=15 x-15-1 \Rightarrow y=15 x-16[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #509 (ID: 476022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Mymensingh Board, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x^{2}} \cdot x=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #510 (ID: 476023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2014-2015, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]y = ax (1 - x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x অক্ষের সহিত [math]60°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=a x(1-x)=y=a x-a x^{2} ; y_{1}=a-2 a x[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \tan 60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3} ; \sqrt{3}=a(1-2 x)[/math]
 মূলবিন্দুতে [math]x=0 \therefore \sqrt{3}=a(1-0)=a \quad \therefore a=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #511 (ID: 476024)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2006-2007, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}=2 \text { [By L' H Rule] }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #512 (ID: 476025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = x + sinx[/math] হয়, তবে [math]x[/math] এর কোন মানটির জন্য [math]f'(x) = 0[/math] হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=1+\cos x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 0=1+\cos x \Rightarrow \cos x=-1 \Rightarrow x=\pi[/math]


Explanation:

Question #513 (ID: 476026)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #514 (ID: 476027)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]x^{x}(1+\log x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{x}+x \log x[/math]
C. [math]x \log x^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}(x+\log x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x} \frac{d}{d x}(x \ln x)=x^{x}\left(\frac{x}{x}+\ln x\right)=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #515 (ID: 476028)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C), University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}[/math] তাহলে, y'(0) হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]c^{2}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}\left\{\frac{d}{d x} \sin x \ln \left(x^{2}+1\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y^{\prime}(x)=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\cos x \cdot \ln \left(x^{2}+1\right)+\sin x \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}+1} \cdot 2 x\right\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{\prime}(0)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #516 (ID: 476029)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে, $$\frac{d y}{d x}=?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)-\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x}{x}-\ln x \cdot 1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #517 (ID: 476030)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y+x=x^{-y}[/math] সমীকরণ হইতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x^{2}+2 y}{2 x+\log x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{x+2 y+5}{(x+y)+\log x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x y+y^{2}+1}{x+\log x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{x y+x+y^{2}}{x[1+(x+y) \operatorname{log} x]}[/math]
ঙ. [math]-\frac{x+x y-y^{2}}{x^{2}[(x+y) \log x]}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\ln (y+x)=-y \ln x \Rightarrow \frac{1}{y+\dot{x}}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}+1\right)=-\frac{y}{x}-\ln x \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{x+y}+\ln x\right)=-\left(\frac{y}{x}+\frac{1}{y+x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-\frac{y^{2}+x y+x}{x(y+x)}}{\frac{(x+y) \ln x+1}{(x+y)}}=-\frac{y^{2}+x y+x}{x[1+(x+y) \ln x]}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #518 (ID: 476031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a(\theta-\sin \theta) ; y=a(1-\cos \theta)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\tan \theta[/math]
D. [math]\cot \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=a(\theta-\sin \theta) ;[/math]
 [math]y=a(1-\cos \theta) ; \frac{d x}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=a-a \cos \theta=a(1-\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]=a[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=2 a \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d \theta}=\operatorname{asin} \theta=a \cdot 2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cdot \cos \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 a \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 a \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{\sin \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #520 (ID: 475892)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{30}[/math] হয়, [math]d^{40} y / d x^{40}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]30 ![/math]
ঘ. [math]30 \times 10^{-10}[/math]
ঙ. [math]30[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^{n}[/math]
 এর [math]n[/math]
 তম অন্তরক সহগ [math]=n !,(n+1),(n+2), \ldots \ldots[/math]
 তম অন্তরক সহগ শূন্য ।[math]\therefore \mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}^{30}[/math]
 এর জন্য, [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{30} \mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{dx}^{30}}=30 ! \therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{31} \mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{dx}^{31}}=0 \therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{40} \mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{dx}^{40}}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #521 (ID: 475893)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)

Question:
একটি কণা স্থিরাবস্থা থেকে ধ্রুব ত্বরণে 4 মি/সে. সহকারে চলতে শুরু করলে তৃতীয় সেকেন্ডে কণাটির অতিক্রান্ত দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math] মি
খ. [math]15[/math] মি
গ. [math]20[/math] মি
ঘ. [math]25[/math] মি


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]S=\frac{1}{2} a(2 t-1)=\frac{1}{2} \times 4(2 \times 3-1)=10[/math]

Question #522 (ID: 475894)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বৃত্তের পরিধির বৃদ্ধির হার বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধের বৃদ্ধির হারের-

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math] গুণ
খ. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math] গুণ
গ. [math]\pi[/math] গুণ
ঘ. [math]2 \pi[/math] গুণ


Correct Answer: D.[math]2 \pi[/math] গুণ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{P}=2 \pi \mathrm{r} ; \frac{\mathrm{dp}}{\mathrm{dt}}=2 \pi \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #523 (ID: 475895)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=a^{x}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]a^{x}\{\ln (a)\}^{3}[/math]
B. [math]a^{x}\{\ln (x)\}^{3}[/math]
C. [math]a\{\ln (a)\}^{3}[/math]
D. [math]a\{\ln (x)\}^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=a^{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=a^{x} \ln (a) ; \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=a^{x} \ln (a) \cdot \ln (a)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d y^{3}}=a^{x} \ln (a) \cdot \ln (a)=a^{x}(\ln (a))^{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #524 (ID: 475896)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log _{e}(2 x)^{\frac{1}{3}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3 x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3} \log _{e}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log (2 x)^{\frac{1}{3}}=\frac{1}{3} \frac{d}{d x} \log (2 x)=\frac{1}{3} \times \frac{2}{2 x}=\frac{1}{3 x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #525 (ID: 475897)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\mathrm{s}=38 \mathrm{t}+1.5 \mathrm{t}^{2}[/math] হয় তবে রাশিটির ত্বরণ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2} v[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{S}=38 \mathrm{t}+1.5 \mathrm{t}^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}}=38+3 \mathrm{t} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{~s}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}=3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{~s}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{a}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #526 (ID: 475898)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log (\log x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] = কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x \log x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\log x}[/math]
C. [math]x \log x[/math]
D. [math]2 \log x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\log (\log x) ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\log (x)} \frac{d}{d x} \log x=\frac{1}{x \log (x)}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #527 (ID: 475899)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=e^{t} \cos t[/math] এবং [math]y=e^{t} \sin t^{}[/math] হয়, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sin t-\cos t}{\cos t-\sin t}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin t-\cos t}{-\cos t-\sin t}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin t+\cos t}{\cos t-\sin t}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d t}=e^{t} \sin t+e^{t} \cos t[/math]
 [math]\frac{d x}{d t}=e^{t} \cos t-e^{t} \sin t ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\sin t+\cos t}{\cos t-\sin t}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #528 (ID: 475900)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty}\{\ln (2 x-1)-\ln (x+5)\}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \left(\frac{2}{1}\right)[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln 2[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty}\{\ln (2 x-1)-\ln (x+5)\}[/math]
 [math]=\underset{x \rightarrow \infty}{\operatorname{Lt}}\{\ln (2 x-1) /(x+5)\}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \infty}\left\{\ln \left(\frac{2-\frac{1}{x}}{1+\frac{5}{x}}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{2}{1}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #529 (ID: 475901)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=(x+1)(x-1)(x-3)[/math] বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ হলে, [math]( 3,0)[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=(x+1)(x-1)(x-3)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}-1\right)(x-3)[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{3}-3 x^{2}-x+3\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-6 x-1 ;(3,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3.3^{2}-6.3-1[/math]
 [math]=27-18-1=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #530 (ID: 475902)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)\right\}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\sin ^{2} x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \sin ^{-1}(\sin x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\sin ^{2} x}} \cos x=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #531 (ID: 475903)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos a x-\cos b x}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\mathrm{a}^{2}-\mathrm{b}^{2}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}^{2}-\mathrm{a}^{2}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\mathrm{a}^{2}+\mathrm{b}^{2}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]b^{2}-a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos a x-\cos b x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\underset{x \rightarrow 0}{L t} \frac{-a \sin a x+b \sin b x}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\underset{x \rightarrow 0}{L t} \frac{-a^{2} \cos a x+b^{2} \cos b x}{2}=\frac{-a^{2}+b^{2}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{b^{2}-a^{2}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #532 (ID: 475904)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
X এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{x \cos \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{x \sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}})=[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}} \frac{d}{d x}(\sin \sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{1}{4 \sqrt{x}}\right) \frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{x \sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #533 (ID: 475905)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]1+3 \sin x+9 \cos ^{2} x[/math] এর চরম মান কত? যখন [math]0 \leq x<\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{7}[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]\frac{41}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=1+3 \sin x+9 \cos ^{2} x ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3[/math]
 [math]\cos x-18 \cos x \sin x[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=0 \text { So, } 3 \cos x(1-6 \sin x)=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\because x<\pi / 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos 
eq 0[/math]
 অথবা [math]\sin x=\frac{1}{6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=1+3 \sin x+9[/math]
 [math]\left(1-\sin ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=1+3 \times \frac{1}{6}+9\left(1-\frac{1}{36}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{41}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #534 (ID: 475906)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সরলরেখায় চলমান একটি বিন্দুর বেগ: [math]v=a s^{2}+2 b s+c[/math] দ্বারা প্রকাশিত। বিন্দুটির ত্বরণ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{a+b}{s}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{b}\left(\mathrm{s}+\frac{\mathrm{a}}{\mathrm{b}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]2 a\left(s+\frac{b}{a}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\text { ads }}{a+s}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]a=\frac{d v}{d t}=a \times 2 s+2 b=2 a\left(s+\frac{b}{a}\right)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
