Question #535 (ID: 475907)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{a+b x}{b-a x}\right)[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{a b}{a^{2}+b^{2} x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{a b}{a-b x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{a+b x}{b-a x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{b\left(\frac{a}{b}+x\right)}{b\left(1-\frac{a}{b} x\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\left(\frac{a}{b}+x\right)}{\left(1=\frac{a}{b} x\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{a}{b}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{a+b x}{b-a x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan -\frac{a}{b}+\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=0+\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #536 (ID: 475908)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\left(\frac{1+x}{1-x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{(1-x)-(1+x)(-1)}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(1-x)^{2}}{(1-x)^{2}+(1+x)^{2}} \times \frac{1-x+1+x}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #537 (ID: 475909)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]39 / 6[/math]
B. [math]49 / 6[/math]
C. [math]59 / 6[/math]
D. [math]37 / 6[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Lt}_{\mathrm{x} \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 \mathrm{x}}{3 \mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{Lt}_{\mathrm{x} \rightarrow 0} \frac{0+7 \sin 7 \mathrm{x}}{6 \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\underset{\mathrm{x} \rightarrow 0}{\mathrm{Lt}} \frac{49 \cos 7 \mathrm{x}}{6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{49}{6} \text { [L'HOSPITAL] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #538 (ID: 475910)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan (x+y)[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{dy} / \mathrm{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1+\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\left(1+\frac{1}{y^{2}}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1-y^{2}}{y^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]1+\frac{1}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\sec ^{2}(x+y)[/math]
 [math]\left[1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\tan ^{2}(x+y)+1\right][/math]
 [math]\left[1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\left(y^{2}+1\right)\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\left(y^{2}+1\right)}{y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\left(1+\frac{1}{y^{2}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #539 (ID: 475911)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \ln x-3}{x^{4}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 \ln x-3}{x^{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \ln x+3}{x^{3}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \ln x+4}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \frac{d}{d x} \ln x-\ln x \frac{d x}{d x}}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \frac{d}{d x}(1-\ln x)-(1-\ln x) \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right)}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\frac{x^{2}}{x}-(1-\ln x) 2 x}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-x-2 x+2 x \ln x}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \ln x-3}{x^{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #540 (ID: 475912)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sqrt{\cos 2 x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \sin x}{\sqrt{\tan x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{\cos 2 x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d}{d x}(\cos 2 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2}{2} \frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #541 (ID: 475913)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{7 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{7 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{3 x} \times \frac{3}{7}=1 \times \frac{3}{7}=\frac{3}{7}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #542 (ID: 475914)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{x}(\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1+x}}+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x}}}{1}=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #543 (ID: 475915)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=a(\theta-\sin \theta), y=a(1-\cos \theta)[/math] হয় তাহলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
A. [math]\sin \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\cos \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d x}{d \theta}=a(1-\cos \theta) ; \frac{d y}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=a(\sin \theta) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin \theta}{1-\cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #545 (ID: 475917)

Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] বক্র রেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm 2[/math]
খ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=1-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\pm 1[/math]

Question #546 (ID: 475918)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{x^{3}+8}{x+2}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]10[/math]
B. [math]12[/math]
C. [math]16[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{x^{3}+8}{x+2}=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{(x+2)\left(x^{2}+2 x+4\right)}{(x+2)}=4+4+4=12[/math]

Explanation:

Question #547 (ID: 475919)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math] এবং [math]\sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}=2 \theta; \quad[/math]
 [math]\text { let, } t=\tan \theta ; \quad[/math]
 [math]x=\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}=2 \theta[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}=2 ; \quad[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #548 (ID: 475920)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=a \sin x+b \cos x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{dx}^{2}}+\mathrm{y}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=a \cos x-b \sin x ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-a \sin x-b \cos x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+y[/math]
 [math]=-a \sin x-b \cos x+a \sin x+b \cos x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

গ. [math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{\sin x}{x}=\infty[/math]

Question #550 (ID: 475922)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\frac{\tan x-\cot x}{\tan x+\cot x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
B. [math]2 \cos 2 x[/math]
C. [math]2 \tan 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \cot 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\tan x-\cot x}{\tan x+\cot x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cot x\left(\frac{\tan x}{\cot x}-1\right)}{\cot x\left(\frac{\tan x}{\cot x}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\tan ^{2} x-1}{\tan ^{2} x+1}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1-\tan ^{2} x}{1+\tan ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=-\cos 2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \sin 2 x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #551 (ID: 475923)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #552 (ID: 475924)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x>0[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে e ভিত্তিক [math]\log \frac{1}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log \frac{1}{x}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log x^{-1}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(-\log x)=-\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #553 (ID: 475925)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{-\cos x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin \frac{\pi}{2}}=\frac{0}{1}=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{x}}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]

Question #555 (ID: 475927)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে, $$\frac{d y}{d x}=?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)-\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x}{x}-\ln x \cdot 1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #558 (ID: 475930)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{Lt}_{h \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{f(x+h)-I(x)}{h}\right\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt[3]{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{lx}_{h \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{(f x+h)-f(x)}{h}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #560 (ID: 475932)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-2 x^{2}+4 x-1[/math] বক্ররেখাটির [math]x = 2[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢালের মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y-x^{3}-2 x^{2}+4 x-1 ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-4 x+4[/math]
 [math]\left.\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{x=2}[/math]
 [math]=3 \times 2^{2}-4 \times 2+4[/math]
 [math]=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #561 (ID: 475933)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\cos y[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-y^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=\cos y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]= \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #562 (ID: 475934)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\cos \theta[/math] এবং [math]y=\sin \theta[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\cot \theta[/math]
B. [math]-\cot \theta[/math]
C. [math]\tan \alpha[/math]
D. [math]-\tan \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=\cos \theta, y=\sin \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d(s \sin \theta)}{d(\cos \theta)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos \theta}{-\sin \theta}[/math]
 [math]=-\cot \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #563 (ID: 475935)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (x)[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{y}_{3}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]2 x^{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #564 (ID: 475936)

Question:
[math]y=e^{5 x}[/math] রেখাটির [math]x = 0[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢালের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5 e^{5 x}[/math]
খ. [math]e^{5 x}[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ঢাল, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=5 e^{5 x} \quad \therefore x=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]=5 e^{0}=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #568 (ID: 475940)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a m^{2} ; y=2 a m[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\text { m }[/math]
B. [math]-m[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-1}{m}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{m}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{ll}x=a^{2} & y=2 a m \\\Rightarrow \frac{d x}{d m}=2 a m & \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d m}=2 a .\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\left(\frac{d y}{d m}\right)}{\left(\frac{d x}{d m}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \mathrm{a}}{2 \mathrm{am}}=\frac{1}{m} \text {. }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #570 (ID: 475942)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]Inx[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\ln \frac{1}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ হলো

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-1}{x}[/math]
গ. 1
ঘ. -1
ঙ. 0


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: f(x) এর সাপেক্ষে g(x) এর অন্তরীকরণ [math]=\frac{\frac{d}{d x} g(x)}{\frac{d}{d x} f(x)}[/math]
Solve : Inx এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\ln \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 এর অন্তরক = [math]=\frac{\mathrm{d}(\ln 1 / \mathrm{x})}{\mathrm{d}(\ln \mathrm{x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\ln \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}\right)}{\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\ln \mathrm{x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{1}{1 / \mathrm{x}}\left(-\mathrm{x}^{-2}\right)}{\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\mathrm{x} \cdot \mathrm{x}^{-2}}{1 / \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\mathrm{x}^{-1}}{1 / \mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}}{\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}}=-1[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: একটি ফাংশনের সাপেক্ষে আরেকটি ফাংশনকে অন্তরীকরণ করতে বললে মনে রাখবে, যার সাপেক্ষে, তাকে নীচে (হর হিসেবে) এবং যাকে অন্তরীকরণ করতে হবে, তাকে উপরে (লব হিসেবে) নিজ নিজ চলকের সাপেক্ষে পৃথক পৃথকভাবে অন্তরীকরণ করতে হবে।প্রদত্ত প্রশ্নে Inx এর সাপেক্ষ অন্তরীকরণ করতে বলা হয়েছে। তাই Inx কে নীচে x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করা হয়েছে, আর [math]\ln \frac{1}{x}[/math] কে উপরে x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #571 (ID: 475943)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{e^{x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} e^{e^{x}}[/math]
D. [math]x^{x} e^{x}[/math]
E. [math]\ln x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Hints: চলক যখন ঘাত আকারে থাকে তখন সমীকরণের উভয় পাশে In নিয়ে করলে খুব সহজেই অংকটি করা যায় ।[math]\text { Solve: } y=e^{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\ln y=\ln e^{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}} \ln \mathrm{e}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=y e^{x}=e^{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot e^{x}=e^{x} \cdot e^{e^{x}}[/math]
By Calculator: [math]\text { shift } \rightarrow \int_{\square}^{\square} \square \rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}} \rightarrow \square[/math]
x এর মান 0.5 বা 0.2 যেকোনো কিছু ধরলেই হবে। এরপর x এর ঐ একই মানের জন্য Option টেস্ট করতে হবে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #572 (ID: 475944)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দুগামী একটি সরলরেখা কোন বিন্দুতে [math]y=e^{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার স্পর্শক হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]1, \frac{1}{e}[/math]
খ. [math]1, 1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1, e[/math]
ঙ. [math]e, 1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: [math]\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ: [math]\left(y-y_{1}\right)=\frac{d y}{d x}\left(x-x_{1}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\mathrm{m}=\right.[/math]
ঢাল]Solve: [math]y=e^{x}[/math]
 বক্ররেখার ঢাল [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}[/math]
মূলবিন্দু অর্থাৎ (0, 0) বিন্দুগামী কোনো সরলরেখার সমীকরণ: [math](y-0)=m(x-0) \Rightarrow y=m x[/math]
 এখানে, m= ঢাল = [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}[/math]
স্পর্শকটির সমীকরণ [math]y=e^{x} x[/math]
এখন, বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ: [math]y=e^{x}[/math]
সমীকরণদ্বয়কে সমাধান করে পাই, [math]e^{x}=e^{x} \cdot x \Rightarrow x=1[/math]
x=1 যেকোনো সমীকরণে বসিয়ে পাই, [math]y=e^{1}=e[/math]
:. নির্ণেয় বিন্দু (1, e)

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #573 (ID: 475945)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{\alpha \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\sin ^{2} \alpha-\cos \alpha}{\alpha^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-1/2[/math]
B. [math]2/3[/math]
C. [math]3/2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]
E. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Hints: La' Hospital Rule: লবকে অন্তরীকরন/হরকে অন্তরীকরণ[math]\text{Solve: } \lim _{\alpha \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\sin ^{2} \alpha-\cos \alpha}{\alpha^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{\alpha \rightarrow 0} \frac{0-2 \sin \alpha \cos \alpha+\sin \alpha}{2 \alpha} \text { [Using La' Hospital] }[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{\alpha \rightarrow 0} \frac{-2 \sin \alpha \cos \alpha+\sin \alpha}{2 \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{\alpha \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin 2 \alpha+\sin \alpha}{2 \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 \cos 2 \alpha+\cos \alpha}{2}[/math]
 [math][\text { Using La' Hospital again] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 \cos 2 \cdot 0+\cos 0}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2+1}{2}=\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: L Hospital's Rule হলো কোন ফাংশনের লব ও হরকে পৃথকভাবে ততক্ষণ পর্যন্ত অন্তরীকরণ করতে হবে যতক্ষণ পর্যন্ত x এর লিমিট বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান না পাওয়া যায়। সঙ্গায়িত মান পেলে limit বসিয়ে মান বের করতে হবে। আমাদের আলোচ্য অঙ্কে একবার অন্তরীকরণ করার পরও limit বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান পাওয়া যায় নি। তাই আবার অন্তরীকরণ করে limit বসানোর পর এবার সঙ্গায়িত মান পাওয়া গেছে। এই সঙ্গায়িত মানই আমাদের কাঙ্ক্ষিত উত্তর বা Limiting Value.

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #574 (ID: 475946)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)

[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{x^{3}+8}{x+2}[/math] এর মান -

C. [math]14[/math]
D. [math]15[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{x^{3}+8}{x+2},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-2} \frac{3 x^{2}}{1}=12[/math]

Question #575 (ID: 475947)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{1}[/math]
 [হসপিটাল [math]\text { rule }]=0[/math]
বিকল্পঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x^{2}}{x}\left[\because \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \sin x\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #576 (ID: 475948)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y+x=x^{-y}[/math] সমীকরণ হইতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x^{2}+2 y}{2 x+\log x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{x+2 y+5}{(x+y)+\log x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x y+y^{2}+1}{x+\log x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{x y+x+y^{2}}{x[1+(x+y) \operatorname{log} x]}[/math]
ঙ. [math]-\frac{x+x y-y^{2}}{x^{2}[(x+y) \log x]}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\ln (y+x)=-y \ln x \Rightarrow \frac{1}{y+\dot{x}}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}+1\right)=-\frac{y}{x}-\ln x \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{x+y}+\ln x\right)=-\left(\frac{y}{x}+\frac{1}{y+x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-\frac{y^{2}+x y+x}{x(y+x)}}{\frac{(x+y) \ln x+1}{(x+y)}}=-\frac{y^{2}+x y+x}{x[1+(x+y) \ln x]}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #577 (ID: 475949)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{p} y^{q}=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math] তাহলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{p} y^{q}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p x^{p-1} y^{q}+q y^{q-1} \frac{d y}{d x} \cdot x^{p}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q-1} \cdot(p+q)[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p \cdot \frac{x^{p} y^{q}}{x}+q \cdot \frac{y^{q} x^{p}}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=(p+q) \frac{(x+y)^{p+q}}{x+y}+(p+q)[/math]
 [math]\frac{(x+y)^{p+q}}{x+y}\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p}{x}+\frac{q}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}+\frac{p+q}{x+y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{q}{y}-\frac{p+q}{x+y}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}-\frac{p}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x-p y}{y(x+y)} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q x-p y}{x(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #578 (ID: 475950)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x^{p} y^{q}=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math] হয় তাহলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{p} y^{q}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p \ln x+q \ln y[/math]
 [math]=(p+q) \ln (x+y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p}{x}+\frac{q}{y^{\prime}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{q}{y}-\frac{p+q}{x+y}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}-\frac{p}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x+q y-p x-q y}{y(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p x+q x-p x-p y}{x(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x-p y}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q x-p y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #579 (ID: 475951)

A. [math]99![/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]100![/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{100}}{\mathrm{dx}^{100}}\left(\mathrm{x}^{99}\right)=0 ; \mathrm{n}<\mathrm{m}[/math]

Question #581 (ID: 475953)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log _{x} a[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\log a}{x(\log x)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\log a}{x(\log x)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]Y=\log _{x} a[/math]
 [math]=\log _{e} a x \log _{x} e[/math]
 [math]=\ln a \times \frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\ln a \times \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{\ln x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{(\ln x)^{2}} \times \frac{1}{x} \times \ln a[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #582 (ID: 475954)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{4}[/math] কোনটি সত্য ?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x, y_{1}=2 x \log x+x, y_{2}=2 \log x+3, y_{3}=2 / x \quad y_{4}=-2 / x^{2}[/math]

Question #583 (ID: 475955)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=(2 x-5)^{3}[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]24[/math]
খ. [math]48[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. অনির্ণেয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=(2 x-5)^{3}, y_{1}=3 \cdot(2 x-5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2=6 \cdot(2 x-5)^{2},[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=6.2(2 x-5)[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2=24(2 x-5)[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=24(2 x-5)^{\circ} 2=48, y_{4}=0[/math]
 $$[math]\therefore y_{n}=\left\{\begin{array}{l}6 .(2 x-5)^{2} \text { if } n=1 \\24(2 x-5) \text { if } n=2 \\48 \text { if } n=3 \\0 \text { if } n>3\end{array}\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #584 (ID: 475956)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
B. [math]\pi / 4[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{(\pi / 2-x)^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{-\cos x}{-2(\pi / 2-x)} \text { [L Hospital's rule] }=\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{\sin x}{2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #585 (ID: 475957)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-n^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #586 (ID: 475958)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}=\cos ^{-1} x \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{1+x^{2}} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]\left(1+x^{2}\right) \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}} \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right) \tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]e^{y}=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\ln[/math]
 [math]\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=\left(1+x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #587 (ID: 475959)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=1 / x[/math] হয় তবে [math]y[/math] এর [math]20[/math] তম অন্তরীকরণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{20 !}{\mathrm{x}^{20}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{20 !}{\mathrm{x}^{21}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{21 !}{\mathrm{x}^{21}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}=x^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{1}=(-1) x^{-2} ; y_{2}=(-1)(-2) x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]=(-1)^{2} \cdot 2 ! \cdot x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=(-1)(-2)(-3) x^{-4}[/math]
 [math]=(-1)^{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 3 ! \cdot x^{-4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}[/math]
 [math]=(-1)^{n} \cdot n ! x^{-(n+1)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}_{20}[/math]
 [math]=(-1)^{20} \cdot 20 ! \mathrm{x}^{-21}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{20 !}{\mathrm{x}^{21}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #588 (ID: 475960)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=\tan \ln y[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{y_{2}}{y_{1}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}}{2 x-1}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 x-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{1+x^{2}}{2 x-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{2 x-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x=\tan (\ln y) \Rightarrow \ln y=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} y_{1}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}} \Rightarrow y_{1}\left(1+x^{2}\right)=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}\left(1+x^{2}\right)+2 x y_{1}=y_{1} \quad \therefore \frac{y_{2}}{y_{1}}=\frac{1-2 x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #589 (ID: 475961)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
তাপে সিলিন্ডারের ব্যাস ও উচ্চতা বৃদ্ধির হার যথাক্রমে [math]0.025[/math] ও [math]0.0135[/math] হলে, আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার কত?

যদি, ব্যাস ও উচ্চতা যথাক্রমে [math]10[/math] ও [math]25[/math] একক বিশিষ্ট হয়।

Options:
ক. [math]\text { 10. } 87[/math]
খ. [math]11.05[/math]
গ. [math]14.37[/math]
ঘ. [math]11.37[/math]
ঙ. [math]17.05[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{dh}}{\mathrm{dt}}=0.0135 ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dR}}{\mathrm{dt}}=0.025 ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{R}=10 ; \mathrm{h}=25[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dv}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\dot{\mathrm{d}}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left(\frac{1}{4} \pi \mathrm{R}^{2} \mathrm{~h}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \pi \times\left(2 \mathrm{Rh} \frac{\mathrm{dR}}{\mathrm{dt}}+\mathrm{R}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dh}}{\mathrm{dt}}\right)=[/math]
 [math]\frac{\pi}{2} \times 10 \times 25 \times 0.025+\frac{1}{4} \pi \times 100 \times 0.0135[/math]
 [math]=10.87[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #590 (ID: 475962)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-9 x+5[/math] বক্ররেখার যে সব বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x - অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তাদের ভুজের মান হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]x=0 \text { and } 0[/math]
খ. [math]x=1 \text { and }-1[/math]
গ. [math]x=1 \text { and }-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]x=-1 \text { and } 3[/math]
ঙ. [math]x=-1 \text { and }-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-6 x-9=0 \quad \therefore x=3,-1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #591 (ID: 475963)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
অন্তরীকরণ কর : [math]\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{3 \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{10 x}{3 \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}}+c[/math]
C. [math]\frac{10 x}{\sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}}+c[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt[3]{5 x^{2}-4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left[\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{\frac{1}{3}}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{-\frac{2}{3}} \cdot 10 x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{10 x}{3 \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #592 (ID: 475964)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
- x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{x \cos \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{x \sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}})=\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{\sin \sqrt{x}}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{4 \sqrt{x \sin \sqrt{x}}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #593 (ID: 475965)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } \tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}, \sin x[/math] [math]=\cdot \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}} \text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}[/math] [math]=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d t}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\text { Again, } x=\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} t \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{d t}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #594 (ID: 475966)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{The radius of a circular plate increases at the rate of } 0.25 \mathrm{~cm} / \mathrm{sec} \text{ when heat is applied. If the radius of the}\end{array}[/math] [math]\text { plate is } 7 \mathrm{~cm} \text {, the area increase rate is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]10 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
B. [math]11 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
C. [math]0.5 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
D. [math]12 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]A=\pi r^{2} \Rightarrow \frac{d \Lambda}{d t}=2 \pi t \frac{d r}{d t}=2 \pi \times 7 \times 0.25=\frac{7}{2} \pi \approx 11 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #595 (ID: 475967)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If, } y=\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x \cdot\right)^{2}[/math] [math]\text {, then }[/math] [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right) y_{2}-x y_{1}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]y=\frac{\sin ^{1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{1}-x^{1} y_{1}=\sin ^{2} x=[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{1-x^{2}} y_{2}-\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]y_{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right) y_{2}-x y_{1}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #596 (ID: 475968)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } y=x^{2} \log x \text { then } d^{3} y / d x^{3} \text { is- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-x / 2[/math]
B. [math]2 / x[/math]
C. [math]-2 / x[/math]
D. [math]x / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{x^{2}}{x}+2 x \log x=x+2 x \log x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=1+\frac{2 x}{x}+2 \log x=3+2 \log x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #597 (ID: 475969)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{x}{1+x}\right)^{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\infty[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]e^{-1}[/math]
D. [math]e[/math]
E. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{x}{1+x}\right)^{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{1}{\frac{1+x}{x}}\right)^{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{1}{1+\frac{1}{x}}\right)^{x}=\frac{1}{e}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #599 (ID: 475971)

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{2}-9}{x-3}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]6[/math]
B. [math]9[/math]
C. [math]12[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{2}-9}{x-3} \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 3} x+3 \Rightarrow 3+3 \Rightarrow 6[/math]

Question #600 (ID: 475972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x>0[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে e ভিত্তিক [math]\log \frac{1}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log \frac{1}{x}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log x^{-1}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(-\log x)=-\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #601 (ID: 475973)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #602 (ID: 475974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x} \quad\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1} \text { [L'hospital rule] } \\=\frac{1}{1+0}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #603 (ID: 475975)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} a\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} a\right)=?[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} a\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} e \cdot \log _{e} a\right)[/math]
 [math]=\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\frac{1}{\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{x}\right)^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]\left(-\left(\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{x}\right)^{-2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=-\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a} \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\ln \mathrm{a}}{\mathrm{x}(\ln \mathrm{x})^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #604 (ID: 475976)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-e^{2 x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+e^{2 x}}{e^{x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-e^{2 x}}{e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right)=\frac{1}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}\right)=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #605 (ID: 475977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2 x}{x-\sin x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2 x}{x-\sin x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}-2}{1-\cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
] আকার [math]\text { [By L Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{\sin x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{\cos x}=\frac{1+1}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #606 (ID: 475978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\ln (x y)=x^{2}+y^{2}[/math] এর অন্তরীকরণে কী পাওয়া যায়?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x}{y}\left(\frac{1+2 x^{2}}{1-2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{y}{x}\left(\frac{2 x^{2}-1}{1-2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{y}{x}\left(\frac{1+2 x^{2}}{1+2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\ln (x y)=x^{2}+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x y}[/math]
 [math]\left(y+x \frac{d y}{d x}\right)=2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{y}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{1}{y}-2 y\right) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x-\frac{1}{x}}{\frac{1}{y}-2 y}=\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(\frac{2 x^{2}-1}{1-2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #607 (ID: 475979)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x=\tan (\ln y)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{y_{2}}{y_{1}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}}{2 x-1}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 x-1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+x^{2}}{2 x+1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-2 x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x=\tan (\ln y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan ^{-1} x=\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y[/math]
 [math]=e^{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{y}}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{y}_{2}+2 \mathrm{xy}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1+\mathrm{x}^{2}\right) \mathrm{y}_{2}[/math]
 [math]=-(2 \mathrm{x}-1) \mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{y}_{2}}{\mathrm{y}_{1}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \mathrm{x}-1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 \mathrm{x}+1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-2 \mathrm{x}}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #608 (ID: 475980)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a t^{2}[/math] এবং [math]y=2 \text { at }[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]t[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]t^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{t}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d t}=2 a ; \frac{d x}{d t}=2 a t \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d y}{d t} / \frac{d x}{d t}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 a}{2 a t}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{t}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #609 (ID: 475981)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x} \text { La Hospital theorum; } \operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)}{\frac{d}{d x} x}=\frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1}=2[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #610 (ID: 475982)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (B Unit), Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{4}+2 x^{3}-3 x^{2}-4 x+4[/math] -এর লঘু মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)=4 x^{3}+6 x^{2}-6 x-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-2,1,-\frac{1}{2} f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=12 x^{2}+12 x-6[/math]


Explanation:

Question #611 (ID: 475983)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}[\sin (x+1)][/math] হলে, [math]\frac{dy}{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}[\sin (x+1)][/math]
B. [math]\cos (x+1)[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}[\cos (x+1)][/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin (x+1))=(x+1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #612 (ID: 475984)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{n}[/math] ফাংশনের [math]n + 1[/math] তম অন্তরক সহগ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math](n-1) ![/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm{n} ![/math]
ঘ. [math](n+1) ![/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{n} \quad \therefore y_{n}=n ! \quad \therefore y_{n+1}=0[/math]

Question #613 (ID: 475985)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2005-2006 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log \{\sec (2 x+3)\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\tan (2 x+3)[/math]
B. [math]\sec (2 x+3)[/math]
C. [math]-2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]
D. [math]2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log \{\sec (2 x+3)\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sec (2 x+3)}[/math]
 [math]\times \sec (2 x+3)[/math]
 [math]\times \tan (2 x+3)[/math]
 [math]\times 2=2 \tan (2 x+3)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #614 (ID: 475986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর মান কত হলে [math]y=x-x^{2}[/math] রেখাটির ঢালের মান শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=1-2 x ;[/math]
 ঢাল শূন্য হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 1-2 x=0 \therefore x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #615 (ID: 475988)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{3}+x y^{2}-3 x^{2}+4 x+5 y+2=0[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1 ,– 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+x y^{2}-3 x^{2}[/math]
 [math]+4 x+5 y+2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}+y^{2}+2 x y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]-6 x+4+5 \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(2 x y+5) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\left(3 x^{2}+y^{2}-6 x+4\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{3 x^{2}+y^{2}-6 x+4}{2 x y+5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #618 (ID: 475991)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=\log (x y)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y-2 x^{2} y}{2 x y^{2}-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 x^{3}-x}{y-2 y^{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x^{3}-x}{y-2 y^{3}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y-2 x^{2} y}{x-2 x y^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Hints: x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ করে একপাশে এত [math]dx/dy[/math]
 রাখতে হবে এবং বাকিগুলো অন্যপাশে রাখতে হবে।[math]\text { Solve: } x^{2}+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\log (x y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=\log x+\log y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(2 y-\frac{1}{y}\right) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}-2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{2 y^{2}-1}{y}\right) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-2 x^{2}}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y\left(1-2 x^{2}\right)}{x\left(2 y^{2}-1\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-2 x^{2} y}{2 x y^{2}-x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #619 (ID: 475992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{2}[/math] এবং [math]z=3 x^{2}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d z}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{9 x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{9}{4 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{9 x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে [math]g(x)[/math]
 এর অন্তরীকরণ [math]=\frac{\frac{d}{d x} g(x)}{\frac{d}{d x} f(x)}[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: }[/math]
 [math]y=2 x^{2} \quad[/math]
 [math]z=3 x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 x \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d z}{d x}=6 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d z}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{d y}{d x}}{\frac{d z}{d x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 x}{6 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: Chain Rule অনুযায়ী y, x এর ফাংশন এবং Z, x এর ফাংশন হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d z}=\frac{d y / d x}{d z / d x}[/math]

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #620 (ID: 475993)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
B. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\delta y}{\delta x}[/math]
C. [math]f(x y)[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\lim _{\delta x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\delta y}{\delta x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{\delta x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+\delta x)-f(x)}{\delta x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #621 (ID: 475994)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x e^{\log x^{2} z}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]2 x[/math]
B. [math]\log 2 x[/math]
C. [math]3 x^{2}[/math]
D. [math]x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x e^{\log x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y[/math]
 [math]=x e^{\log x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=x x^{2}=x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #622 (ID: 475995)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}\right)[/math] এর [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}\right)=2 \tan ^{-1} x \quad \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #623 (ID: 475996)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log (\sin x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]
B. [math]\cot x[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]tanx[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\log (\sin x) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sin x} \cos x=\cot x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x=-\frac{1}{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #624 (ID: 475997)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm 2[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm 1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 - ঢাল শূন্য বলে [math]1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \therefore x=\pm 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #625 (ID: 475890)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)=x^{3}-6 x^{2}+9 x-8[/math] এর লঘু মান থাকবে?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
x ≤ 0 এর জন্য ফাংশনটির লঘুমান পাওয়া সম্ভব ।
[Image]
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-6 x^{2}+9 x-8 \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-12 x+9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)=6 x-12=0 \\f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 x+3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-3)(x-1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=3, x=1[/math]
 [math]\text { For, } x=3, f^{\prime \prime}(3)=6>0, \quad[/math]
 [math]x=1, f^{\prime \prime}(1)=-6<0[/math]
অর্থাৎ [math]x = 1[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর লঘুমান থাকবে

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #626 (ID: 475836)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt[3]{5 x^{2}-4}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{6}{(5-3 x)^{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{10 x}{3\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{\frac{2}{3}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{6}{(5+3 x)^{3}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{10 x}{3\left(5 x^{2}+4\right)^{\frac{2}{3}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt[3]{5 x^{2}-4}\right)=\frac{1}{3}\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{\frac{1}{3}-1}\{5(2 x)-0\}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #627 (ID: 475837)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{y}=e^{x-y}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln x}{[1+\ln x]^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln x}{[1+\ln x]}[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1+\ln x}{\ln x}[/math]
E. [math]\text { No answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No answer }[/math]

Solution:
সঠিক উত্তর: [math]\frac{x-y}{x(\ln x+1)}[/math]

Question #628 (ID: 475838)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin ^{-1}(\cos x)[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\cos ^{2} x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-\cos ^{2} x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\sin ^{2} x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\sin ^{-1}(\cos x)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\cos ^{2} x}} \cdot(-\sin x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\sin x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #629 (ID: 475839)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(a^{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2} \cdot \log _{a} a[/math]
B. [math]a^{x} \cdot \log _{e} a[/math]
C. [math]a^{x} \cdot \log _{a} e[/math]
D. [math]a^{x} \cdot \log _{a}-e[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}}\left(\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}}\right)=\mathrm{a}^{\mathrm{x}} \log \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{a}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #630 (ID: 475840)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a(\theta+\sin \theta)[/math] এবং [math]y=a(1+\cos \theta)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\tan \theta / 2[/math]
B. [math]-\tan \theta / 2[/math]
C. [math]\sec \theta / 2[/math]
D. [math]\cot \theta / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=a \theta+a \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d x}{d 0}=a+a \cos \theta[/math]
আবার, [math]y=a+a \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=-a \sin \theta \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-a \sin \theta}{2+a \cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\sin \theta}{1+\cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
