Question #632 (ID: 475842)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \sin x^{3}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]3 x^{2} \cos x^{3}[/math]
B. [math]3 x^{2} \cos x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]3 x^{2} \sin x^{2} \cos x[/math]
D. [math]3 x^{2} \sin x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin x^{3}\right)=\cos x^{3} \cdot 3 x^{2}=3 x^{2} \cos x^{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #633 (ID: 475843)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac {d} {dx}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x} x^{-2}\right)+\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{-x} x^{2}\right)\right\}-[/math] এর সমান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x^{2} e^{-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x} x^{-2}\right)+\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{-x} x^{2}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\tan ^{-1} \frac{e^{x} x^{-2}+e^{-x} x^{2}}{1-e^{x-x} \cdot x^{-2+2}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #634 (ID: 475844)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ট্রেন [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ডে [math]3 t+1 / 8 t^{2}[/math] মিটার অতিক্রম করে। [math]5[/math] মিনিট পর তার বেগ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]78 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]
খ. [math]80 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]
গ. [math]70 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]
ঘ. [math]60 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]s=3 t+\frac{1}{8} t^{2} \Rightarrow v=\frac{d s}{d t}=3+\frac{1}{4} t \therefore 5 \mathrm{~min}[/math]
 বা [math]300 \mathrm{sec}[/math]
 পর বেগ [math]=3+\frac{1}{4} \times 300=78 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1}\left(\frac{x^{2}+1}{x+1}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{x^{2}+1}{x+1}=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]

Question #636 (ID: 475846)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-y=0[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢালের মান [math]-1[/math] হবে তার স্থানাঙ্ক কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{-1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{-1}{2}, \frac{-1}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]-2 x-\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-\frac{1}{2} ;[/math]
 [math]y=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #637 (ID: 475847)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sqrt{x}[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{Lt}_{h \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{f(x+h)-I(x)}{h}\right\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt[3]{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{lx}_{h \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{(f x+h)-f(x)}{h}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(f(x))[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #638 (ID: 475848)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}[/math] হলে, [math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(2+h)-f(2)}{h}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]9[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(2+h)-f(2)}{h}=f^{\prime}(2)[/math]
 [math]\left[\because f(x)=x^{3} \quad \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=3 x^{2} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(2)=3 \times 4=12\right][/math]


Explanation:

Question #639 (ID: 475849)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=2 \text { at }[/math] এবং [math]y=a t^{2}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]t[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{t}[/math]
C. [math]t^{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d t}}{\frac{d x}{d t}}=\frac{2 a t}{2 a}=t[/math]

Explanation:

Question #640 (ID: 475850)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{a \cos x-b \sin x}{b \cos x+a \sin x}\right)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}}-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{a \cos x-b \sin x}{b \cos x+a \sin x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\frac{a}{b}-\tan x}{1+\frac{a}{b} \tan x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{a}{b}-x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a}{b}-x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #641 (ID: 475851)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]k[/math] এর মান কত হলে, [math]y=k(x-1)(x+2)[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x=1[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x - অক্ষের সাথে [math]60^{\circ}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]k\left(x^{2}+x-2\right)=y ; y_{1}=k(2 x+1) \quad \tan 60^{\circ}=k \times 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore k=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #642 (ID: 475852)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]C[/math] -এর মান কত হলে- [math]y=C x(1+x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূল বিন্দুতে তার স্পর্শক অক্ষের সাথে 30° কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=C x(1+x)=C x+C x^{2}, \frac{d y}{d x}=C+2 C x[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(x=0)}=C \quad \therefore C=\tan 30^{\circ}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #643 (ID: 475853)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2003-2004, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #646 (ID: 475856)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]2x+y-1=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-2y-3=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y=3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+4 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{2 y}[/math]
 [math](1,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{2(-1)}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y+1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1) \therefore x-2 y-3=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #647 (ID: 475857)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016, 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh Military Academy, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}(1-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{27}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{x}}{27}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{27}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{27}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}(1-x)=x^{2}-x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-3 x^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2-6 x[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন ও সর্বোচ্চ মানের জন্য, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x-3 x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(2-3 x)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0, \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2>0[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া পাবে,[math]x=3[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2-6 \cdot \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=2-4=-2<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান পাওয়া যাবে।সর্বোচ্চ মানটি, [math]|y|{x=\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{2}-\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{9}-\frac{8}{27}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{12-8}{27}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{27}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #648 (ID: 475858)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]x^{x}(1+\log x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{x}+x \log x[/math]
C. [math]x \log x^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}(x+\log x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x} \frac{d}{d x}(x \ln x)=x^{x}\left(\frac{x}{x}+\ln x\right)=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #649 (ID: 475859)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x^{p} y^{q}=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math] হয় তাহলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{p} y^{q}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p \ln x+q \ln y[/math]
 [math]=(p+q) \ln (x+y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p}{x}+\frac{q}{y^{\prime}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{q}{y}-\frac{p+q}{x+y}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}-\frac{p}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x+q y-p x-q y}{y(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p x+q x-p x-p y}{x(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x-p y}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q x-p y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #650 (ID: 475860)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } x=\operatorname{acos}^{3} \theta \text { and } y=b \sin ^{3} \theta ;\text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{b}{a} \cot \theta[/math]
B. [math]\frac{a}{b} \tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]\frac{a}{b} \cot \theta[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{b}{a} \tan \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d x}{d \theta}=3 a \cos ^{2} \theta(-\sin \theta) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d \theta}=3 b \sin ^{2} \theta \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d \theta}}{\frac{d x}{d \theta}}=-\frac{b}{a} \tan \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #651 (ID: 475861)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}\right\}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7 x}{\left(x^{2}-1\right)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 x}{\sqrt{\left(x^{2}+1\right)}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5 x}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos \theta}{1+\cos \theta}}\right\}[/math]
 [math][x=\cos \theta][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{\theta}{2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \theta[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\cos \left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\frac{-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\min (11 x+b)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { II cosinx }[/math]
B. [math]a \cos (a x+b)[/math]
C. [math]a \cos (b+x)[/math]
D. সবগুলো


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\{\sin (a x+b)\}-a \cos (a x+b)[/math]

Question #653 (ID: 475863)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x=a(\theta+\sin \theta), y=a(1-\cos \theta)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{(1+\cos \theta)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{a}{(1-\cos \theta)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{(1+\cos \theta)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{a}(1+\cos \theta)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d \theta}=a \sin \theta, \frac{d x}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=a(1+\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin \theta}{1+\cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d \theta}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right) \times \frac{d y}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\cos \theta} \times \frac{d \theta}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a(1+\cos \theta)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #654 (ID: 475864)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=20 x-5 x^{3}[/math] ফাংশনে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান শূন্য হলে, x এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=20 x-5 x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=20-15 x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 20-15 \mathrm{x}^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{20}{15}=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=[/math]
 [math]\pm \frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #655 (ID: 475865)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](0, 2)[/math] বিন্দুটি [math]y=5 x^{2}+3 x+c[/math] বক্ররেখার উপর অবস্থিত। ঐ বিন্দুতে বক্র রেখার উপর অঙ্কিত স্পর্শক [math]a x+c y+1=0[/math] রেখার সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]8[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=5 x^{2}+3 x+c[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=10 x+3 \quad \therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(0,2)}=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math](y-2)=3(x-0)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y-3 x-2=0 \ldots . .(i)[/math]
আবার, , [math](0, 2)[/math]
 বিন্দু [math]y = 5x² + 3x + c[/math]
 রেখার উপর অবস্থিত বলে, [math]c = 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore a x+c y+1=0 \Rightarrow a x+2 y+1=0 \ldots . .[/math]
(i) ও (ii) নং রেখা দুটি সমান্তরাল বলে, [math]\frac{1}{2}=-\frac{3}{a} \therefore a=-6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #656 (ID: 475866)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=(2 x-3) e^{x}[/math] এর শুরু বা লঘুমান পাওয়া যাবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=(2 x-3) e^{x}+(2) e^{x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{x}(2 \mathrm{x}-3+2)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{c}^{x}(2 \mathrm{x}-1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{x}-1-0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #657 (ID: 475867)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-5 x^{2}+24 x+4[/math] ফাংশনের গুরুমান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]32[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-5 x^{2}+24 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=-10 x+24=0 \therefore x=\frac{12}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 গুরুমান [math]=-\left(\frac{12}{5}\right)^{2}+24 \cdot \frac{12}{5}+4=\frac{164}{5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #658 (ID: 475868)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\log (a x+b)[/math] হয় তবে [math]\mathrm{y}_{\mathrm{n}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{(-1) n ! a^{n-1}}{(a x+b)^{n}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n-1}(n-1) \cdot a^{n}}{(a x+b)^{n}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n-1}(n-1): a^{n-1}}{(a x+b)^{n}}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\log (a x+b) ;[/math]
 [math]y_{1}=(a x+b)^{-1} a ;[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=(a x+b)^{-2} \cdot(-1) \cdot 1 \cdot a^{2}[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=(a x+b)^{-3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(-1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 1 \cdot 2 \cdot a^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}=(-1)^{n-1}(a x+b)^{-n}(n-1) ![/math]
 [math]\cdot a^{n} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{(-1)^{n-1} \cdot(n-1) ! \cdot a^{n}}{(a x+b)^{n}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #659 (ID: 475869)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-9 a x^{2}+12 a^{2} x+1,(a>0)[/math] এর [math]x=p[/math] ও [math]x=q[/math] বিন্দুতে যথাক্রমে স্থানীয় গরিষ্ঠ ও লঘিষ্ঠ মান আছে।

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2[/math]
ঙ. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-9 a x^{2}+12 a^{2} x+1[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=6 x^{2}-18 a x+12 a^{2}[/math]
গরিষ্ঠ ও লঘিষ্ঠ মানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}6 x^{2}-18 a x+12 a^{2}=0 \\x^{2}-3 a x+2 a^{2}=0 \\x=\frac{3 a \pm \sqrt{9 a^{2}-8 a^{2}}}{2}=\frac{3 a \pm a}{2}=2 a, a\end{array}[/math]
তাহলে, [math]\mathrm{q}=2 \mathrm{a}[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathrm{p}=\mathrm{a}[/math]
 নিয়ে পাই, কারণ তা না হলে [math]a[/math]
 এর[math]p^{2}=q[/math]
 [ভগ্নাংশিক মান আসবে][math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{a}^{2}=2 \mathrm{a} \\\mathrm{a}=2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #660 (ID: 475870)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a(t+\sin t), y=a(1-\cos t)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{(2 a-y)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{a}{(a+2 y)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]2 \frac{a}{7} t[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3 a}{a+5 y}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{a}{5 t}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x=a(t+\sin t) ; \frac{d x}{d t}=a(1+\cos t)....(i)[/math]
 [math]y=a(1-\cos t)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos t=1-\frac{y}{a} ; \frac{d y}{d t}=a \sin t....(ii)[/math]
 [math]\text { (i) } \div \text { (ii) } \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{d y}{d x}}{\frac{d x}{d t}}=\frac{a \sin t}{a(1+\cos t)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \sin \frac{t}{2} \cos \frac{t}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{t}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \frac{t}{2} \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{t}{2} \cdot \frac{d t}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{t}{2}} \cdot \frac{1}{a(1+\cos t)}=\frac{1}{(1+\cos t)} \cdot \frac{1}{a(1+\cos t)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a(1+\cos t)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{a\left(1+1-\frac{y}{a}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a}{(2 a-y)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #661 (ID: 475871)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x \sin y+y \cos x=\pi[/math] হয়, তবে [math]y^{\prime\prime}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]-\pi[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]
E. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y_{2}=\frac{(\cos x+x \cos y)\left(y \cos x+\sin x \cdot y_{1}-\cos y \cdot y_{1}\right)-(y \sin x-\sin y)\left(-\sin x+\cos y-x \sin y y_{1}\right)}{(\cos x+x \cos y) 2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1[y+0+\cos y \cdot \sin y]+\sin y \cos y}{1}[/math]
 [math][y=\pi] ;[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi+2 \cos \pi \sin \pi}{1}[/math]
 [math]=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #662 (ID: 475872)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=10^{\log (\sin x)}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]10^{\log (\sin x)} \log _{e}^{10(\cot x)}[/math]
B. [math]10^{\log (\sin x)} \log _{e} 10 / \sin x[/math]
C. [math]10^{\log (\sin x)} \log _{c} 10[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=10^{\log (\sin x)} \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=10^{\log (\sin x)} \log _{0}{ }^{10} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\log \sin x) \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\sin \mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]\left[\because a^{x}=a^{x} \ln a=a^{x} \cdot \log e^{a}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow10^{\log (\sin x)} \log _{c}{ }^{10} \frac{1}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos x[/math]
 [math]=10^{\log (\sin x)} \log _{c}{ }^{10} \cot x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #663 (ID: 475873)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x \sqrt{1+y}+y \sqrt{1+x}=0[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{7}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{11}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x \sqrt{1+y}+y \sqrt{1+x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}(1+y)=y^{2}(1+x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+x^{2} y-y^{2}-x y^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-y^{2}+x y(x-y)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-y)(x+y+x y)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+y+x y=0[\because x 
eq y][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=-\frac{x}{1+x} \quad \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-(1+x)+x}{(1+x)^{2}}=\frac{-1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #664 (ID: 475874)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right] \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{1+x}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #665 (ID: 475875)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\log x}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1-\log x[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\log x}{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{1}{x}-x-\log x}{x^{2}}=\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #666 (ID: 475876)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{y \rightarrow \pi / 2}(1-\sin y) /\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-y\right)^{2}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]1/2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{y \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{(1-\sin y)}{(\pi / 2-y)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{y \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{-\cos y}{2(\pi / 2-y)(-1)}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L. hospital's rule] }[/math]
 [math]=_{y \rightarrow \pi / 2} \lim _{2 \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sin y}{2(-1)(-1)} \text { [L. hospital's rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #667 (ID: 475877)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x}=[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{x}{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\times\left(\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #668 (ID: 475878)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x} \text { La Hospital theorum; } \operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)}{\frac{d}{d x} x}=\frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1}=2[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #669 (ID: 475879)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3+x}}+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3-x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\text { [Using L. Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #670 (ID: 475880)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log x^{c}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\log x^{c}}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\log x^{c}=z \text { Or, } x^{2}=e[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } z \ln x=1 \quad \text { Or, } \frac{z}{x}+\ln x \frac{d z}{d x}=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } \frac{d z}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{z}{x \ln x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left[z=\frac{1}{\ln x}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #671 (ID: 475881)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{y}=e^{x-y}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln x}{[1+\ln x]^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln x}{[1+\ln x]}[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1+\ln x}{\ln x}[/math]
E. [math]\text { No answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No answer }[/math]

Solution:
সঠিক উত্তর: [math]\frac{x-y}{x(\ln x+1)}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #672 (ID: 475882)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{p+q x}{q-p x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1+7 x[/math]
B. [math]2+5 x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{7}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{p+q x}{q-p x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\frac{p}{q}+x}{1-\frac{p}{q} x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{p}{q}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=0+\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #673 (ID: 475883)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]+2[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { (La' Hospital Rule) }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\text { La' Hospital Rule }^{\prime}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+1}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #674 (ID: 475884)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underset{x \rightarrow 1}{L t}\left(\frac{x}{x-1}-\frac{1}{\log x}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\underset{x \rightarrow 1}{\operatorname{Lt}}\left(\frac{x}{x-1}-\frac{1}{\log x}\right)=[/math]
 [math]\underset{x \rightarrow 1}{\mathbf{L t}} \frac{x \log x-x+1}{x \log x-\log x}=[/math]
 [math]\underset{x \rightarrow 1}{Lt} \frac{x: \frac{1}{x}+\log x-1}{x \cdot \frac{1}{x}-\frac{1}{x}+\log x}[/math]
 [math]\text { [La Hospital's rule] }[/math]
\[math]\Rightarrow\mathrm{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{\log x}{1-\frac{1}{x}+\log x}=[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{Lt}_{x \rightarrow1} \frac{\frac{1}{x}}{\frac{1}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\text { La Hospital's rule] }=\frac{1}{1+1}=\frac{1}{2}\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #675 (ID: 475885)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\varphi(x)=\log _{e} \cos x[/math] হলে [math]e^{2 \varphi(x)}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(5+\cos x)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 x)[/math]
C. [math](7+\cos 3 x)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}(1+\cos 3 x)[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{3}(1+\sin 3 x)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\varphi(x)=\ln (\cos x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\mathrm{e}^{2 \varphi(x)}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{2 \ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\ln (\cos x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{1}{2}(1+\cos 2 \mathrm{x})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #676 (ID: 475886)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2-\sqrt{x+4}}{\sin 2 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{8}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2-\sqrt{x+4}}{\sin 2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x+4}}}{2 \cos 2 x}[\text { La hospital }][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{4 \times 2 \cos 0}}=\frac{-1}{2 \times 2 \times 2}=\frac{-1}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #677 (ID: 475887)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x}{\sin 7 x}[/math] এর মান ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{7}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{5}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\frac{25}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x}{\sin 7 x}=\left(\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x}{5 x}\right) \times\left(\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 x}{\sin 7 x}\right) \times \frac{5}{7}=1 \times 1 \times \frac{5}{7}=\frac{5}{7}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #678 (ID: 475888)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (B Unit), Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{4}+2 x^{3}-3 x^{2}-4 x+4[/math] -এর লঘু মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)=4 x^{3}+6 x^{2}-6 x-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-2,1,-\frac{1}{2} f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=12 x^{2}+12 x-6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #679 (ID: 475889)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর মান বাস্তব হলে, [math]-9 x^{2}+6 p x+q^{2}[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{p}^{2}-\mathrm{q}^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]p^{2}+q^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]-\mathrm{p}^{2}+\mathrm{q}^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-p^{2}-q^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-9 x^{2}+6 p x+q^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=-18 x+6 p=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{p}{3}[/math]
 [math]f\left(\frac{p}{3}\right)=-9[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{p}{3}\right)^{2}=6[/math]
 [math]p\left(\frac{p}{3}\right)+q^{2}[/math]
 [math]=-p^{2}+2 p^{2}+q^{2}=p^{2}+q^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #680 (ID: 475798)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\left(1+x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{2}{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan \tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
\
[Image]
[math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+x \cdot \frac{1}{2}\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \cdot 2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-x^{2}+x^{2}}{\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #681 (ID: 475799)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+\sin x}{\cos x}[/math] সীমাটি মান নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]9[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-9[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+\sin x}{\cos x}=\frac{1+\sin 0}{\cos 0}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #682 (ID: 475800)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-2 x+4[/math] বক্ররেখার (2, 4) বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
ক. [math]4 x-y-4=0[/math]
খ. [math]x+4 y+18=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-4 y-4=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+2 y-10=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\left.\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right|_{2,4}[/math]
 [math]=2 x-2=2.2-=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore(y-4)=-\frac{d y}{d y}(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(y-4)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y-8=-(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-2+2 y-8=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+2 y-10=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+2 y-10=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #683 (ID: 475801)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)^{2}}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1 / 2[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\cos x}{2\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)(-1)}=[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\sin x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \sin \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #684 (ID: 475802)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x\left(x^{2}-5\right)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math] - নির্ণয় কর-

Options:
A. [math]6[/math]
B. [math]6x[/math]
C. [math]6 x-5[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x\left(x^{2}-5\right) ; \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-5 ; \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=6 x ; \frac{d^{3} x}{d x^{3}}=6[/math]

Explanation:

Question #685 (ID: 475803)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math] এবং [math]x=\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান =?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\because \sin ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} t \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #686 (ID: 475804)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বৃত্তের পরিধি বৃদ্ধির হার এর ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হারের কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi[/math]
খ. [math]2 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]\pi / 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
পরিধি বৃদ্ধির হার [math]\frac{d}{d t}(2 \pi r)=2 \pi \times \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #687 (ID: 475805)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=10^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{10^{-x}}{\log _{10} e}[/math]
B. [math]10^{x} \log _{e} 10[/math]
C. [math]\frac{10^{x}}{\log _{e} 10}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{10^{x}}{10}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { We know that,} \frac{d}{d x} a^{x}=a^{x} \ln a[a[/math] ধনাত্মক পূর্ণ সংখ্যা ]

Explanation:

Question #688 (ID: 475806)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3} \log _{e} x[/math] হলে, [math]\mathrm{y}_{4}[/math] এর জন্য কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y_{1}=3 x^{2} \log _{e} x+x^{2} \Rightarrow y_{2}=6 x \log _{e} x+3 x+2 x[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=6 \log _{e} x+6+5 \Rightarrow y_{4}=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #691 (ID: 475809)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question #692 (ID: 475810)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}\left(x^{2}-3\right)+2 x^{4}+101[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d^{6} y}{d x^{6}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5 x-3[/math]
B. [math]60 x[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math] অসীম


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
কোন রাশিকে চলকের ঘাত সংখ্যক বার অন্তরীকরণ করলে ধ্রুবক আসে এবং ধ্রুবককে অন্তরীকরণ করলে 0 আসে ।

Explanation:

Question #693 (ID: 475811)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x} \text { La Hospital theorum; } \operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)}{\frac{d}{d x} x}=\frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1}=2[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #694 (ID: 475812)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\ln (\cos x)[/math] হয় তাহলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\tan x[/math]
B. [math]\tan x[/math]
C. [math]\cot x[/math]
D. [math]\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\cos x) ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\cos x}(-\sin x)=-\tan x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #695 (ID: 475813)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{\ln (2 x)}[/math] হলে [math]d y / d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{\ln (2 x)}[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{\ln (2 x)} y=\frac{d(2 x)}{d x}=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #696 (ID: 475814)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বস্তুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\vec{y}=2 \sin 3t \hat{ i}+2 \ cost \hat{j}+8 t \hat{k}[/math] যেখানে, t হচ্ছে সেকেন্ড। [math]t = 0[/math] সময়ে বস্তুটির বেগের মান-

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math] একক
খ. [math]12[/math] একক
গ. [math]10[/math] একক
ঘ. [math]14[/math] একক


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d \bar{y}}{d t}=\vec{v}=2(\cos 3 t \hat{i})[/math]
 [math]\times 3-2 \sin t \hat{j}+8 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]t=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}[/math]
 [math]=6 .[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-0+8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+8 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}|=\sqrt{6^{2}+8^{2}}=10[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #697 (ID: 475815)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{3+x}-\sqrt{3-x}}{x}=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3+x}}+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3-x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\text { [Using L. Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}+\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #698 (ID: 475816)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হলে, [math]\log x \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-x / 2[/math]
B. [math]2 / x[/math]
C. [math]-2 / x[/math]
D. [math]x / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x ; \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 x \log x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x+2 x \log x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=1+2 x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 \log x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=1+2+2 \log x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #699 (ID: 475817)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+\mathrm{x}}{1-\mathrm{x}}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\tan ^{-1} 1+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #700 (ID: 475818)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-5 x^{2}+24 x+4[/math] ফাংশনের গুরুমান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]32[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-5 x^{2}+24 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=-10 x+24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{12}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 গুরুমান [math]=-5\left(\frac{12}{5}\right)^{2}+24 \cdot[/math]
 [math]\frac{12}{5}+4[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{144}{5}+\frac{288}{5}+4[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-144+288+20}{5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{164}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #701 (ID: 475819)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2}(2 x)}{x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]1 / 2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2}(2 x)}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} 4 x \frac{\sin ^{2}(2 x)}{4 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} 4 x\left(\frac{\sin 2 x}{2 x}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #702 (ID: 475820)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \ln x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d^{3}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \ln x \text { Or, } \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x \ln x+x \text { [Differentiating] }[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2+2 \ln x+1 \text { Or, } \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{2}}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #703 (ID: 475821)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log x^{c}\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\log x^{c}}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\log x^{c}=z \text { Or, } x^{2}=e[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } z \ln x=1 \quad \text { Or, } \frac{z}{x}+\ln x \frac{d z}{d x}=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\text { Or, } \frac{d z}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{z}{x \ln x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left[z=\frac{1}{\ln x}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #704 (ID: 475822)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{2} 3 x\right)=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-3 \sin 6 x[/math]
B. [math]3 \sin 3 x[/math]
C. [math]-2 \sin 3 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \sin 3 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{2} 3 x\right)=-2 \times 3 \cos 3 x \sin 3 x=-3 \sin 6 x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #705 (ID: 475823)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হলে [math]x=1[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { No answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2} \frac{1}{x}+2 x \log x ;\left[\frac{d y}{d x}\right]_{x=1}=1+0=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #706 (ID: 475824)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=t^{3}-t[/math] এবং [math]y=\sqrt{3 t+1}[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{t}=1[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{8}[/math]
C. [math]8[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d x}{d t}=3 t^{2}-1 ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d t}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{3 t}+1} \cdot 3 ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2 \sqrt{3 t+1}}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{3 t^{2}-1}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{d y}{d x}\right]_{t=1}=\frac{3}{2 \sqrt{3+1}}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{3.1-1}=\frac{3}{2 \times 2 \times 2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #707 (ID: 475825)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0 \frac{y}{z}} \cdot \sin z=y \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z} \\=y \cdot 1=y .\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #708 (ID: 475826)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2006-2007, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}=2 \text { [By L' H Rule] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #709 (ID: 475827)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3 / 2[/math]
B. [math]5 / 3[/math]
C. [math]5 / 4[/math]
D. [math]5 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{5 x}{2} \sin \frac{x}{2}}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{5 x}{2}}{\frac{2}{5}\left(\frac{5 x}{2}\right)} \cdot \frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{2\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)}=\frac{5}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #710 (ID: 475828)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x}-1}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x}-1}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\sqrt{1+x}+1)}{1+x-1} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\sqrt{1+x}+1)=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #711 (ID: 475829)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে, $$\frac{d y}{d x}=?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)-\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x}{x}-\ln x \cdot 1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #713 (ID: 475831)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+k x)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\log _{k} x[/math]
B. [math]\ln (k x)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\mathrm{k}+\mathrm{k})[/math]
D. [math]e^{\mathbf{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+k x)^{\frac{1}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{(1+k x)^{1 / x x}\right\}^{k}=e^{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #714 (ID: 475832)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question #716 (ID: 475834)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{100}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{f^{100}(x)}{100}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\text { 99! }[/math]
C. [math]100[/math]
D. [math]99[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{f}^{100}(\mathrm{x})}{100}=\frac{100 !}{100}=\frac{100 \times 99 !}{100}=99 ![/math]

Explanation:

Question #721 (ID: 475699)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=m x+3[/math] সরলরেখাটি [math]y=x^{2}+12[/math] বক্ররেখাকে স্পর্শ করলে, [math]m[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm 3[/math]
খ. [math]\pm 2[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 6[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm 4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=m x+3[/math]
 এবং [math]y=x^{2}+12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+12=m x+3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-m x+9=0[/math]
 [math]\because[/math]
 রেখাটি স্পর্শ করে, [math]\therefore(-m)^{2}-4.9=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow m^{2}=36[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #722 (ID: 475700)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{0}+e^{-0}}{1}=\frac{1+1}{1}[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #723 (ID: 475701)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #724 (ID: 475702)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2003-2004, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #725 (ID: 475703)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University of Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]a[/math]
B. [math]-a[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]loga[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x},[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]\text { L' Hospital's Rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই,[math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \log a-1}{1}=a^{0} \cdot \log a=\log a[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
