Question #817 (ID: 475796)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=3 x^{2}[/math] যদি, [math]2 x^{2} y^{\prime \prime}+5 x y^{\prime}+k y=0[/math] সমীকরণের সমাধান হয়, তবে k এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-10[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]5 / 2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-14[/math]
ঙ. [math]14[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=3 x^{2} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore y^{\prime}=6 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}^{\prime \prime}[/math]
 [math]=6 . \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{x}^{2} \mathrm{y}^{\prime \prime}+5 \mathrm{xy} \mathrm{y}^{\prime}+\mathrm{ky}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \mathrm{x}^{2} \times 6+5 \mathrm{x} \times(6 \mathrm{x})+\mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]\times 3 \mathrm{x}^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 12 \mathrm{x}^{2}+30 \mathrm{x}^{2}+3 \mathrm{kx}^{2}=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{k}=\frac{-42}{3}=-14[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #818 (ID: 475797)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underset{x \rightarrow 0}{ } \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: L' Hospital's Rule প্রয়োগ করতে পারো।Solve : [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \frac{1}{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-0^{2}}}=1[/math]
Ans. (B)ব্যাখ্যা: L' Hospital's Rule হলো কোন ফাংশনকে ততক্ষণ পর্যন্ত অন্তরীকরণ করতে হবে যথক্ষণ পর্যন্ত x এর লিমিট বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান না পাওয়া যায়। সঙ্গায়িত মান পেলে limit বসিয়ে মান বের করতে হবে। আমাদের আলোচ্য অঙ্কে একবার অন্তরীকরণ করার পর limit বসিয়ে সঙ্গায়িত মান পাওয়া গেছে। এই সঙ্গায়িত মানই আমাদের কাঙ্ক্ষিত উত্তর বা Limiting Value.By Calculator: ক্যালকুলেটরকে রেডিয়ান Mode-এ রেখে x এর পছন্দমতো একটা মান ধরে নিয়ে সম্পূর্ণ ফাংশনটা ক্যালকুলেটরে Input দিয়ে Equal বাটন চেপে ফাংশনটির Limiting value বের করা সম্ভব। সেক্ষেত্রে [math]x → 0[/math]
 এর জন্য x এর মান [math]0.001[/math]
 কিংবা 0 এর খুব কাছাকাছি কোনো মান ধরতে হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #819 (ID: 475637)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { A stone dropped into a still pond sends out a circular ripple whose radius increases at a constant rate of } 3 \mathrm{ft} \text {. }[/math] [math]s^{-1} \text {. How rapidly is the area enclosed by the ripple increasing at the end of } 10 \text { s? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]90 \pi \mathrm{fts}^{-2}[/math]
B. [math]180 \mathrm{fts}^{-2}[/math]
C. [math]180 \pi \mathrm{fts}^{-2}[/math]
D. [math]90 \mathrm{fts}^{-2}[/math]
E. [math]\text {No correct answer}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text {No correct answer}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A=\pi r^{2}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d A}{d t}=2 \pi r \frac{d r}{d t}=2 \pi \times 30 \times 3=180 \pi \mathrm{ft}^{2} s^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d r}{d t}=3 \Rightarrow r=3 t \therefore r=30 \mathrm{ft}[\text { for } t=10 \mathrm{~s}][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #820 (ID: 475638)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}\right\}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7 x}{\left(x^{2}-1\right)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 x}{\sqrt{\left(x^{2}+1\right)}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5 x}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos \theta}{1+\cos \theta}}\right\}[/math]
 [math][x=\cos \theta][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sin \left\{2 \tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{\theta}{2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \theta[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\cos \left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\frac{-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #821 (ID: 475639)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{y \rightarrow \pi / 2}(1-\sin y) /\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-y\right)^{2}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]1/2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{y \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{(1-\sin y)}{(\pi / 2-y)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{y \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{-\cos y}{2(\pi / 2-y)(-1)}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L. hospital's rule] }[/math]
 [math]=_{y \rightarrow \pi / 2} \lim _{2 \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sin y}{2(-1)(-1)} \text { [L. hospital's rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #822 (ID: 475640)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}\right\}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(1+x)-(1-x)}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1+x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #823 (ID: 475641)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{lt}_{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{3 x+2}{x}}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{10}[/math]
B. [math]e^{8}[/math]
C. [math]10[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{lt}_{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{3 x+2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{3+\frac{2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{3} \cdot \operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow{ }_{x \rightarrow 0}^{Lt}(1+5 x)^{\frac{10}{5 x}}[/math]
 [math]=\left[\operatorname{Lt}_{5 x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{1}{5 x}}\right]^{10}[/math]
 [math]=e^{10}[/math]
 [math];\left[\lim _{5 x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{1}{5 x}}=e\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #824 (ID: 475642)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{1}{x}+1\right)\left(\frac{5 x^{2}-1}{x^{2}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{1+x}{x} \times \frac{5 x^{2}-1}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{1+x}{x} \times \frac{5 x^{2}-1}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5 x^{3}-x+5 x^{2}-1}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{3}\left(5+\frac{5}{x}-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \frac{1}{x^{3}}\right)}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=5+0=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #825 (ID: 475643)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d y}\left(\frac{1+y+y^{2}}{y}\right)=কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(1-\frac{1}{y^{2}}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\left(1-\frac{1}{y}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\left(1+\frac{1}{y^{2}}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\left(1+\frac{1}{y}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d y}\left(\frac{1+y+y^{2}}{y}\right)=\frac{d}{d y}\left(\frac{1}{y}+1+y\right)=-\frac{1}{y^{2}}+0+1=1-\frac{1}{y^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #826 (ID: 475644)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log _{x} a[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\log a}{x(\log x)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\log a}{x(\log x)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]Y=\log _{x} a[/math]
 [math]=\log _{e} a x \log _{x} e[/math]
 [math]=\ln a \times \frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\ln a \times \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{\ln x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{(\ln x)^{2}} \times \frac{1}{x} \times \ln a[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #827 (ID: 475645)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x কে পরিবর্তনশীল ধরে [math]\left(x-\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+1}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+1}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log \left(x-\sqrt{x^{2}-1}\right)\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x-\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]\times\left(1-\frac{1}{\sqrt[2]{x^{2}-1}} \times 2 x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x-\sqrt{x^{2}-1}} \times \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}-x}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{x^{2}-1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #828 (ID: 475646)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}+2 a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}+a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}+2 a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}+a^{2}}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}, y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}+x[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\times 2 x=\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}+a^{2}+x^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x^{2}+a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #829 (ID: 475647)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left[\cot ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right]=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{2 x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cot ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right)=\frac{-1}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} \times e^{x}=-\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #830 (ID: 475648)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math] এবং [math]\cos x=\frac{1-t^{2}}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\text { Again, } \cos x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-t^{2}}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2 \tan ^{-1} t \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=y[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d x}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #831 (ID: 475649)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}, \sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
B. [math]2 \sin ^{-1} t[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 \mathrm{t}}{1+\mathrm{t}^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\tan y=\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \left(2 \tan ^{-1} t\right) \Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sin \left(2 \tan ^{-1} t\right) \Rightarrow x=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #832 (ID: 475650)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x\left(3-x^{2}\right)[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math] হলে x এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\pm 1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=3 x-x^{3} ; Y_{1}=3-3 x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3=3 x^{2} ; x^{2}=1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\pm 1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #833 (ID: 475651)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{2}+e^{\sin x}[/math] হলে [math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{0}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]4 x[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\cos x e^{\sin x}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=2 x^{2}+\left.e^{\sin x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{0}=4 x+e^{\sin x} \cdot \cos x=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #834 (ID: 475652)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর লঘুমান ও গুরুমান নিম্নের কোন সম্পর্কটিকে সিদ্ধ করে?

Options:
ক. লঘুমান=গুরুমান
খ. গুরুমান > লঘুমান
গ. গুরুমান<লঘুমান
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y_{1}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \\\Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \\\Rightarrow x=\pm 1\end{array}[/math]
 [math]x=-1[/math]
 হলে[math]y_{2}=\frac{2}{-1}=-20[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1-[/math]
 এ y এর লঘুমান বিদ্যমান [math]\therefore x=-1[/math]
 এ y এর গুরুমান বিদ্যমানy - এর লঘুমান [math]=1+\frac{1}{1}=2 \quad \therefore y[/math]
 এর গুরুমান [math]=-1+\frac{1}{-1}=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #835 (ID: 475653)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=1+\sqrt{\sin ^{2}(x)+1}[/math] ফাংশনের সর্বোচ্চ মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2.41[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=1+\sqrt{\operatorname{Sin}^{2}(x)+1} ; \operatorname{Sin}(x)[/math]
 এর সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]= 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=1+\sqrt{(1)^{2}+1}=1+\sqrt{2}=2.41[/math]


Explanation:

Question #836 (ID: 475654)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x(12-2 x)^{2}[/math] *এর বৃহত্তম মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]120[/math]
খ. [math]128[/math]
গ. [math]228[/math]
ঘ. [math]-128[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\Rightarrow f(x)=x(12-2 x)^{2}, f^{\prime}(x)=144-96 x+12 x^{2} \text { So, } 12 x^{2}-96 x+144=0[/math]
 [math]x^{2}-8 x+12=0 \Rightarrow x=6,2, f^{\prime}(x)=-96+24 x \text { for } x=2 ; f^{\prime \prime}(x)<0 \quad f(x)=128[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #837 (ID: 475655)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2014-2015, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]y = ax (1 - x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x অক্ষের সহিত [math]60°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=a x(1-x)=y=a x-a x^{2} ; y_{1}=a-2 a x[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \tan 60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3} ; \sqrt{3}=a(1-2 x)[/math]
 মূলবিন্দুতে [math]x=0 \therefore \sqrt{3}=a(1-0)=a \quad \therefore a=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #838 (ID: 475656)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]
D. \frac{6}{x^{2}}$


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x \therefore y_{1}=3 x^{2} \ln x+x^{2} ; y_{2}=6 x \ln x+3 x+2 x=6 x \ln x+5 x[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=6 \ln x+6+5=6 \ln x+11 ; y_{4}=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #840 (ID: 475658)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{4}[/math] কোনটি সত্য ?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{x}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x, y_{1}=2 x \log x+x, y_{2}=2 \log x+3, y_{3}=2 / x \quad y_{4}=-2 / x^{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #841 (ID: 475659)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=(2 x-1)^{3}[/math] হলে, [math]y_{3}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]24[/math]
খ. [math]42[/math]
গ. [math]48[/math]
ঘ. [math]18[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=(2 x-1)^{3} ; y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=3(2 x-1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\times 2=6(2 x-1)^{2}[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=12 \times 2(2 x-1)[/math]
 [math]=24(2 x-1) ;[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=24 \times 2=48[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #842 (ID: 475660)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=(2 x-5)^{3}[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]24[/math]
খ. [math]48[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. অনির্ণেয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=(2 x-5)^{3}, y_{1}=3 \cdot(2 x-5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2=6 \cdot(2 x-5)^{2},[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=6.2(2 x-5)[/math]
 [math]\cdot 2=24(2 x-5)[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=24(2 x-5)^{\circ} 2=48, y_{4}=0[/math]
 $$[math]\therefore y_{n}=\left\{\begin{array}{l}6 .(2 x-5)^{2} \text { if } n=1 \\24(2 x-5) \text { if } n=2 \\48 \text { if } n=3 \\0 \text { if } n>3\end{array}\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #843 (ID: 475661)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{3}-3 x+9[/math] এর গুরুমান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-11[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]7[/math]
ঘ. [math]11[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x+9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=3 x^{2}-3[/math]
লঘু গুরুমানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}-1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}= \pm 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=1,-1[/math]
আবার, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=6 x[/math]
 [math]x = -1[/math]
 হলে, [math]f"(x) = 6 <0,[/math]
 গুরুমান হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 গুরুমান [math]=(-1)^{3}[/math]
 [math]-3(-1)+9[/math]
 [math]=1+3+9=11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #844 (ID: 475662)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]15[/math]
ঘ. [math]-18[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]f(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0 \Rightarrow 4 e^{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}=\frac{9}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{x}=\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]\left[e^{x} 
eq \frac{-3}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime \prime}(\mathrm{x})=4 \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}+9 \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}} ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime \prime}(\mathrm{x})_{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \times \frac{3}{2}+9[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6+6=12>0[/math]
 [লঘু][math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=4 e^{x}+\frac{9}{e^{x}} ;=4[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{3}{2}+\frac{9}{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6+\frac{9}{3}[/math]
 [math]\times 2=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #845 (ID: 475663)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)

Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}[\sin (x+1)][/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}[\sin (x+1)][/math]
B. [math]\cos (x+1)[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\left.\cos ^{-1} 9 \cos (x+1)\right][/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}[\sin (x+1)]=x+1 ; y_{1}=\frac{d}{d x}(x+1)=1[/math]

Question #846 (ID: 475664)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left((-2)^{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { 2. }(-2)^{x}[/math]
B. [math]-2,(-2)^{x}[/math]
C. [math](-2)^{x}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{(-2)^{x}\right\}=(-2)^{x} \times \ln (-2)[/math]
 এখন [math]\ln (-2)=\text { math error } \therefore[/math]
 নির্ণয় অসম্ভব।

Explanation:

Question #847 (ID: 475665)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x-x \sin x}{x^{3}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x-\sin x}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{\sin x}{\cos x}-\sin x}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x\left(\frac{1}{\cos x}-1\right)}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x \times \frac{1-\cos x}{\cos x}}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{\cos x} \times \frac{2 \sin ^{2}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\times\left(\frac{1}{\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{2 \sin ^{2}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)}{4\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \times 1[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{1} \times 1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #848 (ID: 475666)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{3}+3 x^{2}-12 x+7[/math] বক্ররেখার মূল বিন্দুতে নতির পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]-6[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]
ঙ. [math]-8[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=2 x^{3}+3 x^{2}-12 x+7 ;[/math]
 [math]\quad y_{1}=6 x^{2}+6 x-12 ;[/math]
 [math]\quad y_{1(0,0)}=6.0+6.0-12=-12[/math]


Explanation:

Question #849 (ID: 475667)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=y^{\mathbf{y} \mathbf{y} ......\infty}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y(1-x \ln y)}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{1-y \ln (\ln x)}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{y(1+x \ln y)}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x=y^{y y} \Rightarrow x=y^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=x \ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=x \times \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}+\ln (y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}+\ln (y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y\left(\frac{1}{x}-\ln y\right)}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y(1-x \ln y)}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #850 (ID: 475668)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=e^{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math] হলে, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(0)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=e^{\tan ^{-1}(x)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\tan ^{-1} x} \times \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\tan ^{-1} x} \times \frac{1}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)^{2}}+e^{\tan ^{-1}}[/math]
 [math]\times(-1) \times \frac{1}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times 2 x=e^{\tan ^{-1} x}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)^{2}} \times(1-2 x)[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(0)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{1} \times 1=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:

 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=6 x-2[/math]
 [math]\therefore m=6 \times 1-2=4[/math]

Question #853 (ID: 475671)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\left(e^{x}\right)^{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\left(e^{x}\right)^{2} e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]2 x e^{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\left(e^{x}\right)^{x} \log x[/math]
D. [math]x^{2} \log x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\left(e^{x}\right)^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=x \ln e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=x[/math]
 [math]\cdot x=x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot y_{1}=2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}=2 x y=2 x[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(e^{x}\right)^{x}=2 x \cdot e^{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #854 (ID: 475672)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \ln x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \ln (x) ; y_{1}=2 x \ln (x)+x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \ln x+x=x(2 \ln x+1)[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=(2 \ln x+1)+x\left(\frac{2}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 \ln (x)+3 ;[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]
E. কোনটি নয়


Correct Answer: E.কোনটি নয়

Solution:
[math]x=0[/math]
 বসিয়ে [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=\sin y[/math]

Question #856 (ID: 475674)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বাস t সেকেন্ডে [math]3 t+\frac{1}{4} t^{2}[/math] মিটার দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে। 5 মিনিট পর তার বেগ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]50 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]
খ. [math]58 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]
গ. [math]63 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]70 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]
ঙ. [math]78 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]
undefined. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: .[math]\text { None }[/math]

Solution:
[math]S=3 t+\frac{1}{4} t^{2} ; V=\frac{d s}{d t}=3+\frac{2}{4} t=3+\frac{t}{2}[/math]
 [math]V_{5 \min =300 \mathrm{~s}}=3+\frac{300}{2}=153 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #857 (ID: 475675)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনের [math]n[/math] তম অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]n ![/math]
খ. [math](n+1) ![/math]
গ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n+1}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} 3 !}{x^{n}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n}}{x^{n+1}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x} ; y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(-1)^{n} 1 !}{x^{1+1}} ;[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=\frac{2 !}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(-1)^{2} 2 !}{(x)^{2+1}} ;[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=\frac{-3 !}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{(x)^{3+1}} ;[/math]
 [math]y_{4}=\frac{4 !}{x^{5}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(-1)^{4} 4 !}{(x)^{4+1}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{(x)^{n+1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #858 (ID: 475676)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x(1-x)[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তার স্থানাংক-

Options:
ক. [math](1,0)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{3}, \frac{1}{6}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{4}, \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x-x^{2}[/math]
 স্পর্শক [math]X[/math]
 অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হতে হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } y=x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-2 x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1=2 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(x, y)=\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #859 (ID: 475677)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{x}=\tan y[/math] হলে এর [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{2 x}}{1+e^{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]e^{x}=\tan y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} \cdot e^{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #860 (ID: 475678)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ell n \cot \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
C. [math]-x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \cot \tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \cot \cot ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{2}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]= \ln 2-\ln x . \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #861 (ID: 475679)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Mymensingh Board, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x^{2}} \cdot x=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #862 (ID: 475680)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
লিমিট [math]\frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{x},[/math] যখন [math]x \rightarrow 0[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. does not exist


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} x}{x}=1[/math] [সূত্রানুসারে]

Question #863 (ID: 475681)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-1+x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #864 (ID: 475682)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x} \quad\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1} \text { [L'hospital rule] } \\=\frac{1}{1+0}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #865 (ID: 475683)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর [math]n[/math] তম অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{n !}{x^{n+1}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n-1} n !}{x^{n-1}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n+1}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x} ; y_{n}=\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n+1}}[/math] সূত্রানুসারে

Explanation:

Question #866 (ID: 475684)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math] হলে [math]f^{\prime}(x)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-e^{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-e^{2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right) \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #867 (ID: 475685)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\log _{e}(1+x)}{x}\right\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]-e[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\log _{e}(1+x)}{x}\right\}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{\frac{1}{1+ x}}{1}\right\}=\frac{1}{1}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #868 (ID: 475686)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x[/math] এবং [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math] হলে x এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-\pi[/math]
গ. [math]\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=1+\cos x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=-1=\cos \pi[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\pi[/math]


Explanation:

Question #869 (ID: 475687)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\ln x}}[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \ln \sqrt{x}=\frac{d}{d x} \ln x^{1 / 2}=\frac{1}{2} \frac{d}{d x} \ln x=\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\frac{2 \tan \frac{x}{2}}{1-\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sec ^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]
C. [math]-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{2 \tan ^{\frac{x}{2}}}{1-\tan ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}=\tan x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\sec ^{2} x[/math]

Question #872 (ID: 475690)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\tan x+\cos x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d}{d x}\{f(x)+f(-x)\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 \cos x[/math]
B. [math]-2 \cos x[/math]
C. [math]-2 \sin x[/math]
D. [math]2 \sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\tan x+\cos x ; f(-x)[/math]
 [math]=-\tan x+\cos x ;[/math]
 [math]f(x)+f(-x)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \cos x ; \frac{d}{d x}\{f(x)+f(-x)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \sin x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #873 (ID: 475691)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\sin y[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=\sin y \Rightarrow y=\sin ^{-1} x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #874 (ID: 475692)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln \sec (b x+c)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\tan (b x+c)[/math]
B. [math]b \tan (b x+c)[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{ctan}(b x+c)[/math]
D. [math]b \operatorname{bec}(b x+c)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \sec (b x+c)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sec (b x+c)} \cdot \sec (b x+c) \tan (b x+c)[/math]
 [math]\cdot b=b \tan (b x+c)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #875 (ID: 475693)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{y-x}=x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x-1}{x}[/math]
খ. [math]e^{y-x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x+1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]e^{y-x}=x \Rightarrow e^{y}=x e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore e^{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=x e^{x}+e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=e^{x}(x+1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}(x+1)}{e^{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x+1}{e^{y-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x+1}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #876 (ID: 475694)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=a m^{3}[/math] এবং [math]x=a m^{2}+b[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3 m}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 \mathrm{~m}}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2}{3 \mathrm{~m}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\left(\frac{d y}{d m}\right)}{\left(\frac{d x}{d m}\right)}=\frac{3 a m^{2}}{2 a m}=\frac{3}{2} m[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #877 (ID: 475695)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x, f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math] হলে x এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]-\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=1+\cos x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=\cos 180^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=180^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #878 (ID: 475626)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \text { then find the valuc of } \frac{d y}{d x} \text {. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]
E. [math]\text {No correct answer}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text {No correct answer}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #879 (ID: 475627)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } x=\operatorname{acos}^{3} \theta \text { and } y=b \sin ^{3} \theta ;\text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{b}{a} \cot \theta[/math]
B. [math]\frac{a}{b} \tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]\frac{a}{b} \cot \theta[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{b}{a} \tan \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d x}{d \theta}=3 a \cos ^{2} \theta(-\sin \theta) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d \theta}=3 b \sin ^{2} \theta \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d \theta}}{\frac{d x}{d \theta}}=-\frac{b}{a} \tan \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #880 (ID: 475628)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { An object is thrown vertically upward from the ground with an initial velocity of } 80 \mathrm{ft} \mathrm{s}^{-1} \text {. Its heights }[/math] [math]\text { above the ground is parabola and is given by the equation: } \mathrm{s}=80 \mathrm{t}-16 \mathrm{t}^{2} \text {. How high does the object rise }[/math] [math]\text { above the ground? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]100 \mathrm{ft}[/math]
B. [math]120 \mathrm{ft}[/math]
C. [math]96 \mathrm{ft}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]V^{\prime}=\frac{d s}{d t}=80-32 t=0[\text { at maximum height }] \Rightarrow t=\frac{80}{32}[/math]
 [math]\therefore S=80 \cdot \frac{80}{32}-16 \cdot\left(\frac{80}{32}\right)^{2}=100 \mathrm{ft}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #881 (ID: 475629)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The value of } \lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{\cos \frac{\pi}{x}}{x-2} \text { is }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{\cos \frac{\pi}{x}}{x-2}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{-\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{x}\right)\left(\frac{-\pi}{x^{2}}\right)}{1}\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #882 (ID: 475630)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-7[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} x / 2}{4(x / 2)^{2}}=-\frac{1}{2} \lim \left(\frac{\sin x / 2}{x / 2}\right)^{2}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
অথবা, [math]\text { Calculator }[/math]
 এ [math]\text { Radian mode } \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 রাশিটির মান [math]0[/math]
-র খুব কাছাকাছি বসালেও [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 চলে আসে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #883 (ID: 475631)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{2}+3 x y+5 y^{2}=1[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান হবে -

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2 x-3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x-10 y}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+3 x y+5 y^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+3 y+3 x \frac{d y}{d x}+10 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #884 (ID: 475632)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{1}[/math]
 [হসপিটাল [math]\text { rule }]=0[/math]
বিকল্পঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x^{2}}{x}\left[\because \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \sin x\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #885 (ID: 475633)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004, 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\left(\frac{sin x}{x}\right)}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\cos x+\cos 2 x)=1+1=2[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #886 (ID: 475634)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \ln \frac{\sin x}{1-\cos x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]\cot x-\tan x+1[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{cosec} x[/math]
D. [math]-\operatorname{cosec} x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left[\ln \left(\frac{\sin x}{1-\cos x}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \ln \left[\frac{2 \sin \frac{x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left[\ln \left(\cot \frac{x}{2}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\frac{1 \cdot \frac{1}{2} \operatorname{cosec}^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{\cot \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos \frac{x}{2} \cdot \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=-\operatorname{cosec} x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #887 (ID: 475635)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The function } x^{3}-12 x+5 \text { has a stationary value when- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x=-2[/math]
B. [math]x=\sqrt{6}[/math]
C. [math]x=0[/math]
D. [math]x=4[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-12 x+5 ; f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-12=0 \Rightarrow x=\pm 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #888 (ID: 475625)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { A farmer has an adjustable clectric fence that is } 100 \mathrm{~m} \text { long. He uses this fence to enclose a rectangular }[/math] [math]\text { area on three sides as show in the figure given below. The fourth side is kept open. The maximum area }[/math] [math]\text { that he can enclose is- }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]1050 m^{2}[/math]
B. [math]1200 \mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math]
C. [math]1250 \mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of these }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]1=100=x+2 y[/math]
 [math]\therefore A=x y=(100-2 y)[/math]
 [math]y=100 y-2 y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \frac{d A}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=100-4 y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=25[/math]
 [math]\therefore A_{\max }[/math]
 [math]=100 \times 25-2 \times(25)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1250 \mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #889 (ID: 475556)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-(x-5)^{4}[/math] ফাংশনের গুরুমান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-5[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]625[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]
ঙ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
Hints:
[Image]
[math]f^{\prime \prime}\left(\mathrm{x}_{1} \text { or } \mathrm{x}_{2}\right)<0[/math]
 হলে গুরুমান পাওয়া যায়[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { Solve: } f(x)=-(x-5)^{4} \\f^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=-4(\mathrm{x}-5)^{3} \\f^{\prime \prime}(\mathrm{x})=-12(\mathrm{x}-5)^{2} \\\end{array}[/math]
গুরুমান [math]=-(5-5)^{4}=0[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow-4(x-5)^{3}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=5[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{X}=5[/math]
 এর জন্য গুরুমান বিদ্যমান

Explanation:
কোনো একটি ফাংশনকে একবার অন্তরীকরণ করলে নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দুতে ফাংশনটির ঢাল পাওয়া যায়। এই ঢাল = 0 লিখে f(x) কে solve করলে যে বিন্দুতে ঢাল শূন্য, তা পাওয়া যায়। গুরুমান ও লঘুমান সম্পন্ন বিন্দুগুলোতে অর্থাৎ চরমমান সম্বলিত বিন্দগুলোতে ঢাল 0 হয়। কিন্তু Exactly কোন বিন্দুতে গুরুমান কিংবা লঘুমান বিদ্যমান, তা একবার অন্তরীকরণ থেকে জানা যায় না।এজন্য ফাংশনটাকে আরেকবার অন্তরীকরণ (f" (x) ) করতে হয়। এরপর f" ( x ) এ f' ( x ) = (0) লিখে যে মান পাওয়া গিয়েছিল, সেগুলো বসিয়ে দেখতে হয় কোন মানের জন্য গুরুমান, আর কোন মানের জন্য লঘু বিদ্যমান। f(x) এ মান বসানোর পর প্রাপ্ত Value ধনাত্মক হলে ঐ মানের জন্য লঘুমান (সর্বনিম্ন মান ) বিদ্যমান; আর ঋণাত্মক হলে ঐ মানের জন্য গুরুমান (সর্বোচ্চ মান) বিদ্যমান। এরপর Finally f(x) এ f(x) থেকে প্রাপ্ত প্রয়োজনীয় মান বসালেই কাঙ্ক্ষিত গুরুমান বা লঘুমান পাওয়া যাবে। এক্ষেত্রে যেহেতু প্রশ্নে স্পষ্ট করে গুরুমান চাওয়া হয়েছে এবং f' (x) = 0 থেকে x এর একটি value পাওয়া গেছে, সেহেতু f(x) এ মান বসানোর দরকার নেই। x = 5 এর জন্যই এ ফাংশনের কাঙ্খিত গুরুমান বিদ্যমান।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #890 (ID: 475557)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Bangamata Sheikh Fojilatunnesa Mujib Science and Technology University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার [math]][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x}{2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right)\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #891 (ID: 475558)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Mymensingh Board, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x^{2}} \cdot x=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #892 (ID: 475559)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x^{2}} \cdot x=0[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin (2 x)^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 4 x^{2} \cdot 8 x}{1}=0[/math]

Question #893 (ID: 475560)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{49}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{49}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \sin 7 x}{6 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{49 \cos 7 x}{6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{49}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #894 (ID: 475561)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-1+x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #895 (ID: 475562)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x} \quad\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1} \text { [L'hospital rule] } \\=\frac{1}{1+0}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #896 (ID: 475563)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x}-1}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x}-1}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\sqrt{1+x}+1)}{1+x-1} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\sqrt{1+x}+1)=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #897 (ID: 475564)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x}{2 x}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Question #898 (ID: 475565)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math] - এর ক্ষুদ্রতম মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]e^{-2}[/math]
গ. [math]1 / e[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x}{\ln x} ; y_{1}=\frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow \ln x=1 \Rightarrow x=e[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=\frac{e}{\ln e}=e[/math]


Explanation:

Question #899 (ID: 475566)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{3}-3 x y+y^{3}=3[/math] বক্ররেখাটির [math](2, 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x^{3}-3 x y+y^{3}=3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-3 x y_{1}-3 y+3 y^{2} y_{1}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}=\frac{3 x^{2}-3 y}{3 x-3 y^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}-y}{x-y^{2}}[/math]
 [math](2,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2^{2}-1}{2-1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #900 (ID: 475567)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\sin \theta, y=\cos \theta[/math] হলে নিচের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\cot \theta[/math]
E. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: E.কোনটিই নয়

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d \theta}=-\sin \theta, \frac{d x}{d \theta}=\cos \theta \quad \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\tan \theta[/math]

Explanation:

Question #901 (ID: 475568)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গাড়ি [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ড সময়ে [math]3 t^{2}-5 t+2[/math] দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে। কখন তার বেগ শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]6 / 5 \mathrm{sec}[/math]
খ. [math]2 / 3 \mathrm{sec}[/math]
গ. [math]3 / 2 \mathrm{sec}[/math]
ঘ. [math]5 / 6 \mathrm{sec}[/math]
ঙ. [math]7 / 8 \mathrm{sec}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]s=3 t^{2}-5 t+2 \Rightarrow \frac{d s}{d t}=6 t-5 \Rightarrow 0=6 t-5 \Rightarrow t=\frac{5}{6} \mathrm{sec}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #902 (ID: 475569)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে [math]y_{98}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-99!}{x^{99}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-98 !}{x^{98}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{99!}{x^{98}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{98!}{x^{99}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x} ;[/math]
 [math]y_{1}=\frac{-1!}{x^{2}} ;[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=\frac{2 !}{x^{3}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n+1}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{98}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{98 !}{x^{99}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #904 (ID: 475571)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}+2[/math] হলে, [math]f^{-1}(3)[/math] এর মান -

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]
ঙ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f^{-1}(3)=m \Rightarrow f(m)=3 \Rightarrow m^{3}+2=3 \Rightarrow m=1[/math]

Question #905 (ID: 475572)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি , [math]y=A e^{k x}+B e^{-k x}[/math] হয়, তবে কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
ক. [math]y_{2}=k^{2} y[/math]
খ. [math]y_{2}=2 k y[/math]
গ. [math]y_{2}=k y_{1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]y_{2}-k^{2} y_{1}=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=A e^{k x}+B e^{-k x} ; y_{1}=A k e^{k x}-B k e^{-k x} ; y_{2}=A k^{2} e^{k x}+B k^{2} e^{-k x} \Rightarrow y_{2}=k^{2} y[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #907 (ID: 475574)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5+3 x-x^{2}[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{11}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{29}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{27}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=5+3 x-x^{2} ; f^{\prime}(x)=3-2 x=0 \Rightarrow x=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \max (f(x))=f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{29}{4}[/math]


Explanation:
