Question #908 (ID: 475575)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{e^{-x}}[/math] হলে [math]\operatorname{Lim}_{h \rightarrow 0}\left\{\frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}\right\}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{-x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{e^{x}}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{e^{-x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d(f(x)}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d\left(e^{-x}\right)^{-1}}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d e^{x}}{d x}=e^{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #909 (ID: 475576)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=p^{2}-2 p+1 ; x=3 p^{2}[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math] হলে [math]p[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d p}}{\frac{d x}{d p}}=\frac{2 p-2}{6 p}=0 \therefore 2 p-2=0 \Rightarrow p=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #910 (ID: 475577)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{n}=7[/math] এবং [math]m=5[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(x^{m}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]m x^{m-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x^{m+1}}{m+1}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d^{r} x^{r}}{d x^{n}}=n ! \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{7} x^{5}}{d x^{7}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d^{2}}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d^{5} x^{5}}{d x^{5}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d^{2} 5 !}{d x^{2}}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #911 (ID: 475578)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\frac{1}{p}[/math] এবং [math]y = log P[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-P[/math]
B. [math]P[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\mathbf{P}^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d p}}{\frac{d x}{d p}}=\frac{\frac{1}{p}}{\frac{1}{p^{2}}}=-p[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #912 (ID: 475579)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{m \tan x}-1}{m(\tan x+\sin x)}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]m[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{m \tan x}-1}{m(\tan x+\sin x)},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার ][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{m e^{m \tan x} \cdot \sec ^{2} x}{m\left(\sec ^{2} x+\cos x\right)}=\frac{m}{m(1+1)}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #913 (ID: 475580)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-e^{-2 x}}{\ln (1+x)^{,}},[0

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-e^{-2 x}}{\ln (1+x)}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 e^{-2 x}}{\frac{1}{1+x}}=\frac{2 e^{0}}{\frac{1}{1}}=\frac{2}{1}=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #914 (ID: 475581)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}\right)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{x^{2}+4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]
C. [math]1+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}\right) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]

B. [math]0[/math]

D. does not exist

Question #916 (ID: 475583)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2023-2024, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sec x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{4} \tan x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}y & =\sqrt{\sec x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec x}} \sec x \tan x \\& =\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sec x} \tan x=\frac{y}{2} \tan x\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #918 (ID: 475585)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 7 x-\sin x}{\sin 6 x}=[/math] ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{6}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{7}{6}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. $-1


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 7 x-\sin x}{\sin 6 x}[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \cos 7 x-\cos x}{6 \cos 6 x}=\frac{7-1}{6}=\frac{6}{6}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #919 (ID: 475586)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University of Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]a[/math]
B. [math]-a[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]loga[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x},[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]\text { L' Hospital's Rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই,[math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \log a-1}{1}=a^{0} \cdot \log a=\log a[/math]


Explanation:

Question #920 (ID: 475587)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+k x)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\log _{k} x[/math]
B. [math]\ln (k x)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\mathrm{k}+\mathrm{k})[/math]
D. [math]e^{\mathbf{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+k x)^{\frac{1}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{(1+k x)^{1 / x x}\right\}^{k}=e^{x}[/math]

Question #921 (ID: 475588)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1}\left(x^{2}\right)\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1}\left(x^{2}\right)\right)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\left(x^{2}\right)^{2}}} \times 2 x=\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #922 (ID: 475589)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\cot x a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
খ. [math]-\tan x a^{\ln (\cos x)} \ln a[/math]
গ. [math]\tan x a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cot x a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\cos x}[/math]
 [math](-\sin x) \cdot \ln a[/math]
 [math]=-a^{\ln (\cos x)} \cdot \tan x \cdot \ln a[/math]


Explanation:

Question #923 (ID: 475590)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{\operatorname{sinbx}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{b}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{b}{a}[/math]
C. [math]a b[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{\sin b x}=\frac{a}{b} \quad \text { [By Technique] }[/math]

Question #924 (ID: 475591)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow y} \frac{\sin x-\sin y}{x-y}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { secy }[/math]
B. [math]\sec ^{2} y[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{2} y[/math]
D. [math]\cos y[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow y} \frac{\sin x-\sin y}{x-y}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{(x-y) \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \cos \frac{x+y}{2} \sin \frac{x-y}{2}}{x-y}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{(x-y) \rightarrow 0} \cos \left(\frac{x+y}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\sin \frac{x-y}{2}}{\frac{x-y}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow y} \cos \frac{x+y}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\cos y[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #925 (ID: 475592)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=x^{2}+3 x+2[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{f(x)-f(4)}{x-4}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]11[/math]
D. [math]30[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]x-4=h, x \rightarrow 4\Rightarrow \mathrm{h} \rightarrow 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x=4+h[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{f(x)-f(4)}{x-4}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(4+h)-f(4)}{h} \\=\frac{d}{d x} f(x)=2 x+3\end{array}[/math]
যখন, [math]x=4, \frac{d}{d x} f(4)=2 \times 4+3=11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #926 (ID: 475593)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরজ কর: [math]\sin ^{2} x^{2}[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]2 x \sin 2 x^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]x \sin 2 x^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]x \sin x^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x \sin x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x^{2}\right)=2 \sin x^{2} \cos x^{2} \cdot 2 x \\\quad=4 x \sin x^{2} \cos x^{2}=2 x \sin 2 x^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #927 (ID: 475594)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=10 x-\frac{54}{(5 x+4)^{1 / 2}}[/math] হলে f'(1) এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]10[/math]
C. [math]15[/math]
D. [math]20[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=10 x-\frac{54}{(5 x+4)^{1 / 2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 [math]=10+\frac{54 \cdot\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) \cdot 5}{(5 \mathrm{x}+4)^{3 / 2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(1)[/math]
 [math]=10+\frac{54\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) 5}{(5+4)^{3 / 2}}[/math]
 [math]=10+\frac{27 \times 5}{9^{3 / 2}}[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #928 (ID: 475595)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x \sqrt{x+1}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 x+2}{2 \sqrt{x+1}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 x+2}{3 \sqrt{x+1}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 x+1}{2 \sqrt{x+1}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3 x+1}{3 \sqrt{x+1}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x \sqrt{x+1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\sqrt{x+1}+x \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x+1}}=\frac{2 x+2+x}{2 \sqrt{x+1}}=\frac{3 x+2}{2 \sqrt{x+1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #929 (ID: 475596)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{x^{3} \ln (x)\right\}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x+2 x \ln (x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+2 x \ln (x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{2}+2 x^{2} \ln (x)[/math]
D. [math]x^{2}+3 x^{2} \ln (x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{x^{3} \ln (x)\right\}=\frac{x^{3}}{x}+3 x^{2} \ln (x)=x^{2}+3 x^{2} \ln (x)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #930 (ID: 475597)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=x \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}+2 a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}+a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x^{2}+a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}+a^{2}}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}+\frac{x}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}} \times 2 x \\=\frac{x^{2}+a^{2}+x^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}=\frac{2 x^{2}+a^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #931 (ID: 475598)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x} \sin ^{-1} x\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}}{\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]e^{x} \sin ^{-1} x[/math]
C. [math]e^{x} \sin ^{-1} x-\frac{e^{x}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]e^{x} \sin ^{-1} x+\frac{e^{x}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x} \sin ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{e^{x}}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}+e^{x} \sin ^{-1} x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #932 (ID: 475599)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{(1+x)}{(1-x)}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-2}{(x-1)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1+x}{1-x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{(1-x) \cdot 1-(1+x) \cdot(-1)}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{1-\mathrm{x}+1+\mathrm{x}}{(1-\mathrm{x})^{2}} \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{2}{(1-\mathrm{x})^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #933 (ID: 475600)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2001-2002 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}(\sec x+\tan x)\right\}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\cos x}+\frac{\sin x}{\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+\sin x}{\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\cos \frac{x}{2}+\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\cos \frac{x}{2}-\sin \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+\tan \frac{x}{2}}{1-\tan \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #934 (ID: 475601)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]x^{p} y^{q}=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math] হয় তাহলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{p} y^{q}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p \ln x+q \ln y[/math]
 [math]=(p+q) \ln (x+y)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p}{x}+\frac{q}{y^{\prime}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{q}{y}-\frac{p+q}{x+y}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}-\frac{p}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x+q y-p x-q y}{y(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p x+q x-p x-p y}{x(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x-p y}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q x-p y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #935 (ID: 475602)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x \sqrt{1+y}+y \sqrt{1+x}=0[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{(1+x)^{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x \sqrt{1+y}+y \sqrt{1+x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \sqrt{1+y}[/math]
 [math]=-y \sqrt{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}(1+y)=y^{2}(1+x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x^{2}}{y^{2}}=\frac{1+x}{1+y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{y^{2}}{x^{2}}=\frac{1+y}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{y^{2}-x^{2}}{x^{2}}=\frac{y-x}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{y+x}{x^{2}}=\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+x=\frac{x^{2}}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x^{2}}{1+x}-x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{-x}{1+x}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{(1+x) \times 1-x \times 1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1+x-x}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #936 (ID: 475603)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh Military Academy, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d^{100}}{d x^{100}}\left(x^{99}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]99![/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]100![/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{100}}{\mathrm{dx}^{100}}\left(\mathrm{x}^{99}\right)=0 ; \mathrm{n}<\mathrm{m}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #938 (ID: 475605)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016, 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh Military Academy, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}(1-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{27}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{x}}{27}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{27}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{27}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}(1-x)=x^{2}-x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-3 x^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2-6 x[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন ও সর্বোচ্চ মানের জন্য, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x-3 x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(2-3 x)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0, \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2>0[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া পাবে,[math]x=3[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2-6 \cdot \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=2-4=-2<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান পাওয়া যাবে।সর্বোচ্চ মানটি, [math]|y|{x=\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{2}-\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{9}-\frac{8}{27}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{12-8}{27}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{27}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #939 (ID: 475606)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2006-2007, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]y_{3}[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x[/math]
খ. [math]9 x[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x+5[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x ; y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \log x+\frac{x^{2}}{x}=2 x \log x+x[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=2 x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=2+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #941 (ID: 475608)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh Military Academy
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=5 x^{4}-2 x^{3}+7 x^{2}-x+9[/math] হয়, তবে [math]y_{4}=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]60[/math]
গ. [math]120[/math]
ঘ. [math]240[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=5 x^{4}-2 x^{3}+7 x^{2}-x+9[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y_{1}=20 x^{3}-6 x^{2}+14 x-1 \\\Rightarrow y_{2}=60 x^{2}-12 x+14 \\\Rightarrow y_{3}=120 x-12 \therefore y_{4}=120\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #942 (ID: 475609)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-21 x^{2}+36 x[/math] এর গুরুমান ও লঘুমান যথাক্রমে নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]20[/math] ও [math]-128[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math] ও [math]-128[/math]
গ. [math]17[/math] ও [math]-108[/math]
ঘ. [math]-30[/math] ও [math]-128[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-21 x^{2}+36 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 x^{2}-42 x+36[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=12 x-42[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 x^{2}-42 x+36=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}-7 x+6=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-6 x-x-6=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(x-6)-1(x-6)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-1)(x-6)=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1,6[/math]
 [math]f'(1)12-42 0[/math]
 লঘুমানলঘুমান, [math]f(6)=2 \times 6^{3}-21[/math]
 [math]\times 6^{2}+36[/math]
 [math]\times 6=-108[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #943 (ID: 475610)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=-(x-5)^{4}[/math] ফাংশনের গুরুমান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-5[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=-(x-5)^{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=-4(x-5)^{3}=0 \Rightarrow x=5[/math]
আবার, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-12(x-5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]f^{i v}(x)=-24<0[/math]
 গুরুমান হবে যখন, [math]x=5[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 গুরুমান [math]=-(5-5)^{4}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #944 (ID: 475611)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos \theta}{1+\cos \theta}}[/math] এবং [math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\cos \theta}{1+\sin \theta}[/math] তা হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\pm 1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos \theta}{1+\cos \theta}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \cos^{2} \frac{\theta}{2} }}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(\tan \frac{\theta}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\cos \theta}{1+\cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\cos ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}-\sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}{\cos ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}+\sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}+2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\cos \frac{\theta}{2}-\sin \frac{\theta}{2}}{\cos \frac{\theta}{2}+\sin \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1-\tan \frac{\theta}{2}}{1+\tan \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-\frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}-x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #945 (ID: 475612)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{y_{1}}{y_{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\overline{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1-x^{2}}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{x}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\text { Blank }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { Blank }[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} x \Rightarrow y_{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{1-x^{2}} \times 0-1 \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \times(-2 x)}{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{\left(1-x^{2}\right)\left(\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\right)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{y_{1}}{y_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \times \frac{\left(1-x^{2}\right)\left(\sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}\right)}{x}=\frac{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}-\frac{x^{2}}{x}=\frac{1}{x}-x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #946 (ID: 475613)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]s=4 t-t^{2}+10[/math] হয় তবে [math]4[/math] সে. পরে ত্বরণ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-8 \mathrm{~m} / \sec ^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]8 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{sec}^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]2 \mathrm{~m} / \sec ^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 m / \sec ^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]s=4 t-t^{2}+10 \Rightarrow v=\frac{d s}{d t}=4-2 t \Rightarrow a=\frac{d v}{d t}=-2 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #947 (ID: 475614)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right) \tan x[/math] এর সীমাহ মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}+h \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right) \tan x=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0}(-h)(-\operatorname{coth})=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{h}{\tanh }=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #948 (ID: 475615)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-2 x+5=0[/math] এর ন্যূনতম মান-

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-2 x+5 \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=2 x-2 ; f^{\prime \prime}(x)=2>0 \Rightarrow[/math]
 > ন্যূনতম মান বিদ্যমান।[math]\therefore 2 x-2=0 \Rightarrow x=1 \Rightarrow f(1)=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #949 (ID: 475616)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \pi}\left(\frac{1+\cos x}{\sin x}\right)[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{1+\cos x}{\sin x}=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{2 \sin \frac{\pi}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \pi} \cot \frac{\pi}{2}=\cot \frac{\pi}{2}=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #950 (ID: 475617)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \infty}(\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x}}-\sqrt{x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]e[/math]
D. [math]0.5[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{x+\sqrt{x}}-\sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x\left(1+\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}\right)}-\sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x}\left(1+\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}-\sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x}\left(1+\frac{1}{2} \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}+\cdots\right)-\sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { [higher terms are zero, as } x[/math]
 [math]\rightarrow \infty \text { ] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #951 (ID: 475618)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left[\tan ^{-1}(\cot x)+\cot ^{-1}(\tan x)\right]=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]
E. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\tan ^{-1}(\cot x)+\cot ^{-1}(\tan x)=\tan ^{-1}\left\{\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)\right\}+\cot ^{-1}\left\{\cot \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{I}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\pi-2 x)=-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x-\sin x}{x^{3}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

[math]\text { Perlorming La Hospital three times. }[/math]

Question #953 (ID: 475620)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\sin y=x \sin (a+y)[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\tan a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sin a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\cos a}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sec a}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\cos y}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-\sin (a+y)}{x \cos (a+y)-\cos y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{-\sin (a+y)}{\frac{\sin y}{\sin (a+y)} \cdot \cos (a+y)-\cos y}=\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sin (a+y) \cos y-\sin y \cos (a+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sin a}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #954 (ID: 475621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর যে মানের জন্য [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\operatorname{asin} x-3 x}{5 x}[/math] এর মান 0 হবে তা হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]
E. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x-3 x}{5 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \cos x-3}{5} ;\left[\text { L'A }^{\prime} \text { haspital rule }\right] \frac{\operatorname{acos} 0-3}{5}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=3[/math]


Explanation:

Question #955 (ID: 475622)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Which of the following statements is/are correct? }[/math] [math]\text { (i) The number } L \text { is the limit of } f(x) \text { as } x \rightarrow a \text { if, given any }[/math] [math]\in>0,[/math] [math]\text { there exists a value of } x \text { for which }[/math] [math]|f(x)-L|0[/math] [math]\text { there exists a corresponding }[/math] [math]\text { number } \delta>0 \text { such that for all } x \text {, if } 0<|x-a|<\delta \text {, then }|f(x)-L|<\in \text {. }[/math] [math]\text { (iii) The number } L \text { is the limit of } f(x) \text { as } x \rightarrow a \text {, if } f(x) \text { gets closer to } L \text { as } x \text { approaches a. }[/math] [math]\text { (iv) The number } L \text { is the limit of } f(x) \text { as } x \rightarrow a \text {, if the values of } f(x) \text { can be made as close as we like to } L \text { by }[/math] [math]\text { making } \mathrm{x} \text { sufficiently close to a (but not equal to a). }[/math]

Options:
A. ii
B. iii
C. ii,iv
D. All are corrent


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
All are corrent

Explanation:

Question #956 (ID: 475623)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The value of } \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\sqrt{x^{2}+1}-x\right) \text { is }-[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]-\infty[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\sqrt{x^{2}+1}-x\right)=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\left(\sqrt{x^{2}+1}+x\right)\left(\sqrt{x^{2}+1}-x\right)}{\sqrt{x^{2}+1}+x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+1-x^{2}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+1}+x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+1}+x}=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #957 (ID: 475624)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { In a dc circuit consisting of two resistors in series, the power } P \text { delivered to resistor } R_{2} \text { is }=\frac{v^{2} R_{2}}{\left(R_{1}+R_{2}\right)^{2}} \text {. }[/math] [math]\text { If } \mathrm{V} \text { and } \mathrm{R}_{1} \text { are constants, what is the value of } \mathrm{R}_{2} \text { that produces a maximum power in this resistor? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{R}_{2}=\mathrm{R}_{1}[/math]
B. [math]R_{2}=-R_{1}[/math]
C. [math]R_{2}^{\prime}=2 R_{1}[/math]
D. [math]R_{2}=2 R_{1}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d P}{d R_{2}}=\frac{\left(R_{1}+R_{2}\right)^{2} \cdot V^{2}-V^{2} R_{2} \cdot 2\left(R_{1}+R_{2}\right)}{\left(R_{1}+R_{2}\right)^{4}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(R_{1}+R_{2}\right)^{2}-2 R_{2}\left(R_{1}+R_{2}\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow R_{1}^{2}+2 R_{1} R_{2}+R_{2}^{2}-2 R_{1} R_{2}-2 R_{2}^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow R_{1}^{2}=R_{2}^{2} \Rightarrow R_{2}=R_{1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #958 (ID: 475518)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1+y^{2}[/math]
B. [math]1-y^{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 y\left(1-y^{2}\right)[/math]
D. [math]2 y\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sec x \cdot \sec x \tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sec ^{2} x \tan x[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan x\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 y\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #959 (ID: 475519)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\ln (x y)=x^{2}+y^{2}[/math] এর অন্তরীকরণে কী পাওয়া যায়?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x}{y}\left(\frac{1+2 x^{2}}{1-2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{y}{x}\left(\frac{2 x^{2}-1}{1-2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{y}{x}\left(\frac{1+2 x^{2}}{1+2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\ln (x y)=x^{2}+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x y}[/math]
 [math]\left(y+x \frac{d y}{d x}\right)=2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{y}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{1}{y}-2 y\right) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 x-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x-\frac{1}{x}}{\frac{1}{y}-2 y}=\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(\frac{2 x^{2}-1}{1-2 y^{2}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #960 (ID: 475520)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\sin y=x \sin (a+y)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\tan a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sin a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin 2(a+y)}{\cos a}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sec a}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=\frac{\sin y}{\sin (a+y)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin (a+y-a)}{\sin (a+y)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin (a+y) \cos a-\cos (a+y) \sin a}{\sin (a+y)}[/math]
 [math]=\cos a-\cot (a+y) \sin a[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{cose}(a+y) \sin a=\frac{\sin a}{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin ^{2}(a+y)}{\sin a}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #961 (ID: 475521)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3 x^{-4}[/math]
B. [math]3 x^{4}[/math]
C. [math]-6 x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]6 x^{-4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x} \Rightarrow y=x-\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\frac{2}{x^{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=\frac{6}{x^{4}}=6 x^{-4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #962 (ID: 475522)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3 x^{-4}[/math]
B. [math]3 x^{4}[/math]
C. [math]-6 x^{4}[/math]
D. [math]6 x^{-4}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x^{2}-1}{x} \Rightarrow y=x-\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\frac{2}{x^{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=\frac{6}{x^{4}}=6 x^{-4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #963 (ID: 475523)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{y_{1}}{y_{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-x^{2}}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}^{2}\left(1-x^{2}\right)=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right) 2 y_{1} y_{2}+y_{1}^{2}(-2 x)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right) y_{2}=x y_{1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{y_{1}}{y_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-x^{2}}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

ক. [math]14[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]

Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\therefore(5,4)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে বক্ররেখার ঢাল [math]=3.5^{2}-14.5+5=10[/math]

Question #965 (ID: 475525)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখাটির [math](2,2 \sqrt{2})[/math] বিন্দুতে tangent এর ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=4 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{4}{2 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(2,2 \sqrt{2})[/math]
 বিন্দুতে tangent-এর ঢাল = [math]=\frac{4}{2 \times 2 \sqrt{2}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #966 (ID: 475526)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-6 x^{2}+12 x-9[/math] বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]X[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math](0, 0)[/math]
খ. [math](2, 2)[/math]
গ. [math](2,-1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](3,0)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-6 x^{2}+12 x-9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-12 x+12=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 x+4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2,2[/math]
 [math]y=2^{3}-6 \times 4+24-9[/math]
 [math]=8-24+24-9=-1[/math]
বিন্দুটি [math](2,-1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #967 (ID: 475527)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]y = x Inx[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]Xx[/math] অক্ষের সমান্তরাল সে বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক?

ঘ. [math]\left(e, \frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]

================================================================================
Question #968 (ID: 475528)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{3}+y^{3}=3 x y[/math] এর কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক -অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2^{\frac{2}{3}}, 2^{\frac{1}{3}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(2^{-\frac{1}{3}}, 2^{\frac{2}{3}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(2^{\frac{1}{3}}, 2^{\frac{2}{3}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{26}, \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{3}+y^{3}=3 x y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}+3 y^{2} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 y+3 x \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(y^{2}-x\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=y-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-x^{2}}{y^{2}-x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শক [math]x-[/math]
 অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{y-x^{2}}{y^{2}-x}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=y[/math]
মূল সমীকরণে [math]x² = y[/math]
 বসিয়ে পাই,[math]x^{3}+x^{6}=3 x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x^{3}=x^{6}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}\left(x^{2}-2\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}=2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2^{\frac{1}{3}},[/math]
 [math]y=2^{\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু = [math]=\left(2^{\frac{1}{3}}, 2^{\frac{2}{3}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]x = 2[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠমান থাকলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর মান -

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]>2[/math]
গ. [math]<0[/math]
ঘ. [math]>1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x = 2[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)[/math]
 গরিষ্ঠমান থাকে যখন [math]f(x) = 0[/math]
 হয়।

Question #970 (ID: 475530)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+4[/math] ফাংশনটি কোন ব্যবধিতে বৃদ্ধি পায়?

Options:
ক. [math]-1 \leq x<1[/math]
খ. [math]-\infty
গ. [math]1
ঘ. [math]-1 \leq x<2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+4 \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=3 x-6[/math]
হ্রাস বৃদ্ধির জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow 3 x-6=0 \Rightarrow x=2[/math]
 বিন্দুতে বৃদ্ধি হবেএখান, [math]1 [math]\therefore[/math]
 এই ব্যবধিতে বৃদ্ধি হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #971 (ID: 475531)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+4[/math] এর সন্ধি বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-1, 1)[/math]
খ. [math](1,-1)[/math]
গ. [math](-1,-1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,1)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 x-6=0 \therefore x=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=f(x)=3-6+4=1 \therefore[/math]
 সন্ধি বিন্দু [math](1,1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #972 (ID: 475532)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]100 m²[/math] ক্ষেত্রফলের একটি বর্গকে রোল করে একটি সিলিন্ডার বানানো হলো, সিলিন্ডারের আয়তন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{250}{\pi}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{250}{\pi^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{250}{2 \pi}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{250}{2 \pi^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
মনে করি, বর্গের বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য [math]= x m[/math]
তাহলে, [math]\mathrm{x}^{2}=100 \mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=10 \mathrm{~m} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সিলিন্ডার উচ্চতা, [math]x = 10m[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]2 \pi \mathrm{rx}=100[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \pi \mathrm{r} \times 10=100[/math]
 [math]\therefore r=\frac{5}{\pi}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সিলিন্ডারের আয়তন [math]=\pi r^{2} x=\pi \frac{25}{\pi^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times 10[/math]
 [math]=\frac{250}{\pi}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #973 (ID: 475533)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{3} x[/math] হলে [math]y_{n}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left[3 \sin (n \pi / 2+x)-3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)\right][/math]
খ. [math]\sin (n \pi / 2+x)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos (\pi / 2+x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)[/math]
ঙ. [math]3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)+\cos n x[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)+\cos n x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{3} x=\frac{1}{4}(3 \sin x-\sin 3 x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}(3 \cos x-3 \cos 3 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left\{3 \sin \left(x+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)-3^{1} \sin \left(3 x+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left\{3 \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)-3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #974 (ID: 475534)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] -এর গুরু মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x} ; \frac{d f(x)}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \Rightarrow x=\pm 1[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} f(x)}{d x^{2}}=\frac{2}{x^{3}} \therefore x=-1[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})}{\mathrm{d} \mathrm{x}^{2}}<0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর গুরুমান [math]=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #975 (ID: 475535)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
গড় মান উপপাদ্য অনুসারে, [math][1, 2][/math] ব্যবধিতে ফাংশন [math]f(x) = x(x - 2)[/math] এর জন্য নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দুটি হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]x=\frac{4}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]x=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]x=\frac{7}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x=\frac{6}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
গড় মান উপপাদ্য হতে পাই, [math]\frac{f(b)-f(a)}{b-a}=f^{\prime}(c)[/math]
এখানে, [math]a=1, b=2[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}f(x)=x(x-2) \\f(b)=f(2)=0, f(a)=f(1)=-1\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{0-(-1)}{2-1}=\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{c}) \\\because \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\mathrm{x}^{2}-2 \mathrm{x} \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=2 \mathrm{x}-2 \\\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{c})=2 \mathrm{c}-2 \Rightarrow 1=2 \mathrm{c}-2 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{c}=\frac{3}{2} \therefore 1<\frac{3}{2}<2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #976 (ID: 475536)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{2}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math] সেই বিন্দুতে উহার ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]-8[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{2}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]=\frac{2}{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}=-8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #977 (ID: 475537)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{p} y^{q}=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math] তাহলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{p} y^{q}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p x^{p-1} y^{q}+q y^{q-1} \frac{d y}{d x} \cdot x^{p}[/math]
 [math]=(x+y)^{p+q-1} \cdot(p+q)[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(1+\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p \cdot \frac{x^{p} y^{q}}{x}+q \cdot \frac{y^{q} x^{p}}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=(p+q) \frac{(x+y)^{p+q}}{x+y}+(p+q)[/math]
 [math]\frac{(x+y)^{p+q}}{x+y}\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p}{x}+\frac{q}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}+\frac{p+q}{x+y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{q}{y}-\frac{p+q}{x+y}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{p+q}{x+y}-\frac{p}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{q x-p y}{y(x+y)} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{q x-p y}{x(x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #978 (ID: 475538)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি সংখ্যার যোগফল [math]7[/math] হলে, সংখ্যা দুটির গুণফলের সর্বোচ্চ মান হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]10[/math]
গ. [math]12[/math]
ঘ. [math]\infty[/math]
ঙ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: E.কোনটিই নয়

Solution:
সংখ্যাদ্বয় [math]x[/math]
 ও [math]( 7 − x )[/math]
 হলে, -গুনফল [math]P=x(7-x)=7 x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{7}{2}\right)^{2}-\left(\frac{7}{2}\right)^{2}+2 \cdot x \cdot \frac{7}{2}-(x)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{19}{4}-\left(x-\frac{7}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore P \leq \frac{49}{4}[/math]
 যেহেতু [math]\left(x-\frac{7}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]0[/math]
।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]\frac{49}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #979 (ID: 475539)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt[n]{x}}\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হয় ,তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{\frac{1}{n x}} \log _{e} x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{n x}\left(\log _{e} x-1\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{n x}\left(\log _{e} x-2\right)[/math]
D. [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{\frac{1}{n x}}\left[\frac{1}{n}\left(\frac{\log _{e} x-1}{x^{2}}\right)\right][/math]
E. [math]\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{\frac{1}{n x}}\left[\frac{1}{n}\left(\frac{\left(\log _{0} x-3\right)}{x^{2}}\right)\right][/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt[n]{x}}\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=-\frac{1}{n x} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{n}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{1}{x^{2}}-\frac{\ln x}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{\frac{1}{n x}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{1}{n}\left(\frac{\ln x-1}{x^{2}}\right)\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #980 (ID: 475540)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\log _{c}\left(e^{x} \cos x\right)}{x \sin x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{7}[/math]
E. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\log _{e}\left(e^{x} \cos x\right)}{x \sin x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-x-\log _{e}(\cos x)}{x \sin x}[/math]
 [math]\text { Using L'Hospital's law, } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1+\tan x}{\sin x+x \cos x} ;\left[\frac{0}{0}\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x+\sec ^{2} x}{\cos x+\cos x-x \sin x}=\frac{1}{1+1}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #981 (ID: 475541)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় করঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{49}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{49}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকৃতি ] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \sin 7 x}{6 x}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকৃতি ] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{49 \cos 7 x}{6}=\frac{49}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #982 (ID: 475542)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x y+x^{2} y^{2}=C[/math] সমীকরণটির [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x y+x^{2} y^{2}=C[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \frac{d y}{d x}+y+2 x y^{2}+2 x^{2} y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(x+2 x^{2} y\right) \frac{d y}{d x}+y+2 x y^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{y(1+2 x y)}{x(1+2 x y)}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #983 (ID: 475543)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2006-2007, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{2} \log x[/math] হয় তবে, [math]y_{3}[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x[/math]
খ. [math]9 x[/math]
গ. [math]2 x+3[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x+5[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \log x ; y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=2 x \log x+\frac{x^{2}}{x}=2 x \log x+x[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=2 x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=2+2 \log x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #984 (ID: 475544)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x^{2}+x-3}{3 x^{2}-4 x+1}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]-3[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
E. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x^{2}+x-3}{3 x^{2}-4 x+1}=\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}} \frac{2+\frac{1}{x} \frac{3^{}}{x^{2}}}{3 \frac{4}{x}+\frac{1}{x^{2}}}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #985 (ID: 475545)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x} \text { limit }[/math]
 বসালে [math]\div[/math]
 আসে ,তাই [math]\text { L' Hospital's Rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{x}{2}} \frac{0-\cos x}{-\sin x}=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #986 (ID: 475546)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{x^{3} \ln (x)\right\}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x+2 x \ln (x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+2 x \ln (x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{3}+2 x^{2} \ln (x)[/math]
D. [math]x^{2}+3 x^{2} \ln (x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{x^{3} \ln (x)\right\}=x^{3} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+(\ln x) \cdot 3 x^{2}=x^{2}+3 x^{2} \ln (x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #987 (ID: 475547)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 4 x}{7 x}[/math] এর মান হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{4}[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]
E. [math]\frac{4}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{4}{7}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 4 x}{7 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 4 x}{7(4 x)} . \quad(4)=\frac{4}{7}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #988 (ID: 475548)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{\sin b x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a}{b}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{b}{a}[/math]
C. [math]ab[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{\sin b x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{\sin a x}{a x} \cdot a x}{\frac{\sin b x}{b x} \cdot b x}=\frac{a}{b}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #989 (ID: 475549)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right)}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right)}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
 এখন , [math]-1 \leq \sin x \leq 1[/math]
 এবং [math]-1 \leq \cos x \leq 1 \therefore-1 \leq \cos ^{3} x \leq 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore-2 \leq \sin x+\cos ^{3} x \leq 2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 x^{2} \leq x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right) \leq 2 x^{2}[x \rightarrow-\infty[/math]
 হলে [math]\left.\mathrm{x}^{2}>0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math]\leq \frac{x^{2}\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right)}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)} \leq \frac{2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math][x \rightarrow-\infty[/math]
 হলে [math]\left.\left(x^{2}+1\right)>0\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]\geq \frac{x^{2}\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right)}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)} \geq \frac{2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math][x \rightarrow-\infty[/math]
 হলে [math](x-3)<0][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]\leq \frac{x^{2}\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right)}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)} \leq \frac{-2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
এখন, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{-2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{-2}{\left(1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) \times\left(1-\frac{3}{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
এবং, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{-2 x^{2}}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{-2}{\left(1+\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right) \times\left(1-\frac{3}{x}\right)}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Sandwich Theorem }[/math]
 অনুযায়ী বলা যায়, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(\sin x+\cos ^{3} x\right)}{\left(x^{2}+1\right)(x-3)}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #990 (ID: 475550)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\frac{1}{1+2 x}\right\}[/math] হলে মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{(1+2 x)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2}{(1+2 x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{(1+2 x)^{4}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2}{(1+2 x)^{-2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\frac{1}{1+2 x}\right\}=(-1) \frac{2}{(1+2 x)^{2}}=\frac{-2}{(1+2 x)^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #991 (ID: 475551)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{\sqrt{x}}}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ [math]\text { (derivative) }[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}{4 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}{4 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{4 \sqrt{x} \sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]
E. [math]B,D[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]B,D[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot e^{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}{4 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{4 \sqrt{x} \sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)[/math]একটি ফাংশন। যদি [math]x = c[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f^{\prime}(c)=0[/math] এবং [math]f^{\prime \prime}(c)>0[/math] হয় তবে নিচের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
ক. ফাংশনটির আপেক্ষিক লঘুমান আছে
খ. ফাংশনটির আপেক্ষিক গুরুমান আছে
গ. ফাংশনটির নিশ্চল বিন্দু আছে
ঘ. ফাংশনটির আনতি বিন্দু আছে


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

Question #993 (ID: 475553)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-21 x^{2}+36 x[/math], এর গুরুমান ও লঘুমান যথাক্রমে নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]20[/math] ও [math]-128[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math] ও [math]128[/math]
গ. [math]17[/math] ও [math]-108[/math]
ঘ. [math]-30[/math] ও [math]-128[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-21 x^{2}+36 x \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=6 x^{2}-42 x+36[/math]
 [math]\therefore f^{\prime \prime}(x)=12 x-42[/math]
গুরুমানের বা লঘুমানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore 6 x^{2}-42 x+36[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
সুতরাং [math]x=6[/math]
 অথবা, [math]x=1[/math]
 এখন , [math]f^{\prime \prime}(6)=30>0[/math]
 এবং [math]f^{\prime \prime}(1)=-30<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(1)=17[/math]
 যা গুরুমান এবং [math]f(6) = 108[/math]
 যা লঘুমান।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #994 (ID: 475554)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গাড়ি স্থিথাবস্থা হতে সমত্বরণে চলা শুরু করে [math]5[/math] সেকেণ্ডে [math]180[/math] মিটার/সেকেন্ড গতিবেগ প্রাপ্ত হল। গাড়িটির ত্বরণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]32 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]36 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]30 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]45 \mathrm{~m} / \mathrm{s}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]V=V_{o}+a t \Rightarrow 180=0+a \times 5 \therefore a=36 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}[/math]

Explanation:
