Question #1089 (ID: 475345)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0 \frac{y}{z}} \cdot \sin z=y \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z} \\=y \cdot 1=y .\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1090 (ID: 475346)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-1+x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1091 (ID: 475347)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5 \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]4 \mathrm{a}[/math]
C. [math]3 a^{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{(\sqrt{x})^{5}-(\sqrt{a})^{5}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\=5(\sqrt{a})^{5-1}=5(\sqrt{a})^{4}=5 a^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1092 (ID: 475348)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x} \quad\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1} \text { [L'hospital rule] } \\=\frac{1}{1+0}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1093 (ID: 475349)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{\circ}}{x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{\circ}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}}{x} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}}{\frac{\pi x}{180}}\right) \frac{\pi}{180}=\frac{\pi}{180}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=\frac{-2^{2}+3^{2}}{2}=\frac{5}{2}[\text { technique }][/math]

Question #1095 (ID: 475351)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{5}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-x-1}{x(\sqrt{1-x}+1)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x}+1}=\frac{-1}{1+1}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1096 (ID: 475352)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{b x+c}{x}}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]ac[/math]
B. [math]bc[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ac}}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{0 x+c}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{b+\frac{c}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{b}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left\{(1+a x)^{\frac{1}{a x}}\right\}^{a c}=1[/math]
 [math]\times e^{a c}=e^{a c}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1097 (ID: 475353)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{x^{2}-16}{x-4}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]9[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]16[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{x^{2}-16}{x-4}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{(x-4)(x+4)}{(x-4)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 4}(x+4)[/math]
 [math]\quad=4+4=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1098 (ID: 475354)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2 x}{x-\sin x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2 x}{x-\sin x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}-2}{1-\cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
] আকার [math]\text { [By L Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{\sin x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{\cos x}=\frac{1+1}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1099 (ID: 475355)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{x+3}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
B. [math]e[/math]
C. [math]e^{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}[/math]
 [math]\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{x+3}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}[/math]
 [math]\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{3}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=1 \cdot e=e[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1100 (ID: 475356)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{y \rightarrow 0}(1+x y)^{\frac{1}{y}}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]e^{-x}[/math]
C. [math]e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]Inx[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{y \rightarrow 0}(1+x y)^{\frac{1}{y}}=\lim _{y \rightarrow 0}\left\{(1+x y)^{\left.\frac{1}{x y}\right\}}\right\}^{x}=e^{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1101 (ID: 475357)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x \sin \left(\frac{3}{x}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x \sin \left(\frac{3}{x}\right)=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sin \left(\frac{3}{x}\right)}{\left(\frac{3}{x}\right)} \times 3=1 \times 3=3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1102 (ID: 475358)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{2 x-1}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{2 x-1}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{x\left(2-\frac{1}{x}\right)} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{2-\frac{1}{x}}=\frac{1}{2-\frac{1}{\infty}}=\frac{1}{2-0}=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1104 (ID: 475360)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{3^{x}-3^{-x}}{3^{x}+3^{-x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]9[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{3^{x}-3^{-x}}{3^{x}+3^{-x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{3^{x}-\frac{1}{3^{x}}}{3^{x}+\frac{1}{3^{x}}}=\frac{3^{0}-\frac{1}{3^{0}}}{3^{0}+\frac{1}{3^{0}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-1}{1+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0}{2}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1105 (ID: 475361)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{n x-b}\right)=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{n x}}{a}[/math]
B. [math]e^{a x-b}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{a x-b}}{b}[/math]
D. [math]a e^{a x-b}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{a x-b}\right)=e^{a x-b} \frac{d}{d x}(a x-b)=e^{a x-b} a=a e^{a x-b}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1106 (ID: 475362)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1+3 x)[/math] হলে, [math]f^{\prime}(0)=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln (1+3 x) \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{1+3 x} \cdot 3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{3}{1+3 x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(0)=\frac{3}{1+3(0)}=\frac{3}{1}=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1107 (ID: 475363)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{y}[/math]
B. [math]e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\ln x \Rightarrow x=e^{y} \therefore \frac{d x}{d y}=e^{y}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1108 (ID: 475364)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
B. $0
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{(\sin x+\cos x)^{2}}}=1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]

Question #1109 (ID: 475365)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n} \text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
B. [math]\left(-\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
C. [math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]
D. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{n x^{n-1}}{n y^{n-1}}=-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1110 (ID: 475366)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x(\ln y-x)}{y(\ln x-y)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-x)}{x(y \ln x-y)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \ln x=x \ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\ln y+x \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\ln x-\frac{x}{y}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln y-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x} \cdot \frac{(x \ln y-y)}{(y \ln x-x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1111 (ID: 475367)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]x^{3} y_{2}-2 x y[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y=\ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y_{1}+y=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{1}+x y=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+2 x y_{1}+x y_{1}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+3 x y_{1}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+3 x^{2} y_{1}+x y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+3(-x y+1)+x y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]-3 x y+3+x y=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]-2 x y=-3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1112 (ID: 475368)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ফাংশনটির জন্য [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right) \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-x \frac{d y}{d x}=2[/math] সত্য?

Options:
A. [math]y=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]y=\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
C. [math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]y=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 \cos ^{-1} x \cdot\left(-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)^{2}\left(1-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=4\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right)\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)^{2}=4 y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right) 2 \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-2 x[/math]
 [math]\times\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=4 \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(1-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-x \frac{d y}{d x}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1113 (ID: 475369)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{n}[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n+1}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\text { n! }[/math]
B. [math](n+1) ![/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math](n-1) ![/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{n} \Rightarrow y_{n}=n ! \Rightarrow y_{n+1}=0[/math]

Explanation:

Solution:

Question #1115 (ID: 475371)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}\\=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2 \frac{x}{2}}}}\\=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)\\=\frac{x}{2}\\ \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1116 (ID: 475372)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln 3 x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3 x}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln 3 x)=\frac{1}{3 x} \frac{d}{d x}(3 x)=\frac{1}{3 x} \cdot 3=\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1117 (ID: 475373)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\log _{\operatorname{enn} x} \sin ^{2} x[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math](\sin x)^{\sin 2 x-1}[/math]
C. [math]2(\sin x)^{\cos ^{2} x-1}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\log _{\sin x^{2}}^{\sin ^{2} x}=2 \log _{\sin x} x^{\sin x}=2 \times 1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\log _{\sin x^{2}} \sin ^{2} \mathrm{x}\right)=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(2)=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1118 (ID: 475374)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt[3]{5 x^{2}-4}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{3 \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)}}+c[/math]
B. [math]\frac{10 x}{3 \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{10 x}{\sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}}+c[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt[3]{5 x^{2}-4}\right)=\frac{10 x}{3 \sqrt[3]{\left(5 x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1119 (ID: 475375)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln \cos x^{\circ}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\tan x^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]-\tan x^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{180} \tan x^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{\pi}{180} \tan x^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \cos x^{\circ} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\cos x^{\circ}}\left(-\sin x^{\circ}\right) \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\tan x^{\circ} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi x}{180^{\circ}}\right)=-\frac{\pi}{180} \tan x^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1120 (ID: 475376)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\operatorname{asec}^{2} \theta[/math] এবং [math]y=\operatorname{atan}^{3} \theta[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{5} \sec \theta[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} \tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan \theta[/math]
D. [math]4 \cos \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}}{\frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}}=\frac{3 \mathrm{a} \tan ^{2} \theta \sec ^{2} \theta}{2 \mathrm{a} \sec ^{2} \theta \tan \theta}=\frac{3}{2} \tan \theta[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1121 (ID: 475377)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sin ^{2} x}{1+\cos x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos x[/math]
B. [math]-\sin x[/math]
C. [math]\sin x[/math]
D. [math]-\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\sin ^{2} x}{1+\cos x}=\frac{1-\cos ^{2} x}{1+\cos x}=1-\cos x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(1-\cos x)=\sin x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1122 (ID: 475378)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]e^{x y}-4 x y=2[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]e^{x y}-4 x y=2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{x y}\left(y+x \frac{d y}{d x}\right)-4[/math]
 [math]\left(y+x \frac{d y}{d x}\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(e^{x y}-4\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(y+x \frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y+x \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1123 (ID: 475379)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{1+\log x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{1+\log x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} e^{1+\log x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{e x}(1+\log x)[/math]
D. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{1+\log x}=e \cdot e^{\log x}=x \cdot e \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=e[/math]

Question #1124 (ID: 475380)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2} y=50[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{100}{x^{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{50}{x^{3}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{100}{x^{3}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{50}{x^{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{2 x y \times x}{x^{2} \times x}=-\frac{100}{x^{3}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1125 (ID: 475381)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1+y^{2}[/math]
B. [math]1-y^{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 y\left(1-y^{2}\right)[/math]
D. [math]2 y\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\sec ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sec x \cdot \sec x \tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sec ^{2} x \tan x[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan x\left(1+\tan ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 y\left(1+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1126 (ID: 475382)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{9}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]
C. [math]\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\cos x \Rightarrow y_{9}=\cos \left(\frac{9 \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{9}=\cos \left(4 \pi+\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \therefore y_{9}=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1127 (ID: 475383)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 \log (\sec x)[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল-

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{\pi}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=2 \log (\sec x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sec x} \sec x \tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \tan x[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢালের মান [math]=2 \tan \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]=2 \times 1=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1128 (ID: 475384)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{2}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x=\frac{1}{3}[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-16[/math]
খ. [math]16[/math]
গ. [math]-18[/math]
ঘ. [math]18[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{2}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{-2}{\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)^{2}}=-18[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1129 (ID: 475385)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]1,1[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y=e^{\ln \left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)}-x>0[/math] বক্ররেখার ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{\ln \left(x-\frac{1}{x}\right)}-x[/math]
 [math]=x-\frac{1}{x}-x[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1^{2}}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1130 (ID: 475386)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x(2 a-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান-

Options:
ক. [math]a[/math]
খ. [math]2a[/math]
গ. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 a x-x^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=2 a-2 x ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2[/math]
 [math]-2[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর গুরুমান বিদ্যমান সুতরাং [math]f'(x) = 0[/math]
 হবে।[math]2 a-2 x=0 \therefore x=a[/math]
 অতএব, সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]f(x)=a(2 a-a)=a^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1131 (ID: 475387)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
খ. [math]e[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-x-(1-\ln x) 2 x}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1-2(1-\ln x)}{x^{3}}[/math]
লঘু ও গুরুমানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\ln x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=e[/math]
 [math]x = e[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime \prime}(e)=\frac{-1-1(1-\ln e)}{e^{3}}=-\frac{1}{e^{3}}<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চমান[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=\frac{\ln \mathrm{e}}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1132 (ID: 475388)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right] \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{1+x}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Solution:
[math]= f(x)[/math]

 হয়।

Question #1134 (ID: 475390)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গোলাকার বুদবুদের ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হার [math]0.2mm/sec[/math] যখন ব্যাসার্ধ [math]7mm[/math] তখন ঐ গোলকের আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]0.123 cc/sec[/math]
খ. [math]0.132 cc/sec[/math]
গ. [math]1.012 cc/sec[/math]
ঘ. [math]1.201 cc/sec[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
বুদবুদের আয়তন, [math]\mathrm{v}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3} \pi \mathrm{r}^{3}, \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=0.2 \mathrm{~mm} / \mathrm{sce}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dv}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{3} \cdot 3 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dv}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \pi .7^{2} \times 0.2[/math]
 [math]=0.123 \mathrm{cc} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1135 (ID: 475391)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বস্তু [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ড সময়ে [math]63 t-6 t^{2}-t^{3}[/math] দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে, কত সময় পরে বস্তুটি থেমে যাবে?

Options:
ক. [math]2s[/math]
খ. [math]3s[/math]
গ. $ 4s $
ঘ. [math]5s[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]s=63 t-6 t^{2}-t^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=63-12 \mathrm{t}-3 \mathrm{t}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 63-12 \mathrm{t}-3 \mathrm{t}^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{t}^{2}+4 \mathrm{t}-21=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{t}^{2}+7 \mathrm{t}-3 \mathrm{t}-21=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\mathrm{t}+7)(\mathrm{t}-3)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{t}=3[/math]
 [math][\because \mathrm{t} 
eq-7][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1136 (ID: 475392)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{1+\sin x}-\sqrt{1-\sin x}}{\sqrt{1+\sin x}+\sqrt{1-\sin x}}\right)[/math] হয় তাহলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\sqrt{1+\sin x}-\sqrt{1-\sin x}}{\sqrt{1+\sin x}+\sqrt{1-\sin x}}[/math]
 [math]\left[\because \sqrt{1 \pm \sin x}=\sqrt{\sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}+\cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2} \pm 2 \sin \frac{x}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}=\sqrt{\left(\cos \frac{x}{2} \pm \sin \frac{x}{2}\right)^{2}}=\cos \frac{x}{2} \pm \sin \frac{x}{2}\right][/math]
 [math]\therefore y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sin \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1137 (ID: 475393)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এবং [math]b[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে কত হলে: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a c^{x}-b \cos x+e^{-x}}{\sin x}=2[/math] হয়।

Options:
A. [math]3,3[/math]
B. [math]3,4[/math]
C. [math]4,3[/math]
D. [math]-3,4[/math]
E. [math]-3,-4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a e^{x}-b \cos x+e^{-x}}{\sin x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a\left(1+x+\frac{x^{2}}{2 !}+\frac{x^{3}}{3 !}+\cdots\right)-b\left(1-\frac{x^{2}}{2 !}+\frac{x^{4}}{4}-\cdots\right)+\left(1-x+\frac{x^{2}}{2 !}-\cdots\right)}{x-\frac{x^{3}}{3 !}+\frac{x^{5}}{4 !}}[/math]
তাহলে [math]a-b+1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow b=a+1 ;[/math]
 [math]\text { option }[/math]
 গুলোতে এরূপ অপশন [math](a, b)=(3,4)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1138 (ID: 475394)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{a}{2^{x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]a[/math]
E. [math]-a[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{a}{2^{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sin \left(\frac{a}{2^{x}}\right)}{\frac{a}{2^{x}}} \cdot a=a[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1139 (ID: 475395)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x}{\log x}[/math] এর লঘুমান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-e[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
গ. [math]e[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{\frac{1}{e}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]-e^{\frac{1}{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x}{\log x}=\frac{x}{\ln x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \ln \mathrm{x}=1 \quad \therefore \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-\frac{1}{(\ln x)^{2}} \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\frac{2}{(\ln x)^{3}} \cdot \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=e[/math]
তাহলে [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}>0 \therefore x=e[/math]
 এর জন্য লঘুমান পাওয়া যায়। [math]\therefore y=\frac{e}{\ln e}=e[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1140 (ID: 475396)

Question:
[math]4(x-2)^{2}+5(y+3)^{2}=20[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \sqrt{5} \pi[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{2} \pi[/math]
গ. [math]20 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]10 \pi[/math]
ঙ. [math]9 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{(x-2)^{2}}{5}+\frac{(y+3)^{2}}{4}=1[/math]
 উপবৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi a b=\pi \cdot \sqrt{5} .2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1141 (ID: 475397)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{x}=e^{x+y}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{x+y}(1+\ln y)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x+y}(1-\ln y)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y}{x-y}(1+\ln y)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x-y}(1-\ln y)[/math]
E. [math]\frac{y}{x-y}(\ln y-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y^{x}=e^{x+y} \Rightarrow x \ln y=x+y[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{x}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}+\ln[/math]
 [math]y=1+\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln y}{\frac{x}{y} 1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x-y}(1-\ln y)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1142 (ID: 475398)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin x=\frac{1}{4}[/math] এর জন্য [math]y=\sin x+\cos 2 x[/math] ফাংশনটির গুরুমান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{9}{8}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{11}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin x+\cos 2 x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}+1-2 \sin ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{1}{4}+1-2\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{8}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1143 (ID: 475399)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]x^{3} y_{z}-2 x y[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]
ঙ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x y=\ln x \therefore x y_{1}+y=\frac{1}{x} \ldots \ldots \ldots \text { (i) }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{1}+x y=1 \therefore x^{2} y_{2}+2 x y_{1}+x y_{1}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{2}+3 x y_{1}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{2}+3\left(\frac{1}{x}-y\right)+y=0 \text { [from (i)] }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}-2 x y=-3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1144 (ID: 475400)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর- [math]\operatorname{lt}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x)^{\tan x}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]
E. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=L_{x-\frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x)^{\tan x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=\underset{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}{\mathrm{Lt}}(\tan x) \ln (\sin x)=\mathrm{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\ln (\sin x)}{\frac{1}{\tan x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \ln (\sin x)}^{\cot x}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকারে ] [math]=\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\frac{1}{\sin x} \cdot \cos x}{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x}=0 \quad \therefore y=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1145 (ID: 475401)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=1-x+\frac{x^{2}}{2 !}-\frac{x^{3}}{3 !}+\cdots \infty[/math] এবং [math]z=-y-\frac{y^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{3}}{3}-\frac{y^{4}}{4} \ldots \infty[/math] - হয়। তাহলে x এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\left(1+\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{z}}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\left(1+e^{-z}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (1+3 z)[/math]
D. [math]\ln \left(\frac{1}{1+5 z}\right)[/math]
E. [math]\ln \left(\frac{1}{1-e^{2}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\ln \left(\frac{1}{1-e^{2}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{-x} \Rightarrow 1-e^{z}[/math]
 [math]=e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow e^{x}=\frac{1}{1-e^{z}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\ln \left(\frac{1}{1-\mathrm{e}^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left[z=\ln (1-y) \Rightarrow e^{z}=1-y \Rightarrow y=1-e^{z}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1146 (ID: 475402)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles, Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] -এর গুরু মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-2[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x} ; \frac{d f(x)}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \Rightarrow x=\pm 1[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} f(x)}{d x^{2}}=\frac{2}{x^{3}} \therefore x=-1[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})}{\mathrm{d} \mathrm{x}^{2}}<0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর গুরুমান [math]=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1147 (ID: 475403)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2} \ln x[/math] হলে, [math]x y_{3}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2} \ln x \Rightarrow y_{1}=2 x \ln x+x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=2 \ln x+2+1 \Rightarrow y_{3}=\frac{2}{x} \Rightarrow x y_{3}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1148 (ID: 475404)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x-\sin 3 x}{\sin 3 x-\sin 2 x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 5 x- \sin 3 x}{\sin 3 x-\sin 2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{5 \cos 5 x-3 \cos 3 x}{3 \cos 3 x-2 \cos 2 x} \text { [Using La Hospital] }=\frac{5-3}{3-2}=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1151 (ID: 475407)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1-\sin x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\sin \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\cos \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} \tan ^{-1}\left(\tan \frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1152 (ID: 475408)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The total waste per mile in an electric conductor is } W=i^{2} R+\frac{K^{2}}{R} \text {. Where } i \text { is the current and } R \text { is the }[/math] [math]\text { resistance. If the current is kept constant, then find the maximum value of W. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { 2ik }[/math]
B. [math]\text { ik }[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\mathbf{k}}{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 K}{I}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d W}{d R}=i^{2}-\frac{k^{2}}{R^{2}}=0 ; R=\frac{k}{i} ; W_{\max }=2 k i[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1153 (ID: 475409)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { A cylinder is expanding is such a way that its height } h \text { and radius } r \text { are both increasing at the rate of } 1 \% \text { per }[/math] [math]\text { hour. Find the rate of the volume, } V=\pi r^{2} h \text { that is increasing per hour. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1 \%[/math]
B. [math]2 \%[/math]
C. [math]3 \%[/math]
D. [math]4 \%[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d h}{d t}=1 \% \times h ; \frac{d r}{d t}=1 \% \times r ; V^{\prime}=\pi r^{2} h[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d v}{d t}=\pi r^{2} \frac{d h}{d t}+2 \pi r h \frac{d r}{d t}=\pi r^{2} \times 1 \% \times h+2 \pi r h \times 1 \% \times r[/math]
 [math]\therefore\frac{\frac{d v}{d t}}{v}=\frac{\pi r^{2} h \times 1 \%+\pi r^{2} h \times 2 \%}{\pi r^{2} h}=3 \%[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1154 (ID: 475410)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{x^{2}-16}{x-4}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]8[/math]
C. অসংজ্ঞায়িত
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 4} \frac{x^{2}-16}{x-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x-0}{1-0}[/math]
 [math]=2 \times 4=8[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1155 (ID: 475411)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{\sin x}{\pi-x}[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{\sin x}{x-\pi}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin (x-h)}{x-\pi-h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin h}{-h}=1[/math]
 [math]\left[\begin{array}{c}\text { Let, } \mathrm{x}=\pi+\mathrm{h} \\\therefore \mathrm{x} \rightarrow \pi \therefore \mathrm{h} \rightarrow 0\end{array}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1156 (ID: 475412)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\tan x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. অসংজ্ঞায়িত


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\tan x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos x[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1158 (ID: 475414)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{x \ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{x \ln x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=e^{5-2 x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{5-2 x}[/math]
B. [math]2 e^{5-2 x}[/math]
C. [math]-2 e^{5-2 x}[/math]
D. [math](5-2 x) e^{5-2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{5-2 x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-2 e^{5-2 x}[/math]

Question #1160 (ID: 475416)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=3 \log _{a} x-5 e^{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{x}-5 e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{x} \log _{a} e-5 e^{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{x} \log _{a} x-5 e^{x}[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=3 \log _{a}^{x}-5 e^{x}=3 \log _{a}^{e} \cdot \ln x-5 e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3}{x} \cdot \log _{a}^{e}-5 e^{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1161 (ID: 475417)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{1-4 x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{1+4 x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-4}{1-4 x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{1-4 x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4 x^{2}-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{4 x}{1-4 x^{2}}=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2.2 x}{1-(2 x)^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} 2 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2.2}{1+2 x^{2}}=\frac{4}{1+4 x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1162 (ID: 475418)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x \log _{a} x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\log _{a} x+\log _{a} e[/math]
B. [math]+\log _{e} a[/math]
C. [math]\log _{a} x+1[/math]
D. [math]\log _{\mathrm{a}} x[/math]
E. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y \log _{a} e x \log _{e} x=\log _{a} e x \ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\log _{a} e \times\left(\ln x+x \cdot \frac{1}{x}\right)=\log _{a} x+\log _{a} e[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1163 (ID: 475419)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left[\log \tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)\right]=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sec x[/math]
C. [math]\sec x[/math]
D. [math]\sec x \tan x[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left[\log \tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sec ^{2}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}, \frac{x}{2}\right)}{2 \tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{1}{\cos ^{2}\left(\frac{\pi}{4} \frac{x}{4}\right)}}{\frac{2 \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{4} \frac{x}{2}\right)}{\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right) \cos \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{x}{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\sec x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1164 (ID: 475420)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{\tan (x-3)}{x-3}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]
E. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{\tan (x-3)}{x-3}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{\sec ^{2}(x-3)}{1}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1165 (ID: 475421)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x+y=a^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d x}{d y}[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]0,0[/math]
B. [math]0,2 a[/math]
C. [math]2 a, 0[/math]
D. [math]-1,-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x+y=a^{2} ; 1+\frac{d y}{d x}=0 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-1 \quad \therefore \frac{d x}{d y}=\frac{1}{-1}=-1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1166 (ID: 475422)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=f(\theta)=r \cos \theta[/math] এবং [math]y=g(\theta)=r \sin \theta[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d x}{d y}[/math] মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]-\cot \theta,-\tan \theta[/math]
B. [math]\tan \theta, \cot \theta[/math]
C. [math]-\tan \theta,-\cot \theta[/math]
D. [math]-\cot \theta, \tan \theta[/math]
E. [math]\cot \theta,-\tan \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d x}}{\frac{d x}{d \theta}}=\frac{\pi \cos \theta}{-x \sin \theta}=-\cot \theta \therefore \frac{d x}{d y}=-\tan \theta[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1167 (ID: 475423)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-6 x^{2}+12 x-9[/math] বক্র রেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক X-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y_{1}=3 x^{2}-12 x+12=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2[/math]
 [math]x=2[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=2^{3}-6.2^{2}[/math]
 [math]+12.2-9=-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1168 (ID: 475424)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4}\right\}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-8 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{6 x}{\left(x^{2}+4\right)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4 x}{\left(x^{2}-8\right)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4 x}{\left(x^{2}+8\right)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(1+\frac{4}{x^{2}-4}\right)=\frac{-4 \times 2 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1169 (ID: 475425)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=p e^{m x}+q e^{-m x}[/math] হলে [math]y_{2}-m^{2} y=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]y[/math]
B. [math]y^{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=p e^{m x}+q e^{-m x} \therefore y_{1}=m\left(p e^{m x}-q e^{-m x}\right)[/math]
 [math]y_{2}=m^{2}\left(p e^{m x}+q e^{-m x}\right)=m^{2} y \quad \therefore y_{2}-m^{2} y=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1170 (ID: 475426)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=f(x)=e^{a x+b}[/math] হলে, [math]y=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]a e^{a x+b}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{a} e^{a x+b}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{b} e^{a x+b}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{a} e^{a x+b}+k[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=e^{a x+b} \quad \therefore y=\int e^{a x+b} d x=\frac{1}{a} e^{a x+b}+k[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1172 (ID: 475428)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{3 x-x^{3}}{1-3 x^{2}}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{3}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{3 x-x^{3}}{1-3 x^{2}}=3 \tan ^{-1} x \therefore[/math]
 অন্তরক সহগ [math]=\frac{3}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 - আর ডোমেইনে তা অন্তর্ভুক্ত আছে এরূপ অপশন [math]\frac{3}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1173 (ID: 475429)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4(x-2)^{2}+5(y+3)^{2}=20[/math] বক্ররেখা দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \sqrt{5} \pi[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{2} \pi[/math]
গ. [math]20 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]10 \pi[/math]
ঙ. [math]9 \pi[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{(x-2)^{2}}{5}+\frac{(y+3)^{2}}{4}=1[/math]
 উপবৃত্তের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\pi a b=\pi \cdot \sqrt{5} \cdot 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1174 (ID: 475250)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](1,2)[/math] বিন্দুগামী y বক্ররেখার অন্তরক সহগ [math]e^{\ln (\ln x)}[/math] হলে বক্ররেখাটির সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]y=\ln x(x-1)+3[/math]
খ. [math]y=x \ln x+3[/math]
গ. [math]y=x(\ln x-1)-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=x \ln x-3[/math]
ঙ. [math]y=x(\ln x-1)+3[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]y=x(\ln x-1)+3[/math]

Solution:
[math]y_{1}=e^{\ln (\ln x)}=\ln x[/math]
 [math]\left[\because a_{a} \log _{a} b=b\right] \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=\int \ln x d x=x \ln x-x+c[/math]
 [math](1, 2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে, [math]2=-1+\mathrm{c} \quad \therefore \mathrm{c}=3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}=\mathrm{x}(\ln \mathrm{x}-1)+3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1175 (ID: 475251)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\tan \sqrt{y}[/math] হলে, [math]x=1[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{\pi}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
E. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=\tan \sqrt{y}\\ \Rightarrow \sqrt{y}=\tan ^{-1} x \\\Rightarrow y=\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}\\ \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \tan ^{-1} x \cdot \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2 \cdot \frac{\pi}{4} \cdot \frac{1}{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:
এটি অন্তরীকরণের একদম সহজ একটি প্রশ্ন। y = আকারে না থেকে প্রশ্নটি x = আকারে থাকায় (অর্থাৎ অব্যক্ত আকারে থাকায়) প্রথমে y = dy আকারে (অর্থাৎ ব্যক্ত আকারে) রূপান্তরিত করে নিয়ে তারপর [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] বের করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1176 (ID: 475252)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{\sin x}-1}{\sin x}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x \rightarrow 0[/math]
 হলে [math]\sin x \rightarrow 0 \therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{sin x}-1}{\sin x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1177 (ID: 475253)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{\frac{1}{x-1}}(1-\ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{\frac{1}{x-2}}(1-\ln x)[/math]
C. [math]x^{\frac{1}{x^{2}}}(1-\ln x)[/math]
D. [math]x^{\frac{1}{x}}(1-\ln x)[/math]
E. [math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { No correct answer }[/math]

Solution:
Answer হবে, [math]x^{\frac{1}{x}-2}(1-\ln x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1178 (ID: 475254)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]L^{\prime} \text { Hospital } \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x}}}{1}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1179 (ID: 475255)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=a^{x}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]a^{x} \ln a[/math]
খ. [math]\left(a^{x} \ln a\right)^{3}[/math]
গ. [math]a^{3 x}(\ln a)^{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]a^{x}(\ln a)^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=a^{x} \ln a \frac{d^{2} y}{d^{2} x^{2}}=a^{x}(\ln a)^{2} \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}=a^{x}(\ln a)^{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1180 (ID: 475257)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ট্রেন t সেকেন্ডে [math]5 \mathrm{t}+\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{t}^{2}[/math] ফুট দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে। 2 সেকেন্ড পর ট্রেনটির বেগ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]13 \mathrm{ft} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
খ. [math]11 \mathrm{ft} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
গ. [math]9 \mathrm{ft} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 \mathrm{ft} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]V=5+t ; t=2 \mathrm{~s} \Rightarrow V=7 \mathrm{ft} / \mathrm{sec}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1181 (ID: 475258)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x-\sin x}{x^{3}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]1 / 2[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x(1-\cos x)}{x \cdot x^{2}}=1 \cdot \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin 2 \frac{x}{2}}{x^{2}}=\frac{1 \cdot 2 \cdot 1}{4} \cdot 1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1182 (ID: 475259)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x+4}{x-4}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\infty / \infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1+\frac{4}{x}}{1-\frac{4}{x}}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1183 (ID: 475260)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln \left(a x^{3}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{a x^{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3 a}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{a}{x^{3}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{a x^{3}} \times 3 x^{2}=\frac{3}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1184 (ID: 475261)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln e^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\text { In a }[/math]
C. [math]\ln a^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\ln x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math]
 আকার বলে [math]\text { L'Hospital rule apply }[/math]
 করে পাই, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \ln a}{1}=\ln a[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1185 (ID: 475262)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2}(1+3 \ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x(5+6 \ln x)[/math]
C. [math]11+6 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}=3 x^{2} \ln x+x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=6 x \ln x+5 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=6 \ln x+11[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{4}=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1186 (ID: 475263)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]12.5 cm[/math] ব্যাসার্ধ বিশিষ্ট একটি গোলকের আয়তন, [math]4 cm[/math] ব্যাসার্ধ ও [math]16 cm[/math] উচ্চতা বিশিষ্ট কয়টি সিলিন্ডারের আয়তনের সমান?

Options:
ক. [math]7[/math]
খ. [math]8[/math]
গ. [math]9[/math]
ঘ. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]n \pi \times 4^{2} \times 16=\frac{4}{3} \pi \times(12.5)^{3} \Rightarrow n=10.1725 \approx 10[/math] টি ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
