Question #1187 (ID: 475264)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{3}}{e^{x}}\right)+\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{e^{x}}{x^{3}}\right)\right\}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]3 x^{2} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x^{6}}{c^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{3}}{e^{x}}\right)+\cot ^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{3}}{e^{x}}\right)\right\}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1188 (ID: 475265)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \cos ^{2} x / 2}{2 \sin ^{2} x / 2}}=\frac{x}{2} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1189 (ID: 475266)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]\tan x[/math]
C. [math]\sec x \operatorname{cosec} x[/math]
D. [math]\sec x \tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{0}{0} \text { form, }[/math]
 তাই [math]\text { L'Hospital }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই, [math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h) \tan (x+h)}{1}=\sec x \tan x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1191 (ID: 475268)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=a^{ln}(\cos x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-a^{\ln (\cos x)} \tan x[/math]
B. [math]-a^{\ln (\cos x)} \tan x \ln (a)[/math]
C. [math]a^{ln=(\cos x)} \ln (a)[/math]
D. [math]a^{\ln (\cos x)} \tan x \ln (a)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(a^{\ln (\cos x)}\right)[/math]
 [math]=a^{\ln (\cos x)} \cdot \ln a[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d}{d_{x}} \ln (\cos x)[/math]
 [math]=a^{\ln \cos x} \ln a[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left(\frac{-\cos x}{\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-a^{\ln (\cos x)} \tan x \ln a[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1193 (ID: 475270)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1}(2 x)}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1}(2 x)}{2 x} \times 2=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1194 (ID: 475271)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{-\cos x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin \frac{\pi}{2}}=\frac{0}{1}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1195 (ID: 475272)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2018-2019, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{3 x} \times 3=3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1196 (ID: 475273)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0 \frac{y}{z}} \cdot \sin z=y \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z} \\=y \cdot 1=y .\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1197 (ID: 475274)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-1+x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1198 (ID: 475275)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+2 x}-\sqrt{1-3 x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{11}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11}{32}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]=\frac{2-(-3)}{2}=\frac{5}{2}[/math]

Question #1199 (ID: 475276)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-4}{2+x-4 x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-4}{2+x-4 x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(1-\frac{4}{x^{2}}\right)}{x^{2}\left(\frac{2}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x}-4\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1-\frac{4}{x^{2}}}{\frac{2}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x}-4}=\frac{1-0}{0+0-4}=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1200 (ID: 475277)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3^{x}-3^{-x}}{3^{x}+3^{-x}}=1[/math]

Question #1201 (ID: 475278)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2008-2009, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1202 (ID: 475279)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5 \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]4 \mathrm{a}[/math]
C. [math]3 a^{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{(\sqrt{x})^{5}-(\sqrt{a})^{5}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\=5(\sqrt{a})^{5-1}=5(\sqrt{a})^{4}=5 a^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1203 (ID: 475280)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Khulna University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x} \quad\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1} \text { [L'hospital rule] } \\=\frac{1}{1+0}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1204 (ID: 475281)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L'Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} .1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1205 (ID: 475282)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University of Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]a[/math]
B. [math]-a[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]loga[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x},[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]\text { L' Hospital's Rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই,[math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \log a-1}{1}=a^{0} \cdot \log a=\log a[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=\frac{-2^{2}+3^{2}}{2}=\frac{5}{2}[\text { technique }][/math]

Question #1207 (ID: 475284)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{5}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-x-1}{x(\sqrt{1-x}+1)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x}+1}=\frac{-1}{1+1}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1208 (ID: 475285)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{a+x^{2}}-\sqrt{a-x^{2}}}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{a}}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{a}}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{a+x^{2}}-\sqrt{a-x^{2}}}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\left(\sqrt{a+x^{2}}-\sqrt{a-x^{2}}\right)\left(\sqrt{a+x^{2}}+\sqrt{a-x^{2}}\right)}{x^{2}\left(\sqrt{a+x^{2}}+\sqrt{a-x^{2}}\right)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a+x^{2}-a+x^{2}}{x^{2}\left(\sqrt{a+x^{2}}+\sqrt{a-x^{2}}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2}{\sqrt{a+x^{2}}+\sqrt{a-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2 \sqrt{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1209 (ID: 475286)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](3, 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]3 x^{2}+2 y^{2}=2 x y+23[/math] এর স্পর্শক এর ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]-7[/math]
গ. [math]-6[/math]
ঘ. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]3 x^{2}+2 y^{2}=2 x y+23[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 x^{2}+2 y^{2}-2 x y-23=0[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{6 x-2 y}{4 y-2 x} ;[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(3.2)}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{6.3-2.2}{4.2-2.3}=-7[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1210 (ID: 475287)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1+x^{2}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(2 \tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1211 (ID: 475288)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{b x+c}{x}}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]ac[/math]
B. [math]bc[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ac}}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{0 x+c}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{b+\frac{c}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{b}[/math]
 [math]\cdot\left\{(1+a x)^{\frac{1}{a x}}\right\}^{a c}=1[/math]
 [math]\times e^{a c}=e^{a c}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1212 (ID: 475289)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+k x)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\log _{k} x[/math]
B. [math]\ln (k x)[/math]
C. [math]\ln (\mathrm{k}+\mathrm{k})[/math]
D. [math]e^{\mathbf{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+k x)^{\frac{1}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{(1+k x)^{1 / x x}\right\}^{k}=e^{x}[/math]

Question #1213 (ID: 475290)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2}}{3 x-6}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2}}{3 x-6}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}\left(1+\frac{2}{x^{2}}\right)}}{x\left(3-\frac{6}{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x \sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x^{2}}}}{x\left(3-\frac{6}{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{1+\frac{2}{\infty}}}{3-\frac{6}{\infty}}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1214 (ID: 475291)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x+4}{x-4}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x+4}{x-4}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1+\frac{4}{x}}{1-\frac{4}{x}}=\frac{1}{1}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1215 (ID: 475292)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1}\left(x^{2}\right)\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1}\left(x^{2}\right)\right)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\left(x^{2}\right)^{2}}} \times 2 x=\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1216 (ID: 475293)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]\tan x[/math]
C. [math]\sec x \operatorname{cosec} x[/math]
D. [math]\sec x \tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}=\frac{d}{d x}(\sec x)=\sec x \tan x[/math]

Question #1218 (ID: 475295)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{2} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1220 (ID: 475297)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]2x+y-1=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-2y-3=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y=3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+4 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{2 y}[/math]
 [math](1,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{2(-1)}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y+1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1) \therefore x-2 y-3=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1221 (ID: 475298)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে, $$\frac{d y}{d x}=?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)-\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x}{x}-\ln x \cdot 1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1222 (ID: 475299)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
খ. [math]e[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-x-(1-\ln x) 2 x}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1-2(1-\ln x)}{x^{3}}[/math]
লঘু ও গুরুমানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\ln x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=e[/math]
 [math]x = e[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime \prime}(e)=\frac{-1-1(1-\ln e)}{e^{3}}=-\frac{1}{e^{3}}<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চমান[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=\frac{\ln \mathrm{e}}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1223 (ID: 475300)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\cot x a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
খ. [math]-\tan x a^{\ln (\cos x)} \ln a[/math]
গ. [math]\tan x a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cot x a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=a^{\ln (\cos x)}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\cos x}[/math]
 [math](-\sin x) \cdot \ln a[/math]
 [math]=-a^{\ln (\cos x)} \cdot \tan x \cdot \ln a[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1224 (ID: 475301)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2} e^{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]x e^{x}+2 x e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]x^{2}+2 x e^{2}[/math]
C. [math]x^{2}+x e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{2} e^{x}+2 x e^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2} e^{x}\right)=x^{2} e^{x}+2 x e^{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1225 (ID: 475302)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\tan \sqrt{y}[/math] হলে, [math]x=1[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{\pi}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x=\tan \sqrt{y}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{y}=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} x \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]
 এর জন্য, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} 1 \frac{1}{1+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 \times \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1226 (ID: 475303)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{2}(3 x)\right)[/math] এর মান?

Options:
A. [math]\sin 6 x[/math]
B. [math]6 \cos 3 x[/math]
C. [math]2 \sin 3 x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{2}(3 x)\right)=-2 \cos 3 x \cdot \sin 3 x \cdot 3=-3 \sin 6 x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1227 (ID: 475304)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{3}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{2}{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan \left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\sec ^{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1-\sin ^{2}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)} \cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{3 / 2}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(1-x^{2}\right)^{-\frac{3}{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1228 (ID: 475306)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin (\ln x)+\cos (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]y_{2}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{2 \cos (\ln x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-2 \sin (\ln x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \cos (\ln x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{2 \cos (\ln x)}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\sin (\ln x)+\operatorname{cox}(\ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\cos (\ln x) \cdot \frac{1}{x}-\sin (\ln x) \cdot \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\cos (\ln x)-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\sin (\ln x)+\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\sin (\ln x)-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \cos (\ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \operatorname{cox}(\ln x)}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1229 (ID: 475307)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=3 x^{2}+2 x-1[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-1,0)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=3 x^{2}+2 x-1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=6 x+2[/math]
 [math](-1,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]=6 \times(-1)+2=-4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1230 (ID: 475308)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বক্ররেখাটি [math](1,2)[/math] বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং উক্ত বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]5:[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]y=2 x^{2}+x-1[/math]
খ. [math]y=2 x^{2}-3 x+2[/math]
গ. [math]y=2 x^{2}-x+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=2 x^{2}-2 x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { Option (A) ? }[/math]
 হতে, [math]y=2 x^{2}+x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore(1,2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=4 \times 1+1=5 \text {, }[/math]
 যা স্পর্শকের। ঢাল নির্দেশ করে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1231 (ID: 475309)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](3, 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]3 x^{2}+2 y^{2}=2 x y+23[/math] এর স্পর্শক এর ঢাল নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]-7[/math]
গ. [math]-6[/math]
ঘ. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{6 x-2 y}{4 y-2 x}=-\frac{3 x-y}{2 y-x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(3,2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে বক্ররেখার ঢাল [math]=-\frac{3 \times 3-2}{2 \times 2-3}=-\frac{9-2}{4-3}=-7[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]\log _{\sin x} \sin ^{2} x[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math](\sin x)^{\sin ^{2} x-1}[/math]
গ. [math]2(\sin x)^{\cos ^{2} x-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]
ঙ. [math]\cot x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{\sin x} \sin ^{2} x\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(2)=0[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]
E. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=2\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2\left(\infty+\frac{1}{\infty}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\infty[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1234 (ID: 475312)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{3} x[/math] হলে [math]y_{n}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left[3 \sin (n \pi / 2+x)-3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)\right][/math]
খ. [math]\sin (n \pi / 2+x)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos (\pi / 2+x)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)[/math]
ঙ. [math]3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)+\cos n x[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]3^{n} \sin (n \pi / 2+3 x)+\cos n x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{3} x=\frac{1}{4}(3 \sin x-\sin 3 x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}(3 \cos x-3 \cos 3 x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left\{3 \sin \left(x+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)-3^{1} \sin \left(3 x+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4}\left\{3 \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)-3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1235 (ID: 475313)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\ln \left(e^{x} \cos x\right)}{x \sin x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\ln \left(e^{x} \cos x\right)}{x \sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\ln e^{x}-\ln \cos x}{x \sin x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-x-\ln (\cos x)}{x \sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1+\frac{\sin x}{\cos x}}{x \cos x+\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L. Hospital] }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x-0+\sec ^{2} x}{-x \sin x+\cos x+\cos x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-0+1}{-0+1+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \quad[/math]
 [math]\text { [L. Hospital] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1236 (ID: 475314)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-\cos x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{0}{0} \text { form }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1-\cos x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{2} \sin \frac{x}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2} \cdot \frac{1}{2} \cos \frac{x}{2}}[\text { L'Hospital] }[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1237 (ID: 475315)

Question:
[math]\text { When } x=1 \text {, the function } x^{3}-3 x^{2}+7=0 \text { is: }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { Increasing }[/math]
B. [math]\text { Maximum }[/math]
C. [math]\text { Decreasing }[/math]
D. [math]\text { Minimum }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { at } x=1 \frac{d y}{d x}=-3<0 \quad \therefore \text { decreasing }[/math]

Question #1238 (ID: 475316)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If, } y=\sec ^{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right), \text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]X[/math]
D. [math]2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sec ^{2}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right) \Rightarrow y=1+\left(\tan \left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=1+x^{2} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1240 (ID: 475318)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2017-2018, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Bangamata Sheikh Fojilatunnesa Mujib Science and Technology University

[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার [math]][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x}{2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right)\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

B. [math]\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)[/math]
C. [math]\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

Question #1243 (ID: 475321)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(\frac{y}{x}\right)^{n}[/math]
B. [math]\left(-\frac{x}{y}\right)^{\mathbf{n}}[/math]
C. [math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]
D. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n} \Rightarrow n x^{n-1}+n y^{n-1} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1245 (ID: 475323)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{10} x\right)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{|x|}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\ln 10}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 10}{|x|}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln 10}[/math]


Correct Answer: E. [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln 10}[/math]

Solution:
সরাসরি সূত্র [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{a} x\right)=\frac{1}{|x| \ln a}[/math]

Explanation:
[math]\log _{a} x[/math]
 এর অন্তরক হচ্ছে - [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln a}[/math]
তাহলে [math]\log _{10} x[/math]
 এর অন্তরক হবে $\frac{1}{|x| \ln 10}1 তোমাদের মনে প্রশ্ন জাগতে পারে, এ x এর পরমমান কোনো? [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln 10}[/math]
 এর কারণ হচ্ছে log এর পর সর্বদা ধনাত্মক মান বসে। [math]\log _{10} x[/math]
 রাশিটিতে x যেহেতু log এর পর বসেছে, সেহেতু এই x কে হতে হবে সর্বদা ধনাত্মক ।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1246 (ID: 475324)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x \ln x[/math] বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল সে বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক-

Options:
ক. [math](e,-e)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{e},-\frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(e,-\frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(e, \frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]
ঙ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{e}, e\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: কোনো বক্ররেখার কোনো বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল হলে সে বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
Solve: শর্তমতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0 \therefore \ln x+1=0 \Rightarrow \ln x=-1 \Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{\ln x}=\mathrm{e}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e}^{-1}=\frac{1}{e}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{x}=\frac{1}{e}[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{y}=\frac{1}{e} \ln \frac{1}{e}=\frac{1}{e} \ln \mathrm{e}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{e}(-1) \ln e=\frac{-1}{e}[/math]
.:. নির্ণেয় স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\left(\frac{1}{e},-\frac{1}{e}\right)[/math]


Explanation:
কোনো বক্ররেখাকে কোনো নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দুতে অন্তরীকরণ করলে সেই বিন্দুতে বক্ররেখাটির স্পর্শকের ঢাল পাওয়া যায় ।x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল রেখার ঢাল শূন্য। তাই এ প্রশ্নে y = x Inx বক্ররেখার যে বিন্দুতে ঢাল শূণ্য, সে বিন্দুতেই স্পর্শক x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1247 (ID: 475325)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি , [math]0 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{(b x+c)}{x}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]e^{b}[/math]
B. [math]e^{c}[/math]
C. [math]e^{-1}[/math]
D. [math]e^{a c}[/math]
E. [math]e^{a b}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Hints: ফাংশনটিকে y ধরে নিয়ে উভয়পাশে In নিয়ে La' Hospital Rule প্রয়োগ করো ।Solve: ধরি [math]y=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{b x+c}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \ln y=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \ln (1+a x)^{\frac{b x+c}{x}} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{b x+c}{x}\right) \ln (1+a x) \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(b x+c) \ln (1+a x)}{x} . \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(b x+c) \frac{1}{1+a x} \cdot a+\ln (1+a x) \cdot b}{1} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a(b x+c)}{1+a x}+\{\ln (1+a x)\} b \\=\frac{a(b \cdot 0+c}{1+a \cdot 0}+\{\ln (1+a \cdot 0)\} b \\=\frac{a c}{1}+\{\ln 1\} b=a c+0 \cdot b \\\ln y=a c \quad \therefore y=e^{a c}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যাঃ কোনো ফাংশন [math]x^{x}[/math]
 ফরম্যাটে থাকলে Limiting Value বের করার সময় ফাংশনটিকে y ধরে নিয়ে উভয়পাশে In নিয়ে করতে হয়। এতে xx থেকে power এ থাকা [math]x^{x}[/math]
 কে নীচে In এর সামনে নামিয়ে আনা যায়। এরপর Normally অন্যান্য অংকের মতো Lal Hospital নিয়ম ব্যবহার করে বা অন্য কোনো নিয়মে ফাংশনটির Limiting Value বের করতে হয়।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1248 (ID: 475326)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}=?[/math]a

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x-1}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-1}{\frac{2 \sqrt{1-x}}{1}} \text { [L. Hospital] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(\sqrt{1-x})^{2}-1^{2}}{x(\sqrt{1-x}+1)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-x-1}{x(\sqrt{1-x}+1)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-0}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1249 (ID: 475327)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x(2 a-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]a^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]a[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 a[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x(2 a-x)=2 a x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=2 a-2 x=0 \Rightarrow x=a[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2<0 \therefore x=a[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})[/math]
 এর মান বৃহত্তম হবে[math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{a})=\mathrm{a} \cdot(2 \mathrm{a}-\mathrm{a})=\mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
অথবা, [math]f(x)=2 a x-x^{2}=a^{2}-a^{2}+2 a x-x^{2}=a^{2}-(a-x)^{2} \therefore f(x)[/math]
 এর সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=a^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1250 (ID: 475328)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x y+x^{3} y^{3}-5=0[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d x}{d y}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 x}{y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x y+x^{3} y^{3}-5=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cdot \frac{d y}{d y}+y \cdot \frac{d x}{d y}+x^{3} \cdot 3 y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d y}+y^{3} \cdot 3 x^{2} \cdot \frac{d x}{d y}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{d y}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{x+3 x^{3} y^{2}}{y+3 x^{2} y^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1251 (ID: 475329)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x}{\ln (x)}[/math] এর ক্ষুদ্রতম মান কত হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]e^{-2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x}{\ln x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\ln x-x \cdot \frac{1}{x}}{(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(\ln x)^{2} \cdot \frac{1}{x}-(\ln x-1) 2 \ln x \cdot \frac{1}{4}}{(\ln x)^{4}}[/math]
এখন, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}=0 ;[/math]
 [math]x=e[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{d_{y}^{2}}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{e}>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{x}[/math]
 [math]=\mathbf{e}[/math]
 হলে ন্যূনতম মান পাওয়া যাবে । [math]\therefore y=\frac{e}{\ln e}=e[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1252 (ID: 475330)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \cdot \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}}{\frac{y}{2^{x}}}[/math]
 [math]\times y[/math]
 [math]=1 \times y=y[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1253 (ID: 475331)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}}=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)=\frac{x}{2} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1254 (ID: 475332)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=0[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y=x+e^{x}[/math] সমীকরণের লেখচিত্রে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y=x[/math]
খ. [math]y=-x[/math]
গ. [math]y=x+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=2 x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x+e^{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=1+e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d y}\right)_{x=0, y=1}=1+1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]\left(\frac{y-1}{x-0}\right)=2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y-1=2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 x+1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1255 (ID: 475333)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\operatorname{asec}^{2} \theta[/math] এবং [math]y=\operatorname{atan}^{3} \theta[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{5} \sec \theta[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2} \tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2} \tan \theta[/math]
D. [math]4 \cos \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x=a \sec ^{2} \theta, \frac{d x}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=2 a \cdot \sec \theta \sec \theta \tan \theta[/math]
 [math]=2 a \sec ^{2} \theta \tan \theta[/math]
 [math]y=a \tan ^{3} \theta ; \frac{d y}{d \theta}[/math]
 [math]=3 a \tan ^{2} \theta \cdot \sec ^{2} \theta ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{d y}{d \theta}}{\frac{d x}{d \theta}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 a \tan ^{2} \theta \sec ^{2} \theta}{2 a \sec ^{2} \theta \tan \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2} \tan \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1256 (ID: 475334)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি একটি সমবাহু ত্রিভুজের বাহুগুলো প্রতি সেকেন্ডে [math]\sqrt{3} \mathrm{~cm}[/math] এবং এর ক্ষেত্রফল প্রতি সেকেন্ডে [math]12 \mathrm{~cm}^{2}[/math] পরিমাণ বৃদ্ধি পায়,ত্রিভুজটির বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]4cm[/math]
খ. [math]9 / 3 \mathrm{~cm}[/math]
গ. [math]8cm[/math]
ঘ. [math]8m[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]A=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^{2} ; \frac{d A}{d t}=2 \cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a \cdot \frac{d a}{d t}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=\frac{2 \times \frac{d A}{d t}}{\sqrt{3} \times \frac{d a}{d t}}=\frac{2 \times 12}{\sqrt{3} \times \sqrt{3}}=8 \mathrm{~cm}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
নীচের কোনটি [math]3^{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ ?

Options:
ক. [math]x^{3} \ln 3[/math]
খ. [math]3^{x} \ln x[/math]
গ. [math]8^{\mathrm{x}} \ln x[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{x} \ln 3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=3^{x} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=3^{x} \cdot \ln 3[/math]

Question #1258 (ID: 475336)

Question:
[math]x^{2}-2 x+5[/math] এর ন্যূনতম মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]2.752.75[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-2 x+5 \Rightarrow x^{2}-2 x+1+4=(x-1)^{2}+4[/math]

Question #1259 (ID: 475337)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{x}^{2}(1+3 \ln \mathrm{x})[/math]
B. [math]x(5+6 \ln x)[/math]
C. [math]11+6 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2} \ln x+x^{3} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=x^{2}(3 \ln x+1)[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{2}[/math]
 [math]=2 x(3 \ln x+1)+x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{3}{x}[/math]
 [math]=x\{6 \ln x+5\}[/math]
 [math]y_{3}=6 \ln x+5+x \cdot \frac{6}{x}=6[/math]
 [math]\ln x+11: y_{4}=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1260 (ID: 475338)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lt}_{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{2 x-1}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{2 x-1}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{x\left(2-\frac{1}{x}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{2-\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2-\frac{1}{\infty}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2-0}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1261 (ID: 475339)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln x[/math] হলে [math]y_{n}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n-1}(n-1) !}{x^{n}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n !}{x^{n+1}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n}(n+1) !}{x^{n+1}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln x \Rightarrow y_{1}=\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow y_{2}=-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=\frac{(-1)^{2} \cdot 1 \cdot 2}{x^{3}}=(-1)^{3-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\lfloor 3-1}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \ldots \ldots . y_{n}=\left(-1{ }^{n-1} \frac{(n-1)!}{x^{n}}\right.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1262 (ID: 475226)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\alpha[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { [Using L'Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]\operatorname{Lim}_{\mathbf{x} \rightarrow \mathbf{0}} \frac{\ln (\mathbf{1}-\mathbf{x})}{\mathbf{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1-x} \cdot(-1)}{1}[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1263 (ID: 475227)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-4}{2+x-4 x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-4}{2+x-4 x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1 \frac{4}{x^{2}}}{\frac{2}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x}-4}=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\text { [Shortcut: } \mathbf{x}^{2}[/math]
এর সহগের অনুপাত ]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1264 (ID: 475228)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{2}{x}-1\right)[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{2}{x}-1\right)=\frac{2}{\infty}-1=0-1=-1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1265 (ID: 475229)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5 a^{2}[/math]
B. [math]4 a^{2}[/math]
C. [math]3 a^{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{\sqrt{x} \rightarrow \sqrt{a}} \frac{(\sqrt{x})^{5}-(\sqrt{a})^{5}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}=5(\sqrt{a})^{4}=5 a^{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1266 (ID: 475230)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+2 x}-\sqrt{1-3 x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{11}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11}{32}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+2 x}-\sqrt{1-3 x}}{x}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1+2 x}} \times 2-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-3 x}}(-3)}{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+\frac{3}{2}}{1}=\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1267 (ID: 475231)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{b x+c}{x}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]a c[/math]
B. [math]b c[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{ac}}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{b x+c}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+a x)^{\frac{a c}{a x}}=e^{a c}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1268 (ID: 475232)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\ln \mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\text { In a }[/math]
C. [math]\ln a^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\ln x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x} ; \div[/math]
 আকার বলে, [math]\text { L'Hospital rule apply }[/math]
 করে পাই, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \ln a}{1}=\ln a[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1269 (ID: 475233)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]\tan x[/math]
C. [math]\sec x \operatorname{cosec} x[/math]
D. [math]\sec x \tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { ; } \frac{0}{0} \text { form, }[/math]
 তাই [math]\text { L'Hospital }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই ,[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h) \tan (x+h)}{1}=\sec x \tan x[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x}{1+x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} x ; \quad y_{1}=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(2 x-5)^{3}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]8[/math]
B. [math]38[/math]
C. [math]48[/math]
D. [math]58[/math]
E. No Answer


Correct Answer: E.No Answer

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(2 x-5)^{3}=3(2 x-5)^{2} \cdot 2=6(2 x-5)^{2}[/math]

Question #1272 (ID: 475236)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\operatorname{Sin}^{-1}\left(x^{2}\right)\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 x^{2}}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}} \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x}{\sqrt{1-x^{4}}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1273 (ID: 475237)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]X[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\ln \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{e^{2 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{e^{-x}-e^{x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\ln \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} \cdot\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1274 (ID: 475238)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]x^{2} \cdot(1+3 \ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x(5+6 \ln x)[/math]
C. [math]11+6 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x \Rightarrow y_{1}=3 x^{2} \ln x+x^{2} \Rightarrow y_{2}=6 x \ln x+5 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{3}=6 \ln x+11 \Rightarrow y_{4}=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\log x}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1-\log x[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-\log x}{x}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{1+\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\log x}{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{1}{x}-x-\log x}{x^{2}}=\frac{1-\log x}{x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1276 (ID: 475240)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{3}}{e^{x}}\right)+\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{e^{x}}{x^{3}}\right)\right\}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]3 x^{2} e^{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x^{6}}{e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{3}}{e^{x}}\right)+\cot ^{-1}\left(\frac{x^{3}}{e^{x}}\right)\right\}=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1277 (ID: 475241)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{y}[/math] হলে [math](1-y \log x) \frac{d y}{d x}= কত ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{2 y}-1[/math]
B. [math]x^{2 y-1}[/math]
C. [math]x^{y-\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
D. [math]x^{2(y-1)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\ln y=y \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{y_{1}}{y}=\frac{y}{x}+y_{1} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}(1-y \ln x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y^{2}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{2 y-1}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1278 (ID: 475242)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y-\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \cos ^{2} x / 2}{2 \sin ^{2} x / 2}}=\frac{x}{2} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1279 (ID: 475243)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x}[/math] এর মান হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{1} \text { (L'Hospital's rule) }=0[/math]

Question #1280 (ID: 475244)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](0,1)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y=e^{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y=x+1[/math]
খ. [math]y=2 x+e^{x}[/math]
গ. [math]x=e+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=-x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\left.e^{x} \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(0,1)}=1 \therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকঃ [math]y-1=1(x-0)=y=x+1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1281 (ID: 475245)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)=\int_{0}^{x} \frac{t-3}{t^{2}+7} d t[/math] ন্যূনতম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sqrt{7}[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d t} f(x)=\frac{x-3}{x^{2}+7}=0 \quad \therefore x=3[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]12.5 cm[/math] ব্যাসার্ধ বিশিষ্ট একটি গোলকের আয়তন, [math]4 cm[/math] ব্যাসার্ধ ও [math]16 cm[/math] উচ্চতা বিশিষ্ট কয়টি সিলিন্ডারের আয়তনের সমান?

Options:
ক. [math]7[/math]
খ. [math]8[/math]
গ. [math]9[/math]
ঘ. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]n \pi \times 4^{2} \times 16=\frac{4}{3} \pi \times(12.5)^{3} \Rightarrow n=10.1725 \approx 10[/math] টি

Explanation:

Question #1283 (ID: 475247)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে, [math]y=a x(1-x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি [math]X[/math]– অক্ষের সাথে [math]60°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 3[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pm 1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{\prime}=a-2 a x[/math]
 যা, [math](0,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী [math]\Rightarrow y^{\prime}=a=\tan 60^{\circ} \text { or, } \tan 120^{\circ}=\pm \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1284 (ID: 475248)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বক্ররেখাটি [math](1, 2)[/math] বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং উক্ত বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল 5?

Options:
ক. [math]y=2 x^{2}-3 x+2[/math]
খ. [math]y=2 x^{2}-x+1[/math]
গ. [math]y=2 x^{2}+x-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=2 x^{2}-2 x+1[/math]
ঙ. [math]y=3 x^{2}+x-2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: কোনো বক্ররেখাকে নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দুতে Differentiate করলে সেই বিন্দুতে ঐ বক্ররেখার উপর অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল পাওয়া যায়।Solve : অপশনগুলো থেকে,[math]\text { (A) } \mathrm{y}=2 \mathrm{x}^{2}-3 \mathrm{x}+2 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 \mathrm{x}-3[/math]
(1, 2) বিন্দুতে বক্ররেখাটির স্পর্শকের ঢাল, [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(1.2)}=4.1-3=1[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\text { (B) } \mathrm{y}=2 \mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{x}+1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 \mathrm{x}-1 \\\therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(1 ; 2)}=4.1-1=3 \\\text { (C) } \mathrm{y}=2 \mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{x}-1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 \mathrm{x}+1 \\\therefore\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(1,2)}=4.1+1=5\end{array}[/math]
 [math]y=2 x^{2}+x-1[/math]
 বক্ররেখাটির (1, 2) বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল = 5

Explanation:
অন্তরীকরণ করা মানে ঢাল বের করা। আরেকটু সুন্দর করে বললে, কোনো বক্ররেখার যেকোনো বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢালই হচ্ছে সেই বিন্দুতে বক্ররেখাটির অন্তরক সহগ ।[math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right)}=\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right)[/math]
বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকটির ঢাল।

মনে রাখবে,ঢাল = tan [math]\theta=\frac{d y}{d x} \frac{\Delta y}{\Delta x}=[/math]
 কোটিদ্বয়ের অন্তর/ভুজদ্বয়ের অন্তর [math]=\frac{y_{2}-y_{1}}{x_{2}-x_{1}}=-[/math]
 x এর সহগ /y এর সহগ[math]\\ \\ \ \\[/math]
By Calculator : Calculator এ [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 সে বাটনটা চেপে একটি একটি করে option input দিয়ে x = 1 এর জন্য (যেহেতু বক্ররেখাটির (1, 2) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল বের করতে হবে) যে ফাংশনটি অন্তরজ 5 আসে সেটিই সঠিক Answer.

Sub-Questions:

Question #1285 (ID: 475249)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ধাতব গোলককে গলিয়ে সমব্যাসার্ধের সিলিন্ডারে রূপ দিলে তার দৈর্ঘ্য ও ব্যাসার্ধের অনুপাত কত হবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4 \pi}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}=\pi r^{2} h \Rightarrow \frac{h}{r}=\frac{4}{3}[/math]

Explanation:
