Question #1286 (ID: 475223)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The following figure shows a right circular cylinder metal rod which is expanding as it is heated. After t }[/math] [math]\text { seconds the radius of the rod is } x \text { cm and the length of the rod is } 5 x \mathrm{~cm} \text {. The cross-sectional area of the rod is }[/math] [math]\text { increasing at the constant rate of } 0.032 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \mathrm{~s}^{-1} \text {. Find } \mathrm{dx} / \mathrm{dt} \text { when the radius of the rod is } 2 \mathrm{~cm} \text {. }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]0.002546[/math]
B. [math]0.003546[/math]
C. [math]0.022546[/math]
D. [math]0.302546[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { Cross sectional Arca, } A=\pi x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d A}{d t}=\pi .2 x \cdot \frac{d x}{d t}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 0.0032 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \mathrm{~s}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=2 \pi \times 2 \mathrm{~cm} \times \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=2.54647 \times 10^{-3} \mathrm{~cm} / \mathrm{s}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1287 (ID: 475224)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{1-\sin x}{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]0.5[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{1-\sin x}{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)^{2}}\left[\frac{0}{0}\right][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{-\cos x}{2\left(\frac{\pi}{2}-x\right)(-1)}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{0}{0}\right][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{-\sin x}{2(-1)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}=0.5[/math]
 [math]\left[L^{\prime}\right. \text { Hospital] }[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right] \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{1+x}=1[/math]

Question #1289 (ID: 475177)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L'Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} .1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1290 (ID: 475178)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{e^{x}}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{x}}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{x}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{e^{x}}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{3 \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{e^{x}}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{-\frac{x}{2}}\right)=-\frac{1}{2} e^{-\frac{x}{2}}=-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{x}}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1291 (ID: 475179)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3 / 2[/math]
B. [math]5 / 3[/math]
C. [math]5 / 4[/math]
D. [math]5 / 2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{5 x}{2} \sin \frac{x}{2}}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin \frac{5 x}{2}}{\frac{2}{5}\left(\frac{5 x}{2}\right)} \cdot \frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{2\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)}=\frac{5}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1292 (ID: 475180)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} ; y_{1}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}} ; y_{2}=\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ বা সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]y_{1}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \therefore x=\pm 1[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{2}=\frac{2}{1}=2>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া যাবে[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=1+\frac{1}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1293 (ID: 475181)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5 ; f^{\prime}(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x ; f^{\prime \prime}(x)=6 x-6[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ বা সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 ; 3 x^{2}-6 x=0 ; 3 x(x-2)=0 ; x=0,2[/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=6 \times 0-6=-6<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5[/math]
 এর গরিষ্ঠ মান পাওয়া যাবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 গরিষ্ঠ মান [math]f(0) = 5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1294 (ID: 475182)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখা [math](2,2 \sqrt{2})[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2}{y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left[\frac{d y}{d x}\right]_{(2.2 \sqrt{2})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1295 (ID: 475183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 9} \frac{\sqrt{x}-3}{x-9}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 9} \frac{\sqrt{x}-3}{x-9}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 9} \frac{\sqrt{x}-3}{(\sqrt{x})^{2}-3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 9} \frac{\sqrt{x}-3}{(\sqrt{x}-3)(\sqrt{x}+3)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 9} \frac{1}{\sqrt{x}+3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{9}+3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3+3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1296 (ID: 475184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{\sin x}{\pi-x}[/math] সমান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{\sin x}{\pi-x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার ] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi} \frac{\cos x}{-1}=\frac{\cos \pi}{-1}=\frac{-1}{-1}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1297 (ID: 475185)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]-5[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{7}[/math]
D. [math]-7[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{7^{n}\left\{\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n} \cdot 5+7\right\}}{7^{n}\left\{\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n}-1\right\}} \\=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5 \cdot\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n}+7}{\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n}-1}=\frac{5 \times 0+7}{0-1}=-7\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1298 (ID: 475186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+5 x}-\sqrt{1-7 x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+5 x}-\sqrt{1-7 x}}{x}=\frac{5-(-7)}{2}=\frac{12}{2}=6\\\text{[By technique:01]}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1299 (ID: 475187)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x}-1}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sqrt{1+x}-1}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\sqrt{1+x}+1)}{1+x-1} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\sqrt{1+x}+1)=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1300 (ID: 475188)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{5}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1-x}-1}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-x-1}{x(\sqrt{1-x}+1)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x}+1}=\frac{-1}{1+1}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1301 (ID: 475189)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin x=c \operatorname{cosec} y[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\tan y}{\tan x}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\tan x}{\tan y}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\tan y}{\tan x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan x}{\tan y}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\sin x=c \operatorname{cosec} y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=-c \operatorname{cosec} y \cdot \cot y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{\cos x}{\cot y \operatorname{cosec} y}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\cos x}{\frac{\sin x}{\operatorname{cosec} y} \times \cot y \operatorname{cosec} y}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\tan y}{\tan x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1302 (ID: 475190)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{5}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{25+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{25-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{25+x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{25+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{5}\right)=\frac{1}{1+\left(\frac{x}{5}\right)^{2}} \cdot \frac{1}{5}=\frac{5}{25+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1303 (ID: 475191)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}+\sqrt{2}[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=f^{\prime}(x)[/math] ) হলে f '(0) এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{9}[/math]
C. [math]x+\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=f(x)=\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}+\sqrt{2} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3} \times \frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{3}{2^{-1}}}+0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=f^{\prime}(x)=x^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(0)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{0}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1304 (ID: 475192)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin (x+h)^{2}-\sin x^{2}}{h}=[/math] =কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]x \cdot \cos x^{2}[/math]
C. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 x \cos x^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin (x+h)^{2}-\sin x^{2}}{h} \\=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin x^{2}\right)=\cos x^{2} \cdot 2 x=2 x \cos x^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1306 (ID: 475194)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} a\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} a\right)=?[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{\ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} a\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} e \cdot \log _{e} a\right)[/math]
 [math]=\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\frac{1}{\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]\left(\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{x}\right)^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a}[/math]
 [math]\left(-\left(\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{x}\right)^{-2}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=-\log _{\mathrm{e}} \mathrm{a} \frac{1}{\mathrm{x}(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\ln \mathrm{a}}{\mathrm{x}(\ln \mathrm{x})^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1307 (ID: 475195)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে, $$\frac{d y}{d x}=?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)-\ln x \frac{d}{d x}(x)}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{x}{x}-\ln x \cdot 1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1308 (ID: 475196)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2019-2020, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{4}-4 x^{3}+4 x^{2}+5[/math] এর লঘিষ্ঠ মান-

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x) = x²-4x² + 4x² +5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 x^{3}-12 x^{2}+8 x=4 x\left(x^{2}-3 x+2\right)=4 x(x-1)(x-2)[/math]
লঘিষ্ঠ ও গরিষ্ঠ মানের জন্য, [math]'(x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 x(x-1)(x-2)=0 \Rightarrow x=0,1,2[/math]
আবার [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=12 x^{2}-24 x+8[/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(0)=8>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ফাংশনটি লঘিষ্ঠ হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 লঘিষ্ঠ মান [math]= 0-0+0+5=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1309 (ID: 475197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln 5}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{x y+1}=5 \Rightarrow x y+1=\ln 5[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y+x \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1310 (ID: 475198)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n} \text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
B. [math]\left(-\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
C. [math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]
D. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{n x^{n-1}}{n y^{n-1}}=-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1311 (ID: 475199)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=25[/math] হলে, [math](3,-4)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{5}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{7}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=25 \Rightarrow 2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(3,-4)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1312 (ID: 475200)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2023-2024, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sec x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{4} \tan x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}y & =\sqrt{\sec x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec x}} \sec x \tan x \\& =\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sec x} \tan x=\frac{y}{2} \tan x\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1313 (ID: 475201)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x(\ln y-x)}{y(\ln x-y)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-x)}{x(y \ln x-y)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \ln x=x \ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\ln y+x \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\ln x-\frac{x}{y}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln y-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x} \cdot \frac{(x \ln y-y)}{(y \ln x-x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1314 (ID: 475202)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গোলাকার সাবানের বুদবুদের আয়তনের বৃদ্ধির হার তার ব্যাসার্ধের বৃদ্ধির হার কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \pi r^{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pi r^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
গোলাকার বুদবুদের আয়তন [math]V=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dV}}{\mathrm{dt}}=4 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}} \Rightarrow\left(\frac{\mathrm{dV}}{\mathrm{dt}}\right) /\left(\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}\right)=4 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1315 (ID: 475203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]e^{4 n^{1} 1}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{\operatorname{tin} 3}, \sin 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]2 e^{4 \ln 3} \cdot \sin x[/math]
গ. [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x} \cdot \sin x[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sin ^{2} x}\right)-e^{\sin ^{2} x} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \cdot 2 \sin x \cos x[/math]
 [math]=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \cdot \sin 2 x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1316 (ID: 475204)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-e^{2 x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+e^{2 x}}{e^{x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-e^{2 x}}{e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right)=\frac{1}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}\right)=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1317 (ID: 475205)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হলে, [math]f^{(11)}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin x \Rightarrow f^{n}(x)=\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{11}(0)=\sin \left(\frac{11 \pi}{2}+0\right)=-\cos 0^{\circ}=-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1318 (ID: 475206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin 2 x[/math] এর 99তম অন্তরকসহগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2^{99} \cos 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]2^{99} \sin 2 \mathrm{x}[/math]
গ. [math]-2^{99} \cos 2 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2^{99} \sin 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin 2 x \Rightarrow y_{99}=2^{99} \sin \left(99 \cdot \frac{\pi}{2}+2 x\right)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=2^{99} \sin \left(50 \pi-\frac{\pi}{2}+2 x\right)=2^{99} \sin \left(-\frac{\pi}{2}+2 x\right) \\=-2^{99} \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}-2 x\right)=-2^{99} \cos 2 x\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
m এর মান কত হলে, y = mx + 1 রেখাটি X অক্ষের সাথে 60° কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=m x+1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=m \Rightarrow m=\tan 60^{\circ} \therefore m=\sqrt{3}[/math]

খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]

 [math]\frac{1}{2z}; 2 \frac{1}{2} \therefore x = 2[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল = [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Question #1321 (ID: 475209)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\ln 2 x, f(x)[/math] বক্ররেখার x = 2 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{1}{2 \mathrm{x}} \cdot 2=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \therefore \mathrm{x}=2[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Question #1322 (ID: 475210)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 x^{2}+2 y^{2}+6 x-10 y+4=0[/math] বৃত্তের উপর (1, 2) বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{5}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{-1} 5[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]2 x^{2}+2 y^{2}[/math]
 [math]+6 x-10 y+4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 x+4 y \frac{d y}{d x}+6-10 \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{4 x+6}{4 y-10}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 x+3}{2 y-5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল = [math]=-\frac{2+3}{4-5}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{5}{-1}=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1323 (ID: 475211)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=2 x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm 2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=2 x+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঢাল শূন্য হবে যখন, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x= \pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1324 (ID: 475212)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}-2 x-4 y+4=0[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](0,2)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]y=0[/math]
খ. [math]x=0[/math]
গ. [math]x=2[/math]
ঘ. [math]y-2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}-2 x-4 y+4=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}-2-4 \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}(2 y-4)=2 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{y-2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2-2}=\frac{1}{0}=\infty[/math]
 [math](0, 2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ,[math]y-2=-\frac{1}{\infty}(x-0) \Rightarrow y-2=0 \therefore y=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1325 (ID: 475213)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]0 \leq x \leq \frac{\pi}{2}[/math] সীমার মধ্যে [math]y=1+2 \sin x+2 \cos ^{2} x[/math] এর মান x এর কোন মানষয়ের জন্য গরিষ্ঠ বা লঘিষ্ঠ হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}, \frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0, \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=1+2 \sin x+2 \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 \cos x-4 \cos x \sin x[/math]
গরিষ্ঠ ও লঘিষ্ঠ মানের জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \cos x-4 \cos x \sin x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \cos x(1-2 \sin x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 অথবা [math]\sin x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{\pi}{2},[/math]
 [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
 হলে গরিষ্ঠ বা লঘিষ্ঠ হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1326 (ID: 475214)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{2 \ln [f(x)]}{\{f(x)\}^{2}}[/math] ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=x \therefore y=\frac{2 \ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln x^{2}}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \frac{1}{x^{2}} 2 x-\ln x^{2} 2 x}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 x\left(1-\ln x^{2}\right)}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2\left(1-\ln x^{2}\right)}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4 x-3\left(2-2 \ln x^{2}\right)}{x^{4}}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2\left(1-\ln x^{2}\right)}{x^{3}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\ln x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=e[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} y}{\mathrm{dx}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-4 \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{3}{2}}<0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=\frac{\ln \mathrm{e}}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1327 (ID: 475215)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
খ. [math]e[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x)=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-x-(1-\ln x) 2 x}{x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1-2(1-\ln x)}{x^{3}}[/math]
লঘু ও গুরুমানের জন্য, [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\ln x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=e[/math]
 [math]x = e[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime \prime}(e)=\frac{-1-1(1-\ln e)}{e^{3}}=-\frac{1}{e^{3}}<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চমান[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=\frac{\ln \mathrm{e}}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1328 (ID: 475216)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{\frac{(3 x+2)}{x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]e^{5}[/math]
C. [math]e^{7}[/math]
D. [math]e^{10}[/math]
E. [math]\mathrm{e}^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+5 x)^{3+\frac{2}{x}}=1-\lim _{5 x \rightarrow 0}\left[(1+5 x)^{\frac{1}{5 x}}\right]^{10}=e^{10}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1329 (ID: 475217)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2 \ln x+3}{x^{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 \ln x-3}{x^{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2 \ln x+5}{x^{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 \ln x-3}{x^{2}}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{2 \ln x+3}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{x \frac{1}{x}-\ln x}{x^{2}}=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}} ; \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=\frac{-x^{2}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)-(1-\ln x) \times 2 x}{\left(x^{4}+1 / 1\right.}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{-x-2 x+2 x \ln x}{x^{4}}=\frac{-3 x+2 x \ln x}{x^{4}}=\frac{2 \ln x-3}{x^{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1330 (ID: 475218)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{4 \sqrt{x}}{1-4 x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{x(1+4 x)}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{x(1+4 \sqrt{x})}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{x}(1+4 x)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{x}(1+4 x)}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{x}(1+4 x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text { Let, } 2 \sqrt{x}=\tan \alpha[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha=\tan ^{-1} 2 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{4 \sqrt{x}}{1-4 x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \tan \alpha}{1-\tan ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan 2 \alpha=2[/math]
 [math]\alpha=2 \tan ^{-1} 2 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{x}(1+4 x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1331 (ID: 475219)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]u=\frac{4}{x}+\frac{36}{2-x}[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]
ঙ. [math]20[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d u}{d x}=\frac{-4}{x^{2}}+\frac{36}{(2-x)^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-1, \frac{1}{2} \therefore u=8[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1332 (ID: 475220)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সাবানের একটি গোলাকার বুদবুদ আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার ও তার ব্যসার্ধের বৃদ্ধির হাররে অনুপাত কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi r^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]v=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d v}{d t}=\frac{4}{3} \pi \times 3 r^{2} \times \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\frac{d v}{d t}}{\frac{d r}{d t}}=4 \pi r^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1333 (ID: 475221)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } f(x)=\sin x \text { then what is the value of } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f\left(x^{2}\right)}{x} \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\text { Undefined }[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{f\left(x^{2}\right)}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin \left(x^{2}\right)}{x}\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\left[\text { L'hospital] } \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x^{2} .2 x}{1}=2 \times 0 \times \cos 0^{\circ}=0\right.[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1334 (ID: 475222)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The current, } I \text { amps, in an electric circuit at time } t \text { seconds is given by } I=16-16(0.5)^{t}, t \geq 0 \text {. What is }[/math] [math]\text { the value of } \mathrm{d} / \mathrm{dt} \text { when } \mathrm{t}=3 \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\ln 4[/math]
B. [math]\ln 2[/math]
C. [math]\ln 16[/math]
D. [math]\ln 8[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{dt}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left[16-16(0.5)^{\mathrm{t}}\right][/math]
 [math]=-16(0.5)^{\mathrm{t}} \times \ln (0.5)[/math]
 [math]\text { at, } t=3,[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dI}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=-16(0.5)^{3} \times \ln (0.5)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \ln (0.5)[/math]
 [math]=2 \ln 2=\ln 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1335 (ID: 475129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan 2 x}{\sin 5 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan 2 x}{\sin 5 x}=\frac{2}{5} \text { [By Technique] }[/math]

Question #1336 (ID: 475130)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2016-2017, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}=\left(\frac{d}{d x} \ln x\right)_{x=2}=\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)_{x=2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1337 (ID: 475131)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin ^{2} x[/math] কে [math]\sin x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]sinx[/math]
খ. [math]2cosx[/math]
গ. [math]2sinx[/math]
ঘ. [math]sin2x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d(\sin x)}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)=\frac{2 \sin x \cdot \cos x}{\cos x}=2 \sin x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1339 (ID: 475133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{\circ}}{x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{180}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{\circ}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}}{x} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin \frac{\pi x}{180}}{\frac{\pi x}{180}}\right) \frac{\pi}{180}=\frac{\pi}{180}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1340 (ID: 475134)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Islamic University of Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]a[/math]
B. [math]-a[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]loga[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x}-1}{x},[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]\text { L' Hospital's Rule }[/math]
 প্রয়োগ করে পাই,[math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a^{x} \log a-1}{1}=a^{0} \cdot \log a=\log a[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1341 (ID: 475135)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 2 x-\cos 3 x}{x^{2}}=\frac{-2^{2}+3^{2}}{2}=\frac{5}{2}[\text { technique }][/math]

Question #1342 (ID: 475136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{e^{x}}}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{x}}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{x}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{e^{x}}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{3 \sqrt{\mathrm{e}^{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{e^{x}}}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{-\frac{x}{2}}\right)=-\frac{1}{2} e^{-\frac{x}{2}}=-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{x}}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1343 (ID: 475137)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\{\ln (\sin 2 x)\}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \cos 2 x[/math]
B. [math]2 \tan 2 x[/math]
C. [math]2 \cos 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \sec 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}[\ln (\sin 2 x)]=\frac{1}{\sin 2 x} \cos 2 x \cdot 2=2 \cot 2 x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1344 (ID: 475138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log s i n x^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]2 x \cot x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 x \cot x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\cos x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}y & =\log \sin x^{2} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sin x^{2}} \times \cos x^{2} \times 2 x \\& =2 x \cot x^{2}\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1345 (ID: 475139)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 \cos ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\cos ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)^{2}=2 \sin ^{-1} x \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{2 \sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1346 (ID: 475140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\tan \sqrt{4 x+3})=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \sin ^{-1} x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\sec ^{2}(4 x+3)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{4 x+3}} \sec ^{2} \sqrt{4 x+3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{4 x+3}} \sec ^{2}(4 x+3)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}(\tan \sqrt{4 x+3})=\sec ^{2} \sqrt{4 x+3} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{4 x+3}} \times 4 \\\quad=\frac{2}{\sqrt{4 x+3}} \cdot \sec ^{2} \sqrt{4 x+3}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1347 (ID: 475141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]1+x^{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-x}{1+x}}=\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1} x\\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1348 (ID: 475142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]x^{x}(1+\log x)[/math]
B. [math]x^{x}+x \log x[/math]
C. [math]x \log x^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}(x+\log x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x} \frac{d}{d x}(x \ln x)=x^{x}\left(\frac{x}{x}+\ln x\right)=x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1349 (ID: 475143)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C), University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}[/math] তাহলে, y'(0) হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]c^{2}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}\left\{\frac{d}{d x} \sin x \ln \left(x^{2}+1\right)\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y^{\prime}(x)=\left(x^{2}+1\right)^{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\left\{\cos x \cdot \ln \left(x^{2}+1\right)+\sin x \cdot \frac{1}{x^{2}+1} \cdot 2 x\right\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{\prime}(0)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1350 (ID: 475144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-21 x^{2}+36 x-20[/math] হলে, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]12 x-42[/math]
B. [math]12x-45[/math]
C. [math]6x-6[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 x^{3}-21 x^{2}+36 x-20[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=6 x^{2}-42 x+36 \Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}(x)=12 x-42[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1352 (ID: 475146)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]2x+y-1=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-2y-3=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y=3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+4 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{2 y}[/math]
 [math](1,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{2(-1)}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y+1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1) \therefore x-2 y-3=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1353 (ID: 475147)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = a[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y = f(x)[/math] ফাংশনটিকে ক্রমহ্রাসমান ফাংশন বলা যাবে, যদি-

Options:
ক. [math]f(a)>0[/math]
খ. [math]f(a)<0[/math]
গ. [math]f'(a) = 0[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x = a[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]y = f(x)[/math]
 ফাংশনটিকে ক্রমহ্রাসমান ফাংশন বলা যাবে যদি [math]f'(a) < 0[/math]
 হয়।

Explanation:

Question #1354 (ID: 475148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x(2 a-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান-

Options:
ক. [math]a[/math]
খ. [math]2a[/math]
গ. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 a x-x^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime}(x)=2 a-2 x ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2[/math]
 [math]-2[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)[/math]
 এর গুরুমান বিদ্যমান সুতরাং [math]f'(x) = 0[/math]
 হবে।[math]2 a-2 x=0 \therefore x=a[/math]
 অতএব, সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]f(x)=a(2 a-a)=a^{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1355 (ID: 475149)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি কণা এমনভাবে চলছে যে [math]t[/math] সময়ে [math]s(t)=3 t+4 t^{2}[/math] দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে। [math]t = 10[/math] সময়ে উহার বেগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]73[/math]
খ. [math]77[/math]
গ. [math]93[/math]
ঘ. [math]83[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{s}(\mathrm{t})=3 \mathrm{t}+4 \mathrm{t}^{2} \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dS}}{\mathrm{dt}}=3+8 \mathrm{t}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{t}=10[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}}=3+8 \times 10=83[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1356 (ID: 475150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গাড়ী [math]t[/math] সেকেন্ড সময়ে [math]3 t^{2}-5 t+2[/math] দূরত্ব অতিক্রম করে। কখন তার বেগ শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{6}{5} \sec[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{3} \sec[/math]
গ. $ [math]\frac{3}{2} \sec[/math] $
ঘ. [math]\frac{5}{6} \sec[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{s}=3 \mathrm{t}^{2}-5 \mathrm{t}+2 \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{ds}}{\mathrm{dt}}=6 \mathrm{t}-5=0 \therefore \mathrm{t}=\frac{5}{6} \mathrm{sec}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1357 (ID: 475151)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+3 x}-\sqrt{1-4 x}}{x}[/math] এর মান হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+3 x}-\sqrt{1-4 x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(\sqrt{1+3 x}-\sqrt{1-4 x})(\sqrt{1+3 x}+\sqrt{1-4 x})}{x(\sqrt{1+3 x}+\sqrt{1-4 x})}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+3 x-1+4 x}{x(\sqrt{1+3 x}+\sqrt{1-4 x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7}{\sqrt{1+3 x}+\sqrt{1-4 x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1358 (ID: 475152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log _{y} x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x(1+\ln x)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x(1+\ln y)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{y(1+\ln x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Hints: ফাংশনটিকে একটু সরল করে এরপর উভয়পাশে ln নিয়ে Differentiation করো।Solve : [math]y=\log _{y} x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{y}=x\left[y=\log _{a}^{b}\right.[/math]
 হলে, a = b লেখা যায়]⇒ ylny = lnx [উভয়পাশে ln নেয়া হয়েছে]⇒ ylny - lnx = 0[math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=-\frac{0-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}}}{\mathrm{y}^{\frac{1}{\mathrm{y}}+\ln y-0}}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}(1+\ln y)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1359 (ID: 475153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 9 x-\sin 7 x}{\sin 7 x-\sin 5 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 9 x-\sin 7 x}{\sin 7 x-\sin 5 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \cos 8 x \sin x}{2 \cos 6 x \sin x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 8 x}{\cos 6 x}=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1360 (ID: 475154)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}\right)^{2} \times \frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1361 (ID: 475155)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}-2 x-4 y+4=0[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](0,2)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y=0[/math]
খ. [math]x=0[/math]
গ. [math]x=2[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=2[/math]
ঙ. [math]x=y[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { Solve: } y^{2}-2 x-4 y+4=0[/math]
(0, 2) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y \cdot y_{1}-2 \frac{x+x_{1}}{2}[/math]
 [math]-4 \frac{y+y_{1}}{2}+4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \cdot 2-(x+0)-2(y+2)+4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y-x-2[/math]
 [math]y-4+4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-x=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0[/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 এর উপর লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ,[math]0.x – 1.y + k = 0[/math]
, যা (0, 2) বিন্দুগামী ।[math]−1.2 + k = 0[/math]
 [math]k=2[/math]
অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ, [math]−y + 2 = 0 ⇒ y = 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1362 (ID: 475156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{11}(0)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Solve: } \mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=\sin \mathrm{x} \\\quad \therefore \mathrm{f}^{1}(\mathrm{x})=\cos \mathrm{x}=\sin \left(1 \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)\\\mathrm{f}^{2}(\mathrm{x})=-\sin \mathrm{x}=\sin \left(2 \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \\\mathrm{f}^{3}(\mathrm{x})=-\cos \mathrm{x}=\sin \left(3 \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right) \\\mathrm{f}^{\mathrm{n}}(\mathrm{x})=\sin \left(n \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
Ans. C

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1363 (ID: 475157)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}x^{2}, & x>0 \\1, & x=0 \\x, & x<0\end{array}\right.[/math] হয় তবে , [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} f(x)[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]
E. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\text{Solve:}[/math]
 [math]\text{L.H.L: } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{-}} f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{-}}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0}(0-h)[/math]
 [math]=0-0=0[/math]
 [math]\text{R.H.L: } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{+}} f(x)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0^{+}}\left(x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0}(0+h)^{2}=(0+0)^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\text{Ans. (C)}[/math]


Explanation:
কোনো ফাংশনের L. H L (Left Hand Limit ও R.H. L (Right Hand Limit) যদি সমান হয় তবে সেই ফাংশনের Limit এর অস্তিত্ব আছে এবং সেই সমান Value টিই হচ্ছে ঐ ফাংশনের Limiting Value আর L.H.L, R.H. L ও Functional Value তিনটিই সমান হলে সেই ফাংশনকে অবিচ্ছিন্ন ফাংশন বলে ।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1364 (ID: 475158)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]=-\sin \sqrt{x} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1365 (ID: 475159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}=2 \tan ^{-1} x \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \cdot \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{9} e^{-9 x}[/math]

ঘ. [math]9 e^{-9 x}[/math]

 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]

Question #1367 (ID: 475161)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]1+x^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\left(\frac{1+x}{1-x}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{(1-x) \times 1-(1+x)(-1)}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{(1-x)^{2}}{(1-x)^{2}+(1+x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1-x+1+x}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2+2 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1368 (ID: 475162)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর প্রেক্ষিতে [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{5}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{25+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5}{25-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{25+x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{25+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} \frac{x}{5}\right)=\frac{1}{1+\left(\frac{x}{5}\right)^{2}} \times \frac{1}{5}=\frac{1 \times 25}{25+x^{2}} \times \frac{1}{5}=\frac{5}{25+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1369 (ID: 475163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{x \times \frac{1}{x} \ln x \times 1}{x^{2}}=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1370 (ID: 475164)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরজ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{1-e^{2 x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1+e^{2 x}}{e^{x}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1-e^{2 x}}{e^{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\tan ^{-1}\left(e^{x}\right)\right\}=\frac{1}{1+e^{2 x}} \times e^{x}=\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1371 (ID: 475165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math] বক্ররেখা [math](2,2 \sqrt{2})[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=4 x \Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2}{y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left[\frac{d y}{d x}\right]_{(2.2 \sqrt{2})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1372 (ID: 475166)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]0 \leq \mathrm{x} \leq \frac{\pi}{2}[/math] সীমার মধ্যে [math]y=1+2 \sin x+2 \cos ^{2} x[/math] এর মান x এর কোন মানদ্বয়ের জন্য গরিষ্ঠ বা লঘিষ্ঠ হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}, \frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0, \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y_{1}=2 \cos x+4 \cos x(-\sin x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 0=2 \cos x-4 \cos x \sin x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos x(2 \sin x-1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos x=0 \therefore x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 অথবা, [math]\text { or, } \sin x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\frac{\pi}{6} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\left\{\frac{\pi}{2}, \frac{\pi}{6}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1373 (ID: 475167)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গোলাকার বলের আয়তনের বৃদ্ধির হার তার ব্যাসার্ধ [math]r[/math] এর বৃদ্ধির হারের কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]2 \pi r[/math]
গ. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]v=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3} \Rightarrow \frac{d v}{d t}=4 \pi r^{2} \times \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]

Explanation:
