Question #1374 (ID: 475168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] কাংশনটির গুরুমান লঘুমান অপেক্ষা ক্ষুদ্রতর হলে গুরুমানটি কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \therefore y_{1}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \therefore 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \therefore x=\pm 1[/math]
এখানে, [math]y_{2}=\frac{2}{x^{3}} ; \quad x=1[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{2}=2>0[/math]
 অর্থাৎ লঘুমান পাব।[math]x=-1[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{2}=-2<0[/math]
 অর্থাৎ গুরুমান পাব [math]\therefore y=-1+\frac{1}{(-1)}=-2 \therefore[/math]
 গুরুমান [math]= -2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1375 (ID: 475169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর সর্বনিম্ন মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} ; y_{1}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}} ; y_{2}=\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ বা সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য [math]y_{1}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \therefore x=\pm 1[/math]
 [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{2}=\frac{2}{1}=2>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 এর সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া যাবে[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=1+\frac{1}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1376 (ID: 475170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5[/math] হলে [math]f(x)[/math] ] এর গরিষ্ঠ মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]6[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]5[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5 ; f^{\prime}(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x ; f^{\prime \prime}(x)=6 x-6[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ বা সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 ; 3 x^{2}-6 x=0 ; 3 x(x-2)=0 ; x=0,2[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime}(x)=6 \times 0-6=-6<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+5[/math]
 এর গরিষ্ঠ মান পাওয়া যাবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 -গরিষ্ঠ মান [math]f(0)=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1377 (ID: 475171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]-\infty[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{x \sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x}}}{-x} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x}}}{-1}=-\sqrt{1}=-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1378 (ID: 475172)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]sinx[/math]
B. [math]cosx[/math]
C. [math]x[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x) \Rightarrow y=x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sqrt{\cos 2 x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2 \sin x}{\sqrt{\tan x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\cos 2 x})=-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]

Question #1381 (ID: 475175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003, 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Question #1382 (ID: 475176)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0 \frac{y}{z}} \cdot \sin z=y \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z} \\=y \cdot 1=y .\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1383 (ID: 475061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = secx[/math] হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime \prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
E. [math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sec x \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sec x \tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sec x \cdot \sec ^{2} x+\tan x \cdot \sec x \tan x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sec x\left(\sec ^{2} x+\tan ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\sec x\left(1+\tan ^{2} x+\tan ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime \prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\sec \frac{\pi}{4}\left(1+2 \tan ^{2} \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2}(1+2)[/math]
 [math]=3 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1384 (ID: 475062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=x^{8} \log x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\mathbf{y}_{9}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{8 !}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{9 !}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{6 !}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7 !}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x^{n} \ln x \Rightarrow y_{n+1}=\frac{n !}{x} \Rightarrow y_{9}=\frac{8 !}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1385 (ID: 475063)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=q x+\frac{p}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]x^{2} y_{2}+x y_{1}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]qx + py[/math]
D. [math]q-\frac{p}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=q x+\frac{p}{x} \Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=q-\frac{p}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 p}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{2} y_{2}+x y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=x^{2} \times \frac{2 p}{x^{3}}+x[/math]
 [math]\times\left(q-\frac{p}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 p}{x}+q x-\frac{p}{x}[/math]
 [math]=q x+\underset{x}{p}=y[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1386 (ID: 475064)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-1[/math] ফাংশনটির [math]Optimal value[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x[/math]
 [math]\text { Optimal value }[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x=0 \therefore x=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Optimal value }=0^{2}-1=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1387 (ID: 475065)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = kx (1 + x)[/math] বক্র রেখাটির [math](2,0)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]x[/math] অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে [math]k[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{5 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-1}{5 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{5 \sqrt{-3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=k x(1+x)=k x+k x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=k+2 k x[/math]
 [math](2, 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{k}+2 \mathrm{k} \cdot 2[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{k}+4 \mathrm{k}=5 \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 প্রশ্নমতে, [math]5 \mathrm{k}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \therefore \mathrm{k}=\frac{1}{5 \sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1388 (ID: 475066)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
M-ক্ষেত্রের উর্বরতা N-ক্ষেত্রের উর্বরতার দ্বিগুণ। M-ক্ষেত্রের একটি [math]800 ×[/math] [math]100\mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math] আয়তাকার ভূমি, N-ক্ষেত্রে সমান উৎপাদনশীল একটি বর্গাকার ভূমির সঙ্গে বিনিময় করতে হলে বর্গাকার ভূমির দৈর্ঘ্য কত m হতে হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]400[/math]
খ. [math]450[/math]
গ. [math]600[/math]
ঘ. [math]900[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
M এর ক্ষেত্রফল = [math]=800 \times 100 \mathrm{~m}^{2}[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, N এর ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\begin{array}{l}=2 \times 800 \times 100 \mathrm{~m}^{2} \\=160000 \mathrm{~m}^{2}=(400)^{2} \mathrm{~m}^{2}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বর্গাকার ক্ষেত্রের বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য = 400 m

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1389 (ID: 475067)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ভূমির সীমান্ত রেখা বরাবর সমদূরত্বে গাছের চারা লাগানো হবে। একটি আয়তাকার ভূমি যার দৈর্ঘ্য প্রন্থের চারগুণ, সমান ক্ষেত্রফল বিশিষ্ট অন্য একটি বর্গাকার ভূমির সঙ্গে বিনিময় করা হল। এক্ষেত্রে চারা রোপন সংখ্যার কি পরিবর্তন হলো?

Options:
ক. 10% বাড়লো
খ. 10% কমলো
গ. অপরিবর্তিত রইল
ঘ. 20% কমলো


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, আয়তাকার ক্ষেত্রের প্রন্থ= x মি. এবং দৈর্ঘ্য = 4x মি. x মিটার পরপর ভূমির সীমান্তে চারা রোপন করলে চারা সংখ্যা 10 টি হবে। আবার, ঐ ক্ষেত্রফলের সমান বর্গক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]4 x \times x=4 x^{2}=(2 x)^{2}[/math]
 অনুরূপে x মিটার পরপর চারা রোপন করলে চারার সংখ্যা 4 টি হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 চারা কমলো = [math]=\frac{10-8}{10} \times 100=20 \%[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1390 (ID: 475068)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বৃত্তাকার জলাশয় থেকে সমস্ত মাছ অন্য একটি বৃত্তাকার জলাশয়ে স্থানান্তর করা হল। দ্বিতীয় জলাশয়ের ব্যাসার্ধ প্রথম জলাশয়ের দ্বিগুণ, তবে গভীরতা প্রথম জলাশয়ের অর্ধেক। স্থানান্তরের কারণে মাছের ঘনত্বে কত পরিবর্তন আসলো?

Options:
ক. দ্বিগুণ কমলো
খ. দ্বিগুণ বাড়লো
গ. অপরিবর্তিত রইল
ঘ. চারগুণ কমলো


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, ১ম জলাশয়ের গভীরতা = h এবং ব্যাসার্ধ = r হলে,আয়তন, [math]V₁ = r²h;[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\mathrm{V}_{2}=\pi \times 4 \mathrm{r}^{2} \times \frac{\mathrm{h}}{2}=2 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2} \mathrm{~h}[/math]
 [math]\frac{V_{2}}{V_{1}}=\frac{2 \pi r^{2} h}{\pi r^{2} h}=2[/math]
 = 2 গুণ কমলো

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1391 (ID: 475069)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{1}=\frac{\sin 0}{1}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1392 (ID: 475070)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]5 \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]4 \mathrm{a}[/math]
C. [math]3 a^{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 a^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{x^{\frac{5}{2}}-a^{\frac{5}{2}}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow a} \frac{(\sqrt{x})^{5}-(\sqrt{a})^{5}}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{a}} \\=5(\sqrt{a})^{5-1}=5(\sqrt{a})^{4}=5 a^{2}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1393 (ID: 475071)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{\sin ^{2} 2 x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{\sin ^{2} 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{\sin ^{2} 2 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{2 \cdot\left(\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}\right)^{2} \frac{x^{2}}{4}}{\left(\frac{\sin 2 x}{2 x}\right)^{2} \cdot 4 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \cdot 1 \cdot \frac{1}{4}}{1.4}=\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1394 (ID: 475072)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan 2 x}{\sin 5 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan 2 x}{\sin 5 x}=\frac{2}{5} \text { [By Technique] }[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1395 (ID: 475073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+4 x)^{\frac{(3 x+2)}{x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]e^{\frac{3}{4}}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{3}[/math]
D. [math]e^{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
টেকনিক [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+m x)^{\frac{n}{x}}=e^{m n}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+4 x)^{\frac{(3 x+2)}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+4 x)^{3+\frac{2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=e^{4 \times 2}=e^{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1396 (ID: 475074)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{2 x+1}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x}{2 x+1}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{2+\frac{1}{x}}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1397 (ID: 475075)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 7 x-\sin x}{\sin 6 x}=[/math] ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{6}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{7}{6}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. $-1


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 7 x-\sin x}{\sin 6 x}[/math]
 [ [math]\frac{0}{0}[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \cos 7 x-\cos x}{6 \cos 6 x}=\frac{7-1}{6}=\frac{6}{6}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1398 (ID: 475076)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1399 (ID: 475077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin (\cos x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sin \cos (\cos x)[/math]
B. [math]\cos x \sin (\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]
D. [math]-\sin x \sin (\cos x)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin (\cos x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\cos (\cos x)(-\sin x)=-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1400 (ID: 475078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1995-1996, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin (\sin x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]
B. [math]\cos x \cos (\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]\cos (\cos x)[/math]
D. [math]\cos (\sin x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x} =\cos (\sin x) \frac{d}{d x}(\sin x)[/math]
 [math]=\cos (\sin x)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos x-\cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1401 (ID: 475079)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+x}{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+x}{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \cos ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{1-\mathrm{x}^{2}}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1402 (ID: 475080)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]t[/math] এর প্রেক্ষিতে [math]\frac{d}{d t}(\sqrt{t}+9)=?[/math] যখন [math]t=16[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d t}(\sqrt{t}+9)=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{t}}[/math]
 [math]t=16[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{t}}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{16}}=\frac{1}{2 \times 4}=\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1403 (ID: 475081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}[/math] এর অন্তরজ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{4 \sqrt{x e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}\right)=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{e^{\sqrt{x}}}} \times e^{\sqrt{x}} \times \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{4 \sqrt{x e^{\sqrt{x}}}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1404 (ID: 475083)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log (\sec x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos x[/math]
B. [math]\sec x[/math]
C. [math]\sec x \tan x[/math]
D. [math]\tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\log (\sec x) \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sec x} \times \sec x \tan x \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\tan x[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1405 (ID: 475084)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2016-2017, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}=\left(\frac{d}{d x} \ln x\right)_{x=2}=\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)_{x=2}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1406 (ID: 475085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{8 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}-4}\right)=\frac{\left(x^{2}-4\right) \cdot 2 x-x^{2} \cdot 2 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}=-\frac{8 x}{\left(x^{2}-4\right)^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1407 (ID: 475086)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin ^{2} x[/math] কে [math]\sin x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে অন্তরীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]sinx[/math]
খ. [math]2cosx[/math]
গ. [math]2sinx[/math]
ঘ. [math]sin2x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d(\sin x)}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)=\frac{2 \sin x \cdot \cos x}{\cos x}=2 \sin x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1408 (ID: 475087)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\sqrt{x}}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}\left(1+x^{2}\right)}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1409 (ID: 475088)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}\\=\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{2 \cos ^{2 \frac{x}{2}}}}\\=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{x}{2}\right)\\=\frac{x}{2}\\ \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1410 (ID: 475089)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-x}[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ নির্ণয় করঃ

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sec x+\tan x}{\sec x-\tan x}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{\text {kinx }}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sin 3 x}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 \sqrt{x}}{1-(\sqrt{x})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}(1+x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1411 (ID: 475090)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x y=1[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1412 (ID: 475091)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5 x^{4}-x^{3} y+4 y^{3}=0[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{20 x^{3}+3 x^{2} y}{x^{3}+12 y^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-20 x^{3}+3 x^{2} y}{x^{3}-12 y^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{20 x^{3}-3 x^{2} y}{x^{3}-12 y^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{20 x^{3}-3 x^{2} y}{x^{3}+12 y^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{20 x^{3}-3 x^{2} y}{-x^{3}+12 y^{2}}=\frac{20 x^{3}-3 x^{2} y}{x^{3}-12 y^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1413 (ID: 475092)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{y}=\mathbf{a x}+\frac{\mathbf{b}}{\mathbf{x}}[/math] হলে, নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. [math]x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+2 \frac{d y}{d x}=-2 a[/math]
B. [math]x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+2 \frac{d y}{d x}=4 a[/math]
C. [math]x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+2 \frac{d y}{d x}=2 a[/math]
D. [math]x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+2 \frac{d y}{d x}=3 a[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+2 \frac{d y}{d x}=3 a[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{xy}_{2}+2 \mathrm{y}_{1}=\frac{2 \mathrm{~b}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}+2 \mathrm{a}-\frac{2 \mathrm{~b}}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=2 \mathrm{a}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1414 (ID: 475093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{2}+x^{2}-8 x+4[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x=\frac{5}{2}[/math] এ অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{109}{24}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{109}{24}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{13}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]+x^{2}-8 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{2}+2 x-8[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{5}{2}[/math]
 স্পর্শকের চাল, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)^{2}+2[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{5}{2}-8[/math]
 [math]=\frac{25}{4}+5-8=\frac{13}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1415 (ID: 475094)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-45 x+13[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-3, 94)[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শক এর ঢাল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-45 x+13[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-6 x-45[/math]
 [math](-3,94)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল,[math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=3(-3)^{2}-6(-3)-45[/math]
 [math]=27+18-45=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1416 (ID: 475095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x(2x-1) (x+3)[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1, 4)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]13[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]23[/math]
ঘ. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=x(2 x-1)(x+3) \Rightarrow y=2 x^{3}+5 x^{2}-3 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=6 x^{2}+10 x-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]= 6+ 10-3-13[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1417 (ID: 475096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-x+3[/math] বক্ররেখার ওপর [math]A(-1, 0)[/math] একটি বিন্দু হলে, [math]A[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত অভিলম্বের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]8[/math]
খ. [math]-8[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=x^{3}-3 x^{2}-x+3 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-6 x-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math](-1, 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]= 3+6-1=8[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]=-\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1418 (ID: 475097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{3}-2 x y^{2}=1[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](-1, 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{3}-2 x y^{2}=1 \Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-2 y^{2}-4 x y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3 x^{2}-2 y^{2}}{4 x y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3(-1)^{2}-2 \cdot 1^{2}}{4 \cdot(-1) \cdot 1}=\frac{3-2}{-4}=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1419 (ID: 475098)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{2}+8 x^{-2}-9[/math] বক্ররেখার স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি, যখন [math]x = 7?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]y=6 x-11[/math]
খ. [math]x+6 y=8[/math]
গ. [math]6 x-y=8[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=6 x+11[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=8+\frac{8}{4}-9=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শ বিন্দু [math](2, 1)[/math]
 [math]y=2 x^{2}+8 x^{-2}-9[/math]
 [math](2.1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ঢাল [math]= 8-2=6[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ,[math]\begin{aligned}& y-1=6(x-2) \\\Rightarrow & y-1=6 x-12 \\\Rightarrow & y=6 x-11\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1420 (ID: 475099)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = y[/math] সরলরেখাটি [math]xy² = 4(4x)[/math] বক্ররেখাটির যে বিন্দুতে মিলিত হয়, বক্ররেখাটির সেই বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]y+x-4=0[/math]
খ. [math]y+x+4=0[/math]
গ. [math]y-x-4=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-y-4=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x = y[/math]
 এবং [math]xy² = 4 (4-x)[/math]
রেখাদ্বয় হতে পাই, [math]x^{3}=16-4 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}[/math]
 [math]+4 x-16=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3}[/math]
 [math]-2 x^{2}+2 x^{2}-4 x+8 x-16=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}[/math]
 [math](x-2)+2 x(x-2)+8(x-2)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\left(x^{2}+2 x+8\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=2, y=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শ বিন্দু/ ছেদ বিন্দু [math](2, 2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=\frac{16}{x}-4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{16}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{16}{2 y x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শ বিন্দু ছেদ বিন্দু [math](2, 2)[/math]
 তে ঢাল [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{16}{2 x^{2} y}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{16}{2 \times 4(2)}[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math]y-2[/math]
 [math]=-1(x-2)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+y-4=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

[math](0, 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y = e^{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:

ঘ. [math]y=-x+1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Question #1422 (ID: 475101)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2013-2014, 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] - বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]x=\pm 2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \therefore x= \pm 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1423 (ID: 475102)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2006-2007, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}=2 \text { [By L' H Rule] }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1424 (ID: 475103)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](1,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]2x+y-1=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-2y-3=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y=3[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+2 y^{2}=3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+4 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{2 y}[/math]
 [math](1,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{2(-1)}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y+1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1) \therefore x-2 y-3=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1425 (ID: 475104)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}+x^{2}-8 x+4[/math] ফাংশনটির সর্বনিম্ন মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{16}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-16}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{16}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-16}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{x^{3}}{3}+x^{2}-8 x+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2}+2 x-8[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2 x+x[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x-8=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)(x+4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,-4[/math]
x=2 হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=4+2=6>0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া যাবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান [math]=\frac{2^{3}}{3}+2^{2}-8[/math]
 [math]\times 2+4=-\frac{16}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1426 (ID: 475105)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-4 x+11[/math] বক্ররেখাটির সর্বনিম্ন বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](-2,-7)[/math]
খ. [math](2,8)[/math]
গ. [math](2, 7)[/math]
ঘ. [math](2,-7[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-4 x+11 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-4[/math]
লঘু-গুরু মানের জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 2 x-4=0 \Rightarrow x=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 লঘু বা সর্বনিম্ন বিন্দু [math](2, 7)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1427 (ID: 475106)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2015-2016, 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangladesh Military Academy, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}(1-x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{27}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{x}}{27}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{x}{27}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{27}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}(1-x)=x^{2}-x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-3 x^{2} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2-6 x[/math]
সর্বনিম্ন ও সর্বোচ্চ মানের জন্য, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x-3 x^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x(2-3 x)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=0, \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]x=0[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2>0[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান পাওয়া পাবে,[math]x=3[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2-6 \cdot \frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=2-4=-2<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান পাওয়া যাবে।সর্বোচ্চ মানটি, [math]|y|{x=\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{2}-\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{9}-\frac{8}{27}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{12-8}{27}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{27}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1428 (ID: 475107)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-6 x+5[/math] ফাংশনটির সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]-4[/math]
গ. [math]16[/math]
ঘ. [math]-16[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}-6 x+5 \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=2 x-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=2>0,[/math]
 লঘুমান/সর্বনিম্নমান হবেযখন [math]2 x-6=0[/math]
 হয় [math]⇒ x = 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান, [math]f(3)=3^{2}-6 \times 3+5=-4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1429 (ID: 475108)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](1, 6)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y=x^{2}+5[/math] বক্ররেখাটি কেমন হবে?

Options:
ক. ক্রমহ্রাসমান
খ. ক্রমবর্ধমান
গ. কমবেও না বাড়বেও না
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}+5 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x[/math]
 [math](1, 6)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=2 \times 1=2>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ফাংশনটি ক্রমবর্ধমান।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1430 (ID: 475109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{x}(\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\alpha[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-(1-x)}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1431 (ID: 475110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int \cos \frac{x}{2} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \cos \frac{x}{2}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sin \frac{x}{2}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sec \frac{x}{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 \operatorname{cosec} \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\int \cos \frac{x}{2} \mathrm{~d} x=\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{2}{2}}=2 \sin \frac{x}{2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1432 (ID: 475111)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 7 x-\cos 9 x}{\cos 3 x-\cos 5 x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin 8 x \sin x}{2 \sin 4 x \sin x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 8x}{8 x} \frac{4 x}{\sin 4 x} \times \frac{8}{4}=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1433 (ID: 475112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (2+h)-\ln 2}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln \left(\frac{2+h}{3}\right)}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln \left(1+\frac{h}{2}\right)}{h}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{h}{2} \frac{h^{2}}{8}+\frac{h^{3}}{24}}{h}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { Shortcut: L'Hospital rule }[/math]
 অনু্যায়ী, [math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{2+h}}{1}=\frac{1}{2+0}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1434 (ID: 475113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+\mathrm{x}}{1-\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} 1+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} \mathrm{x} \cdot \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1435 (ID: 475114)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x^{x-1}[/math]
B. [math]x \cdot x^{x-1}[/math]
C. [math]x \ln x[/math]
D. [math]x^{x}(1+\ln x)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{x} \Rightarrow \ln y=x \ln x \Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}=\ln x+1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{x}(\ln x+1)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1436 (ID: 475115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-y}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5 ; x y+1=\ln 5 \Rightarrow x y=\ln 5-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \frac{d y}{d x}+y=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1437 (ID: 475116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{3 x y+5}=10[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\underline{x}}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]3 x y+5=\ln 10 \Rightarrow 3\left(y+x \frac{d y}{d x}\right)=0 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-y}{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1438 (ID: 475117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\pm 1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1439 (ID: 475118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 x^{2}+3 x-5[/math] বক্ররেখার (1, 2) বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]11[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=4 x^{2}+3 x-5 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=8 x+3[/math]
 [math]\left.\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{(1,2)}=8 \times 1+3=11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1440 (ID: 475119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=y[/math] সরলরেখাটি [math]x y^{2}=4(4-x)[/math] বক্ররেখাটির যে বিন্দুতে মিলিত হয়, বক্ররেখাটির সেই বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]y+x-4=0[/math]
খ. [math]y+x+4=0[/math]
গ. [math]y-x-4=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-y-4=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^{3}=16-4 x[/math]
 দেখেই বোঝা যায় [math]x = 2[/math]
 [math]2^{3}=16-4 \times 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=2 ;[/math]
 [math]y^{2}+2 x y y_{1}=-4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4-y^{2}}{2 x y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4-4}{2 \times 2 \times 2}[/math]
 [math]=-1 \rightarrow[/math]
 ঢাল[math]\therefore \frac{y-2}{x-2}=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y-2=-x+2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x+y-4=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\alpha[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-(1-x)}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]

C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:

 [math]=\tan ^{-1} 1+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x:[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Question #1443 (ID: 475122)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5 ; x y+1=\ln 5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y=\ln 5-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore x \frac{d y}{d x}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1444 (ID: 475123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]x[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\ln (1+x)}{x} \quad\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { form }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{1}{1+x}}{1} \text { [L'hospital rule] } \\=\frac{1}{1+0}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1445 (ID: 475124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L'Hospital Rule] }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2} .1=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1446 (ID: 475125)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln 5}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{x y+1}=5 \Rightarrow x y+1=\ln 5[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y+x \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1447 (ID: 475126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x(\ln y-x)}{y(\ln x-y)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-x)}{x(y \ln x-y)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \ln x=x \ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\ln y+x \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\ln x-\frac{x}{y}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln y-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x} \cdot \frac{(x \ln y-y)}{(y \ln x-x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1448 (ID: 475127)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-1+x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1449 (ID: 475128)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2003-2004, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1450 (ID: 474979)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d(\cos x)}(\sin x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cot x[/math]
B. [math]-\cot x[/math]
C. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\cot x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d(\cos x)}(\sin x)=\frac{\cos x}{-\sin x}=-\cot x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1451 (ID: 474980)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]Inx[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\ln \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর অন্তরক সহগ হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d\left(\ln \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)\right)}{d(\ln x)}=\frac{d\left(\ln \left(x^{-1}\right)\right)}{d(\ln x)}=\frac{-d(\ln x)}{d(\ln x)}=-1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1452 (ID: 474981)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}, x>0[/math] ফাংশনের চরম বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](1,-1)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(-1, \frac{-3}{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math](1,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(2, \frac{5}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](1,2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}, x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f(x)=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
লঘু ও গুরুমানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x= \pm 1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=1[/math]
 যখন [math]x > 0[/math]
x = 1 হলে, [math]f(1)=1+\frac{1}{1}=1+1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 চরম বিন্দু [math](1, 2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1453 (ID: 474982)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^2 = 4x[/math] এবং [math]y = x[/math] দ্বারা আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. 3
খ. 8
গ. [math]\dfrac{8}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\dfrac{3}{8}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y^2 = 4x[/math]
 একটি পরাবৃত্ত এবং [math]y = x[/math]
 একটি সরলরেখা। ছেদবিন্দুগুলো নির্ণয় করে, যথাযথ সীমা নির্ধারণ করে [math]x[/math]
 বা [math]y[/math]
-এর উপর নির্ভর করে নির্দিষ্টকরণ করে ইন্টিগ্রেশনের মাধ্যমে ক্ষেত্রফল নির্ণয় করা হয়।

Explanation:

Question:
[math]y = x - x^2[/math] একটি স্পর্শক [math]x + y = k[/math] হলে [math]k[/math] এর মান?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
স্পর্শক রূপে [math]2x - x^2 = k[/math]
D = 0 হলে [math]k = -1[/math]
 হয়

Explanation:

Question #1455 (ID: 474984)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = \tan^{-1}\left(\dfrac{2x}{1 - x^2}\right)[/math] হলে [math]\dfrac{dy}{dx} =[/math]?

Options:
A. 2
B. [math]\dfrac{2}{1 + x^2}[/math]
C. 2
D. [math]\dfrac{2}{1 - x^2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\dfrac{2x}{1 - x^2}[/math]
 হলো [math]\tan 2\theta[/math]
-এর ফর্মুলার বিপরীত। তাই [math]y = 2 \tan^{-1} x[/math]
 হবে এবং [math]\dfrac{dy}{dx} = \dfrac{2}{1 + x^2}[/math]
।

Explanation:

Question #1456 (ID: 474985)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = \dfrac{2}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. 8
খ. -8
গ. 8
ঘ. -2


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y = \dfrac{2}{x}[/math]
 এর জন্য [math]\dfrac{dy}{dx} = -\dfrac{2}{x^2}[/math]
 হয়। এতে [math]x = 1[/math]
 বসালে, ঢাল হয় [math]-2[/math]
।

Explanation:

Question #1457 (ID: 474986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{1 - \cos x}{x^2} =[/math]?

Options:
A. 2
B. [math]\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\dfrac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\dfrac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{1 - \cos x}{x^2} = \dfrac{1}{2}[/math]
 এটি লিমিটের একটি গুরুত্বপূর্ণ সূত্র, যেটি [math]\cos x[/math]
-এর Maclaurin ধারার প্রয়োগে প্রমাণ করা যায়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1460 (ID: 474989)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles

Question:
[math]u[/math] আদিবেগে আনুভূমিকের সহিত [math]\alpha[/math] কোণে প্রক্ষিপ্ত বস্তুর আনুভূমিক পাল্লা কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{u \sin 2\alpha}{g}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{u^2 \sin 2\alpha}{2g}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{u \sin \alpha}{2g}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{u^2 \sin 2\alpha}{g}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
পাল্লা: [math]R = \frac{u^2 \sin 2\alpha}{g}[/math]যা গতি বিজ্ঞান থেকে প্রাপ্ত

Explanation:

Question #1461 (ID: 474990)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^2 - 2x + 5 = 0[/math] এর ন্যূনতম মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. 3
খ. 2.75
গ. 4
ঘ. 5


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x^2 - 2x + 5 = (x - 1)^2 + 4[/math]
 [math](x - 1)^2[/math]
 এর ন্যূনতম মান [math]0[/math]
 হলে, সম্পূর্ণ প্রকাশের মান হয় [math]4[/math]
অতএব, ন্যূনতম মান [math]= 4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1462 (ID: 474991)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = x^3 - 3x^2 + 2[/math] এর গুরুমান/লঘুমান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. 2
খ. 5
গ. 10
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]f'(x) = 3x^2 - 6x = 3x(x - 2)[/math]
 ⇒ [math]x = 0[/math]
 এবং [math]x = 2[/math]
।[math]f(0) = 0 - 0 + 2 = 2[/math]
 এবং [math]f(2) = 8 - 12 + 2 = -2[/math]
। তাই গুরুমান [math]= 2[/math]
, লঘুমান [math]= -2[/math]
। কোনো অপশনেই [math]-2[/math]
 নেই, তাই সঠিক উত্তর: কোনোটিই নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1463 (ID: 474992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = e^{2x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{2x}[/math]
B. [math]2e^{2x}[/math]
C. [math]2xe^x[/math]
D. [math]e^x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
চেইন রুল প্রয়োগ করে: [math]dy/dx = \frac{d}{dx}(e^{2x}) = 2e^{2x}[/math]।

Explanation:

Question #1464 (ID: 474993)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text { lim }\\x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}=?\end{array}[/math]

Options:
A. 0
B. 1
C. 2
D. [math]\frac{n}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.0

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { }\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{-\cos x}{-\sin x}=\frac{\cos \frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin \frac{\pi}{2}}=\frac{0}{1}=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1465 (ID: 474994)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{2}-9}{x-5 x+6}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. 6
B. 0
C. -6
D. 2


Correct Answer: A.6

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{x^{2}-9}{x^{2}-5 x+6},\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { }\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 3} \frac{2 x}{2 x-5} \\=\frac{2 \times 3}{2 \times 3-5}=\frac{6}{6-5}=6\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1466 (ID: 474995)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{x-2}{x^{2}-5 x+6}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. 1
B. 0
C. -1
D. 3


Correct Answer: C.-1

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{x-2}{x^{2}-5 x+6},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right].[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{1}{2 x-5}=\frac{1}{2 \times 2-5}=-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1467 (ID: 474996)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{2^{\theta}-1}{\theta}=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. 2
B. ln2
C. ln [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. ln [math]\theta[/math]


Correct Answer: B.ln2

Solution:
[math]\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{2^{\theta}-1}{\theta},\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { }\right]=\lim _{\theta \rightarrow 0} \frac{2^{\theta} \ln 2}{1}=2^{0} \ln 2=\ln 2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1468 (ID: 474997)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 e^{-\sin x}-2}{\sin x}=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. -1
B. 1
C. -2
D. 2


Correct Answer: C.-2

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 e^{-\sin x}-2}{\sin x}=-2 \times \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{-\sin x}-1}{-\sin x} \\=-2 \times 1=-2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:
