Question #1469 (ID: 474998)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math]\ln \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]1+e^{x}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{\left(1+\mathrm{e}^{x}\right)}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\left(1+e^{x}\right)}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\left(1-\mathrm{e}^{x}\right)}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{\left(1+e^{x}\right)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}=\ln e^{x}-\ln \left(1+e^{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{e^{x}} \cdot e^{x}-\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}\\=1-\frac{e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}=\frac{1+e^{x}-e^{x}}{1+e^{x}}\\=\frac{1}{\left(1+e^{x_{1}}\right.}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

D. x

Question #1471 (ID: 475000)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos 5 x^{\circ}\right)=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\sin 5 x^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]-5 \sin 5 x^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{5 \pi}{180} \sin 5 x^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5 \pi}{180} \sin 5 x^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{5 \pi}{180} \sin 5 x^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos 5 x^{\circ}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{5 \pi x}{180}\right) \\= -\sin \frac{5 \pi x}{180} \times\left(\frac{5 \pi}{180}\right)=-\frac{5 \pi}{180} \sin 5 x^{\circ}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1472 (ID: 475001)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(10^{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]10^{\mathrm{x}} \log _{\mathrm{e}} 10[/math]
B. [math]x 10^{x-1}[/math]
C. [math]10^{x} \log 10_{e}[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm{x} 10^{\mathrm{x}+1}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]10^{\mathrm{x}} \log _{\mathrm{e}} 10[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(10^{x}\right)=10^{x} \cdot \ln 10=10^{x} \log _{e} 10[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2022-2023, 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1}(2 x)}{x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1}(2 x)}{2 x} \times 2=2[/math]

A. [math]1[/math]

C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Question #1475 (ID: 475004)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{p+q x}{q-p x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান হবে -

Options:
A. [math]1+7 \mathbf{x}[/math]
B. [math]p+q x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{p+q x}{q-p x}=\tan ^{-1} \frac{p}{q}+\tan ^{-1} x \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1476 (ID: 475005)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = x(2a - x)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান-

Options:
ক. a
খ. 2a
গ. [math]2a^2[/math]
ঘ. [math]a^2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]a^2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2 a x-x^{2} \\\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=2 a-2 x \\\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=-2[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, f(x) = 0 ⇒ 2a - 2x = 0 [math]\therefore[/math]
 x = aঅতএব, সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow 2 a-2 x=0 \therefore x=a[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1477 (ID: 475006)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x+2[/math] এর গুরুমান/লঘুমান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. 1
খ. 5
গ. 10
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: D.কোনোটিই নয়

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{3}-3 x^{2}+6 x+2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=3 x^{2}-6 x+6=3\left(x^{2}-2 x+2\right)[/math]
 [math]=3\left\{(x-1)^{2}+1\right\}[/math]
 যা সর্বদাই ধনাত্মকx এর যেকোনো মানের জন্য f'(x) কখনো শূন্য হতে পারে না। অতএব ফাংশনটির কোনো গুরুমান অথবা লঘুমান নেই।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1478 (ID: 475007)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y = x(1 - x) ফাংশনটির সর্বোচ্চ মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. -2
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
গ. -1
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x(1-x)=x-x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-2 x \Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=-2<0[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্নমানের জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 1-2 x=0 \Rightarrow x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চমান, [math]y=x-x^{2}=\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1479 (ID: 475008)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = x ^ 2 - x[/math] ফাংশনটির কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সাথে 45 deg কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. (1,0)
খ. (1,2)
গ. (0,-1)
ঘ. (1,1)


Correct Answer: A.(1,0)

Solution:
[math]f(x)=y=x^{2}-x \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-1 \\\Rightarrow \tan 45^{\circ}=2 x-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1=2 x-1 \\\Rightarrow 2 x=2 \\\Rightarrow x=1[/math]
 [math]y=x^{2}-x=1^{2}-1=1-1=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দু (1,0)

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1480 (ID: 475009)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
xy = 1 বক্ররেখার (1, 1) বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x-y+2=0[/math]
খ. [math]x+y-2=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-2 y+2=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+2 y-2=0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]x+y-2=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]x y=1 \Rightarrow x \frac{d y}{d x}+y=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
(1, 1) বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{1}=-1[/math]
স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]y-1=(-1)(x-1) \\\Rightarrow x+y-2=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1481 (ID: 475010)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{2}+3 x+5[/math] বক্ররেখার (0,1) বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের ঢাল-

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. -3
ঘ. 3


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=2 x^{2}+3 x+5 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 x+3[/math]
(0,1) বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]=-\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1482 (ID: 475011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-4 x+4[/math] হলে কোন বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2[/math] হবে ?

Options:
ক. (1, 3)
খ. (3, 1)
গ. (-3, 1)
ঘ. (-1, 3)


Correct Answer: B.(3, 1)

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-4 x+4 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-4 \\\Rightarrow 2 x-4=2 \\\Rightarrow x=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=3^{2}-4 \times 3+4=1[/math]
 বিন্দু = 3,1

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1483 (ID: 475012)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-2 x+1[/math] হলে কোন বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math] হবে ?

Options:
ক. (0,1)
খ. (1,0)
গ. (-1,0)
ঘ. (0, -1)


Correct Answer: B.(1,0)

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-2 x+1 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-2[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{x}-2=0 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=1 \\\therefore \mathrm{y}=1^{2}-2 \times 1+1=0 \end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দু 1,0

Explanation:

Question #1484 (ID: 475013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
cos 3x এর n তম অন্তরক সহগ হবে:

Options:
ক. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
খ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-3 x\right)[/math]
গ. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-3 x\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\cos m x[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{n}=m^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+m x\right)[/math]
 [math]y = cos3x[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{n}=3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1485 (ID: 475014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর সাপেক্ষে [math](2 x)^{n}-b^{n}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2 n x^{n-1}[/math]
খ. [math]2^{n} n x^{n-1}[/math]
গ. [math]2^{n} x^{n-1}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2^{n} n x^{n-1}-b^{n}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2^{n} n x^{n-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left((2 x)^{n}-b^{n}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(2 x)^{n}-\frac{d}{d x}\left(b^{n}\right)[/math]
 [math]=n \cdot(2 x)^{n-1} \cdot 2-0\\=n \cdot 2^{n-1} x^{n-1} \cdot 2\\=n 2^{n} x^{n-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1486 (ID: 475015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim_{x \to 0} x^x[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. 0
B. -1
C. 1
D. [math]\frac{1}{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim_{x \to 0} x^x = \lim_{x \to 0} e^{x\ln x}[/math]
, এখানে [math]x \ln x \to 0[/math]
 ফলে [math]e^0 = 1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1487 (ID: 475016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = 3x^2 + 2x - 1[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](2, 0)[/math] বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. 0
খ. 8
গ. 14
ঘ. 16


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{dy}{dx} = 6x + 2[/math]
, এখানে [math]x = 2[/math]
 হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx} = 6(2) + 2 = 12 + 2 = 14[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1488 (ID: 475017)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x^3 \ln x[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d^4 y}{dx^4}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^2 (1 + 3 \ln x)[/math]
B. [math]x (5 + 6 \ln x)[/math]
C. [math]11 + 6 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধাপে ধাপে অন্তরীকরণ করি —প্রথম অন্তরীকরণঃ[math]y' = \frac{d}{dx}(x^3 \ln x) = x^3 \cdot \frac{1}{x} + \ln x \cdot 3x^2 = x^2 + 3x^2 \ln x = x^2(1 + 3 \ln x)[/math]
দ্বিতীয় অন্তরীকরণঃ[math]y'' = \frac{d}{dx}[x^2(1 + 3 \ln x)] = 2x(1 + 3 \ln x) + x^2 \cdot \frac{3}{x} = 2x(1 + 3 \ln x) + 3x = x(5 + 6 \ln x)[/math]
তৃতীয় অন্তরীকরণঃ[math]y''' = \frac{d}{dx}[x(5 + 6 \ln x)] = 1 \cdot (5 + 6 \ln x) + x \cdot \frac{6}{x} = 5 + 6 \ln x + 6 = 11 + 6 \ln x[/math]
চতুর্থ অন্তরীকরণঃ[math]y^{(4)} = \frac{d}{dx}(11 + 6 \ln x) = 0 + \frac{6}{x} = \frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1489 (ID: 475018)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\sec x)^{x}=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. অসংজ্ঞায়িত


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\sec x)^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} x \ln (\sec x)=0 \Rightarrow y=e^{\circ}=1 \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\sec x)^{x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1490 (ID: 475019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(e^{x}-1\right) \tan ^{2} x}{x^{3}}=3[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(e^{x}-1\right) \tan ^{2} x}{x^{3}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-1}{x} \times \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\tan x}{x}\right)^{2} \\=1 \times 1=1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1491 (ID: 475020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { " } \mathrm{a} \text { " }[/math] এর যে মানের জন্য [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\operatorname{asin} x-3 x}{5 x}[/math] এর মান 0 হবে তা হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. 2$


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a \sin x-3 x}{5 x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{a \cos x-3}{5}=\frac{a-3}{5}[/math]
 প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\frac{a-3}{5}=0 \therefore a=3[/math]


Explanation:

Options:
A. [math]\frac{11}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{11}{32}[/math]

Question #1494 (ID: 475023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-4}{2+x-4 x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}-4}{2+x-4 x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(1-\frac{4}{x^{2}}\right)}{x^{2}\left(\frac{2}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x}-4\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1-\frac{4}{x^{2}}}{\frac{2}{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{x}-4}=\frac{1-0}{0+0-4}=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1495 (ID: 475024)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\{\ln (2 x-3)-\ln (x+4)\}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln 3[/math]
C. [math]\ln 4[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\{\ln (2 x-3)-\ln (x+4)\}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \ln \frac{2 x-3}{x+4}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x\left(2-\frac{3}{x}\right)}{\ln \frac{\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}}{x\left(1+\frac{4}{x}\right)}} \frac{2-\frac{3}{x}}{1+\frac{4}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1496 (ID: 475025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\{\ln (2 x-1)-\ln (x+5)\}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\ln 2[/math]
B. [math]\ln 2[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \ln \left(\frac{2 x-1}{x+5}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \ln \left(\frac{2-\frac{1}{x}}{1+\frac{5}{x}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln \left(\frac{2-0}{1+0}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]sinx[/math]
B. [math]cosx[/math]
C. [math]x[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x) \Rightarrow y=x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]

Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
B. $0
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{(\sin x+\cos x)^{2}}}=1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]

Question #1499 (ID: 475028)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln 5}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{x y+1}=5 \Rightarrow x y+1=\ln 5[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y+x \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})=\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{x}}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{e^{\sqrt{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{x}}\right)=e^{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Question #1502 (ID: 475031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=e^{\tan x^{\prime}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{i=n} I_{x}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{c}^{\tan { }^{-1} x}\left(a+x^{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{\operatorname{tan}^{-1} }x^{}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=e^{\tan x^{\prime}} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{\tan 1} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{e^{\tan -1} x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1503 (ID: 475032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0 \frac{y}{z}} \cdot \sin z=y \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z} \\=y \cdot 1=y .\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1504 (ID: 475033)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দেয়া আছে, $$

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]e[/math]
ঙ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow+\infty}(\ln x)^{\frac{1}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow+\infty} e^{\frac{1}{x} \ln (\ln (x))}=e^{0}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x+2}{x(x+3)}+\frac{3 x+1}{x(x+4)}[/math] হলে, [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x f(x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} x f(x)=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty}\left(\frac{x+2}{x+3}+\frac{3 x+1}{x+4}\right)=1+3=4[/math]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x)[/math] হলে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\ln x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\ln (\ln x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\ln x} \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]

Explanation:

B. [math]-e^{-\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{\frac{1}{x}}}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x} e^{\frac{1}{x}-1}[/math]

Question #1509 (ID: 475038)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\ln x}}[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\ln \sqrt{x})=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}} \times \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{1}{2 x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1510 (ID: 475039)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left[\ln \left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)\right]=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{2 x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{-x}-e^{x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left[\ln \left(\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}}{e^{x}+e^{-x}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1511 (ID: 475040)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=\ln \left(2 x+e^{3 x}\right)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]f'(0) =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\ln \left(2 x+e^{3 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2 x+e^{3 x}}\left(2+3 e^{3 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(0)=\frac{1}{2 \times 0+e^{0}}\left(2+3 e^{0}\right)[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1512 (ID: 475041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
B. [math]\tan x[/math]
C. [math]\sec x \operatorname{cosec} x[/math]
D. [math]\sec x \tan x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sec (x+h)-\sec x}{h}=\frac{d}{d x}(\sec x)=\sec x \tan x[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1513 (ID: 475042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=a(\theta-\sin \theta), y=a(1+\cos \theta)[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\sqrt{3}[/math] হলে, ৪ = কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{5}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5 \pi}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-a \sin \theta}{a(1-\cos \theta)}=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-2 \sin \frac{\theta}{2} \cos \frac{\theta}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{\theta}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\cot \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=-\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{6}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\tan \left(\pi-\frac{\pi}{6}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\theta}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 \pi}{6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\frac{5 \pi}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1514 (ID: 475043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1} x+\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{\left(1-x^{2}\right)}[/math] ) হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1} x+\sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\sin ^{-1} x+\cos ^{-1} x=\frac{\pi}{2} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1515 (ID: 475044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2003-2004, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1-x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1516 (ID: 475045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sec ^{2} \frac{x}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=\cot ^{-1} \sqrt{\frac{1+\cos x}{1-\cos x}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \frac{x}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{2} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1517 (ID: 475046)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{x} y^{y}=1[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1+\ln x}{1+\ln y}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1+\ln x}{1+\ln y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1-\ln x}{1+\ln y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1+\ln x}{1-\ln y}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{x} y^{y}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \ln x+y \ln y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x+y[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}+\ln y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+\ln x+\frac{d y}{d x}(1+\ln y)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{(1+\ln x)}{1+\ln y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1518 (ID: 475047)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\pi^{\sin x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathbf{f}^{\prime}(\mathbf{x})[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pi^{\sin x}[/math]
B. [math]\pi^{\sin x}(\ln x)[/math]
C. [math]\pi^{\sin x}(\ln x) \cos x[/math]
D. [math]\pi^{\sin x}(\ln \pi)[/math]
E. [math]\pi^{\sin x}(\cos x)[/math]
undefined. [math]f(x)=\pi^{\sin x}[/math]


Correct Answer: .[math]f(x)=\pi^{\sin x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\pi^{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\pi^{\sin x} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}(\sin \mathrm{x} \ln \pi)=\pi^{\sin x}(\ln \pi)(\cos \mathrm{x})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1519 (ID: 475048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](x+y)^{2}-x y=1[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x+2 y}{y+2 x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 x+y}{x+2 y}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{-2 x-y}{x+2 y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-x-2 y}{y+2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math](x+y)^{2}-x y=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x y+y^{2}-x y=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+x y+y^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+y+x \frac{d y}{d x}+2 y[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 x-y}{x+2 y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1520 (ID: 475049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\ldots .+\infty}}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{2 y-1}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{x}}{2 y+1}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{-x}}{2 y-1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{e^{-x}}{2 y+1}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text {} y[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\ldots .+\infty}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\sqrt{e^{x}+\ldots .+\infty}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=e^{x}+y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{x}+\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(2 y-1) \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=e^{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{e^{x}}{2 y-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1521 (ID: 475050)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{n}[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n+1}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\text { n! }[/math]
B. [math](n+1) ![/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math](n-1) ![/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x^{n} \Rightarrow y_{n}=n ! \Rightarrow y_{n+1}=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1522 (ID: 475051)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(4,3) বিন্দুতে [math]3 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=12[/math] অধিবৃত্তের স্পর্শকের ঢালের মান -

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]3 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 x-8 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 x}{8 y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 x}{4 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{3 \times 4}{4 \times 3}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1523 (ID: 475052)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2013-2014, 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] - বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]x=\pm 2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \therefore x= \pm 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1524 (ID: 475053)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]sinx[/math]
B. [math]cosx[/math]
C. [math]x[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x) \Rightarrow y=x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1525 (ID: 475054)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2003-2004, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Barishal, Bangladesh Military Academy
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sqrt{\cos 2 x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2 \sin x}{\sqrt{\tan x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\cos 2 x})=-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1526 (ID: 475055)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003, 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})=\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1527 (ID: 475056)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2022-2023, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{x}}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{e^{\sqrt{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{x}}\right)=e^{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1528 (ID: 475057)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos 3 x[/math] এর । তম অন্তরক সহগ হবে।

Options:
ক. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
খ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-3 x\right)[/math]
গ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\cos m x[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{n}=m^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+m x\right)[/math]
y=\cos 3 x হলে, [math]y_{n}=3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
cos 3x এর n তম অন্তরক সহগ হবে:

Options:
ক. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
খ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-3 x\right)[/math]
গ. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-3 x\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]y=\cos m x[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{n}=m^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+m x\right)[/math]
 [math]y = cos3x[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{n}=3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]

Question #1532 (ID: 474886)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 x^{2}-7 y^{2}+4 x y-8 x=0[/math] বক্ররেখাটির (-1, 1) বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকের ঢাল-

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{5}{9}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{5}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{9}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{9}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{5}{9}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-6 x-4 y+8}{-14 y+4 x}[/math]
 [math](-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{-6-4+8}{-14-4}=-\frac{5}{9}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1533 (ID: 474887)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2022-2023, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{x}}\right)=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 e^{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x}{e^{\sqrt{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sqrt{x}}\right)=e^{\sqrt{x}} \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1534 (ID: 474888)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2001-2002, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=25[/math] হলে, [math](3,-4)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{5}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{3}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{7}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{3}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=25 \Rightarrow 2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(3,-4)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1535 (ID: 474889)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার] [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{-\cos x}{\sin x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\cos \frac{\pi}{2}}{\sin \frac{\pi}{2}}=\frac{0}{1}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1536 (ID: 474890)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=e^{\tan x^{\prime}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]e^{i=n} I_{x}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm{c}^{\tan { }^{-1} x}\left(a+x^{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{e^{\operatorname{tan}^{-1} }x^{}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{e^{\operatorname{tan}^{-1} }x^{}}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{\tan x^{\prime}} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=e^{\tan 1} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\tan ^{-1} x\right)=\frac{e^{\tan -1} x}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1537 (ID: 474891)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2023-2024, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sec x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{4} \tan x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{y}{2} \tan x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}y & =\sqrt{\sec x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec x}} \sec x \tan x \\& =\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sec x} \tan x=\frac{y}{2} \tan x\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1538 (ID: 474892)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2018-2019, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{x}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 3 x}{3 x} \times 3=3[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1539 (ID: 474893)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2021-2022, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin (\cos x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sin \cos (\cos x)[/math]
B. [math]\cos x \sin (\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]
D. [math]-\sin x \sin (\cos x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin (\cos x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\cos (\cos x)(-\sin x)=-\sin x \cos (\cos x)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1540 (ID: 474894)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1997-1998, 1996-1997, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}\{\sin (x+1)\}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\{\sin (x+1)\}[/math]
B. [math]\cos (x+1)[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\{\cos (x+1)\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}\{\sin (x+1)\} \Rightarrow y=x+1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=1 \quad \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dy}}=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1541 (ID: 474895)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1997-1998 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}-2 x y+2 y^{2}=1[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x+4 y}{2 x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x-y}{x+2 y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x-y}{x-2 y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x+2 y}{4 y}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{x-y}{x-2 y}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{(2 x-2 y)}{(-2 x+4 y)}=\frac{x-y}{x-2 y}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1542 (ID: 474896)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1997-1998, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin x+e^{2 x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+y=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e^{2 x}[/math]
B. [math]2 \cos x+e^{2 x}[/math]
C. [math]5 e^{2 x}[/math]
D. [math]-2 \sin x+e^{2 x}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5 e^{2 x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin x+e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+2 e^{2 x} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x+4 e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+y[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x+4 e^{2 x}+\sin x+e^{2 x}[/math]
 [math]=5 e^{2 x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1543 (ID: 474897)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1996-1997 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=\cos t[/math] এবং [math]y=\sin t[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { (1) cott }[/math]
B. [math]-\operatorname{cott}[/math]
C. [math]\operatorname{tant}[/math]
D. [math]-\tan t[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\operatorname{cott}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\cos t}{-\sin t}=-\cot t[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1544 (ID: 474898)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1995-1996, 2017-2018, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\left(\log _{e} x\right)^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
C. [math]2 \log _{e} x[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \log _{e} x}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{2 \log _{e} x}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2 \log _{e} x \frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{e} x\right)=2 \log _{e} x \cdot \frac{1}{x}=\frac{2 \log _{e} x}{x}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1545 (ID: 474899)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1995-1996, 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin (\sin x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]
B. [math]\cos x \cos (\cos x)[/math]
C. [math]\cos (\cos x)[/math]
D. [math]\cos (\sin x)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x} =\cos (\sin x) \frac{d}{d x}(\sin x)[/math]
 [math]=\cos (\sin x)[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos x-\cos x \cos (\sin x)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1546 (ID: 474900)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1995-1996 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2 x+2 y[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{2 x}{2 y}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4 \Rightarrow \frac{d}{d x}\left(x^{2}\right)+\frac{d}{d x}\left(y^{2}\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1547 (ID: 474901)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1995-1996 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\cos x+\sin x[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]cosx - sinx[/math]
B. [math]-cosx - sinx[/math]
C. [math]cosx - sinx[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{2} x-\sin ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-cosx - sinx[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\cos x+\sin x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(\cos x+\sin x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\sin x+\cos x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-\cos x-\sin x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1548 (ID: 474903)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{2 x^{3}-(2 k+1) x^{2}+2 x+k}{x-1}=-6[/math] হলে k এর মান কত? [math]\text { (If } \lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{2 x^{3}-(2 k+1) x^{2}+2 x+k}{x-1}=-6[/math] Then what is the value of k?)

Options:
A. 1
B. -1
C. 3
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{2 x^{3}-(2 k+1) x^{2}+2 x+k}{x-1}=-6[/math]
একবার অন্তরীকরণ করার পর-[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{6 x^{2}-2 x(2 x+1)+2}{1}=-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6(1)-2(2 k+1)+2=-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6-4 k-2+2=6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-4 k=-12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k=3[/math]


Explanation:
শুরুতে [math]\lim _{n \rightarrow 1}[/math]
 মান বসলে সমীকরণের শুরুতে অসংজ্ঞায়িত হয়।[math]\frac{3-k}{0}=-6[/math]
 (অসংজ্ঞায়িত)[math]\frac{0}{0}, \frac{\infty}{\infty}, \frac{4}{0}[/math]
 এমন ক্ষেত্রে La Hospital নিয়ম ব্যাবহার করতে পারি। আমরা সমীকরণের হর ও লব কে Differentiate করবো সংজ্ঞায়িত করার জন্য।

Question #1549 (ID: 474904)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+x)^{\frac{3 x+2}{x}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
B. [math]e^{2}[/math]
C. [math]\mathrm{e}^{\frac{2}{3}}[/math]
D. [math]e^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+x)^{\frac{3 x+2}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+x)^{3+\frac{2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+x)^{3} \cdot \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{(1+x)^{\frac{1}{x}}\right\}^{2}=1 \cdot e^{2}=e^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1550 (ID: 474905)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{x(\ln y-x)}{y(\ln x-y)}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-x)}{x(y \ln x-y)}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{y(x \ln y-y)}{x(y \ln x-x)}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{y}=y^{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \ln x=x \ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y \cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\ln y+x \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}\left(\ln x-\frac{x}{y}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\ln y-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x} \cdot \frac{(x \ln y-y)}{(y \ln x-x)}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1551 (ID: 474906)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{3} x^{3}-\frac{7}{2} x^{2}+10 x+5[/math] এর চরম মান এর কোন মানের জন্য পাওয় যাবে?

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{1}{3} x^{3}-\frac{7}{2} x^{2}+10 x+5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=x^{2}-7 x+10[/math]
চরম বিন্দুর জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-7 x+10=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-5 x-2 x+10=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(x-2)(x-5)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1552 (ID: 474907)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin \theta[/math] এর যে মানের জন্য 7sec) - 3tand এর মান ন্যূনতম হয় তা কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]9 \frac{7}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{3}{10}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{7}{10}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=7 \sec \theta-3 \tan \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d \theta}=7 \sec \theta \tan \theta-3 \sec ^{2} \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ন্যূনতম মানের জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d \theta}=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore 7 \sec \theta \tan \theta-3 \sec ^{2} \theta=0 \\\Rightarrow 7 \frac{\sin \theta}{\cos \theta}=\frac{3}{\cos \theta} \therefore \sin \theta=\frac{3}{7}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1553 (ID: 474908)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}(\sin x)^{\tan x}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x)^{\tan x}=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \tan x \ln \sin x[/math]
 [math]=x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2} \frac{\ln \sin x}{\cot x},[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\frac{\cos x}{\sin x}}{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}-\frac{\cos x}{\sin x} \cdot \sin ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x[\text { L Hospital Law] }[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}-\cos x \cdot \sin x[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow y[/math]
 [math]=e^{0}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1554 (ID: 474909)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{x-1}{\sqrt{x}-1}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{x-1}{\sqrt{x}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{(\sqrt{x})^{2}-1}{\sqrt{x}-1}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{(\sqrt{x}-1)(\sqrt{x}+1)}{(\sqrt{x}-1)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \sqrt{x}+1[/math]
 [math]=1+1=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1555 (ID: 474910)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{a \cos x-b \sin x}{b \cos x+a \sin x}\right)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}}-1[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]-[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{a \cos x-b \sin x}{b \cos x+a \sin x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{\frac{a}{b}-\tan x}{1+\frac{a}{b} \tan x}[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \tan \left(\frac{a}{b}-x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a}{b}-x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1556 (ID: 474911)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{t}=e^{x+y}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{x+y}(1+\ln y)[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x+y}(1-\ln y)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y}{x-y}(1+\ln y)[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{x-y}(1-\text { lny })[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{y}{x-y}(1-\text { lny })[/math]

Solution:
[math]x \ln y=x+y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cdot \frac{y_{1}}{y}+\ln y[/math]
 [math]=1+y_{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x}{y} y_{1}-y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=1-\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}-1\right)=1-\ln y[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x-y}(1-\ln y)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1557 (ID: 474912)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]x^{3} y_{2}-2 x y[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\ln x}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y=\ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x y_{1}+y=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{1}+x y=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+2 x y_{1}+x y_{1}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+3 x y_{1}+y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+3 x^{2} y_{1}+x y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]+3(-x y+1)+x y=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]-3 x y+3+x y=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{3} y_{2}[/math]
 [math]-2 x y=-3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1558 (ID: 474913)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ফাংশনটির জন্য [math]\left(1-x^{2}\right) \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-x \frac{d y}{d x}=2[/math] সত্য?

Options:
A. [math]y=\cos ^{-1} x[/math]
B. [math]y=\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
C. [math]y=\sin ^{-1} x[/math]
D. [math]y=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]y=\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]y=\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=2 \cos ^{-1} x \cdot\left(-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)^{2}\left(1-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=4\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right)\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)^{2}=4 y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right) 2 \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-2 x[/math]
 [math]\times\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=4 \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(1-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-x \frac{d y}{d x}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1559 (ID: 474914)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]\infty[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]-4[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=2 x+\frac{2}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}=2-\frac{2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{2}=\frac{4}{x^{3}}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য, [math]\mathrm{y}_{1}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-\frac{2}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}= \pm 1[/math]
 [math]x = 1[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{2}=4>0[/math]
 [math]x=-1[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{2}=-4<0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=-1[/math]
 [math]y[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চ মান [math]=2(-1-1)=-4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1560 (ID: 474915)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{49}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{6}{49}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{49}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos 7 x}{3 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \sin 7 x}{6 x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{49 \cos 7 x}{6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{49}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1561 (ID: 474916)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]k[/math] এর মান কত হলে, [math]y=k(x-1)(x+2)[/math] বক্ররেখার [math]x=1[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক x - অক্ষের সাথে [math]60^{\circ}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]k\left(x^{2}+x-2\right)=y ; y_{1}=k(2 x+1) \quad \tan 60^{\circ}=k \times 3[/math]
 [math]\therefore k=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1562 (ID: 474917)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\left(\sin _{i}^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math] হলে, [math]y=\left(\sin _{i}^{-1} x\right)^{2}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{y}=\sin ^{-1} x ; \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{y}} y_{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(1-x^{2}\right) y_{1}^{2}=4 y ; \quad 2 y_{1} y_{2}-2 x y_{1}^{2}-x^{2} \cdot 2 y_{1} y_{2}=4 y_{1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(1-x^{2}\right) y_{2}-x y_{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1563 (ID: 474918)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\sin \theta[/math] -এর যে মানের জন্য [math]7 \sec \theta-3 \tan \theta[/math] এর মান ন্যূনতম হয় তা কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{7}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{7}{10}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{7}{10}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=7 \sec \theta-3 \tan \theta ;[/math]
 [math]\quad[/math]
 [math]y_{1}=7 \sec \theta \tan \theta-3 \sec ^{2} \dot{\theta}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 7 \tan \theta=3 \sec \theta \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \tan \theta \times \cos \theta=\frac{3}{7} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \sin \theta=\frac{3}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1564 (ID: 474919)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির জন্য যে সমস্ত বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]x[/math] - অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তা হল-

Options:
ক. [math](1,2),(-1,-2)[/math]
খ. [math](-1,2),(1,0)[/math]
গ. [math](2,-1),(0,1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1,2),(1,-2)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](1,2),(-1,-2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} ; \quad y_{1}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=\pm 1, y=2,-2 ; \text { Points : }(1,2),(-1,-2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
