Question #1565 (ID: 474920)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গোলকের ব্যাসার্ধের বৃদ্ধিহার এবং পৃষ্ঠদেশের ক্ষেত্রফলের বৃদ্ধিহার সংখ্যাসূচক ভাবে সমান হলে, গোলকটির ব্যাসার্ধের মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4 \pi}[/math]
খ. [math]8 \pi[/math]
গ. [math]4 \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{8 \pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{8 \pi}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}}=\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}} \therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left(4 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2}\right)=\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \pi \times 2 \mathrm{r} \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}=\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}} \quad \therefore 8 \pi \mathrm{r}=1 \quad \therefore \mathrm{r}=\frac{1}{8 \pi}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1566 (ID: 474921)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2016-2017, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটির জন্য যে সমস্ত বিন্দুর স্পর্শক X অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তা হল-

Options:
ক. [math](1, 2), (-1,-2)[/math]
খ. [math](-1, 2), (1, 0)[/math]
গ. [math](2,-1), (0, 1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](-1, 2), (1, -2)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](1, 2), (-1,-2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শক x- অক্ষের সমান্তরাল [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=1 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}= \pm 1 \therefore \mathrm{x}=1,-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}=\mathrm{f}(\mathrm{x})=1+\frac{1}{1}=2[/math]
 যখন [math]x = 1[/math]
 [math]y=f(x)=-1-\frac{1}{1}=-2[/math]
 যখন x = -1[math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু [math](1,2), (-1,-2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1567 (ID: 474922)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গোলকের ব্যাসার্ধের বৃদ্ধিহার এবং পৃষ্ঠদেশের ক্ষেত্রফলের বৃদ্ধিহার সংখ্যাসূচকভাবে সমান হলে, গোলকটির ব্যাসার্ধের মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4 \pi}[/math]
খ. [math]8\pi[/math]
গ. [math]4\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{8 \pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{8 \pi}[/math]

Solution:
গোলকের ব্যাসার্ধ বৃদ্ধির হার = [math]=\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
গোলকের ক্ষেত্রফল বৃদ্ধির হার [math]=\frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}}=8 \pi \mathrm{r} \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}=\frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}} \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}=8 \pi \mathrm{r} \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}} \Rightarrow 1=8 \pi \mathrm{r} \therefore \mathrm{r}=\frac{1}{8 \pi}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1568 (ID: 474923)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]k[/math] এর মান কত হলে, [math]y = k (x - 1) (x+2[/math]) বক্ররেখার [math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শক [math]X[/math] অক্ষের সাথে [math]60°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{k}\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{x}-2\right)=\mathrm{y} ;[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{y}_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{k}(2 \mathrm{x}+1)[/math]
 [math]=\tan 60^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=k \times 3 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1569 (ID: 474924)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি , [math]y=p x^{2}+q x^{-1 / 2}[/math] হয়,তাহলে [math]2 x^{2} y^{\prime \prime}-x y^{\prime}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]2y[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]y[/math]
D. [math]2 y^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2y[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=p x^{2}+q x^{-\frac{1}{2}} ;[/math]
 [math]y^{\prime}=2 p x-\frac{1}{2} q x^{-\frac{3}{2}} ;[/math]
 [math]y^{\prime \prime}=2 p+\frac{3}{4} q x^{-\frac{5}{2}}[/math]
 [math]2 x^{2} y^{\prime \prime}-x y^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=2 x^{2}\left(2 p+\frac{3}{4} q x^{-\frac{5}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]-x\left(2 p x-\frac{1}{2} q x^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow4 p x^{2}+\frac{3}{2} q x^{-\frac{1}{2}}-2 p x^{2}+\frac{1}{2} q x^{-\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 p x^{2}+2 q x^{-\frac{1}{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2\left(p x^{2}+q x^{-\frac{1}{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=2 y[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1570 (ID: 474925)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর মান কত হলে ফাংশন [math]f(x)=\frac{x}{\ln x}[/math] এর মান ক্ষুদ্রতম হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{e}[/math]
খ. [math]e[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-e[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\frac{x}{\ln x} ; f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln x \cdot 1-x: \frac{1}{x}}{(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}} ;[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(\ln x)^{2}\left(\frac{1}{x}-0\right)-(\ln x-1)\left(2 \ln x \cdot \frac{1}{x}\right)}{(\ln x)^{4}}[/math]
 [math]\text { -For maximum or minimum } f^{\prime}({x})=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\ln x-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x-1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln x=1=\ln e[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=e[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)[/math]
 এ [math]x=e[/math]
 হলে [math]f^{\prime \prime}(\mathrm{e})=\frac{1^{2}\left(\frac{1}{\mathrm{c}}-0\right)-(1-1)\left(2 \cdot \frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}\right)}{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}[/math]
 হলে ক্ষুদ্রতম হবে

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1571 (ID: 474926)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=x^{\ln x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{x}{y}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \ln x}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}(2 \ln x)[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]2 y \ln x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \ln x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{\ln x} ; \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{\ln x}\left[\frac{\ln x}{x} \cdot 1+\ln x \frac{1}{x}\right] ;\left[\because \frac{d}{d x}\left(u^{v}\right)=u^{v}\left(\frac{v}{u} \frac{d u}{d x}+\ln x \cdot \frac{d v}{d x}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{x}{y}\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)=\frac{x}{x^{\ln x}}\left[x^{\ln x}\left(\frac{2 \ln x}{x}\right)\right][/math]
 [মান বসিয়ে ] [math]=2 \ln x[/math]
 [math]\text { [ref. Lutfuzzaman Sir] }[/math]
[অথবা, প্রচলিত পদ্ধতিতে [math]\ell \mathrm{n}[/math]
 নিয়ে করা যাবে। [math]=x^{\ln x}\left[\frac{\ln x}{x}+\frac{\ln x}{x}\right]=x^{\ln x}\left[\frac{2 \ln x}{x}\right][/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1572 (ID: 474927)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
B. [math]-5[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{7}[/math]
D. [math]-7[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{7^{n+1}\left[\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n+1}+\left(\frac{7}{7}\right)^{n+1}\right]}{7^{n+1}\left[\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n} \cdot \frac{1}{7}-\frac{7^{n}}{7^{n}} \cdot \frac{1}{7}\right]}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\left[\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n+1}+1\right]}{\left[\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n} \cdot \frac{1}{7}-\frac{1}{7}\right]}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{0+1}{0 \cdot \frac{1}{7}-\frac{1}{7}}[\because|\mathrm{r}|<1 z[/math]
 হলে [math]\left.\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} r^{n}=0\right]=-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1573 (ID: 474928)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=x^{\ln x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\frac{x}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2 \ln x}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{x}(2 \ln x)[/math]
C. [math]2 \ln x[/math]
D. [math]2 y \ln x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \ln x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text {} y=x^{\ln x} \Rightarrow \ln y=\ln x \ln x=(\ln x)^{2} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \ln x \cdot \frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{x}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \ln x\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1574 (ID: 474929)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]C[/math] -এর মান কত হলে- [math]y=C x(1+x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূল বিন্দুতে তার স্পর্শক অক্ষের সাথে 30° কোণ উৎপন্ন করবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=C x(1+x)=C x+C x^{2}, \frac{d y}{d x}=C+2 C x[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(x=0)}=C \quad \therefore C=\tan 30^{\circ}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1575 (ID: 474930)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y(x-2)(x-3)-x+7=0[/math] বক্ররেখাটি যে বিন্দুতে x - অক্ষকে ছেদ করে, ঐ বিন্দুতে বক্র রেখাটির অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ হল-

Options:
ক. [math]x+20 y-7=0[/math]
খ. [math]20 x+y-140=0[/math]
গ. [math]20 x+y+140=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-20 y-7=0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]20 x+y-140=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { (b)} y(x-2)(x-3)-(x-7)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{x-7}{(x-2)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=\ln (x-7)[/math]
 [math]-\ln (x-2)-\ln (x-3)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x-7}-\frac{1}{x-2}-\frac{1}{x-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{(x-2)(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{(x-7)}{(x-2)^{2}(x-3)}[/math]
 [math]-\frac{x-7}{(x-2)(x-3)^{2}}[/math]
x অক্ষকে ছেদ করলে, y = 0 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=7 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}[/math]
 অক্ষের ছেদ বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math]( 7, 0 )[/math]
ঐ বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{1}{20} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]= -20[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ: [math]y-0=-20(x-7)=0 \Rightarrow y=-20 x+140 \Rightarrow 20 x+y-140=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1576 (ID: 474931)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] ফাংশনটি সর্বোচ্চ মান সম্পন্ন হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x} ; f^{\prime}(x)=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}} ; f^{\prime \prime}(x)=\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]
গুরুমান ও লঘুমান থাকার প্রয়োজনীয় শর্ত,[math]f^{\prime}(x)=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow(x+1)(x-1)=0 \Rightarrow x=1 \text { or, }-1[/math]
এখন, [math]x=1[/math]
 হলে, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=2>0 \therefore x=1[/math]
 বিন্দুতে লঘুমান থাকবে।[math]x=-1[/math]
 হলে, [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=-2<0 \quad \therefore x=-1[/math]
 বিন্দুতে গুরুমান থাকবে ।[math]\therefore x[/math]
 এর মান [math]-1[/math]
 হলে, ফাংশনটি সর্বোচ্চ মান সম্পন্ন হবে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1577 (ID: 474932)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]f(x)=2^{-4 x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]-4 \times 2^{-4 x} \log _{c} 2[/math]
B. [math]4 \times 2^{-4 x} \log _{c} 2[/math]
C. [math]2^{-4 x} \log _{c} 2[/math]
D. [math]-4 \times 2^{-4 x-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-4 \times 2^{-4 x} \log _{c} 2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=2^{-4 x} ; \lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x} f(x)[/math]
 [math]=2^{-4 x} \log _{c} 2(-4)[/math]
 [math]=-4 \times 2^{-4 x} \cdot \log _{c} 2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1578 (ID: 474933)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \pi / 2} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}[/math] এর মান হল-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathrm{x}=\mathrm{h}+\frac{\pi}{2} ; \mathrm{x} \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{h} \rightarrow 0[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{1-\sin x}{\cos x}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+h\right)}{\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+h\right)}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cosh }{-\sinh }=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{h}{2}}{2 \sin \frac{h}{2} \cos \frac{h}{2}}=\lim _{h \rightarrow 0}-\tan \frac{h}{2}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1579 (ID: 474934)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সাবানের একটি গোলাকার বুদবুদ আয়তন বৃদ্ধির হার ও তার ব্যসার্ধের বৃদ্ধির হাররে অনুপাত কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pi r^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]v=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d v}{d t}=\frac{4}{3} \pi \times 3 r^{2} \times \frac{d r}{d t}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\frac{d v}{d t}}{\frac{d r}{d t}}=4 \pi r^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1580 (ID: 474935)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর যে মানের জন্য [math]\left.f(x)=\sin ^{3} x \cos x, 10

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]4[/math]
 টি [math]\text { option }[/math]
 বসিয়ে [math]\text { check }[/math]
 কর : [math]f^{\prime}(x)=-\sin ^{4} x+3 \sin ^{2} x \cos ^{2} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=0 ; 3 \cos ^{2} \mathrm{x}=\sin ^{2} \mathrm{x} \Rightarrow \tan ^{2} \mathrm{x}=3[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\tan x=\pm \sqrt{3})[\text { only }+\mathrm{ve}] \therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{\pi}{3} \text { and } \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})<0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1581 (ID: 474936)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=2 x^{3}[/math] বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি [math]4x-3y+1=0[/math] সরলরেখার সাথে লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{8}, \frac{1}{16}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{8},-\frac{1}{16}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{8},-\frac{1}{16}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{8}, \frac{1}{16}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left(\frac{1}{8},-\frac{1}{16}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=2 x^{3} \Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=2.3 x^{2} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3 x^{2}}{y}[/math]
স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=-\frac{3}{4}=\frac{3 x^{2}}{y}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore-\frac{3}{4}=\frac{3 x^{2}}{y} \Rightarrow y=-4 x^{2} \\\Rightarrow y^{2}=\left(-4 x^{2}\right)^{2} \Rightarrow 16 x^{4}-2 x^{3}=0 \\\Rightarrow 2 x^{3}(8 x-1)=0 \therefore x=0, \frac{1}{8}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=\frac{1}{8}[/math]
 হলে, [math]y=-4 \times \frac{1}{8^{2}}=-\frac{1}{16}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দু [math]=\left(\frac{1}{8},-\frac{1}{16}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1582 (ID: 474937)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sin ^{-1}\left[\frac{4 \sqrt{x}}{1+4 x}\right][/math] হয় তাহলে [math]\left(\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right)_{(4,2)}[/math] এর মান হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{17}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of the above }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{17}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}\left[\frac{4 \sqrt{x}}{1+4 x}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} 2 \sqrt{x} ;[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2 \cdot \frac{1}{1+4 x} \cdot 2 \cdot \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore\left(\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}\right)_{(4,2)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{17}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1583 (ID: 474938)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y^{x}=x^{y}[/math] হয় তাহলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\ln y+\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x+\frac{x}{y}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\ln y-\frac{x}{y}}{\ln x-\frac{y}{x}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\ln x-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln y-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{x}=x^{y} . \Rightarrow x \ln y=y \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x \cdot \frac{1}{y}[/math]
 [math]\cdot y_{1}+\ln y[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x}+\ln x \cdot y_{1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{i}\left(\frac{x}{y}-\ln x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{x}-\ln y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}=\frac{\ln y-\frac{y}{x}}{\ln x-\frac{x}{y}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1584 (ID: 474939)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
. মান নির্ণয় করঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-e^{-2 x}}{\log (1+x)},[0

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\mathrm{e}^{-2 x}}{\log (1+x)}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-1+2 x-\frac{4 x^{2}}{2 !}+\ldots \ldots}{x-\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{x^{3}}{3}-\ldots \ldots \ldots}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2-\frac{4 x}{2 !}+\ldots \ldots}{1-\frac{x}{2}+\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\cdots \cdots \cdots}=\frac{2}{1}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1585 (ID: 474940)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}\left[\frac{4 \sqrt{x}}{1+4 x}\right][/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(4,2)}[/math] এর মান হয়েছিল

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{17}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{9}[/math]
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{17}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}\left[\frac{4 \sqrt{x}}{1+4 x}\right] \Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} 2 \sqrt{x}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2}{1+4 x} 2 \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}=\frac{2}{(1+4 x) \sqrt{x}} \\\left(\frac{d y}{d x}\right)_{(4,2)}=\frac{2}{(1+4 \times 4) \sqrt{4}}=\frac{2}{17 \times 2}=\frac{1}{17}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1586 (ID: 474941)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি গোলাকার সাবানের বুদবুদের আয়তনের বৃদ্ধির হার তার ব্যাসার্ধের বৃদ্ধির হার কত গুণ?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \pi r^{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pi r^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4 \pi r^{2}[/math]

Solution:
গোলাকার বুদবুদের আয়তন [math]V=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{dV}}{\mathrm{dt}}=4 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2} \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}} \Rightarrow\left(\frac{\mathrm{dV}}{\mathrm{dt}}\right) /\left(\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}\right)=4 \pi \mathrm{r}^{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1587 (ID: 474942)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]y[/math]
C. [math]2^{y}[/math]
D. [math]2^{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]y[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0 \frac{y}{z}} \cdot \sin z=y \lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z} \\=y \cdot 1=y .\end{array}[/math]
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 হলে, [math]\mathrm{z} \rightarrow 0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1588 (ID: 474943)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
তাপ প্রয়োগের ফলে ধাতুর তৈরি একটি বৃত্তাকার থালার ব্যাসার্ধ প্রতি সেকেন্ডে [math]0.25[/math] সে. মি বাড়ে। যখন থালাটির ব্যাসার্ধ [math]7[/math] সে. মি তখন তলের বৃদ্ধির হার বের কর।

Options:
ক. [math]49 cm²[/math]
খ. [math]11 cm²[/math]
গ. [math]7/25 cm[/math]
ঘ. [math]1 \mathrm{~cm}^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]11 cm²[/math]

Solution:
এখানে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}=0.25[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{A}[/math]
 [math]=\pi \mathrm{r}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dA}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \pi \frac{\mathrm{dr}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \times \pi \times 7 \times 0.25[/math]
 [math]=11 \mathrm{~cm}^{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1589 (ID: 474944)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2020-2021, 2012-2013, 2009-2010, 2006-2007, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math] মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}}{2}=2 \text { [By L' H Rule] }[/math]

Question #1590 (ID: 474945)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos 3 x[/math] এর । তম অন্তরক সহগ হবে।

Options:
ক. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
খ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-3 x\right)[/math]
গ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\cos m x[/math]
 হলে, [math]y_{n}=m^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+m x\right)[/math]
y=\cos 3 x হলে, [math]y_{n}=3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]

Question #1591 (ID: 474946)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-2 e^{3 x}+e^{5 x}}{x^{2}}=[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. 4
B. 2
C. 0
D. -4


Correct Answer: A.4

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-2 e^{3 x}+e^{5 x}}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { }\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-2.3 e^{3 x}+5 e^{5 x}}{2 x},\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { }\right] \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\frac{e^{x}-2.3 .3 e^{3 x}+5.5 e^{5 x}}{2}=\frac{1-18+25}{2}=\frac{8}{2}=4\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1592 (ID: 474947)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{\frac{4}{3}}+x^{\frac{-4}{3}}[/math]এর জন্য নিচের কোন উত্তরটি সঠিক ?

Options:
ক. [math]9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-3 \frac{d y}{d x}=32 x^{\frac{-1}{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-3 \frac{d y}{d x}=32 x^{\frac{-7}{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-3 \frac{d y}{d x}=32 x^{\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}+\frac{d y}{d x}=32 x^{\frac{-1}{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-3 \frac{d y}{d x}=32 x^{\frac{-7}{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{\frac{4}{3}}+x^{\frac{1}{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{4}{3} x^{\frac{1}{3}}-\frac{4}{3} x^{-\frac{-}{3}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 3 \frac{d y}{d x}=4 x^{\frac{1}{3}}-4 x^{\frac{-7}{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=\frac{4}{9} x^{\frac{-2}{3}}+\frac{28}{9} x^{\frac{-10}{3}} \\\Rightarrow 9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=4 x \cdot x^{\frac{-2}{3}}+28 \cdot x \cdot x^{\frac{-10}{3}} \Rightarrow 9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=4 x^{\frac{1}{3}}+28 x^{\frac{-7}{3}} \\\therefore 9 x \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}-3 \frac{d y}{dx}=4 x^{\frac{1}{3}}+28 x^{\frac{-7}{3}}-4 x^{\frac{1}{3}}+4 x^{\frac{-7}{3}}=32 x^{\frac{-9}{3}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1593 (ID: 474948)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=1-x+\frac{1}{2-x}[/math] এর সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্ন মান কত?

Options:
ক. 1
খ. -3
গ. -1
ঘ. 3


Correct Answer: A.1

Solution:
[math]f(x)=1-x+\frac{1}{2-x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=-1+\frac{1}{(2-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\frac{2}{(2-\mathrm{x})^{3}}[/math]
সর্বোচ্চ ও সর্বনিম্নমানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime} (x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow-1+\frac{1}{(2-x)^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow(2-x)^{2}=1 \Rightarrow 4-4 x+x^{2}=1 \\\Rightarrow x^{2}-4 x+3=0 \Rightarrow(x-1)(x-3)=0\Rightarrow x=1,3\end{array}[/math]
x = 1 হলে [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime \prime}(1)=2>0[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন মান[math]f(1)=1-1+\frac{1}{2-1}=1-1+1=1[/math]
x = 3 হলে [math]f^{\prime}(3)=\frac{2}{(2-3)^{3}}=-2<0[/math]
 সর্বোচ্চমান

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1594 (ID: 474949)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 2}\left(\frac{x^{2}-2}{x^{2}-4}\right)[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1+\ln 2}{1-\ln 2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1-\ln 2}{1+\ln 2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2-\ln 2}{2+\ln 2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2+\ln 2}{2-\ln 2}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{\ln 2-1}{\ln 2+1}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1-\ln 2}{1+\ln 2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{x^{2}-2^{x}}{x^{x}-4} \cdot\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 2} \frac{2 x-2^{x} \ln 2}{x^{1}(1+\ln x)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 2-2^{2} \ln 2}{2^{2}(1+\ln 2)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4-4 \ln 2}{4(1+\ln 2)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1-\ln 2}{1+\ln 2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1595 (ID: 474950)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\ln \left(e^{2} \cos x\right)}{x \sin x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x-\ln \left(e^{x} \cos x\right)}{x \sin x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-\frac{1}{e^{x} \cos x}\left(e^{x} \cos x-e^{x} \sin x\right)}{\sin x+x \cos x} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-(1-\tan x)}{\sin x+x \cos x},\left[\frac{0}{0} \text { आका }\right] \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x+\sec ^{2} x}{\cos x+\cos x-x \sin x}=\frac{-0+1}{1+1-0}=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1596 (ID: 474951)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=A \cos 3 x+B \sin 3 x+\frac{1}{2} x \sin 3 x[/math] হয়, তাহলে নিচের কোন উত্তরটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. [math]y_{2}+9 y_{1}=3 \cos 3 x[/math]
খ. [math]y_{2}-9 y_{1}=3 \cos 3 x[/math]
গ. [math]y_{2}+9 y=\frac{3}{2} \cos 3 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]y_{2}+9 y=3 \cos 3 x[/math]
ঙ. [math]y_{2}+9 y=3 \sin 3 x[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]y_{2}+9 y=3 \cos 3 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=A \cos 3 x+B \sin 3 x+\frac{1}{2} x \sin 3 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{1}[/math]
 [math]=-3 A \sin 3 x+3 B \cos 3 x+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math](3 x \cos 3 x+\sin 3 x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}[/math]
 [math]=-9 A \cos 3 x-9 B \sin 3 x+\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math](-9 x \sin 3 x+3 \cos 3 x+3 \cos 3 x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}=-9[/math]
 [math]\left(A \cos 3 x+B \sin 3 x+\frac{1}{2} x \sin 3 x\right)[/math]
 [math]+3 \cos 3 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y_{2}[/math]
 [math]=-9 y+3 \cos 3 x[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{2}+9 y[/math]
 [math]=3 \cos 3 x[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1597 (ID: 474952)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মান নির্ণয় কর: [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}(\sin x)^{\tan x}}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x)^{\tan x}=y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln y=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \tan x \ln \sin x[/math]
 [math]=x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2} \frac{\ln \sin x}{\cot x},[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\frac{\cos x}{\sin x}}{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}-\frac{\cos x}{\sin x} \cdot \sin ^{2}[/math]
 [math]x[\text { L Hospital Law] }[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}-\cos x \cdot \sin x[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow y[/math]
 [math]=e^{0}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1598 (ID: 474953)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin ^{3} x[/math] হলে, [math]y_{n}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}\left[3 \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)-3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)\right][/math]
খ. [math]\sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
ঙ. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)+\cos n x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{4}\left[3 \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)-3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)\right][/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{3} x=\frac{3}{4} \sin x-\frac{1}{4} \sin ^{3} x[/math]
................................................................................................................[math]\begin{array}{l}y_{n}=\frac{3}{4} \sin \left(n \frac{\pi}{2}+x\right)-\frac{3^{n}}{4} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right) \\=\frac{1}{4}\left[3 \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+x\right)-3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)\right]\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1599 (ID: 474954)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x+\sin y=x^{3}[/math] সমীকরণে [math]x = 1[/math] এর জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঙ. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x+\sin y=x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3} x^{\frac{1}{3}-1}+\cos y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2} \\\Rightarrow \cos y \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=3 x^{2}-\frac{1}{3} x \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{3 x^{2}-\frac{1}{3} x^{-\frac{2}{3}}}{\cos y}[/math]
 [math]x+\sin y=x^{3} \\\Rightarrow 1+\sin y=1^{3}[\because x=1][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sin y=0 \therefore y=0[/math]
যখন, [math]\mathrm{x}=1, \mathrm{y}=0[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3-\frac{1}{3}}{\cos 0^{\circ}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\frac{8}{3}}{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1600 (ID: 474955)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-2 e^{3 x}+e^{5 x}}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-2 e^{3 x}+e^{5 x}}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-2 \cdot 3 \cdot 3 e^{3 x}+5 \cdot 5 e^{5 x}}{2}=\frac{1-18+25}{2}=\frac{8}{2}=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1601 (ID: 474956)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{(\sin x+y)}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।।

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cos x}{1-2 y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\cos x}{2 y-1}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin x}{2 y-1}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin x}{1-2 y}[/math]
E. [math]2 y-\cos x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\cos x}{2 y-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sqrt{(\sin x+y)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=\sin x+y[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\cos x+\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}(2 y-1)[/math]
 [math]=\cos x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cos x}{2 y-1}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1602 (ID: 474957)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math] -এর ক্ষুদ্রতম মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. 12
খ. 5
গ. 7
ঘ. 11
ঙ. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]f(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 e^{x}-9 e^{-x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{4\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}-9}{e^{x}}=0 \Rightarrow\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}=\frac{9}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{x}=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=4 e^{x}+9 e^{-x}[/math]
 , যা সর্বদা শূন্য অপেক্ষা বড় ।[math]\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{x}}=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 এর জন্য, [math]f(x)[/math]
 সর্বনিম্ন হবে ।[math]\therefore f(x)=4 \times \frac{3}{2}+9 \times \frac{2}{3}=6+6=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1603 (ID: 474958)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x=t-\sin t[/math] এবং [math]y=\frac{d x}{d t}[/math] হয় তাহলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\cot \frac{t}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\tan \frac{t}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\tan t[/math]
D. [math]\cot t[/math]
E. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cot \frac{t}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x=t-\sin t \Rightarrow \frac{d x}{d t}=1-\cos t[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=1-\cos t \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d t}=\sin t[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d t}}{\frac{d x}{d t}}=\frac{\sin t}{1-\cos t}=\frac{2 \sin \frac{t}{2} \cos \frac{t}{2}}{2 \sin ^{2} \frac{t}{2}}=\cot \frac{t}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1604 (ID: 474959)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x)^{\tan x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]
E. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]L=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}}(\sin x)^{\tan x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \log L=\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \tan x \log (\sin x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow L=\mathrm{e}^{\lim _{x-\frac{\pi}{2}} \tan x \log (\sin x)}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\log (\sin x)}{\cot x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\lim _{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\log (\sin x)}{\cot x} \text { is a } \frac{0}{0} \text { form }[/math]
 [math]\text { So, we can apply L'Hospital rule, }[/math]
 [math]L=e^{\lim ^{x \rightarrow \frac{\pi}{2}} \frac{\cot x}{-\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{\frac{0}{-1}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{e}^{0}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1605 (ID: 474960)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt[n]{x}}\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y(\log x-1)}{n}[/math]
B. [math]3 y(\log x-2)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{(\log x-3)}{y}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y(\log x-1)}{x^{3}}[/math]
E. [math]\frac{y(\log x-1)}{n x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\frac{y(\log x-1)}{n x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt[n]{x}}\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=\left(x^{-\frac{1}{n}}\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}[/math]
 [math]=x^{\frac{1}{n x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \log y=\log x^{-\frac{1}{n x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{n x} \log x^{}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{n x} \times \frac{1}{x}+\log x\left(\frac{-1}{n}\right)\left(\frac{-1}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{y} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{n x^{2}}+\frac{1}{n x^{2}} \log x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y}{n x^{2}}(\log x-1)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

B. [math]\frac{1}{n x}\left(\log _{e} x-1\right)[/math]

Question #1607 (ID: 474962)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1+x-1+x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 x}{x(\sqrt{1+x}+\sqrt{1-x})}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1}+\sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1608 (ID: 474963)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{1}^{e^2} \dfrac{dx}{x(1+\ln x)^2}[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Substitution [math]u = 1 + \ln x[/math]
, [math]du = \frac{1}{x}dx[/math]
 ব্যবহার করলে [math]-\frac{1}{u}[/math]
 থেকে [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 হয়।

Explanation:

Question #1609 (ID: 474964)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x + \dfrac{1}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখার চাল শুন্য হলে [math]x[/math] এর মান

Options:
ক. [math]1/2[/math]
খ. [math]-1/2[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]dy/dx = 1 - \frac{1}{x^2} = 0 ⇒ x = ±1[/math]
 ⇒ [math]x = -1[/math]
 সঠিক।

Explanation:

Question #1610 (ID: 474965)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. 2
B. y
C. [math]2^y[/math]
D. [math]2^x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.y

Solution:
ধরি, [math]z=\frac{y}{2^{x}} \Rightarrow 2^{x}=\frac{y}{z}[/math]
 যখন [math]x \rightarrow \infty[/math]
 তখন [math]z \rightarrow 0[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=\lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{y}{z} \cdot \sin z=y \\\lim _{z \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin z}{z}=y \times 1=y[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1611 (ID: 474966)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{x}[/math] এর n তম অন্তরক কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n!}{x^{n+1}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} x^{n+1}}{n!}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{(-1)^{n} x^{n}}{n!}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{(-1) n!}{x^{n}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{(-1)^{n} n!}{x^{n+1}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 হলে [math]y_{n}=\frac{(-1)^{n} n!}{x^{n+1}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1612 (ID: 474967)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a> 1[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\ln a^{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{a^{x}}{\ln a}[/math]
B. [math]Ina[/math]
C. [math]a^{x}[/math]
D. [math]x \ln a[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]Ina[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\ln a^{x}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(x \ln a)=\ln a[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1613 (ID: 474968)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y = x lnx[/math] এর লঘুমান নির্ণয় করা যাবে?

Options:
ক. [math]e[/math]
খ. [math]-e[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-1}{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x \ln x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{x}+\ln x[/math]
 [math]\cdot 1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1+\ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x}[/math]
লঘুমান ও গুরুমানের জন্য [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+\ln x=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \ln \mathrm{x}=-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\mathrm{e}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1614 (ID: 474969)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]- k[/math] এর মান কোন মানের জন্য [math]\mathbf{y}[/math] [math]=\mathbf{k x}+\mathbf{k} \mathbf{x}^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শকx অক্ষের সাথে 30° কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=k x+k x^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=k+2 k x[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে [math](0,0), \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{k}[/math]
 প্রশ্নমতে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1615 (ID: 474970)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{-5 x}-2}{x^{2}}=[/math] = কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]25[/math]
D. [math]50[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]25[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{5 x}+e^{-5 x}-2}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{5 e^{5 x}-5 e^{-5 x}}{2 x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার [math]]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{25 e^{5 x}+25 e^{-5 x}}{2}=\frac{25+25}{2}=25[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1616 (ID: 474971)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\log _{x} a^{5}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]5 x \ln a[/math]
B. [math]\frac{5 \ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln a^{5}}{x \ln x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-5 \ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-5 \ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]=\log _{x} a^{5}=5 \log _{x}{ }^{a}[/math]
 [math]=5 \log _{x}{ }^{e} \cdot \log _{e}{ }^{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 \ln a}{\ln x}[/math]
 [math]=5 \ln a \cdot(\ln x)^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-5 \ln a(\ln x)^{-2} \times \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-5 \ln a}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1617 (ID: 474972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2014-2015, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x) = x + sinx[/math] হয়, তবে [math]x[/math] এর কোন মানটির জন্য [math]f'(x) = 0[/math] হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\sin x \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=1+\cos x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 0=1+\cos x \Rightarrow \cos x=-1 \Rightarrow x=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1618 (ID: 474973)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{2}=3 x[/math] এবং [math]x^{2}=3 y[/math] পরাবৃত্তদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু দিয়ে গমনকারী সরলরেখার ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y^{2}=3 x[/math]
 এবং [math]x^{2}=3 y \Rightarrow y=\frac{x^{2}}{3}[/math]
তাহলে, [math]\frac{x^{4}}{9}=3 x \Rightarrow x^{4}-27 x=0 \Rightarrow x\left(x^{3}-27\right)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{x}\left(\mathrm{x}^{3}-3^{3}\right)=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=0,3 \therefore \mathrm{y}=0,3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ছেদবিন্দুদ্বয় [math](0, 0)[/math]
 ও [math](3, 3)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় রেখার ঢাল [math]=\frac{3-0}{3-0}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1619 (ID: 474974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=(x-2)(x-3)-x+7[/math] ' বক্ররেখাটির কোন বিন্দুতে ঢাল 4?

Options:
ক. [math](2,3)[/math]
খ. [math](2,7)[/math]
গ. [math](3,7)[/math]
ঘ. [math](5,8)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math](5,8)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=(x-2)(x-3)-x+7=x^{2}-5 x+6-x+7[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}-6 x+13[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=2 x-6=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x=6+4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=5[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=(5-2)[/math]
 [math](5-3)-5+7=8[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুটি [math](5,8)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1620 (ID: 474975)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}, x>0[/math] ফাংশনের চরম বিন্দু কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](1,-1)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(-1, \frac{-3}{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math](1,2)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(2, \frac{5}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](1,2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x+\frac{1}{x}, x>0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{x^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=1(x>0)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 চরম বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)=1+\frac{1}{1}=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 চরম বিন্দু [math](1,2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1621 (ID: 474976)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d \cos x}(\sin x)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\cot x[/math]
B. [math]-\cot x[/math]
C. [math]\sec ^{2} x[/math]
D. [math]\operatorname{cosec}^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\cot x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d \cos x}(\sin x)=\frac{\frac{d}{d x}(\sin x)}{\frac{d}{d x}(\cos x)}=\frac{\cos x}{-\sin x}=-\cot x[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1622 (ID: 474977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: DU 7 College Admission Exam, University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{10} x\right)=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{\mathrm{e}} 10[/math]
D. [math]\log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\log _{10} \mathrm{x}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]

Question #1623 (ID: 474978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2000-2001, 2023-2024, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sqrt{\sec x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{y}{4} \tan x[/math]
B. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan x[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y^{2}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{y}{2} \tan ^{2} x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{y}{2} \tan x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}y & =\sqrt{\sec x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{\sec x}} \sec x \tan x \\& =\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{\sec x} \tan x=\frac{y}{2} \tan x\end{aligned}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1625 (ID: 474795)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}{\sin x+\cos x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}{\sin x+\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \cdot \sin x \cos x}}{\sin x+\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sqrt{(\sin x+\cos x)^{2}}}{\sin x+\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sin x+\cos x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}(1)=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1626 (ID: 474796)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x[/math]-এর সাপেক্ষে [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x}[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin 2 x[/math]
খ. [math]2 e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin x[/math]
গ. [math]-e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin 2 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]e^{\sin ^{2} x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]e^{\sin ^{2} x} \sin 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(e^{\sin ^{2} x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \cdot 2 \sin x \cos x[/math]
 [math]=e^{\sin ^{2} x} \cdot \sin 2 x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1627 (ID: 474797)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log _{2} x[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]2^{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2 \ln x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln 2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{x \ln 2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x} \log _{2} x=\frac{1}{x} \log _{2} e=\frac{1}{x} \times \frac{1}{\log _{e} 2}=\frac{1}{x \ln 2}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1630 (ID: 474800)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{2}-x+1[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](2, 3)[/math] বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত অভিলম্বের ঢাল কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{2}-x+1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 x-1[/math]
 [math](2,3)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=2 \times 2-1=3[/math]
অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]-\frac{1}{3} \therefore A n s .(d)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1631 (ID: 474801)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math] ফাংশনটি নিচের কোন বিন্দুতে ক্রমবর্ধমান?

Options:
ক. [math]x=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]x=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\pi[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{5 \pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]x=\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=\sin x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}^{\prime}(\mathrm{x})=\cos \mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}^{\prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\cos \frac{\pi}{4}>0 \therefore \text { Ans. (a) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1632 (ID: 474802)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x-[/math]এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]f(x)=\frac{1}{3} x^{3}-\frac{5}{2} x^{2}+6 x-1[/math] এর চরম মান পাওয়া যাবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2,-3[/math]
খ. [math]-2,3[/math]
গ. [math]2,-3[/math]
ঘ. [math]2,3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2,3[/math]

Solution:
চরম মানের জন্য [math]f^{\prime}(x)=x^{2}-5 x+6[/math]
 [math]=(x-3)(x-2) \equiv 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=2,3[/math]
 [math]Ans. (d)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1634 (ID: 474804)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)[/math] ফাংশন [math]x = a[/math] বিন্দুতে অবিচ্ছিন্ন হলে—

[math]\text { i. } f(a)[/math] সংজ্ঞায়িত হয়

[math]\text { ii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)[/math] বিদ্যমান থাকে

[math]\text { iii. } \lim _{x \rightarrow a} f(x)=f(a)[/math] হয়

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: D.i, ii ও iii

Solution:
সব তথ্যই সত্য।

Explanation:

ঘ. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

[math]f(x)=\cos x[/math] [math]f^{\prime \prime \prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{3}\right)=\text {}[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]

Question #1637 (ID: 474807)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024, 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: DU 7 College Admission Exam, University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{10} x\right)=[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{\mathrm{e}} 10[/math]
D. [math]\log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dx}}\left(\log _{10} \mathrm{x}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{x}} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1638 (ID: 474808)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: DU 7 College Admission Exam
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y^{x y+1}=5[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln 5}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5 \Rightarrow x y+1=\ln 5 \\\Rightarrow y+x \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1639 (ID: 474809)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: DU 7 College Admission Exam
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \frac{1}{\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}} d x=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\int_{0}^{a} \frac{d x}{\sqrt{a^{2}-x^{2}}}=\left[\sin ^{-1} \frac{x}{a}\right]_{0}^{a}\\=\sin ^{-1} 1-\sin ^{-1} 0=\frac{\pi}{2}-0=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1640 (ID: 474810)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sqrt{1 - \sqrt{x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\dfrac{df}{dx} = ?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\dfrac{1}{4\sqrt{x} \sqrt{1 - \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
B. [math]\dfrac{1}{2\sqrt{x} \sqrt{1 - \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
C. [math]-\dfrac{1}{2\sqrt{x} \sqrt{1 - \sqrt{x}}}[/math]
D. [math]-\dfrac{1}{4\sqrt{x} \sqrt{1 - \sqrt{x}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
চেইন রুল প্রয়োগে গুণফল [math]f'(x)[/math] নির্ণয় করা হয়।

Explanation:

Question #1641 (ID: 474811)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim\limits_{x \to 0} \dfrac{\ln(1 + x)}{x}[/math]

Options:
A. 0
B. [math]\dfrac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-1[/math]
D. 1


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
মৌলিক সূত্র অনুযায়ী, [math]\lim\limits_{x \to 0} \dfrac{\ln(1 + x)}{x} = 1[/math]।

Question #1642 (ID: 474812)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে, [math]3x+5y+7=0[/math] ও [math]x-ay+11=0[/math] রেখাদ্বয় পরস্প সমান্তরাল হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{5}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{3}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{5}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{5}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{3}{1}=\frac{5}{-a} \Rightarrow a=-\frac{5}{3}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1643 (ID: 474813)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=f(\theta)=r \cos \theta[/math] এবং [math]y=g(\theta)=r \sin \theta[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d x}{d y}[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে -

Options:
A. [math]\cot \theta, \tan \theta[/math]
B. [math]-\cot \theta,-\tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]-\tan \theta,-\cot \theta[/math]
D. [math]\tan \theta, \cot \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\cot \theta,-\tan \theta[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d(r \sin \theta)}{d(r \cos \theta)}=\frac{r \cos \theta}{-r \sin \theta}=-\cot \theta[/math]
 [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=\frac{d(r \cos \theta)}{d(r \sin \theta)}=\frac{-r \sin \theta}{r \cos \theta}=-\tan \theta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1644 (ID: 474814)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sqrt{1+x}-\sqrt{1-x}}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. 1
C. -1
D. [math]\frac{-1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.1

Solution:
মান [math]=\frac{1-(-1)}{2}=\frac{2}{2}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1645 (ID: 474815)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=f(\theta)=r \cos \theta[/math] এবং [math]y=g(\theta)=r \sin \theta[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে

Options:
A. [math]\cot \theta, \tan \theta[/math]
B. [math]-\cot \theta,-\tan \theta[/math]
C. [math]-\tan \theta,-\cot \theta[/math]
D. [math]\tan \theta, \cot \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\cot \theta,-\tan \theta[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d(r \sin \theta)}{d(r \cos \theta)}=\frac{r \cos \theta}{-r \sin \theta}=-\cot \theta[/math]
 [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=\frac{d(r \cos \theta)}{d(r \sin \theta)}=\frac{-r \sin \theta}{r \cos \theta}=-\tan \theta[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1646 (ID: 474816)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{2 x^{3}-(2 k+1) x^{2}+2 x+k}{x-1}=-6[/math] হলে, k-এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{2 x^{3}-(2 k+1) x^{2}+2 x+k}{x-1}[/math]
 [math]=-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow 1} \frac{6 x^{2}-2 x(2 k+1)+2}{1}[/math]
 [math]=-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6-2[/math]
 [math](2 k+1)+2=-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6-4[/math]
 [math]k-2+2=-6[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4[/math]
 [math]k=12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1647 (ID: 474817)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]f(x)=5^{x}[/math] হয়, তবে f'(x) = কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5^{x} \ln 5[/math]
খ. [math]5^{x} \ln 10[/math]
গ. [math]10^{x} \ln 10[/math]
ঘ. [math]5^{5 x} \ln 5[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]5^{x} \ln 5[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=5^{x} \Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=5^{x} \ln 5[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1648 (ID: 474818)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2016-2017, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=2 \text { at }[/math] এবং [math]y=a t^{2}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]t[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{t}[/math]
C. [math]t^{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]t[/math]

Solution:
[math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{\frac{d y}{d t}}{\frac{d x}{d t}}=\frac{2 a t}{2 a}=t[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
