Question #1649 (ID: 474819)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos y=\frac{1-t^{2}}{1+t^{2}}[/math] এবং [math]\sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math]?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 t}{1-t^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 t\left(1-t^{2}\right)}{\left(1+t^{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos y=\frac{1-t^{2}}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1-t^{2}}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\sin x=\frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=\sin ^{-1} \frac{2 t}{1+t^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \tan ^{-1} t[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1650 (ID: 474820)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{-2} \ln x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]x^{-4} \ln x-2 x^{-2}-3 x^{-4}[/math]
B. [math]6 x^{-4} \ln x-5 x^{-4}[/math]
C. [math]6 x^{-4} \ln x-2 x^{-2}-3 x^{-4}[/math]
D. [math]x^{-4} \ln x-2 x^{-2}+3 x^{-4}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]6 x^{-4} \ln x-5 x^{-4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{-2} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{-2}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{x}+\ln x \times(-2) x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=x^{-3}-2 \ln x x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=-3 x^{-4}-2 \ln x\left(-3 x^{-4}\right)-2 x^{-3}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]=-3 x^{-4}+6 x^{-4} \ln x-2 x^{-4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6 x^{-4} \ln x-5 x^{-4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1651 (ID: 474821)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{6}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2}}{x}+3 x^{2} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2}+3 x^{2} \ln x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=x^{2}(1+3 \ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x^{2} \cdot 3}{x}+2 x(1+3 \ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=3 x+2 x(1+3 \ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=x(3+2+1+6 \ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=x(6+6 \ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x}{x}+1 \cdot(6+6 \ln x)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{3} y}{d x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]=1+6+6 \ln x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d^{4} y}{d x^{4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1652 (ID: 474822)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বৃত্তের [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}[/math] এর বিন্দু (h,h) এ স্পর্শকের ঢাল-

Options:
ক. [math]1[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2} \Rightarrow 2 x+2 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 (h, h) বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{h}{h}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1653 (ID: 474823)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]k[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]x = 1[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]f(x)=x^{2}+\frac{k}{x}[/math] এর লঘুমান পাওয়া যাবে?

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=x^{2}+\frac{k}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)[/math]
 [math]=2 x-\frac{k}{x^{2}}[/math]
লঘু ও ও গুরুমানের জন্য [math]f(x)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x-\frac{k}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x^{3}-k=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1[/math]
 হলে, [math]2 \times 1^{3}-\mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{k}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1654 (ID: 474824)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{\sin ^{2} 2 x}[/math] এর মান হবে ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{8}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{\sin ^{2} 2 x} ;[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{0+\sin x}{2 x 2 \sin 2 x \cos 2 x}[/math]
 [math]\text { [L' Hospital's rule] }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{1}{4}\left(\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x} \times \frac{2 x}{\sin 2 x} \times \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{\cos 2 x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{4} \times \frac{1}{2} \times 1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{8}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1655 (ID: 474825)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{2}(\ln x)\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sin (2 \ln x)}{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2 \cos (\ln x)}{x}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\sin (2 \ln x)}{x}[/math]
D. [math]-2 x \cos (\ln x) \sin (\ln x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{\sin (2 \ln x)}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{2}(\ln x)\right)=2 \cos (\ln x)(-\sin (\ln x)) \frac{1}{x}=-\frac{2 \sin (\ln x) \cos (\ln x)}{x}=\frac{-\sin (2 \ln x)}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1656 (ID: 474826)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=k x(2 x+\sqrt{3})[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x-অক্ষের সাথে 30° কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তাহলে k-এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=k x(2 x+\sqrt{3})=2 k x^{2}+\sqrt{3} k x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=4 k x+\sqrt{3} k[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=4 k \times 0+\sqrt{3} k[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3} k:[/math]
 [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\sqrt{3} k[/math]
 [math]=\tan 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1657 (ID: 474827)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos ^{\prime}(\ln x) \mid-7\right.[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\text { sin(2lax) }[/math]
B. [math]2 \cos (\ln x)[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sin (2 \ln x)}{x}[/math]
D. [math]2 x \cos (\ln x) \sin (\ln x)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\sin (2 \ln x)}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left|\cos ^{3}(\ln x)\right|-2 \cos (\ln x) \frac{d}{d x}|\cos (\ln x)|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}-2 \cos (\ln x)|\sin (\ln x)| \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x) \\=-2 \sin (\ln x) \cos (\ln x), \frac{1}{x}-\frac{1}{x} \sin (2 \ln x)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1658 (ID: 474828)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=k x(2 x+\sqrt{3})[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি [math]x-[/math] অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তাহলে [math]k[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=k x(2 x+\sqrt{3})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=4 k x+\sqrt{3} k[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে মান, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3} \cdot k[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\tan 30^{\circ}=\sqrt{3} \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3} \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{k}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1659 (ID: 474829)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]-\infty[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{x \sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x}}}{-x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty}-\sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x}}[/math]
 [math]\text{Here, limiting value may seen to be }[/math]
 [math]-1 \text{. But, in }[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x} ;[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}>0\\x \rightarrow-\infty[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1660 (ID: 474830)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}[/math] এর মান হলো-

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\infty[/math]
C. [math]-\infty[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+2 x}}{-x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{x \sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x}}}{-x} \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{1+\frac{2}{x}}}{-1}=-\sqrt{1}=-1\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1661 (ID: 474831)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{\tan ^{-1}(3 x)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1 / 3[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1 / 3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\frac{\sin x}{x}}{\frac{\tan ^{-1} 3 x}{3 x} \times 3}=\frac{\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}}{\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 3 x}{3 x} \times 3}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1662 (ID: 474832)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=(1+x) /(1-x)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-2}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{(1+x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(1-x) \cdot 1-(1+x)(-1)}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{(1-x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1663 (ID: 474833)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{limt}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{\tan ^{-1}(3 x)}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{\tan ^{-1}(3 x)}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right) \cdot x}{\frac{\tan ^{-1}(3 x)}{3 x} \cdot 3 x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1 \times 3}=\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1664 (ID: 474834)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=1+x^{3}[/math] বক্ররেখাটির সাথে x অক্ষের ছেদবিন্দুর সংখ্যা-

Options:
ক. [math]0[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=1+x^{3}, x-[/math]
 x-অক্ষে, [math]f(x) = y = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+x^{3}=0 \Rightarrow x^{3}=-1 \Rightarrow x^{3}=(-1)^{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=-1,-\omega,-\omega^{2}[/math]
 তিনটি মান, এদের মধ্যে একটি বাস্তব অপর 2টি অবাস্তব।[math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=[/math]
 [math]x-[/math]
অক্ষে ছেদ বিন্দু [math](-1, 0)[/math]
 যা [math]1[/math]
 টি।

Explanation:

Question #1665 (ID: 474835)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{2 x^{2}+3 x+5}{3 x^{2}+5 x-6}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-5}{6}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{2 x^{2}+3 x+5}{3 x^{2}+5 x-6}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{2+\frac{3}{x}+\frac{5}{x^{2}}}{3+\frac{5}{x}-\frac{6}{x^{2}}}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1666 (ID: 474836)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{4}-4 x^{3}+4 x^{2}+5[/math] হলে, লঘিষ্ঠ মান-

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{4}-4 x^{3}+4 x^{2}+5[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}y^{n}=12 x^{2}-24 x+8 \\y^{\prime \prime}(0)=8>0\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}y^{\prime}=4 x^{3}-12 x^{2}+8 x=0 \\\Rightarrow x\left(4 x^{2}-12 x+8\right)=0\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0[/math]
 এবং [math]4 x^{2}-12 x+8=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=0[/math]
 এর জন্য লঘিষ্ঠ মান রয়েছে [math]\therefore \mathrm{f}(0)=0^{4}-4.0^{3}+4.0^{2}+5=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1667 (ID: 474837)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(4,3) বিন্দুতে [math]3 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=12[/math] অধিবৃত্তের স্পর্শকের ঢালের মান -

Options:
ক. [math]-1[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]3 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=12[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 x-8 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 x}{8 y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 x}{4 y}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=\frac{3 \times 4}{4 \times 3}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1668 (ID: 474838)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2019-2020, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x^{4}-4 x^{3}+4 x^{2}+5[/math] এর লঘিষ্ঠ মান-

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]f(x) = x²-4x² + 4x² +5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow f^{\prime}(x)=4 x^{3}-12 x^{2}+8 x=4 x\left(x^{2}-3 x+2\right)=4 x(x-1)(x-2)[/math]
লঘিষ্ঠ ও গরিষ্ঠ মানের জন্য, [math]'(x) = 0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 x(x-1)(x-2)=0 \Rightarrow x=0,1,2[/math]
আবার [math]f^{\prime \prime}(x)=12 x^{2}-24 x+8[/math]
 [math]x = 0[/math]
 হলে, [math]f(0)=8>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}=0[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ফাংশনটি লঘিষ্ঠ হবে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 লঘিষ্ঠ মান [math]= 0-0+0+5=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1669 (ID: 474839)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { The value of } \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{\cos x}}{\cos x} \text { is }-[/math]

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{e}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{\cos x}}{\cos x}=\frac{e^{\cos 0}}{\cos 0}=\frac{e \prime}{1}=e[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1670 (ID: 474840)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)[/math] হয় তবে , [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\sin x[/math]
B. [math]\cos x[/math]
C. [math]x[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}\left\{\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)\right\}=\frac{d}{d x}(x)=1[/math]

Question #1671 (ID: 474841)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2013-2014, 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] - বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]x=\pm 2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \therefore x= \pm 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1672 (ID: 474842)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

Options:
A. [math]e[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]e[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{\cos x}}{\cos x}=\frac{e^{\cos 0}}{\cos 0}=\frac{e^{1}}{1}=e[/math]

Question:
[math]y=\ln \left(a x^{2}\right)[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\mathrm{ax}^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 a}{x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{a}{x^{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{2}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \left(a x^{2}\right)=\ln a+2 \ln x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=0+\frac{2}{x}=\frac{2}{x}[/math]

Question #1674 (ID: 474844)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] হবে-

Options:
A. [math]sinx[/math]
B. [math]cosx[/math]
C. [math]x[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\sin ^{-1}(\sin x) \Rightarrow y=x \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1[/math]

Question #1675 (ID: 474845)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 7 x-\sin x}{\sin 6 x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{6}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{7}{6}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Using L - Hospital's law: }[/math]
 [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 7 x-\sin x}{\sin 6 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{7 \cos 7 x-\cos x}{6 \cos x 6}=\frac{7-1}{6}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1676 (ID: 474846)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{\sin ^{2} x+\cos ^{2} x+2 \sin x \cos x}}[/math]
 [math]=1 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1677 (ID: 474847)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]k-[/math]এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=kx(1-x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x – অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=k x(1-x)=k\left(x-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=k(1-2 x)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মূলবিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=k(1-0)=k[/math]
 [math]\therefore k[/math]
 [math]=\tan 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1678 (ID: 474848)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2022-2023, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{1+\sin 2 x}}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=[/math] ?

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
B. $0
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\cos 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.$0

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt{(\sin x+\cos x)^{2}}}=1 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]

Question #1679 (ID: 474849)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+6 x}{2 x^{2}+5}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+6 x}{2 x^{2}+5}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1+\frac{6}{x}}{2+\frac{5}{x^{2}}}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1680 (ID: 474850)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{-x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5 \Rightarrow x y+1=\ln (5) \Rightarrow x y=\ln (5)-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x} \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}+\mathrm{y}=0 \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=-\frac{\mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{x}} \text { [Showed] }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1681 (ID: 474851)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=0[/math] বিন্দুতে, [math]y=x+e^{x}[/math] এর লেখচিত্রে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]y=x[/math]
খ. [math]y=x+1[/math]
গ. [math]y=2 x+1[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]y=2 x+1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x+e^{x} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=1+e^{x} ;[/math]
 [math]x=0, m=1+e=2 ; y-1=2(x-0)[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=2 x+1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1682 (ID: 474852)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2003-2004, 2005-2006, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\cos x+\cos 2 x) \\=1 \times(\cos 0+\cos 0)=1+1=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1683 (ID: 474853)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2013-2014, 2021-2022, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] - বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]x=\pm 2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]\pm 1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow 1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \therefore x= \pm 1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1684 (ID: 474854)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+6 x}{2 x^{2}+5}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}+6 x}{2 x^{2}+5}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1+\frac{6}{x}}{2+\frac{5}{x^{2}}}=\frac{1+0}{2+0}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1685 (ID: 474855)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]e^{x y+1}=5[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{x y}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\ln 5}{x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\ln 5}{y}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{e}^{x y+1}=5 \Rightarrow x y+1=\ln 5[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y+x \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{y}{x}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1686 (ID: 474856)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n} \text { then } \frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
B. [math]\left(-\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
C. [math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]
D. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{n x^{n-1}}{n y^{n-1}}=-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1687 (ID: 474857)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-7[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1-\cos x}{x^{2}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin ^{2} x / 2}{4(x / 2)^{2}}=-\frac{1}{2} \lim \left(\frac{\sin x / 2}{x / 2}\right)^{2}=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
অথবা, [math]\text { Calculator }[/math]
 এ [math]\text { Radian mode } \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 রাশিটির মান [math]0[/math]
-র খুব কাছাকাছি বসালেও [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 চলে আসে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1688 (ID: 474858)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If, } x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n} \text { then; } \frac{d y}{d x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
B. [math]\left(-\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n}[/math]
C. [math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{\mathbf{n - 1}}[/math]
D. [math]\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{\mathbf{n - 1}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]x^{n}+y^{n}=a^{n} \Rightarrow n x^{n-1}+n y^{n-1} \cdot \frac{d y}{d x}=0 \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{n x^{n-1}}{n y^{n-1}} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)^{n-1}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1689 (ID: 474859)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]y=x+\frac{1}{x}[/math] বক্ররেখাটির ঢাল শূন্য হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm 2[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm 1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm 1[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x+\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 - ঢাল শূন্য বলে [math]1-\frac{1}{x^{2}}=0 \Rightarrow x^{2}=1 \therefore x=\pm 1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1690 (ID: 474860)

Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার [math]][/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x}{2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right)\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Question #1691 (ID: 474861)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]x^{2}+3 x y+5 y^{2}=1[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান হবে -

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2 x-3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x-10 y}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+3 x y+5 y^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+3 y+3 x \frac{d y}{d x}+10 y \frac{d y}{d x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sqrt{\cos 2 x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2 \sin x}{\sqrt{\tan x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\cos 2 x})=-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]

Question #1693 (ID: 474863)

Question:
যদি [math]x^{2}+3 x y+5 y^{2}=1[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2 x-3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x-10 y}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}=-\frac{2 x+3 y}{3 x+10 y}[/math]

Question #1694 (ID: 474864)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x y+x^{2} y^{2}-c=0[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d x}{d y}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x}{y}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{y}{x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{y}{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{x}{y}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{f_{x}}{f_{y}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-\left(2 x y^{2}+y\right)}{x+2 x^{2} y}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-y(2 x y+1)}{x(2 x y+1)}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{y}{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d x}{d y}=-\frac{x}{y}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

[math]f(x)=x^{3} / 3-2 x^{2}+4 x+4[/math] বক্ররেখার কোন বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল শূন্য হলে, বিন্দুটির ভূজ-

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]f^{\prime}(x)=x^{2}-4 x+4=0 \Rightarrow x=2[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{-1}(2 x)}{2 x} \times 2=2[/math]

Question #1697 (ID: 474867)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\frac{\tan x-\cot x}{\tan x+\cot x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]
B. [math]2 \cos 2 x[/math]
C. [math]2 \tan 2 x[/math]
D. [math]2 \cot 2 x[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2 \sin 2 x[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\tan x-\cot x}{\tan x+\cot x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\cot x\left(\frac{\tan x}{\cot x}-1\right)}{\cot x\left(\frac{\tan x}{\cot x}+1\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\tan ^{2} x-1}{\tan ^{2} x+1}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1-\tan ^{2} x}{1+\tan ^{2} x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=-\cos 2 x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=2 \sin 2 x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1698 (ID: 474868)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{\cos x}}{\cos x}=\frac{e^{\cos 0}}{\cos 0}=\frac{e^{1}}{1}=e[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\infty[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}-2 \ln (1+x)}{x \sin x},\left[\frac{0}{0}\right.[/math]
 আকার][math]\begin{array}{l}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}+e^{-x}-\frac{2}{1+x}}{x \cos x+\sin x},[\text { L' Hospital rule }] \\=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{e^{x}-e^{-x}+\frac{2}{(1+x)^{2}}}{x \sin x+\cos x+\cos x}=\frac{1-1+2}{-0+1+1}=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1699 (ID: 474869)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2021-2022, 2018-2019, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{2 x}{1-x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=2 \tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1700 (ID: 474870)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2014-2015, 2010-2011, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{2 \sin x \cos x}{1}[/math]
 [হসপিটাল [math]\text { rule }]=0[/math]
বিকল্পঃ [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ^{2} x}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x^{2}}{x}\left[\because \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \sin x\right]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} x=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1701 (ID: 474871)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2009-2010, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Mymensingh Board, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x^{2}} \cdot x=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1702 (ID: 474872)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}\right)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] সমান

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{x^{2}+4}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{1+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]
C. [math]1+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\ln \left(x+\sqrt{x^{2}+4}\right) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^{2}+4}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1703 (ID: 474873)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\frac{x+1}{x}[/math] হলে-

Options:
A. [math]x^{2} \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=1[/math]
B. [math]2 x^{4} \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=3 x+2[/math]
C. [math]x^{3} \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{2 x+1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]x^{3} \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2[/math]

Solution:
[math]y =\frac{x+1}{x}=1+\frac{1}{x}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d y}{d x}=-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2 \frac{1}{x^{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x^{3} \frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1704 (ID: 474874)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x^{2}}{x^{2}} \cdot x=0[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin (2 x)^{2}}{x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos 4 x^{2} \cdot 8 x}{1}=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1705 (ID: 474875)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} e\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\log _{x} \mathrm{e}}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x \ln x}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-\ln x}{x}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{x} e\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{\log _{e} x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{\ln x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\times \frac{d}{d x}(\ln x)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{x(\ln x)^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1706 (ID: 474876)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008, 2022-2023, 2022-2023, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{x}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan ^{-1} 2 x}{2 x} \times 2=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1707 (ID: 474877)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)}{2 x}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. Does not exist


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(e^{x}-e^{-x}\right)}{2 x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(e^{x}+e^{-x}\right)}{2}=\frac{1+1}{2}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1708 (ID: 474878)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2003-2004, 2005-2006, 2003-2004 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\pi[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x}{\sin x} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\cos x+\cos 2 x) \\=1 \times(\cos 0+\cos 0)=1+1=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1709 (ID: 474879)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2003-2004, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Barishal, Bangladesh Military Academy
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]y=\sqrt{\cos 2 x}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\frac{dy}{dx}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\cos 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2 \sin x}{\sqrt{\tan x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\tan 2 x}{\sqrt{\sin 2 x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d}{d x}(\sqrt{\cos 2 x})=-\frac{\sin 2 x}{\sqrt{\cos 2 x}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1710 (ID: 474880)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2014-2015, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]y = ax (1 - x)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x অক্ষের সহিত [math]60°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=a x(1-x)=y=a x-a x^{2} ; y_{1}=a-2 a x[/math]
 [math]\text { Now, } \tan 60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3} ; \sqrt{3}=a(1-2 x)[/math]
 মূলবিন্দুতে [math]x=0 \therefore \sqrt{3}=a(1-0)=a \quad \therefore a=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1713 (ID: 474883)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005, 2011-2012, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x>0[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে e ভিত্তিক [math]\log \frac{1}{x}[/math] এর অন্তরক-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log \frac{1}{x}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log x^{-1}\right)=\frac{d}{d x}(-\log x)=-\frac{1}{x}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1714 (ID: 474884)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2003-2004, 2014-2015, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{x(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\sin x}=\operatorname{Lim}_{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{(\cos x+\cos 2 x)}{\left(\frac{sin x}{x}\right)}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(\cos x+\cos 2 x)=1+1=2[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1715 (ID: 474885)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2002-2003, 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)

C. [math]\frac{-\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Question #1716 (ID: 474753)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]f(x)=x^{2}-x[/math]

ফাংশনটির চরম মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]138[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]f(x)=a x^{2 }+b x+c[/math]
 (কোনো দ্বিঘাত ফাংশনের চরম মান)(সর্বোচ্চ/সর্বনিম্ন) [math]=c-\frac{b^{2}}{4 a}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=x^{2}-\mathrm{x}[/math]
 ফাংশনটির চরম মান [math]=0-\frac{(-1)^{2}}{4.1}=-\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1718 (ID: 474755)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin ax}{x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]a[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{a}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]a[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{a x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin (a x)}{a x}[/math]
 [math]\times a[/math]
 [math]=a \lim _{a x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin a x}{a x}=a[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1720 (ID: 474757)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x^{\circ}}{x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{180}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{90}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{90}{\pi}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{90}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x^{\circ}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin \frac{2 x \pi}{180}}{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{90} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin \frac{x \pi}{90}}{\frac{x \pi}{90}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{90} .1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{90}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1721 (ID: 474758)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x}{x \cos 3 x}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x}{x \cos 3 x}=2 \times \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin 2 x}{2 x} \times \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{\cos 3 x}=2 \times 1 \times 1=2[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1724 (ID: 474761)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{1}{x}\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
C. [math]-x^{-2} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
D. [math]x^{-2} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x^{-2} \sin \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\cos \frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\sin \frac{1}{x} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\sin \frac{1}{x}\left(-\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{x^{2}} \sin \frac{1}{x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1725 (ID: 474762)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\sin \sqrt{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\cos \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #1726 (ID: 474763)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(10^{x}\right)=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]10^{x} \log _{e} 10[/math]
B. [math]x 10^{x-1}[/math]
C. [math]10^{\mathrm{x}} \log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]
D. [math]x 10^{x+1}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]10^{x} \log _{e} 10[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{\mathrm{d}\left(10^{\mathrm{x}}\right)}{\mathrm{dx}}=10^{\mathrm{x}} \ln 10=10^{\mathrm{x}} \log \mathrm{e}^{10}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1728 (ID: 474765)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}\left(\log _{10} x\right)[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{x}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} e[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{e} 10[/math]
D. [math]\log _{10} \mathrm{e}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{x} \log _{10} e[/math]

Solution:
[math]\log _{a} x[/math]
 এর অন্তরক হচ্ছে [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln a}[/math]
তাহলে [math]\log _{10} x[/math]
 এর অন্তরক হবে [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln 10}[/math]
তোমাদের মনে প্রশ্ন জাগতে পারে, [math]\frac{1}{|x| \ln 10}[/math]
 এ x এর পরমমান কোনো?এর কারণ হচ্ছে log এর পর সর্বদা ধনাত্মক মান বসে। [math]\log _{10} x[/math]
 রাশিটিতে xযেহেতু [math]log[/math]
 এর পর বসেছে, সেহেতু এই x কে হতে হবে সর্বদা ধনাত্মক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1729 (ID: 474766)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math] হলে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{1+x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1+x}{1-x}[/math]
ধরি, [math]x=\tan \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta=\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
এখন , [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1+\tan \theta}{1-\tan \theta}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\tan \frac{\pi}{4}+\tan \theta}{1-\tan \frac{\pi}{4} \tan \theta}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\tan ^{-1}\left[\tan \left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta\right)\right]=\frac{\pi}{4}+\theta[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{\pi}{4}+\tan ^{-1} x\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{1+x^{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1731 (ID: 474768)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x})=\sin \mathbf{x}[/math] হয় তবে, [math]f\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)[/math] এর অন্তরজ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-1}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}f\left(\cos ^{-1} x\right)=\sin \cos ^{-1} x=\sin \sin ^{-1} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}=\sqrt{1-x^{2}}\\\frac{d}{d x} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}=\frac{-2 x}{2 \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\frac{-x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x}[/math] হলে, [math]\mathbf{y}_{2}[/math] এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]x^{-3}[/math]
B. [math]x^{3}[/math]
C. [math]2 x^{-3}[/math]
D. [math]2 x^{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 x^{-3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x} \Rightarrow y_{1}=-\frac{1}{x^{2}} \Rightarrow y_{2}=\frac{2}{x^{3}}[/math]

Question:
[math]y=\frac{1}{x^{2}}[/math] হলে [math](-1,0)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]y_{1}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]1[/math]
গ. [math]-1[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\frac{1}{x^{2}}=x^{-2} \\y_{1}=-2 x^{-3} \\y_{1}(-1,0)=-2(-1)^{-3}=2\end{array}[/math]

Question #1737 (ID: 474774)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\cos 3 x[/math] এর [math]n[/math] -তম অন্তরজ সহগ—

Options:
ক. [math]3^{n} \sin \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]
খ. [math]3^{n} \cos 3 x[/math]
গ. [math]3^{n} \sin 3 x[/math]
ঘ. [math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=\cos 3 x \\\Rightarrow y_{1}=-3 \sin 3 x=3 \cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2}+3 x\right) \\\Rightarrow y_{2}=-9 \cos 3 x=3^{2} \cos \left(\frac{2 \pi}{2}+3 x\right) \\\Rightarrow y_{3}=27 \sin 3 x=3^{3} \cos \left(\frac{3 \pi}{2}+3 x\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore y_{n}=3^{n} \cos \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+3 x\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1738 (ID: 474775)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{2}[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](− 1, – 2)[/math] বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]2[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{y}=2 \mathrm{x}^{2} \therefore \frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=4 \mathrm{x} \therefore(-1,-2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=-4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1739 (ID: 474776)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=2 x^{2}+3 x+5[/math] - বক্ররেখার [math](0, 1)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\dot{y}=2 x^{2}+3 x+5 \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=4 x+3[/math]
 [math](0,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=4.0+3=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অভিলম্বের ঢাল [math]=-\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1740 (ID: 474777)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x)=x-x^{2}[/math] ফাংশনটির কোন বিন্দুতে অঙ্কিত স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল ?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-\frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2},-\frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]y_{1}=1-2 x[/math]
 . স্পর্শক x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তাই [math]y_{1}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1-2 x=0 \Rightarrow x=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{f}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{1}{2}-\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}=\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 স্পর্শবিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1742 (ID: 474779)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]'b'[/math] এর মান কত হলে, [math]y = bx(1 – bx)[/math] বক্ররেখার মূলবিন্দুতে স্পর্শকটি x-অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]60°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=b x(1-b x) \therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=b-2 b^{2} x[/math]
মূলবিন্দুতে [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=\mathrm{b}-2 \mathrm{~b}^{2} .0=\mathrm{b}[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=b=\tan 60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1743 (ID: 474780)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}+2 x+6[/math] বক্ররেখার [math](0, 6)[/math] বিন্দুতে অভিলম্বের সমীকরণ কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 x-y+6=0[/math]
খ. [math]2 x+y+6=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-2 y+12=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+2 y-12=0[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]x+2 y-12=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=x^{3}+2 x+6[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{dy}}{\mathrm{dx}}=3 \mathrm{x}^{2}+2 \cdot \frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dy}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3 \mathrm{x}^{2}+2}[/math]
 [math](0,6)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{dx}}{\mathrm{dy}}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 এবং অভিলম্বেরসমীকরণ, [math]y-6=-\frac{1}{2}(x-0)[/math]
 [math]x+2 y-12=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1744 (ID: 474781)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=4 e^{x}+e^{-x}[/math] এর লঘুমান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=4 e^{x}+e^{-x} \\\frac{d y}{d x}=4 e^{x}-e^{-x} \\\frac{d^{2} y}{d x^{2}}=4 e^{x}+e^{-x}\end{array}[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]\frac{d y}{d x}=4 e^{x}-e^{-x}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 e^{x}=\frac{1}{e^{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{e}^{2 x}=\frac{1}{4}=2^{-2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x=\ln 2^{-2}=-2 \ln 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x =-\ln 2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=-\ln 2[/math]
 হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \mathrm{y}}{\mathrm{dx}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{e}^{-\ln 2}+\mathrm{e}^{\ln 2}[/math]
 [math]=4[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{2}+2=4>0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 লঘুমান [math]y=4 e^{-\ln 2}[/math]
 [math]+e^{\ln 2}=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1745 (ID: 474782)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]X, Y \subset R[/math] এবং [math]f: X \rightarrow Y[/math] যেখানে, [math]f(x)=\frac{2 x-3}{4 x+5}[/math] [math]f(x)[/math] এর রেঞ্জ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\{2\}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{-\frac{5}{4}\right\}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]

Solution:
আমরা জানি, [math]f(x)=\frac{a x+b}{c x+d}[/math]
ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{a}{c}\right\}[/math]
 [math]\therefore f(x)=\frac{2 x-3}{4 x+5}[/math]
 ফাংশনের রেঞ্জ [math]=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{2}{4}\right\}=\mathbb{R}-\left\{\frac{1}{2}\right\}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1747 (ID: 474784)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{x}-5^{-x}}{5^{x}+5^{-x}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-5[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{x}\left(1-\frac{5^{-x}}{5^{x}}\right)}{5^{x}\left(1+\frac{5^{-x}}{5^{x}}\right)}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1-\frac{1}{5^{2 x}}}{1+\frac{1}{5^{2 x}}}=\frac{1-0}{1+0}=1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1748 (ID: 474785)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=e^{-x}[/math] হলে [math]\mathbf{y}_{5}[/math] কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-e^{-x}[/math]
B. [math]e^{-x}[/math]
C. [math]-5 e^{-x}[/math]
D. [math]5 \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-e^{-x}[/math]

Solution:
[math]y=e^{-x}[/math]
 এর [math]\mathrm{n}[/math]
 তম অন্তরজ, [math]y_{n}=(-1)^{n} e^{-x}[/math]
 [math]n=5[/math]
 হলে অর্থাৎ [math]y_{5}=(-1)^{5} e^{-x}=-e^{-x}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1749 (ID: 474786)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]y = ax(1 − x)[/math] একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ ।

বক্ররেখাটির মূল বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-a[/math]
খ. [math]a[/math]
গ. [math]a-2 a x[/math]
ঘ. [math]a+2 a x[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]a[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}y=a x(1-x)=a x-a x^{2} \\\therefore \frac{d y}{d x}=a-2 a x\end{array}[/math]
বক্ররেখাটির মূল বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল [math]=a-2 a .0=a[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1750 (ID: 474787)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = ax(1 − x)[/math]একটি বক্ররেখার সমীকরণ

মূল বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]a x-y=0[/math]
খ. [math]a x+y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x-a y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+a y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]a x-y=0[/math]

Solution:
মূল বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ, [math]y-0=a(x-0)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow y=a x\\\therefore a x-y=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1751 (ID: 474788)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোনটি অসীম লিমিট?

Options:
ক. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{x^{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{x^{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} e^{x}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} e^{-x}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{x^{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{1}{x^{3}}=\infty\therefore \text { Ans.(a) }[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1752 (ID: 474789)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x^{2}}{3 x^{2}-4}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{2 x^{2}}{x^{2}\left(3-\frac{4}{x^{2}}\right)}=\frac{2}{3-0}=\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1753 (ID: 474790)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{4+3 x-x^{2}}{7+2 x+3 x^{2}}[/math] এর সঠিক মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{7}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow \alpha} \frac{4+3 x-x^{2}}{7+2 x+3 x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\text { coefficient of } x^{2}}{\text { coefficient of } x^{2}}=\frac{-1}{3} \therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1756 (ID: 474793)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-\sin \sqrt{x}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{\sqrt{x}^{6}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{d}{d x}(\cos \sqrt{x})[/math]
 [math]=-\sin \sqrt{x} \times \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\sin \sqrt{x}}{2 \sqrt{x}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1757 (ID: 397621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. -8
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. 8


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\cos x-1}{x^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{-\sin x}{2 x}=-\frac{1}{2} \times \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}=-\frac{1}{2} \times 1=-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1758 (ID: 397622)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+x}}{x+1}=?[/math]

Options:
A. 1
B. [math]-\infty[/math]
C. [math]\infty[/math]
D. -1


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+x}}{x+1}\\=\lim _{x \rightarrow-\infty} \frac{(-x) \sqrt{1+\frac{1}{x}}}{x\left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1777 (ID: 793875)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: দি. বো.'২০২৩
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

Options:
ক. <p>5</p>

খ. <p>3</p>

গ. <p>-5</p>

ঘ. <p>-3</p>



Correct Answer: খ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #1808 (ID: 793866)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]f(x) = \sin {x \over 2}[/math] হলে [math]f''( {\pi \over 2})[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. <p><span class="math-tex">\(-1 \over 2 \sqrt 2\)</span></p>

খ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(-1 \over 4 \sqrt 2\)</span></p>

গ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(1 \over 2 \sqrt 2\)</span></p>

ঘ. <p><span class="math-tex">\(1 \over  \sqrt 2\)</span></p>



Correct Answer: খ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #1839 (ID: 793808)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lim \limits_{x \to 0} \space {\ \ln (1-3x) \over 3x }[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. <p>1</p>

খ. <p>1/3</p>

গ. <p>-1</p>

ঘ. <p>-3</p>



Correct Answer: গ

Solution:


Explanation:
